1b1(mdo sde): //rgyu gar skad du/Ar+yA pra drud pan+d+ha bud d+hA sam mu kha A ba s+thi ta
1b2(mdo sde): sa mA d+hi nA ma ma hU~M yA na sU tra/bod skad du/'phags pa de ltar gyi sangs
1b3(mdo sde): rgyus mA ngan snyam du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i ma//
1b4(mdo sde): bom po dang po//sengs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
2a1(mdo sde): /'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/smyig ma'i
2a2(mdo sde): rgyal bya la d+hA k+taganas pa/dge lta ba rgyu tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen pa ding bkyis citshig tu bzugs/
2a3(mdo sde): cad kyang dgra bcom pa/zag pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor
2a4(mdo sde): ba/bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang dag pa'i shes pas semos shin tu rnam par
2a5(mdo sde): grol ba/sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa sha stag ste/gang zag gcig
2b1(mdo sde): ma gtogs pa ni 'di lta ste/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o//de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong zhes bya ba rgyal po'i
2b2(mdo sde): khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsom thams cad kyang khyim par gyur cing bslab pa'i gzhi lnga yongs su
2b3(mdo sde): bzung ba sha stag dang lhan cig tu chos nyan pa'i phyir bcomi ldan 'das kyi zhabs 'bring byed par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems
2b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas bcom ldan 'das go la bder
2b5(mdo sde): song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te ldan bdun bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das
2b6(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngor phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsom po de dag kyang phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/
3a1(mdo sde): /bcom ldan 'das galta ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lnga mgo ngas phyag bcul
3a2(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das la len bdun bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//dge
3a3(mdo sde): skyong lnga brgya tsam po de dag kyang phye ma red kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las longs nas/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
3a4(mdo sde): dong ste lhagos nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabyas la mgro bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lAn+da bdun bskor ba
3a5(mdo sde): byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /tshe drang
3a6(mdo sde): ljon pa med+gal gyi bu chen po dang mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen por dbyar gnas nas dge slong lnga brgya tsam dang lhan cig tu rim
3b1(mdo sde): gyis yul rgyu zhing rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po glal ba dang /smyig ma'i tshal byA ka lan+ta kA gnas pa gang na ba dang /bcom ldan 'das rga
3b2(mdo sde): la bya de dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsalo te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
3b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya bro mngon
3b4(mdo sde): par mdzad pas dge slong dge yul so so ni rten cing gnas pa de dag thams cad rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga le ba dang /spyi go ma'i tshal byeka
3b5(mdo sde): lan+ta ka gnas pa ga le ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la bya der dong ste lhagros nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgro bos phyog btsal to//
3b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byes nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sbyar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du
3b7(mdo sde): bya ba mngon par mdzad do//yang de'i tshe smyi go ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ke gnas par dge slong 'bum lhan cig tu 'dus te 'khod par gyur to//de nas
4a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo gau ta ma la sogs pa dge
4a2(mdo sde): skyong ma sum khri rgyal po'i khyab kyi grong khyer chen pa gal byi dang /smyig ma'i tshul byA k+ku lan+ta ka gnas pa ga laM ba dang /bcom ldan 'das gal bder
4a3(mdo sde): sing ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lnga mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan
4a4(mdo sde): 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad do//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta
4a5(mdo sde): bubri'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba yangs pa'i glong
4a6(mdo sde): khyer tshon po nas byung ste/l-i tsA bi gzhon nu nyi khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga
4a7(mdo sde): lo ba dang /smig ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pagol ba dang /bcom ldan 'das g.yo bai der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
4b1(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /byang chub
4b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phug sbas kyang grong khyer chen po tsam+ba ya nas byung ste/srog chags nyi khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas
4b3(mdo sde): lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga le ba dang /smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags
4b4(mdo sde): nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs
4b5(mdo sde): gcig tu 'khod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dum bus byin yang grong khyer chen po ba rA NA si nas byung ste/srog chags nyi khro lnga stong gis
4b6(mdo sde): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /smyig ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /bcom
4b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
5a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshams bzang yang ser skya'i gnas
5a2(mdo sde): kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/srog chags nyi khri brgyad stong gis yongs su skor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la
5a3(mdo sde): dang /smyig ma'i tshal bya kaM lan+ta ka gnas pa ga le bu dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dang ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
5a4(mdo sde): btsal to/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sbyar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa'
5a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po ded dpon chen po dang /khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang mnyan yod kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/srog chags nyi khri brgyad stong
5a6(mdo sde): gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nus lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ge la ba dang /smyig ma'i tshe le bya ki len+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /bcom
5a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhogs nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom
5b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi spyan+da sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang pos byin yang kro'u shAm+bI'i grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/
5b2(mdo sde): srog chags nyi khri brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor cir mdun du bder nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /smyig myi'i tshal byako nA ka gnas pa ga la
5b3(mdo sde): dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba drer dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das laM lan gsum bskor
5b4(mdo sde): ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu lha'ang gnas bcas kyi grong khyer
5b5(mdo sde): chen po nas byung ste/srog chags nyi khro brgyad stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du 'dur nas lhan cig tu rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po ga la ba dang /smyig
5b6(mdo sde): ma'i tshal bya ka lan+ta ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabastsol mgo bos phyag btsal nos
5b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /rgyal po ma skyes dgra'ang rgyal po'i
6a1(mdo sde): khyab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung /spro/chags kum khri tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du byedar nas lhan cig tu smrig ma'i chal bya/la
6a2(mdo sde): ka gnas pa ga la ba dang /bcom ldan 'das pa ng+ge da snre lang/sa nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mai ga des phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das lnga
6a3(mdo sde): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan rnanas kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang /rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /mi
6a4(mdo sde): mdzod kyi 'dag pa rgyang so pa dang /lha'i bu dade la sgrib kyang bye bo khrag khrig pa mang phrag du mas yongs su banar cing mdun du ba t+ta/lhan cig tu de tsam ldan
6a5(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba der drong nas lhags pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi nabs la mgongs phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das lnga lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
6a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs gcig tu 'khyod bu dang /lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po 'dra gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor
6a7(mdo sde): cing mdun du bdar nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo ngos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das la len
6b1(mdo sde): gsum bsko rU ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshoms gcig tu 'kho pa dang /lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi'ang lha ma yin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
6b2(mdo sde): du ma dang lhan cig/klu'i rgyal po dga' blo dang nyi dga' yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig/gru'i rgyal po ma dros kyang ku bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
6b3(mdo sde): phrag du ma dang lhan cig/klu'i rgyal po gzi can yang klu bye ba khrig khrig brgya stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig/klu'i rgyal po a la'i 'dab ma'ang blo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
6b4(mdo sde): phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/bcom ldan 'das lnga ldan
6b5(mdo sde): gsum bskor ba byas nas/phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon pa 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad do//yang de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
6b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'dri/'di nas steng du tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad tha na 'khar ba'i mo gzugs pa'i sa khyon tsam yang dbang che ba dbang che bar grags pa'i lha dang /
6b7(mdo sde): klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /ma'amatsho dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ma gang ba gang yang med par gyur to//
7a1(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong stan las langs nus bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i ltung
7a2(mdo sde): sa la gtsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//btsun pa gal te
7a3(mdo sde): zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
7a4(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ge' zhig zhu'o//de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzung skyong
7a5(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bzang skyong de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang /dris pa
7a6(mdo sde): de dang de lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong gis bcom ldan
7a7(mdo sde): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na thos pa rgya mtsho 'dra ba dang /thos pa
7b1(mdo sde): bsags pa rnams su gyur pa dang /nem nur ma mchis pa dang /the tshom ma mchis pa dang /yid gnyis ma mchis pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /bla na med pa yang
7b2(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lus mi nyams shing yongs su mi nyams pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /mi dal ba rnams su mi skye ba dang /skye ba dran pa rnams su 'gyur ba
7b3(mdo sde): dang /tha na rmi lam du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /gzugs bzang zhing mdze snga la lta ni sdug cing khwa drog bzang ba rgyas
7b4(mdo sde): pa mchog dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /rigs mtho ba dang rigs che ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /g.yog 'khor mang zhing g.yog 'khor mi phyed pa rnams su
7b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /dran pa dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /blo gros dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /dpal
7b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /brtan pa dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /shes rab dang ldan pa rnams su
7b7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /nga rgyal bcag pa rnams
8a1(mdo sde): su 'gyur ba dang /byams pa la gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /ye shes dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /blo dang ldan pa rnams
8a2(mdo sde): su 'gyur ba dang /brtson 'grus dang ldan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /ma zhum pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /don gyi rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /chos kyi
8a3(mdo sde): rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /zhi granas kyi rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /lhag mthong gi rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /bsam gtan/
8a4(mdo sde): gyi rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /shes rab kyi rjes su 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /stong pa
8a5(mdo sde): nyid dang /mtshan ma med pa dang /smon pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis mi skrag mi dngang dngang par mi 'gyur ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /g.yang sa chen por mi ltung
8a6(mdo sde): ba'i steng du chos rab tu 'dzin pa dang /chos smra ba chen po rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du phye bar sems kyi smon pa de dang der skye ba dang //
8a7(mdo sde): mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad kyis yongs su mi zin pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /rgyu'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur gyi rkyen gyi stobs can rnams su mi 'gyur
8b1(mdo sde): ba dang /bsam pa'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /skor ba'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /dbang po'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /dmigs
8b2(mdo sde): pa'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /nges par sems pa'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /zhi gnas kyi stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /rnam par lta
8b3(mdo sde): ba'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /mos pa'i stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /smon lam gyi stobs can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /bsam pa yongs
8b4(mdo sde): su mi zad pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /thos pa rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pas rgya mche chu gter lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /dkar po'i chos yongs su rdzogs pas
8b5(mdo sde): zla ba lta bu rnams sa 'gyur ba dang /mi shes pa'i mun pa bsol bas nyi ma lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /snang bar byed pas mar me lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba
8b6(mdo sde): dang /shin tu ma gos pas bar snang lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas pri gnos pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /chos thams
8b7(mdo sde): cad nges par rtogs pas rdo rje lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /mthu brtan pas ri lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /mi g.yo bas brtan pa'i chos can rnams su 'gyur
9a1(mdo sde): ba dang /legs par gnas pas sgo'i them pa lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sems las su rung byas byi la'i pags pa lta bu rnams su
9a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /bya ltar gang dang gang du 'dod par 'gro bas yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /gdol blo lta bur nga rgyal bcag pa rnams
9a3(mdo sde): su 'gyur ba dang /grong dang grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor dang /pho brang 'khor la mngon par dga' ba mi skyed pa dang /ri dgos dang /spre'u dang /
9a4(mdo sde): mtshungs pas dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba rnams dang /lhan cig tu mi sten pas ma 'dres pa rnams su
9a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /tshogs yongs su sdud pas tshogs kyi ston pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sems can thams cad kyis mi bskyod pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /bdud
9a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis gdul dka' ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /chos thams cad shin tu nges par shes pas so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /
9a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /byams pa chen po rab tu mi g.yo bas zil gyis gnon par dka' zhing //
9b1(mdo sde): bsam pa brtan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /dmyigs su med pa la spyad cing brjod du med pa'i spyod yul dang ldan pas lhag pa'i byasam pa thub pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /
9b2(mdo sde): chos kyi shugs kyis dga' bas bag yod pa mang shing bskum pa mnyen pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro'i las bgyid pas lhag
9b3(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa rgya che ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs yang dag par sgrub byas lhag pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs rnams su 'gyur ba dang /rgyan gyis brgyan pa
9b4(mdo sde): rnams dag pas lhag pa'i bsam pa dge bya rnams su 'gyur ba dang /brdzun dang khong khro ba'i skyon spangs pas lhag bi'i bsam pa bzang po rnams su 'gyur ba dang /
9b5(mdo sde): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba thob pas lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dgu pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sems dang zhing tha ba med la shes rab rgyus pa
9b6(mdo sde): yongs su bzung bas yid bde ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyan kyis 'argyan pa rnam par dag pas bkod pa chen
9b7(mdo sde): po la spyad pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rnams su 'gyur ba de//nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems yid la bkyi bya dang bral bas/tshul khrims yongs
10a1(mdo sde): su dag pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /brtsams pa thams cad nyams su lon pas yi dam la brtan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sems can thams
10a2(mdo sde): cad dge ba'i chos rjes su spyod pa'i sngon du 'gro ba rnams su 'gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bslab pa rnams dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la
10a3(mdo sde): yongs su mi 'jigs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la phyir mi ldog pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /bdud dang mu stegs can gzhan
10a4(mdo sde): dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /yid lo byed pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gzhog pas chos thams cad
10a5(mdo sde): la mos pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad la phar 'du shes pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /chos thams cad la snang ba skyes pas sangs rgyas
10a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon du gyur pas shes pa sgrib pa med pa rnams su 'gyur pa dang /
10a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad la rlom sems med pas sgyu ma'i skyes bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /ma skyes ma 'ongs shing 'gro ba med pa'i chos dang ldan pas sprul pa lta bu rnams
10b1(mdo sde): su 'gyur ba dang /dus gsum la rtog pas rmi lam lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rang gi lus yang dag par ston pas gzugs/
10b2(mdo sde): brnyan lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /'pho ba med cing mi gnas la rten pa med pa'i cha sma can pos brag cha lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /'chi 'phro dang /skye ba thams cad
10b3(mdo sde): la grib ma lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /dwangos po'i 'du shes spangs pas dngos po med par shes pa la gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /gnyis la kun tu spyod pa med
10b4(mdo sde): pas mtshan nyid med pa'i chos lnga gzholnga ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /byang chub kyi sems tshad med pas/chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas gtugs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /
10b5(mdo sde): sems kyi rgyud mi g.yo bas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mi g.yo ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhong thams cad la mi chags pa'i spyod yul dang ldan
10b6(mdo sde): pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas/gzungs kyi sgo rnams su zhugs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos
10b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyi snod du gyur pas chos kyi snod rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis brtan pas ng+ge bsnyed gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs
11a1(mdo sde): pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /khyu mchog dang seng+ge'i sgra sgrogs pas bag tsha ba med pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten thams cad la yang dag par
11a2(mdo sde): dga' bar byed pas 'jigs pa med pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pas rmongs pa med pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /chos thams cad
11a3(mdo sde): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing the tshom drang bral bas de bzhin nyid rab tu rtogs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /dris pa thams cad lung bstan pa la srid pa dang dus gsum ston
11a4(mdo sde): nus pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /snying rje chen po thob pas phan pa 'dod pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /chos ston pa la ngal ba med pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sems
11a5(mdo sde): can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba la gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sgyu med pas g.yo med pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten thams cad kyi skyon
11a6(mdo sde): mar gyur pas drang po rnams su 'gyur ba dang /khrims gsum thams cad na tshod med pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /tha snyad tsam du rnam par dpyod pas nyon mongs
11a7(mdo sde): pa med pa la gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /gzhi med pa la dga' bas ma 'dres par glanas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos can pas
11b1(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /theg pa chen po la sems can thams rgyud gzhog pas thams cad mkhyen pA n+ta gtA mA yang dag par ston na
11b2(mdo sde): rnams su 'gyur ba dang /'jigs shing spu zing shes byed pa thams cad dang bral bas mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /mdo sde'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad
11b3(mdo sde): li de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs te gsungs pa la mkhas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /'khor thams cad kyi nang du nye bar 'gro bas bzhin kun tu ston pa rnams su
11b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /theg pa chen po la 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod cing thams cad mkhyen pa ltar bsod nams kyi bdag po rnams su 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten pa
11b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sbyin gnas su gyur pas yon tan zung mi shes pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhabs kyi drung du dga' ba dang /dad pa chen po
11b6(mdo sde): rnyed pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs sgyu d+hi ba la dge ba'i skabs pa can rnams su 'gyur ba dang /'khor gyi nang du 'jigs shing
11b7(mdo sde): big che ba spangs pas yid su mi 'gong ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pas smra ba'i sdig lta bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /b.ram
12a1(mdo sde): phyogs thams cad 'jom pas dam bcas pa mA nyams pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gnang bas chos kyi 'bel ba'i gtam
12a2(mdo sde): gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir/seng ge'i sgra sgrog cing seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa mang ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /yang dag par brjod pa la 'jug pa thams cad rab
12a3(mdo sde): tu rtog pas/'jig rten rgyang pan pa thams cad ma bstan pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rgyu la gnas pas dam pa'i chos smra ba rnams su
12a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring bgyid pas chos 'dod pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa la mi
12a5(mdo sde): skyo ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /phyogs bcur rnam par rgyu bas gnas ma mchis pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid
12a6(mdo sde): po'i smon lam 'debs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /rin po che'i mchog la ngal sos par bgyid pa la mkhas pas/chos kyi rgya mtshor zhugs pa rnams su
12a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pas/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mi g.yo ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /
12b1(mdo sde): srungs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul gyis/rnam par rdol pa spyod pas cho 'phrul chen po myong ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas bralta ba sems kyi skad
12b2(mdo sde): cig gcig la rag las pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /chos la gus pa rnyed pas/ye shes kyis bskor ba rnams su 'gyur ba dang /chos kyi sri dang drag rtogs
12b3(mdo sde): sa/nam mkha' lta bu rnams smra 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas kyi gladung mi chad par brjid pas/byang chub sems dpa'i rnams lnga yang dag par 'dzin tu 'a
12b4(mdo sde): rnams su 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad rgyun mi gcod pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /legs par gnas shing myur ba'i cang shes pa'i/
12b5(mdo sde): che chen po bags pa rnams skyo 'gyur ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i sel thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba rnams su 'gyur
12b6(mdo sde): dang /bgrang ba'i tshul gyi tshig shes pas 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /grangs kyi rnam pa thams cad nye bar rdzogs pas
12b7(mdo sde): 'jig pa dang /tshogs pa thams cad la mkhas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /gtong ba thams cad la nan tan bgyid pas mi gnas shing len pa ma mchis pa rnams
13a1(mdo sde): su 'gyur ba dang /'gyod pa med pa'i sbyin bdag chen por gyur pa sku gtong ba la mkhas pa rnams su 'gyur ba dang /skyid pa'i 'gro ba thams
13a2(mdo sde): cad kyi skye ba'i gnas rnams don du mi gnyer bu rnams su 'gyur ba dang /'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'o/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
13a3(mdo sde): kyi/sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag mthing zhing /chos kyang nyan la de'ang 'dzin cing maing+kuSh+Ta pa la lnga mngon par shos pa'ang ma lags/drug mngon par shes pa'ang
13a4(mdo sde): ma lags shing /byang chub sems dpa' de rnams 'jig rten gyi khams de nas shi 'phos te/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na gnas pa'ang ma lags la/byung
13a5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de rnams 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na gnas bzhin du/sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong lnga chos kyang nyan cing /de thams cad kyang kun+da
13a6(mdo sde): tu'adzin te/ji ltar bdag da ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na mchis pa bzhin du the tshom dang nem nur mA mchis pa de bzhin du/byang chub sems dpa' ji
13a7(mdo sde): rnams kyang tha na rmi lam na'ang sangs rgyas mthong shing /chos nyin pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams su 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang legs/bzang skyong gis zhus
13b1(mdo sde): pa'i 'dzin gyi le'u ste dang po'o////de skadu ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
13b2(mdo sde): bzang skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bzang skyong legs so legs so//yang bzang skyong khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /
13b3(mdo sde): 'jig rten lnga snyid brtse ba dang /sgo blo la po che dang /lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang phan pa dang 'de ba'i byor tshugs shing /bzang skyid khyod do ltar de bzhin gsheg smral
13b4(mdo sde): la don 'di dri bar sems pa legs so//bzang skyong khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bye ba byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stod mang po la
13b5(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byas pa/chos don du gnyer ba/chos 'dod pa/mi dmigs po/tshangs par spyod pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par slob par
13b6(mdo sde): byed pa/byang chubasems dpa' rnams yang dag par dga' bar byed pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sbyin pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par 'dzin du
13b7(mdo sde): 'jug pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams pa yang dag par gzeng po stod pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la lung 'bog pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la sbyin
14a1(mdo sde): par byed pa/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par 'dod pa/snying rje che ba/sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/sems kyi dab
14a2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/srangs rgyas mthong ba smon lam rgya che ba/spyod yul zab pa/thams cad mkhyen pa sems pa/byang chub yang
14a3(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin pa/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung ston pa/byang chub kyi sems rdo rje lta bu dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
14a4(mdo sde): kun tu spyod pa la mkhas pa/sangs rgyas thams cad dang mngon sum du gnas pa ste/bzang skyong khyod kyi yon tan brjod na lta mthar mi phyin to//bzung skyong du
14a5(mdo sde): ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum ru bzhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ting nge 'dzin de bzung zhing ma brjod la/rna blags te nyan cing sems mi g.yeng
14a6(mdo sde): ba rnyed na/yon tan gyi khyad par de dag rnyed pa mi dka' bar 'gyur ro//de nus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong gis bcom ldan 'das la
14a7(mdo sde): /'di skad ces gsol te/ka btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ting nge 'dzin de bshad par gsol/de ni skye bo mang po la sman pa dang //
14b1(mdo sde): skye bo mang po lnga bde ba dang /'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che dang /lha dang mi'i don dang sman pa dang bde bar 'gyur zhing /ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub
14b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la'ang snang ba chen po bgyis par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang
14b3(mdo sde): skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bzang skyong de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon lA yid la gzung zhig dang ngas khyod la bshad do//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin no//zhes
14b4(mdo sde): gsol te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar
14b5(mdo sde): nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//bzang skyong chos gcig la kun tu bsten nges par bsten cing bsgom pa la ldan mang du byas//
14b6(mdo sde): lam du byas/gzhir byas/yang dag par bslang /legs par byang bar byas/shin tu yongs su sbyangs/shin tu mnyam par bzhag/shin tu yang dag
14b7(mdo sde): par brtsams na yon tan thams cad khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ro//chos gcig po gang zhe na/'di lta ste/da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs
15a1(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/mang du thos pa sngon du 'phro ba'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//bzang skyong de la da ltar rgyu
15a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i sems yid la byed pa/sems
15a3(mdo sde): mri g.yeng ba/dran pa nye bar gnas pa/shes rab thob pa/brtson 'grus mi gtong ba/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa/stong pa
15a4(mdo sde): nyid kun tu sten pa/sgom pa mang du byed pa/sgrib pa rnams spong ba/rmugs pa dang gnyid rnam par spong ba/gtam yongs su spong ba/sdig pa'i grogs
15a5(mdo sde): po rnams rnam par spong ba/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la nges par snyan pa/dbang po rnams mi g.yeng ba/zas kyi tshod shes pa/nam gyis
15a6(mdo sde): spyod dang /cha smad la mi nyal ba'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/gos dang /zas dang /ma lA stan dang /na ba'i gsos sman dang /yo byad rnams la mi
15a7(mdo sde): chags pa/dgon pa la gnas pa mi gtong ba/lus la ched che bar mi byed pa/srog la mi lte ba/lus gtong ba sems can la phon 'dogs pa
15b1(mdo sde): gnyen rnams yongs su spong ba/skyes pa'i sa ring du byed pa/byams pa la kun tu brten pa/snying rje thob pa/dga' ba la gnas pa/btang snyoms sgom pa/
15b2(mdo sde): nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su gtong pa/bsam gtan rnams sgrub ci'i dri dgra gi ro myong bar mi byed pa/gzugs kyi 'du shes rnam par 'jig pa/mi
15b3(mdo sde): sdug pa'i 'du shes rnyed pa/dran pa mi g.yeng bu/phung po rnams yongs su mi 'dzin pa/khams rnams la rlom sems med pa/skye mched rnams la mngon
15b4(mdo sde): par mi chags pa/rigs smra bas snyems par mi byed pa/nga rgyal tshar gcod pa/gzhan gyis rnyed pa la phrag dog med pa/sems can la phan pa'i gzhir
15b5(mdo sde): gyur pa/sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa/sems can thams cad mi gtong ba/sems can thams cad yongs su grol bar byed pa/sems can
15b6(mdo sde): thams cad la bdag tu 'du shes pa/sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa/phar 'du shes pa/bur 'du shes pa/gnyen du 'du shes pa/sems
15b7(mdo sde): can thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par 'du shes pa/dngos po thams cad yongs su mi 'dzin pa/tshul khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin pa/ting nge 'dzin la nges
16a1(mdo sde): par sten pa/mang du thos pa 'dod cing des kyang rlom sems su mi byed pa/tshul khrims kyi phung po la skyon med pa/ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la
16a2(mdo sde): g.yo ba med pa/chos rnams la the tshom med pa/sangs rgyas dang mthun pa/chos mi spong ba/dge 'dun mi 'byed po/phra ma'i tshig spong ba/'phags pa
16a3(mdo sde): rnams kyi drung du nye bar 'gro zhing de dag lta bsnyen bkur byed pa/byis pa rnams rnam par spong ba/'jig rten po'i gtam la mngon par mi dga' zhing mi 'dod
16a4(mdo sde): lA ring du byed pa/'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtim la mngon par dga' zhing 'dod la 'dun cing sten pa/gtum rgyud ma yin pa spong ba/dga' bar byed
16a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos drug lnga brten pa/snyan pa rnams sgrub/sgri ba pa lta spong ba/rnam par grol ba'i skye mched lnga la brten pa/phung po lnga yongs su shes pa/mi dge
16a6(mdo sde): babacu'i las kyi lam rnam par spong ba/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam sgom pa stobs bcu sgrub pa/kun nas mnar sems kyi dngos po drugu rnam par sbyong ba/'du
16a7(mdo sde): shes dgu rnam par 'jig pa/le lo'i dngos po brgyad rnam par spong ba/brtsam pa'i dngos po brgyad la nges par brten pa/zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched
16b1(mdo sde): brgyad la kun tu brten pa/rnam par grol ba brgyad sgom pa/rjes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad thob pa/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang mthun pa//
16b2(mdo sde): bsam gtan la mi chags pa/thos pas rlom sems mi byed pa/nga rgyal bcom pa/chos nyan par 'dod pa/chos 'dod pa/chos don du gnyer ba/chos la 'dun pa/
16b3(mdo sde): chos la phyogs pa/chos la 'bab pa/chos la gzhol ba/chos la brtson pa/bdag tu 'du shes pas rlom sems su mi byed pa/sems can du 'du shes pa spong ba/
16b4(mdo sde): srog tu 'du shes pa mi dmigs pa/gang zag tu 'du shes pa yongs su spong ba/phung por 'du shes pa rnam par sel ba/dngos por 'du shes pa la mi gnas pa/mya
16b5(mdo sde): ngan las 'da' ba mi 'dod pa/phung po rnams mi 'dod pa/'khor ba la mi zad pa'i 'jigs par 'du shes pa/phung po rnams la gshed mar 'du shes pa/khams
16b6(mdo sde): rnams la sbrul gdug par 'du shes pa/skye mched rnams la grong stong par 'du shes pa/khrims gsum la mi bde bar 'du shes pa/mya ngan las 'das pa la phan
16b7(mdo sde): yin du lta ba/'dod pa rnams la mchil ma'i thal ba ltar spong bar 'du shes pa/zas la mi mthun par 'du shes pa/mngon par 'byung ba la gzhol ba/khyim na
17a1(mdo sde): gnas pa la mngon par mi dga' ba/bu dang bu mo rnams la dgrar 'du shes pa/chung ma la srin mor 'du shes pa/sangs rgyas kyi bstan
17a2(mdo sde): pa la mi phyed par dad pa/sems can thams cad dang mi mthun pa med pa/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gnas pa med pa/sangs rgyas thams cad
17a3(mdo sde): mngon sum du gyur pa/legs par bsnyen par rdzogs shing tshangs pa legs par spyad pa/lus thams cad rtogs pa/mos pas yongs su dag pa/lhag
17a4(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pas dge ba/sems las su rung ba/mi rigs pa la brtson pa rnams rnam par spong ba/rigs par brtson pa rnams la brtson pa/mtshan ma
17a5(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par sel ba/dus gsum mnyam pa/sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dran pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa/sangs rgyas thams cad
17a6(mdo sde): kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang ba/sangs rgyas kyi sku'i mtshan la mngon par mi chags pa/chos thams cad la mnyam pa/'jig
17a7(mdo sde): rten dang mi rtsod pa/bya ba rnams la mi mthun pa med pa/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pa/nges par 'byung ba'i lam de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la
17b1(mdo sde): bzod pa thob pa chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa/nam mkha'i khams yongs su shes pa/sems can gyi khams la mngon par mi chags pa/mi skye ga/mi 'gag pa/
17b2(mdo sde): gnas pa med pa/mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings mngon sum du gyur pa/shes rab kyi mig rnam par sbyong bya/chos thams cad la gnyis su med pa/byang
17b3(mdo sde): chub kyi sems la mtha' dang dbus med pa/sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pa/sangs rgyas thams cad dang thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa/ye shes
17b4(mdo sde): la sgrib pa med pa/byang chub kyi phyir sems yongs su smin pa/sangs rgyas kyi ye shes gzhan la rag ma lus pa/dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la ston
17b5(mdo sde): par 'du shes pa/byang chub sdo mos dpa' rnams la mi 'byed pa/bdud kyi las rnams rnam par spong ba/'gro ba thams cad sprul pa dang mtshungs pa/de
17b6(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa blta ba la mig yor drang mtshungs pa/byang chub kyi sems yongs su 'tshol pa/pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la sems munyam pa/de bzhin
17b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa rnams blta ba la yang dag pa'i mtha' dang mnyam pa/sangs rgyas thams cad la yon tan gyi chos thams cad mnyam pa 'di ni bzang skyong da ltar
18a1(mdo sde): kyis smanas myanasas du barmugs pa nas bya na'i nga myo dus/da myo gas sa su ti 'an m+b+hi ste gnyis pan//
18a2(mdo sde): bzung skyong chos de rnams ni ting nge 'dzin de yongs su skyed par 'gyur te/bzang skyong di la ta~M de dz+nyAn grang chos de rnams kyis yongs su skyed par 'gyur bya
18a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/'di lta ste/da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//bzang srong da ltar gr-I sangs rgyas mngon
18a4(mdo sde): snyam du bzhugs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin de'ang gang zhe na/bzang skyong de la dge slong nga mi/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen mo tshul khrims
18a5(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par spyod par 'gyur la/des gcig pu dben par song skye 'dug nas 'di snyam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
18a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de phyogs gang rol na gnas te 'tsho zhing brnyes la chos kyang ston cing bzhugs pa 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o//des
18a7(mdo sde): skad du thos pa'i rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba phrag 'bum 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na/bcom
18b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa khang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de/da ltar byang chub sems dnga'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du/
18b2(mdo sde): byedar te bzhugs so//'tsho'o//gzhes so//chos kyang ston to snyam du yid la byed de/des kyang sems ma go yengs pas/de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed do//baning
18b3(mdo sde): skyong 'di lta ste dper na skyes pa 'am/bud med gang la la zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam du gzugs kyi rnam pa mthong ste/dngul lam/gser rAm/mdza' bshes sam/
18b4(mdo sde): nyidu 'am/snag gi gnyen mtshams sam/mdza' bo dang /yid du 'ong ba dang /sdug pa dang mi mthun pa med bya dag mthong la/de rmi lam na de dag dang lhan cing
18b5(mdo sde): ci zhing dga'i la dga' dgur spyod cing /smra ba kun tu smra bar rmis pa lus dri sad nas ji ltar mthong ba dang /thos pa dang bye brag phyed pa dang /rnam par shes
18b6(mdo sde): dang /smras pa dang /kun tu smras pa/de thams cad gzhan la'ang brjod cing /de rmi lam gyi mtshan ma rjes su dran pas mchi ma klog par byed pa de bzhin du/
18b7(mdo sde): spyong byang chub sems dpa' 'am/khyim pa'am/rab tu byung ba'ang rung gcig tu dben par song ste 'dug la/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge pa
19a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med ji skad du thos pa'i rnam pas yid la byas te/tshul khrims kyi phung po la skyon med cing dran pa g.yeng ba
19a2(mdo sde): med par nyin zhag gcig gam/gnyis sam/gsum mAm/bzhi 'am/lnga 'am/drug gam/nyin zhag bdun du yid lo bya'o//de gal te nyin zhag
19a3(mdo sde): bdun du sems mi g.yeng bar de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med yid la byed pa de nyin zhag bdun yongs su tshang ste 'das nas/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
19a4(mdo sde): pa tshe dpag med mthong ngo //de gral te nyin mo bcom ldan 'das de mthong na/dri nyal ba'i rmi lam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gla shegs pa tshe dpag med
19a5(mdo sde): de'i zhal ston to//bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na bud med dam skyes pa nyal ba'i rmi lam na bdag nyid khyim na 'dug par yang mi shes/phyogs na 'dug
19a6(mdo sde): par yang mi shes shing /de'i mig gi dbang po la brtsig pas sgrib par yang mi byed/mun pa dang rab rib tu 'ang mi byed pa de bzhin du/bzang skyong byang
19a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'ang ji ltar 'jig rten gyi bar dag gis sgrib par yang mi byed/ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang /ri'i rgyal po kho yog
19b1(mdo sde): dang /khor yug chen po dang /de bzhin du gzhan yang ri nag po rnams kyis mig gi dbang po la sgrib par mi byed pa de lta de ltar sems bskyed de/byang chub/
19b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' de lha'i mig thob pas/de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'ang ma yin/lha'i rna ba'i khams thob pos/dam pa'i chos nyan pa'ong ma yim rdzu 'phrul
19b3(mdo sde): gyi stobs thob pas/'jig rten gyi khams der skad cig tu 'gro ba'ang ma yin gyi/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' nge 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na gnas
19b4(mdo sde): bzhin du/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med de mthong zhing bdag nyid 'jig rten gyi khams de na 'dug du snyam du shes la/chos kyang nyan to//
19b5(mdo sde): 'chad po thos nas kyang chos de dag kun 'dzin to//kun chub par byed do//'dzin par byed do//bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
19b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la bkur stir byed do//bla mar byed do//ri mor byed do//mchod par byed do//byang chub sems dpa' de'i ting
19b7(mdo sde): 'dzin de las langs nas kyang ji skad du thos pa dang /ji ltar bzung ba dang /ji ltar kun chub par byed pa'i chos de dge gzhon la'ang rgya cher yang dag par 'chad do///
20a1(mdo sde): bam po gnyis pa//bzung skyong 'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu zhig rgyal po'i khyab kyi grong khyer chen po na 'dug pa las yangs pa can gyi grong
20a2(mdo sde): khyer na smad 'tshong ma yid bzung zhes bya ba zhi gra yod par thos so//skyes bu gnyis pas ni smad 'tshong ma a mra skyong zhes bya ba zhig yod par thos so//skyes bu
20a3(mdo sde): gsum pas ni sngon gyi rmad 'tshong ma ut+pa la'i mdog ces bya ba yod par thos so//de rnams kyis de dag thos nas so sor so so la sems chags par gyur
20a4(mdo sde): mod kyi/rjes bu de rnams kyis smad 'tshong ma de rnams mthong ba ni ma yin te/ming dang gzugs dang kha dog tsam zhig thos pas/'dod chags kyi sems
20a5(mdo sde): bskyed par gyur to//de dag phyi phyir zhing de yid la byed bzhin du/nyal ba dang rmi lam du'ang smad 'tshong ma de dag gi drung du bdag cag dong ba snyam du shes te/
20a6(mdo sde): ji ltar skyes bu de dag rgyal po'i khob kyi grong khyer chen po na 'khod cing sngon ma nyal bar/de lta de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems skyed pa de bzhin du/
20a7(mdo sde): skyes bu de dag nyal nas kyang rmi lam na smad 'tshong ma de dag mthong zhing phan tshun sprad de/'khrig pa'i chos la brten nas/'khrig pa la dad pa de dang yang
20b1(mdo sde): bral por gyur par rmis so//de dag sad nas ji ltar mthong ba dang /thos pa dang /shes pa dang /rtogs pa'i rmi lam na myong ba rjes su dran nas/bzang skyong khyod
20b2(mdo sde): gleng nu ba der dong ste phyin nas khyod la don de dag brjod do//khyod kyi don de dag thos nas lung 'dri nyid ci nas kyang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
20b3(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to//ngas kyang skyes bu de dgra ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i
20b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas legs par sad pa zhes bya ba rnams su 'gyur ro zhes lung ston to//skyes bu de dag bzod pa rnyed kyang da dung mngon gyi mtshan ma de dag mthong zhing rjes su dran no//bzang
20b5(mdo sde): skyong de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dang ldan pa de ni 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du/
20b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshe dpag med de thos so//des de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan dang gzugs
20b7(mdo sde): dang /yon tan tsam zhig thos nas sems mi g.yeng bar/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag
21a1(mdo sde): med de yang dag par rjes su dran par byed do//de'i phyi phyi shing yid lnga byed pas ni bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo //da ltar gyi sang+yas rgyas
21a2(mdo sde): mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de la gnas te/des de bzhin ga/shegs pa de mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das chos pa dang ldan
21a3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skye bar 'gyur zhes zhu ba zhu'o//de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang drang gang du skye bar 'dod pa de'i
21a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu'o//de skad zhus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med des byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
21a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa kun tu bsten/nges par bsten cing /bsgoms la mang du byas na 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir skye bar byed do//sangs rgyas rjes su dran
21a6(mdo sde): pabakun tu bsten/nges par bsten cing bsgoms la mang du byas na sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skye bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de gang zhen
21a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/gang de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed pa ste/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang //
21b1(mdo sde): bas su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom
21b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang gsor gyi mdog lta ba'i sku dang ldan pa/gser gyi gzugs 'tshe re zhing gsal la legs par gnas
21b3(mdo sde): pa dang 'dra ba/rin po che'i mchod sdong ltar shin tu brgyan pa/nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi nang na chos kyang ston te ci nas kyang chung mi za ba de ltar ston to//ci zhig
21b4(mdo sde): tshud mi za zhe na/sa chud mi gzon no//chu dang me dang rlung dang /'byung po dang /lha dang /bram ze dang /skye dgu'i bdag po chud mi gzon to//gzugs chud
21b5(mdo sde): mi gzon to//tshor ba dang /'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes pa chud mi gzon to//de bzhin gshegs pa rlom sems su mi byed/mi dmigs//
21b6(mdo sde): mngon par mi chags/yang dug par mi shes/mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog/yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/gang de ltaR+Sha de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs
21b7(mdo sde): der yid la byed pas stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin thob pa de ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' de ting nge 'dzin de bsgoms shing ting nge
22a1(mdo sde): nadu lam nyam par banag nas dzin las la sa te/nga byung khyud gangan bad+mor smang nas sbyin pa dang ti ra mang
22a2(mdo sde): pau ShADU b+h+yod de la snod kyis ci nas kyang byang chub sems dung 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byong rgyub las phyir mi ldeg por 'gyur ba de lta 'i skye
22a3(mdo sde): chos ston to//de la ngas kyung skyes bu don mi 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas spobs pa rnyed pa zhes
22a4(mdo sde): zlab 'i rgyur shes lung sbyinate//bad byung rgyud nyid dang gnas padun 'di skad chen po dang /byang chub sems dang 'a dab blos sbyin dang /
22a5(mdo sde): snyoms dpa'i margyam skye bzang dang /gzhon yod byung chub sems dpa'i gang dag gis ti dang 'dzin 'di thob pa rnams ti nge 'dzin 'di la dbang durgyu
22a6(mdo sde): na/ da sbyin byung ba 'angs pa'i dusan skyes bu gcig cig dkon pa'i ma mu zhig tu song ba dang /dI shes shing sgom nas rmugs pa de dag nying
22a7(mdo sde): na/rmil man bze'i bo dang /btang ba med pa zhig rnyed du//da nas kyang rje mchog par zin te/kris pa dang /ma
22b1(mdo sde): de dag kyang myed par gyur to//de sad pa dang /lus dang lto ma rgyas par gyur nas/de 'di snyam du 'di lta ste/rmi lam dang 'dra ba de lta bu'i chos shig yod do snyam
22b2(mdo sde): ste dri de ltar rtogs pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldogs par gyur to//bzang skyong de
22b3(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba'ang rung /phyogs gang dang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs parwa thos pa'i phyogs de dang de logs su
22b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de yid lnga byas na/des sangs rgyas mthong ba thob bo//des dngos po'i 'du shes su mi bya'i nam mkha'i 'du shes su bya ste/de nam mkha'i
22b5(mdo sde): 'du shes la shin tu gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes shin tu yid la byas pas/de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUr+ya'i sku gzugs lta bu bzang po byang chub
22b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' des mngon sum du mthong byar gyur te/byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de
22b7(mdo sde): lta bu de mthong bar 'gyur ro//bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na skyes bu la la zhig rang skyes pa'i yul nas ljongs kyi phyogs gzhan zhig tu song ste phyin pa dang /rang
23a1(mdo sde): skyes pa'i yul de rjes su dran nas ji ltar mthong ba dang /thos pa dang /shes pa dang /rtogs pa'i chos rnams yid la byed pa las
23a2(mdo sde): rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non te/de nyal ba dang rmi lam na rang skyes pa'i yul du song nas de na bdag nyid 'dug pa snyam du shes shing /ji ltar sngon mthong
23a3(mdo sde): ba dang /thos pa dang /bye brag phyed pa dang /rnam par shes pa de dag kyang mthong ngo //de na 'gro zhing ldog pa dag kyang byed do//de sad pa dang gnyen 'dab
23a4(mdo sde): dang /mdza' ba shes dang /nye du dang /snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams kyi nang du nga ni 'di ltar song song ngo //ngas ni 'di dag mthong ngo //der ngas ni 'di
23a5(mdo sde): dag myong ngo //zhes don de dag kyang brjod do//bzang skyong de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa 'am rab tu byung ba'ang rung /phyogs
23a6(mdo sde): gang dang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa thos po'i phyogs dang de logs su dran pa dang ldan zhing /sems g.yeng ba med pas sangs rgyas mthong ba
23a7(mdo sde): thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de yid la bya'o//de ltar byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUr+ya'i sku gzugs bzang por gnas
23b1(mdo sde): pa mthong bar 'gyur ro//bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na dge slong mi sdug pa sgom pa zhig gis mdun na rnam par bam pa'i gzugs rnams mthong zhing rnam par sngos
23b2(mdo sde): pa dang /rnam par brnags pa dang /rnam par dmar ba dang /rnam par zos pa dang /sha rnams lpags pa 'am/sha dang khrag med pa 'am/dkar po'am/
23b3(mdo sde): kha dog dung dang 'dra ba 'am/keng rus shig mdun du mthong na/rnam par sngos pa nas/king rus kyi bar du de dag gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/gang du'ang mya song ngo ///
23b4(mdo sde): de dag sus kyang ma byas/sus kyang ma bgags te/bzang skyong 'on kyang drage slong dri'i sems rtse gcig pa'i dbang gis 'dun na keng rus 'dug pa mthong ngo //bzang
23b5(mdo sde): skyong de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa rnams phyogs gang dang gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
23b6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i phyogs de dang de ldogs su sangs rgyas mthong ba 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yid la byed do//phyogs de
23b7(mdo sde): dang de logs su yid la byas pas des phyogs de dang de logs su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag mthong ngo //
24a1(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/bzung skyong 'di lta ste/sangs rgyas mthong ba 'thob par 'gyur ba 'di ni ting nge 'dzin 'di'i rgyu mthun pa yin no//ting nge 'dzin
24a2(mdo sde): 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /rang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa dang /ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i phyir dang /'di dag
24a3(mdo sde): grasum tshogs shing 'dus pas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong zhing snang bar 'gyur ro bzang skyong 'di lta ste/dper na bud med dam skye sngo pa gang la la mgo 'khru
24a4(mdo sde): zhing rgyan 'dogs pa'i rang bzhin can zhig yod lnga/de 'bru mar dang ba'i snod dam/chu dang ba'i snod dam/yongs su phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor ram//
24a5(mdo sde): mthing bus bskus pa'i sa phyogs la/bdag nyid blta b.rA bsdams nas des der bdag nyid kyi gzugs mthong na/bzong skyong de la ji snyam du sems 'bru mar dang
24a6(mdo sde): ba'i snod dam chu dang ba'i snod dam yongs su phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor ram/mthing bus bskus pa'i sa phyogs de la/gang skyes pa 'am bud med kyi gzugs
24a7(mdo sde): snang ba de skyes pa 'am/bud med gang yang de'i nang du song ba 'am/de'i nang du zhugs pa yod dam/bzang skyong gis gsol pa/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das
24b1(mdo sde): de ni ma mchis mod kyi/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'du mar dang /chab de dang zhing rnyog pa ma mchis pa'am/me long gi dkyil 'khor de legs par yongs su
24b2(mdo sde): phyis pa 'am/mthing bus bsdus pa'i sa chen po de dag pa'i slad du gzugs brnyan mdun na mchis te/chab dang /'bru mar dang /me long dang /sa chen
24b3(mdo sde): po de las skyes pa 'am/bud med kyi lus 'byung ba'ang ma lags/gang nas kyang ma mchis/gang du'ang ma mchis/gang nas kyang ma skyes/grang du'ang
24b4(mdo sde): mA 'gagaso so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/bzang skyong legs so legs so//bzang skyong khyod yang legs so//bzang skyong de de bzhin no//
24b5(mdo sde): ji skad smras pa bzhin te/gzugs rnams shin tu yongs su drag pa las/gzugs brnyan rnams snang bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de'ang
24b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di shin tu bsgoms pas tshegs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams byang chub sems dpa' des mthong ngo //mthong nas kyang zhu ba zhu zhing zhus pa
24b7(mdo sde): lung bstan pas yi rangs par 'gyur ro//de 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa 'di go zhig nas byon tam/bdag gzhig tu son tam/snyam pa las/des
25a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de gang nas kyang ma byon par rab tu shes so//bdag gi lus kyang gang du'ang ma song bar rab tu 'du shes nas/de 'di snyam
25a2(mdo sde): du khams gsum pa 'di dag ni sems tsam mo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar bdag ji lta ji ltar rnam par rtogs pa/de lta de ltar snang ngo //sems de'adu
25a3(mdo sde): nang na'ang med/phyi rol na'ang med/gnyi ga med par yong mi dmigs te/gzhan du na dmigs pa la brten nas skye'o//gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ni
25a4(mdo sde): dngos po med pa'o//gang dngos po med pa de ni ma skyes pa'o//gang ma skyes pa de ni dmigs su med pa'o//gang dmigs su med pa de ni rang bzhin stong pa'o//
25a5(mdo sde): gang rang bzhin stong pa de ni gdags su med pa'o//gang gagradags su med pa de ni blta ba 'am/rnam par shes pa 'am/chags par bya ba 'am/bstan pa
25a6(mdo sde): 'am/chud gzan par bya ba 'am/rab tu gzhag par bya mi nus so//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//sems
25a7(mdo sde): kyis sangs rgyas byed pa ste//sems nyid kyis kyang mthong ba'o//sems nyid nga yi sangs rgyas te//sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o//sems nyid nga yi
25b1(mdo sde): lus yon to//sangs sa sems kyis mthong ba'o//sems nyi nga ye byang chub ste//sems nyid rang bzhin med pa'o//sems kyis sem ni mi shes gig
25b2(mdo sde): sems kyis sems ni mi mthong ngo //sems su 'du shes mi shes yin//sems su mi shes mya ngan 'da'//chos 'di dag ni snying po med//rlom sems las ni
25b3(mdo sde): kun byung ste//stong pa nyid las gang rlom pa'i//rlom sems de 'dir spong ba yin//bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o///
25b4(mdo sde): bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de'i ye shes ni de lta bu yin no//bzang skyong chos bzhi drung ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
25b5(mdo sde): chen po ltar gyi sangs rgyas mdun sum+b+ha du b+ha thAgaswA pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'i blo//bzhi ga she na/'di lta ste/mi 'phrogs de dod pa dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i
25b6(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dang /gzhon gyi dring lo mi 'jig pa'i shes rab dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen lnga bsnyen ducur byed pa ste/bzang snying chos bzhi po de dag deng lda
25b7(mdo sde): na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting po 'dzin 'di 'job pa//babang byung gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan
26a1(mdo sde): na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/zla ba gsum gyi bar dus go/
26a2(mdo sde): brdabs pa tsam yang bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed pa dang /zla ba gsum gyi bar du se gol brdabs pa tsam yang rmugs pa dang /gnyid kyis mi non pa dang /bshang
26a3(mdo sde): bla dang /gci ba byed pa ma gtogs par zlo ba gsum gyi bar du brtson 'grus brtsams te 'chag pa la zhugs nas sa la mi 'dug pa dang /gzhan dag la'ang chos
26a4(mdo sde): kyi sbyin pa rgya cher gtong pa'i steng du rnyed pa dang /bkur sti dang /tshigs su bcad pa la mi re ba ste/bzang skyong chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/byang chub sems
26a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo//bzang skyong gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di
26a6(mdo sde): 'thob bo//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas blta bar sems can rnams la skul ba dang /chos mnyan par sems can rnams la skul ba dang /byang
26a7(mdo sde): chub kyi sems skyed par sems can rnams la skul ba dang /phrag dog med pa ste/bzang skyong chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
26b1(mdo sde): chen po ting nge 'dzin 'dri 'thob bo//bzang skyong gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo//bzhi gang
26b2(mdo sde): zhe na/'di lta ste/ting nge 'dzin 'dri 'dod pos/de bzhin grashegs pa'i sku gzugs byed du bcug ste/tha na ri mor yang 'drir 'jug pa dang /ting nge 'dzin 'di
26b3(mdo sde): 'dod pas/ting nge 'dzin 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir ci nas kyang ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin par legs par bris shing /glegs pam sbyin pa dang /mngon
26b4(mdo sde): pa'i nga rgyal can+da gyi gang zag rnams mngon pa'i nga rgyal med pa'i chos 'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'jog pa dang /de bzhin
26b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba dang /smra ba dang /yang dag par gzung ba'i phyir gnas pa ste/bzang skyong chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/byang chub sems
26b6(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob bo//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//bde gshegs bstan
26b7(mdo sde): pa la ni dad pa skyed//stong pa nyid kyi chos bshad ma smod cig/brtson 'grus brtsams shing glunyid ni spangs byas te//zla gsum tshang bar nam yang ma 'dug
27a1(mdo sde): shig/rnyed dang bkur sti tshogs bcad mi rten par//badre gshegs gsungs pa'i chos ni bshad bya zhing //mtshungs pa med pa'i bstan pa
27a2(mdo sde): rgyas par bya//rten pa med na chos 'di thob par 'gyur//drag dog med cing khro ba bskyed mi bya//'dod chags spangs shing sems ni rnam grol la//mnyam
27a3(mdo sde): par bzhag cing bsam gtan dga' byas te//sbyor bar byed na chos 'di 'thob par 'gyur//gser mdog bsod nams brgya yi mtshan mnga' la//mdzes
27a4(mdo sde): shing kun nas yongs su rgyas par gyur//gser gyi gzugs bzhin du ni lta sdug pa'i//bsod nams mchog mtshan sangs rgyas dran par byos//sangs rgyas
27a5(mdo sde): 'das pa 'am yang na ma byon pa//thal mo sbyar te rjes su dran par byos//mi mchog gang dag da ltar bzhugs pa yang //de dag mchod phyir bde gshegs
27a6(mdo sde): dran par byos//dang ba'i sems kyis me tog phreng ba dang //thug pa dag dang bza' dang bca' ba yisra//bde bar gshegs pa la ni mchod pa byos//
27a7(mdo sde): ting 'dzin 'di ni rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur//ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog tu rnad 'dod pas na//sems ni rangs shing dga' ba 'dra med pas//rnga dung rdza rnga
27b1(mdo sde): dgra gi srel snyan dang //dpe med rnying bsel la ni rol mo byed//ting nge 'dzin gyi mchog ni 'dod pas na//ri mo legs par bris shing mtshan rdzogs la//
27b2(mdo sde): gser gyi mdog 'dra rgya che skyon med pa'i//mtshungs pa med pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang //dalta' bar byed pa'i chos ni mdun bzhag nas//tshul khrims yongs
27b3(mdo sde): dag thos pa 'tshol byed la//le lo'i dngos po yongs su spangs byis na//ting 'dzin 'di ni ring por mi thogs rnyed//kun+da nas mAn ra sems su la'ang ma byed
27b4(mdo sde): cig/byams la gnas dang snying rje gnas pa dang //'dod pa'i yon tan btang snyoms byas nas ni//ting 'dzin 'di ni ring por mi thogs rnyed/chos spro ba
27b5(mdo sde): la'ang de bzhin byams pa skyed//ston par 'du shes rtag tu nye brla zhog/nga rgyal ma byed chags pa spang bar byos//chos sbyin pa la nam yang 'jung sa ma gyur//
27b6(mdo sde): phan yon bzang po 'di dag blang bar byos//gdams ngag gnas ni 'dre bar gshegs pas bstan//'di ni sangs rgyas mngo po'i bstan pa ste//ting 'dzin
27b7(mdo sde): 'di ni rnyed par dka' mi 'gyur//bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste/bzhi pa'o////bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub
28a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pas chos smra ba'i dge slong la gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par bya ste/glan
28a2(mdo sde): btsal ba med pa'i sems kyis ston par 'du shes bskyed la/ting nge 'dzin 'dri la sbyar bar bya'o//bzang skyong gal te byang chub sems dpa' des chos smra ba'i dge
28a3(mdo sde): slong de la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems kyis gnas sam/tha ba'i sems kyis go nas sam/sems ma drong bas gnas na/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa'
28a4(mdo sde): des ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pa ni gnas ma yin te skabs med do//gal te chos smra ba'i dge slong de la ston pa'i 'du shes mi skyed na 'dra gnas de med do//bzang skyong
28a5(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ltar ma gus pas ni dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ro//bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na mig dang ldan pa'i skyes bu zhig gis namA thang zhing /smon
28a6(mdo sde): med pa'i mtshan mo nam gyi gung thun la gdong gyen du bar snang la bltas na/des der skor ma'i gzugs mang po rnams mthong ngo //bzung skyong de bzhin du/sangs
28a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa ni nam mkha'i 'du shes shin tu nye bar gnas shing /sangs
28b1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi 'du shes shin tu byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgoms pas/'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du shar phyogs
28b2(mdo sde): su bltas na/tshegs chung ngus sangs rgyas mang po rnams mig gi dbang po la snang bar 'gyur ro//tshegs chung ngus sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /sangs
28b3(mdo sde): rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas bye
28b4(mdo sde): ba stong phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po tshegs chung ngus mig gi dbang po la snang
28b5(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin du lho phyogs dang /nub phyogs dang /byang phyogs dang /phyogs mtshams bzhi dang /'og gi phyogs dang /steng gi phyogs
28b6(mdo sde): rgyas par bya ste/de ltar phyogs bcur bltas na/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des tshegs chung ngus sangs rgyas mang po rnams mig gi dbang
28b7(mdo sde): po la snang bar 'gyur ro//tshegs chung ngus sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
29a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas bye ba stong phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas bye ba brgya stong
29a2(mdo sde): phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po//tshogs chung ngus mig gi dbang po la snang bar gyur to//bzang skyong de ltar sang ba rgyas
29a3(mdo sde): kyis yongs su bzung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la
29a4(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams ni tshigs chung ngus sangs rgyas mang po rnams mig gi dbang po la snang bar 'gyur ro//tshigs chung ngus sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /
29a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas bye ba phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang /spangs
29a6(mdo sde): rgyas bye ba stong phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas bye bo brgya stong phrag mang po dang /sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po rnams tshogs chung ngus mig
29a7(mdo sde): gis dbang po la snang bar 'gyur ro//bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na/sangs rgyas kyi spyan gang dang ldan pas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
29b1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/thams cad thugs su chud pa dang /thams cad gzigs par 'gyur ba'i/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
29b2(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan yod do//bzang skyong de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyis yongs su bzung ba'i/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar gyi sangs rgyas
29b3(mdo sde): mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa rnams ni/tshegs chung ngus mang du thos pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
29b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /shes rab
29b5(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//tshul khrims dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /shes rab dang /rnam par grol ba dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
29b6(mdo sde): mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//bla na med pa'i shes rab kyi dbang po dang /
29b7(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//
30a1(mdo sde): dper na mig ldan mi zhig mtshan mo dben pa'i dus//nam gyi gung thun ldang byas namA mkha' rnam dag la//des ni skar ma mang po brgya stong mthong
30a2(mdo sde): gyur te//dran ldan bsams na nyin bar du'ang dran par 'gyur//de ltar byang chub sems dpas ting 'dzin 'di thob nas//sangs rgyas dpa' bo mang po brgya stong mthong
30a3(mdo sde): bar 'gyur//de las langs pa'i dus na'adra dran 'gyur zhing //'khor la 'jig rten mgon po 'di 'dra'o zhes kyang smra//ji ltar de'i mig/sangs rgyas spyan do rnam dag
30a4(mdo sde): la//rab rib med cing yongs dag dris ni 'jig rten lta ba ltar//de ltar rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyan//rdul med ting 'dzin 'di yin des ni mi
30a5(mdo sde): dbang mthong //skyabs bcu rkang gnyis dbang po 'jig rten gtso lha'i tshe//thub rnams dngos po'i 'du shes nam yang mi skyed do//dug bcom yongs dag dngos po'i
30a6(mdo sde): 'du shes med pa yi//byang chub sems dpa' gtso bo yon tan khyad par nyon//chos mchog bsil ba de dag kyang ni mnyan par byos//stong pa nyid chos bde ba
30a7(mdo sde): myur du dran par byos//ngas kyang rgyal ba'i byang chub rnyed nas skye dgu la//skye bo mang po bde ba'i chos 'di bshad par bya//ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshe dpag
30b1(mdo sde): med skyes nas//'jig rten mgron po brgya skyong mang po mthong gyur pa//de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dzin 'di thob na//sangs rgyas dpa'o mang po brgya stong mthong bar//
30b2(mdo sde): 'gyur//ji ltar dran ldan dge slong bzang po kun dga' bos//nga las thos po rab bzung de'ang kun 'dzin pa//de ltar byang chub sems dpas ting 'dzin 'di thob na//chos
30b3(mdo sde): mang thos shing thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur//ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas yang dag dga' skyed la//'jig rten gsung tshwag sna tshogs thams cad spang byos te//myur du
30b4(mdo sde): da par byos la chos kyi sbyin pa byin//de ltar yongs dag zhi ba'i sa 'di thob par 'gyur//bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o///
30b5(mdo sde): bzang skyong de la byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par bya ba dang /'di lta ste/yongs su bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir spro ba dang brtson 'grus chen po bskyed par bya'o//
30b6(mdo sde): bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na rgya mtsho chen po'i gru rin po ches yongs su gang ba zhig rgya mtsho chen po rgal te 'jigs pa thoms cad spangs pa las/tshu rol gyi 'gram du chag
30b7(mdo sde): na/de la dzam+bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams kyis sgra chen po dang /skad chen po dang /'o dod bod par bya'o//bdag cag ni rin po che 'di dag las nyams so//zhes mya ngan chen
31a1(mdo sde): pos smre sngags kyang gdon par bya'o//bzang skyong de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo 'am/dge slong dram/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen
31a2(mdo sde): nam/dge bsnyen ma gang lA la ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'di lta bu 'di rna lam du grag par gyur la//thos nas kyang glegs bam du 'dri bar mi byed/ston par mi byed/'dren
31a3(mdo sde): par mi byed/'dzin par mi byed/klog par mi byed/'chad par mi byed/sgom par mi byed/nan tan gyis sgrub par mi byed na/bzang skyong de la lha dang bcos pa'i
31a4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyis sgra chen po dang /skad chen po dang /'o dod bod par bya'o//'di ltar ting nge 'dzin zab mo rin po che 'di lta bu sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa/sangs
31a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyis bstod pa/sangs rgyas kyis bstod du bcug pa/sangs rgyas kyis yon tan thams cad theb par 'gyur ba grang yin pa de thos nas yi ger 'dri bar mi
31a6(mdo sde): byed/ston par mi byed/'don par mi byed/'dzin par mi byed/klog par mi byed/'chang par mi byed/skom par mi byed/nan tan gyis sgrub par mi byed cing /
31a7(mdo sde): ngade rgyal gyis non lo mi shes te/mang du thos pa yongs su rdzogs pa mi 'dzin po'i sems can de dag ni ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'di lta bu 'di las yongs su nyams
31b1(mdo sde): gyur pa na mya ngan chen pos smre sngags kyang gdon par bya'o//bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan mi 'dod par 'gyur ba dang /ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i sems can
31b2(mdo sde): de dag ni bzang skyong yongs su nyams pa'i chos can yin par ngas bshad do//bzang skyong gang ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'di lta bu 'di thos nas yi ge 'dri bar mi byed/ston par
31b3(mdo sde): mi byed/'don par mi byed/'dzin par mi byed/klog par mi byed/'chad par mi byed/bsgom par mi byed/nan tan gyis sgrub par mi byed pa'i sems can de dag gi
31b4(mdo sde): yongs su nyams pa ji tsam du 'gyur ba ltos shig/bzang skyong sems can de lta bu de rnams la ni chos de lta bu dag ched mi che bar ngas bshad do//bzang skyong 'di lta ste
31b5(mdo sde): dper na/skyes bu gang la la zhig byis pa'i rang bzhin can/shes rab 'tshal pa'i rang bzhin can zhig la tsan+dan dmar po sar pa zhig byin pa dang /de de la mi gtsang
31b6(mdo sde): ba'i 'du shes skyed do//btsog pa'i 'du shes bskyed do//de la skyes bu mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can tsan+dan gyi tshong pa zhig gis 'di skad du kye skyes bu khyod tsan+dan sar pa 'di
31b7(mdo sde): la mi gtsang ba'i 'du shes ma skyed cig/btsog pa'i 'du shes ma skyed cig//kye skyes bu 'di'i dri ji tsam du dga' bar byed pa re shig sdoms shig/kye skyes bu 'di'i
32a1(mdo sde): kha dog ci tsam du ltan sdug pa'ang ltos shig ces smras pa dang /byis pa'i rang bzhin can shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can gyi skyes bu des tsan+dan
32a2(mdo sde): dmar po de mthong nas snom mi 'dod pa'i phyir rang gis ma blangs/lta mi 'dod pa'i phyir mig kyang 'dzum par byed pa de bzhin du/bzang skyong ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/
32a3(mdo sde): dge slong byang chub sems dpa' rlom sems can lus ma bsgoms pa/sems ma bsgoms pa/tshul khrims ma bsgoms pa/shes rab ma bsgoms pa/tshul
32a4(mdo sde): khrims 'chal ba/dam pa'i chos nges pa'i don rin po che mi len pa/dam pa'i chos nges pa'i don rin po che yongs su spong bar byed pa/shes rab 'tshal pa/shes
32a5(mdo sde): rab las yongs su nyams pa/bsum gtan rnyed pas lhag pa'i nga rgyal can/gang zag la rten pa/gang zag tu lta ba/gang zag tu gnas pa/chos su dmigs
32a6(mdo sde): pa la mngon par zhen pa/stong pa nyid bshad pas skrag pa de dag da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dre bshad pa thos na/rna blags te
32a7(mdo sde): nyan par mi byed/mngon par dad par mi byed/'dzin par mi byed/kun chub par mi byed/'chang par mi byed/klog par yang mi byed na/gzhan dag la rgya cher
32b1(mdo sde): 'chad pa lta ci smos/de dag de'i phyir byams pa dang /dga' ba rgya chen po'ang mi 'thob na/de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa lta ci smos pa'i steng du thos nas kyang spong bar byed do//
32b2(mdo sde): mngon par ma dad do//mi len to//mos par mi byed do//dpya ba'i bsam pa dang /bsting ba'i bsam pa dang /smad pa'i bsam pas tshig kyang 'di skad du gsung rab 'di
32b3(mdo sde): dag 'bar ba dang /'di ltar dge slong kun dga' bo 'dra ba 'jig rten du byung ba dang /'di lta bu'i mdo sde byung ba ni ngo mtshar to zhes zer zhing /lcog tu dong nas kyang phan tshun
32b4(mdo sde): du mdo 'di lta bu dag ni rang gis byas pa//rang bzo byas pa ste/'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin/sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba ma yin no zhes de skad kyang rjod cing
32b5(mdo sde): smod par byed de/skyes bu blun po de lta bu dag ni dam pa'i chos rin po che las yongs su nyams pa dang /dam pa'i chos rin po che yongs su spangs par rig par bya'o//
32b6(mdo sde): bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu byis pa'i rang bzhin can de tsan+dan dmar po de mthong nas mi bsdam pa'i phyir sna'ang 'gog pa dang /mi mthong bar bya ba'i phyir mig
32b7(mdo sde): kyang 'dzums pa de bzhin du/bzang skyong skyes bu blun po de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin rin po che 'di lta bu thos nas/phyi phyir zhing mnyan par mi sems/gzung ba dang /kun
33a1(mdo sde): chub par bya ba dang /bcang bar bya ba dang /klag par bya bar mI sems pa'i steng du thos nas kyang 'di lta ste/nyan mi 'dod pa'i phyir gnas de nas 'gro/
33a2(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro//bzang skyong 'di lta ste dper na/skyes bu rin po che 'tshong bA la la zhig gis skyes bu blun po'i rang bzhin can de rnams lnga nor bu rin po che bai DUr+ya rIn thang
33a3(mdo sde): myemed pa zhig bstan parA bsams pa dang /de la skyes bu blun po'i rang bzhin can de dag gis nor bu rin po che de mthong nas/de la 'di skad ces smras so//kye skyes bu
33a4(mdo sde): nor bu rin po che 'di'i rin ji tsam/rin po che 'tshong ba des de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//nor bu rin po che 'di'i 'od kyis phyogs ji tsam khyab pa de tsam gyi phyogs
33a5(mdo sde): bzhir rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang bar byas pa de byin cig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/nor bu rin po che 'di'i rin thang tshang ba ni de yin no//sems can blun pa'i
33a6(mdo sde): radwa bzhin can de dag gis de las nor bu rin po che'i rin tha~Mng thos pa dang /gad mos 'debs shing dpya bar byed steng bar byed la nor bu rin po che de'ang lag pa
33a7(mdo sde): gnyis kyis dpogs par byed do//bzong skyong de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na dge slong rtog pa mang ba/sngon gyi rgyal ba lo bya ba byas pa/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed
33b1(mdo sde): bla de dag da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon snyam du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas/'di lta ste rgyas par bya ba'i phyir 'dzin par 'gyur/kun chub par byed par 'gyur//
33b2(mdo sde): yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur/yi ger 'dir 'jug par 'gyur/'chang bar 'gyur/klog par 'gyur/gzhan lo'ang rgya cher yang dag par 'chad par 'gyur/lhag
33b3(mdo sde): par dad par 'gyur/rtog pa mang bar 'gyur/mos pa mang bar 'gyur/spyod lam dang bar 'gyur/ngo tsha shes pa dang 'gyod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/bslab
33b4(mdo sde): pa 'dod par 'gyur/zab mo lnga mos par 'gyur/shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur/mang du thos par 'gyur/byams pa la gnas pa dang snying rje thob par 'gyur//
33b5(mdo sde): de dag ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan pa'i phyir gang lnga lar song ba der ston par 'gyur/yang dag par ston par 'gyur ro//de 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
33b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/'odi 'dra ba ci nas kyang yun+da ring du gnas par gyur cig/rgyas par gyur cig snyam du sems skyed par 'gyur ro//bzang skyong de na'ang
33b7(mdo sde): sems can gzhan kha cig bsod nams chung ba/dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa/sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba ma byas pa/nga rgyal gyis gzir ba/phrag dog gis gzir
34a1(mdo sde): ba/rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang /tshigs su bcad pas gzir ba/tshul khrims rnams yongs su ma dag pa/ting nge 'dzin rnams ma thob pa shes
34a2(mdo sde): rab rnams ma thob pa/thos pa nyung ba/slob dpon dang ma 'grogs pa/gang zag tu lta ba dang /gang zag tu rten pa/gang zag lnga granas pa/chos su dmigs
34a3(mdo sde): pa la mngon par zhen pa rnams ni stong pa nyid bshad pas skrag par 'gyur te/de dag da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas
34a4(mdo sde): rtog par mi 'gyur/mngon par dad par mi 'gyur/yid ches par mi 'gyur/mos par mi 'gyur ba'i steng du thos nas kyang gad mos 'debs par 'gyur//
34a5(mdo sde): 'phya bar 'gyur/snying bar 'gyur/lkog tu dong nas kyang phan tshun nas smod par byed/spong bar byed cing /tshig kyang 'di skad du dge slong 'di dag ni spyi rtol
34a6(mdo sde): can no//dge slong 'di dag ni mu tshor smra ba ste/'di ltar 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis ma gsungs pa/rang gris byas shing rang bzo byas pa/tshig dang yi ge sna tshogs
34a7(mdo sde): pa/gtam tsam du bshad pa la mdo sde'i ming gis 'chad pa ngo mtshar to zhes zer zhing /mdo sde 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes zer ba
34b1(mdo sde): de dag skye bo rnams la'ang de ltar shes par byed do//de ltar skyes bu blun po bsod nams chung ba dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa/sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba ma byas pa/bla na med
34b2(mdo sde): pa'i chos rin po che yongs su spangs pas chos rin po che los phyi la tu gyur pa de dag bsod nams chung ba nyid la bsten par 'gyur/sgom par 'gyur/mang du byed par
34b3(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//bzang skyong lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'khor 'di rnams kyi mdun du khyod mos par bya'o//khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'om rigs
34b4(mdo sde): kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
34b5(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phul ba bas/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
34b6(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang rtog par byed/mngon par dad par byed/yid ches par byed la 'di ni bden pa nyid do zhes mos par byed cing /sangs rgyas kyis
34b7(mdo sde): gsungs pa yin no zhes tshig tu'ang brjod na/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe don de nyid bstan
35a1(mdo sde): /par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//gang gis stong gsum thams cad du//rin po chus ni//
35a2(mdo sde): bkang byas te//byang chub bcoM lnga bar bya ba'i phyir//'jig rten mgon la phul ba byas//gang gis sangs rgyas kyis sngags pa'i//mdo s+t+ri ting 'dzin 'di lta bu//
35a3(mdo sde): thos na so mos par byed na ni//de yi bsod nams khyad paru 'phyags//spyi dang gya gyu g.yo dang ldan//rgod cing dbang po mi bsdus la//sdig pa'i grogs pos zin byur po//
35a4(mdo sde): blo ngan rnams ni dang mi 'gyur//tshul khrims 'cha bo cing sdig chos can// zhes nga rgyal dam du gnas//phan+d+ha tshun drag nas 'dus nus kyang //rgyal ba'i stan lnga gang
35a5(mdo sde): mos 'debs//mdo sde de dag chos kyi rgyal//sangs rgyas kyis ni ma gsungs zhes//mA bsdams de dag de 'dra ba'i//tshig dag kyang ni brjod par 'gyur//gang zhig ting
35a6(mdo sde): 'dzin modo 'dri la//thos nas rtogs par mi 'gyur ba//ma rungs chud zos mi shes shing //lta ba dun la dmyigs can no//sangs rgyas kyis ni gsungs pa yi//mdze
35a7(mdo sde): sde 'di 'dra 'di dag la//bsod nams chung zhing dmigs gnas pas//dad par bya ba mi nus so//gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'dra ba//thos nas dga' bar 'gyur ba ni/
35b1(mdo sde): mi mchog tu ni mi 'gyur snyam//de lnga the tshom ma byed cig/gang zhig tshul khrims yongs dag cing //lta ba'ang rtag tu drang ba dang //chos 'di la nI gus bcas pa/
35b2(mdo sde): ngas ni de la chos ba shad do//gang gis dpa' tshon 'jig rten mgon//'od byed pa ni mthong gyur pa//de dag don du bshad par byas//de dag kyang ni chos 'dzin shog/bzung
35b3(mdo sde): skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin las lhag pa'i nga rgyal can+da b+hi le'u ste drug pa'o///bam po gsum po//bzang skyong da ltar nga ting nge 'dzin 'di
35b4(mdo sde): 'o chad pa'i tshe gang gis nga la mnyes par byed pa de dag ni phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song ba 'am/dge ba'i bshes dang bral ba
35b5(mdo sde): ma gtogs par ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas spong ba 'am/smod par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med de gnas ma yin te skabs med do//bzang skyong 'dri na dge ba'i ba shes
35b6(mdo sde): gnyen gyi lag tu song ba las kyang skyes bu blun po kha cig ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas mngon par dad par mi byed/yid ches par mi byed/mos par mi byed na/gang
