99a3(mdo sde): pa 'dod pas bsngo bar yang byed na/bzang skyong bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//stong dang /stong phrag brgya dang /
99a4(mdo sde): bye ba phrag brgya dang /bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong dang /grangs dang /cha dang /bgrang ba dang /dpe dang /rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o////bam po bdun pa ste tha ma//
99a5(mdo sde): bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ji tsam du don che ba la ltos/bzang skyong de bas na rnam
99a6(mdo sde): grangs 'dis kyang /ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i/bsod nams kyi phung po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don chen po yin par rig par bya'o//
99a7(mdo sde): mazang skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa shin tu rgyas pa/tshad med pa/bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung ba de'i tshe de'i dus
99b1(mdo sde): na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i blo gros zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen
99b2(mdo sde): pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo //bzang stong de'i tshe dzam+bu'i gling 'di'
99b3(mdo sde): 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang /bde ba dang /lo legs pa dang /nyams dga' ba dang /skye bo mang po dang /mis gang bar gyur to//bzang skyong de'i tshe dza m+bu'i gling 'di na grong
99b4(mdo sde): khyer chen po thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun las grub pa khyim bye ba phrag dgu yod pa dpag tshad bcu gnyis pa stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod par gyur to//bzang skyong de'i tshe
99b5(mdo sde): dzerdom+bu'i gling 'di'ang 'di lta ste/dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad yod de yangs shing rgya che bar gyur to//bzang skyong de'i tshe dzam+bu'i gling 'di na gang du de bzhin gshegs
99b6(mdo sde): bde skye ba'i slar gyur pa 'di lta ste/bzang po byung ba zhes bya ba'i grong khyer chen po gcig cig yod de/grong khyer chen po de na srog chags bye ba phrag drug cu gnas so//bzang
99b7(mdo sde): khyong yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i blo gros de'i nyan thos 'dus pa dang po ni dgra bcom pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'dus
100a1(mdo sde): par gyur to//zhag bdun 'das nas nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa ni nyan thos bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'dus par gyur to//zhag bdun pa gnyis 'das nas
100a2(mdo sde): nyan thos 'dus pa gsum pa ni bye ba phrag dgu bcu 'dus par gyur to//dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu'ang 'dus par gyur to//de nas phyis ni
100a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos grangs kyis mi chod pa zhig byung ngo //bzang skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na mi de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par lon par gyur te/'di lta
100a4(mdo sde): ste/dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i gsung rab la sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan
100a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba bzhin no//bzang skyong de'i tshe sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong thub par gyur to//bzang skyong de'i tshe grong khyer chen po de na 'khor los sgyur
100a6(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa bu stong du tshang ba zhig yod de/de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge gros de'i drung ngu
100a7(mdo sde): song zhing bsnyen bkur byed do//bzang skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i blo gros des rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba
100b1(mdo sde): de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan to//yang dag par bshad do//bzang skyod de nas rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba rjes ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas rjes su
100b2(mdo sde): yi rang ngo //rjes su yi rang nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de la rin po che sngar gang gis gtor to//de de nas shi 'phos pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba des de bzhin gshegs pa de mya ngan
100b3(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i 'og tu'ang dzam+bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po'i khyim de nyid du skyes so//bzang skyong de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gsung rab la dge slong chos smra ba rin chen mchog
100b4(mdo sde): ces bya ba zhig byung ste/des 'khor bzhi la ting nge 'dzin 'di rgya cher ston to//yang dag par bsgrogs so//bzang skyong de'i tshe rgyal po khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba de rgyal po'i
100b5(mdo sde): bu tshangs pas byin zhes bya bar gyur to//des dge slong de ting nge 'dzin 'di 'chad pa thos so//thos nas kyang thos ma thag tu dang ba rnyed par gyur te/drang ba'i sems kyis gser
100b6(mdo sde): stong phrag brgya dang /ras bcos bu zung gcig gris dge slong de la g.yogs so//bzang skyong de nas rgyalnga po'i bu tshangs pas byin des dge slong de las ting nge 'dzin 'di
100b7(mdo sde): thos nas dge slong des legs par bshad pa'i phyir dag ba pa byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//des bla na med pa yang dag par
101a1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ting nge 'dzin 'di 'dod pa'i phyir chos smra ba'i dge slong de las srog chags stong du tshang ba dang lhan cig chos 'dod
101a2(mdo sde): pas skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig bgos nas dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //de rab tu byung nas lo brgyad stong du rang gis 'khor srog chags stong
101a3(mdo sde): po de dag dang lhan cig tu dge slong dri la bsnyen bkur byed cing rjes su 'brangs kyang mnyan pa tsam zhig thob pa ma gtogs par dge slong de lus ting nge 'dzin 'di ma thob bo//
101a4(mdo sde): de'ang lan gnyis ma yin gyi lan cig kho na zhig thos nas rjes su yi rang ba bzhi po 'di dag gis rjes su ye rang ngo //des srog chags stong du tshang ba de dag dang lhan cig
101a5(mdo sde): tu dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad mnyes par byas so//skye ba thams cad du'ang ting nge 'dzin 'di bshad cing gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag
101a6(mdo sde): por bsgrags te/des rim gyis sangs rgyas gzhan stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad kyang mnyes par byas so//de rjes su yi rung ba dang ldan pa'i dgu ba'i rtsa ba de nyid dang /
101a7(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin 'di thob pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
101b1(mdo sde): nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes bya bar gyur te/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med
101b2(mdo sde): pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bzhag go/srog chags stong po de dag kyang ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su smin par byas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di nyid kyis byang
101b3(mdo sde): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs te/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/thams cad kyang de bzhin gsheg
101b4(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' brtan pa zhes bya bar gyur te/srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
101b5(mdo sde): byang chub la bzhag go/bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di la rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du don che ba la ltos/'di ltar rjes su yi rung ba dang ldan
101b6(mdo sde): pa'i tshig tu brjod pas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par byed na/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' gang ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas 'dzin pa dang /kun
101b7(mdo sde): chub par byed pa dang /'chang ba dang /klog pa dang /gzhan dag lo'ang rgya cher yang dog par sgrogs po dang /bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa lta ci smos te/bzang
102a1(mdo sde): da ting nge 'dzin 'di thos nas/rjes su yi rta bar mi byed//yung nod par myi byed/kun chub par mi byed 'chang ba mi byed gzhan dgu la'ang rgyu
102a2(mdo sde): cher yang dag par sgrog par mi byed/bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas pa lha su zhig yod//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bzang skyong 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di thos pas
102a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//bzang skyong de bos na khyod mos par bya'o//khyod kyis
102a4(mdo sde): nga du chud par bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub don du gnyer ba rnams kyis/gal te ting nge 'dzin 'di dpag tshad tsam
102a5(mdo sde): na yod par thos na/bzong skyong byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub don du gnyer ba des ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan pa'i phyir dpag tshad
102a6(mdo sde): tsam gyi bar der 'gro bar bya'o//thos nas kyang gzung bar bya/kun chub par bya/bcang bar bya/klog par bya/gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher bstan par go bshad par
102a7(mdo sde): bya/bsgrag par bya'o//bsgom pa la'ang mngon par dga' bar bya'o//bzang skyong dpag tshod tsam lta zhog gi/dbyug tshad gnyis tsam mam/dpag tshad gsum
102b1(mdo sde): tsam mam/dpag tshad bzhi tsam+ba mam/dpag tshad lnga tsam nas dpag tshad bcu'i bar tsam mamra/bzang skyong dpag tshad bcu tsam lta'ang zhog gi//gal te byang chub sems
102b2(mdo sde): dpyas dpag tshad brgyu nang ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di ljongs kyi phyogs che ge mo zhig na spyod do zhes ting nge 'dzin
102b3(mdo sde): 'di dpag tshad brgya'i bar tsam na yod par thos na'ang /brjed skyong byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsdam pa phun sum tshogs pa byang chub don du gtor ba des zhum pa med pa
102b4(mdo sde): dang /snyam las med pa dang /'jigs pa med pa dang /sgyid log pa med pa dang /gdung ba med pa'i sems dang /brtson 'grus brtsams pa mi lhod pas ting nge 'dzin
102b5(mdo sde): 'di tha na mnyan pa nyi tshe tsam gyi phyir yang dpag tshad brgya po dor 'gro bar bya na lung mnod pa dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /bsgrags par bya ba dang /bsgom par bya ba'i
102b6(mdo sde): phyi lta smos kyang ci dgos te/de ci'i spyir zhe na/bzang skyong 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ni ting nge 'dzin 'di la rag las
102b7(mdo sde): po'i phyir ro//bzang skyong de la byang chub sems dpa' lhag po'i bsam po phun sum tshogs pa byang chub don du gnyir ba de dag gis dpag tshad brgya po der song nas gang las
103a1(mdo sde): ting du 'dzin 'di thos par gyur pa'i slob pon de la des sbyin pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//chos smra ba'i glegs kyi bu de la bsnyen bkar thams cad kyis/
103a2(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur byed cing phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o//thun ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan pa tsam gyi phyir yang lo gcig gami/gnyis sam/gsum mam/gzhi 'am/lnga'am/
103a3(mdo sde): lo bcu 'am/brgya'om/ji srid 'tsho'i bar du phyi bzhin 'brang bar byan lhung munod pa'am/kun chub par bya ba 'am/bri ba 'am/bcang ba 'am/bsgrags pa 'am/
103a4(mdo sde): bsgom pa'i phyir lta smos kyang ci dgos/bzang skyong rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des rang nyam gtang bar bya ste/btang nas kyang slob dpon de'i blo bzhin du 'jug par
103a5(mdo sde): bya'o//gus pa dang bcas pa dang /zhe sa dang bcas pas slob dpon gyi phyir 'brang bar bya'o//bka' bzhin du byed pas phye bzhi ni 'brang bar bya'o//bka' mi gcog pa dang /
103a6(mdo sde): mdza' ba brtag pa dang /ngo mi rtag pa spangs pa dang /nyes par lta ba med pas phyi bzhi na 'brang bar bya'o//dge ba'i bshos gnyen gyi 'du shes kyang bskyed par bya'o//de
103a7(mdo sde): la ston pa'i 'du shes kyang nye bar bzhag par bya'o//bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' de slob dpon de la de ltar nan tan byed na sngon chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba'i las
103b1(mdo sde): byas shing bsags pa ma gtogs par than ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan pa tsam yang mi thob pa ni gnas ma yin skabs ma yin te de ni gnas med do//byang chub sems dpa' nges
103b2(mdo sde): slob dpon de la khrel yod pa dang /byas pa gzo bA dang /byas pa shes par bya'o//de ltar na de'i ting nge 'dzin de'i tshig dang yi ge de yun ring du gnas pa dang rmongs pa med par 'gyur
103b3(mdo sde): na/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' gong ting nge 'dzin 'di grong gzhan na yod par thos sam/grong gi zhing gzhan na yod par thos lnga/thos nas kyang thu na mnyan pa tsam gyi phyir
103b4(mdo sde): yang 'gro bor bya ba lta ci smos/lung mnod par bya ba dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /bcang bar bya ba dang /klag par bya ba dang /bri bar bya ba dang /bsgom par bya ba dang /gzhan
103b5(mdo sde): dag la'ang yang dag par bsgrags par bya ba'i phyir lta'ang smos kyang ci dgos/bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' glang ting nge 'dzin 'di tsha lo bas tha na ting nge 'dzin 'di thos bcom
103b6(mdo sde): yang thob pa ni bzang skyong khyod mos par bya/khyod kyis khong du chud par bya ste/byang chub sems dpa' de ni ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid tshol ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /chos don du gnyer ba'i
103b7(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba dang chos 'dod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /brtson 'grus pa rtsoms pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa yin par
104a1(mdo sde): rig par byan/bzang klong byang chub sems dpa' ga ting nge 'dzin 'di lung nod par bya/kun chub par byed/'chang bar byed/klog par byed pa/grang
104a2(mdo sde): mnod pa dang /kun chub par bya ba dang /btsong bar bya ba dang /glag por byas nus kyang gzhan dag lo ston par byed/srogs par byed/yong dag par stsogs par
104a3(mdo sde): cing bsgom pa'i sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa lta smos kyang ci dugs/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcud pa 'di dag gsungs so//sngon gyi de btsun
104a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa mi yi mchog/seng ge blo gros zhes bya rjes dran te//der ni mi yi dbang po rgyal po des//ting 'dzin 'di ni de tshe thos par gyur//rgyal pos ting 'dzin 'di ni
104a5(mdo sde): thos nas kyang //sems mgu dga' bdupe med pas bzung ste//mI mchog sangs rgyab seng ge'i blo glos la//sdur gleng gi ni rin po chos kyang gtor//bcom ldan 'das
104a6(mdo sde): kyis legs gsungs ting 'dzin 'di//sems can thams cad la ni rdzun par shog/khyod la skyabs su de ring mchi'o zhes//de snyam bsams nas tshig tu'ang brjod par
104a7(mdo sde): gyur//rgyal po de ni de yi las kyis ni//shi nas de nyid du ni yang skyes te//des ni dge slong rin chen zhes bya bar//phyogs su grags pa mthu chen mthong bar gyur//
104b1(mdo sde): de las de nyid kyang ni thos gyur te//thos nas dga' ba shin tu rgyas pa skyed//bskyed nas byang chub zhugs pa dka' gyur te//gser dang gos kyis dge slong drag pa byas nas/
104b2(mdo sde): de ni ting 'dzin 'di yang 'dod pa'i phyir//srog chags stong dang lhan cig rab tu byung //lo ni stong phrag brgya snyed chang bar yang //de dag kun gyi dge slong de phyir 'brangs/
104b3(mdo sde): pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i ting 'dzin 'di//lan gnyis ma yin lan gcig kha na thos//de yi dran pa skyo ba ma skyes shing //ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ni yongs su 'tshalo//de dag kun gyis
104b4(mdo sde): las 'di byas pa'i phyir//stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad tshang ba yi//sangs rgyas mthu chen rnams ni mnyes par byas//de las ting 'dzin 'di ni thos par gyur//de nas bde bar
104b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa gzhan dag kyang //stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad tshang bar brjod//bde bar gshegs pa seng ge'i blo gros la//bdag ni rjes su yi rang bgyid ces brjod//bsod
104b6(mdo sde): nams byas pa de yis rgyal po de//brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes bya'i sangs rgyas gyur//srog chags bye ba khrag khrig bsam mi khyab//thams cad de yis skye zhing 'che las
104b7(mdo sde): bkrol//spong du tshang ba'ang rjes su bslob slob nas//sangs rgyas 'gyur te dpa' brtan zhes bya bar//lhar bcas 'jig rten la ni grags par gyur//ting 'dzin smras
105a1(mdo sde): kyang byang chub reg gyur na//srid pa thams cad lu ni mi brten par//gang zhig ting 'dzin 'di ni rgya che bar//ston pa de dag byang chub 'gyur bar ni//smos
105a2(mdo sde): ci dgos te nam yang the tshom med//sangs rgyas kyis gsungs kyang 'dzin zhi ba 'di//dpag tshad brgyan gal te yod gyur kyang //byang chub don du gnyer ba nyin mtshan du//
105a3(mdo sde): nam yang mi 'dug song ste mnyan par bya//gal te spong nas 'di ni ma rnyed na//'on kyang de yi bsod nams tshad med de//de ni de yi byang chub bskyed yin na//gang gis srong
105a4(mdo sde): ste 'di thos smos mi dgos//de phyir gang zhig ting 'dzin 'di 'dod pas//dang por tshangs pas byin de dran par byos//dge slong gang la ting 'dzin 'di yod la//skyo ba'i
105a5(mdo sde): sems ni med par bsten par bya//rjes su dran te skye ba snga ma la//stong phrag sum cu rtsa drug lo tshang bar//ngos ni chos smra ba la rtag brten kyang //ting 'dzin 'di ni nAm
105a6(mdo sde): yang thos ma gyur//sngon gyi sangs rgyas bden zhes bya ba byung //de na dge slong gzhon nu thos mang zhing //bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa nub 'og tu//de tshe des ni ting
105a7(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di nyid bzung //nga ni de na rgyal rigs rgyal po ste//dge slong che ge mo zhig ting 'dzin 'di//'dzin gyis drung du legs par nyon cig ces//rmi lam du ni ting 'dzin
105b1(mdo sde): 'di thos nas//myur du langs te rings pa'i tshul gyis ni//'di 'dzin pa yi dge slong de btsal te//mthong nas rab tu byung ba de las ni//'di nyid lan 'ga' thos lta srid
105b2(mdo sde): dam zhes//stong phrag drug cu rtsa drug lo tshang bar//ngas ni dge slong de la dga' bas bkur//bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs par gyur pa'i phyir//lan 'ga' tsam yang thos
105b3(mdo sde): par ma gyur te//de phyir dge slong rnams dang dge slong ma//dge bskyen drug dang dge bskyen ma rnams la//ting 'dzin thos nas myur du zung shig ces//mos par byed ni khrod
105b4(mdo sde): du chud par byed//der ni bskal pa tshang bar 'dug nas kyang //ting 'dzin 'dzin pa de ni bsnyen cing bsten//bskal pa stong du legs par bsnyen bkur byas//des ni ting
105b5(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di'ang bshad par gyur//ting 'dzin rdul med 'di la rab spyod pa'i//dge slong grong du slong ba de nyid la//bza' ba dang ni bca' dang mal cha dang //de bzhin gos kyang
105b6(mdo sde): bye bya byin par gyur//bca' dang bza' dang mal stan de bzhin gros//mang po bye ba thams cad lta'ang zhog/gal te rang gi sha byin thob na ni//legs spyad yin na zas skom smos
105b7(mdo sde): ci dgos//rtag tu bran gyur bsnyen bkur byed cing ni//ting 'dzin zhi ba li rlung tshol byed la//mkhas pas rnyed nas de'ang myur byed kyang //de la byas pa gzo ba ma yin no//
106a1(mdo sde): bskal ba mang po bye bar btsabakyang ni//ting 'dzin 'di ni shin tu rnyed par dka'//'di yi skra yang brgya lam thos gyur na//ba ton byas nas ston pa smos TI dgos/
106a2(mdo sde): gang gis gang+gA'i bye skyed 'jig rten khams//rin po ches ni bkang ste byin pa bas//gang zhig 'di las tshig bcad 'ga' lung mnos//de yi bsod nams tshad gzung mi sla'o//
106a3(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye skyed du//gang rtag brtson 'grus brtsams te gnas pa bas//gang zhig 'dri las tshig bcad 'ga' lung mnos//de yi bsod nams tshad gzung mi sla'o//
106a4(mdo sde): bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du//gang dag mi rten bsam gtan sgom pa bas//gang zhig 'di las tshig bcad 'ga' lung mnos//de yi bsod nams tshad gzung mi sla'o//bskal
106a5(mdo sde): pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du//gang rtag shes rab gnas par gyur pa bas//gang zhig 'di las tshig bcad 'ga' lung mnos//de yi bsod nams tshad gzung mi sla'o//bzang skyong
106a6(mdo sde): gos zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o////bzang skyong de bas na dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mos ting nge 'dzin 'di
106a7(mdo sde): gus par byas te mnyan par bya'o//thos nas kyang gzung bar bya/kun chub par bya/yi gor bri bar bya/bcang bar bya/klag par bya'o//bzung zhing kun chub par byas
106b1(mdo sde): nas kyang gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bsgrags par bya'o//legs par bris te gzhag par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/bzang skyong du 'das pa'i 'og tu ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/byung
106b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' dad pa can dang ba/brtag pa mang po/mang po 'byung bar 'gyur te/de dag sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i spyir mang du thos pa 'tshol bar 'gyur ro//de
106b3(mdo sde): dag mang du thos pa 'tshol pas dam pa'i phyir phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dag tu rgyu bar 'gyur te/bzang skyong sems can de lta bu chos don du gnyer ba/chos la mos pa/chos
106b4(mdo sde): 'dod pa/chos yongs su 'dzin pa/shin tu rgyas pa 'dzin pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang ched du ting nge 'dzin 'di lung mnos shing bstan la/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
106b5(mdo sde): kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi byin gyis brlabs te/glegs bam chen por legs par bris nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag rgyas btab la gzhag par bya'o//bzang
106b6(mdo sde): skyong de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad byed pa med pa/bya ba med pa/mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/chags pa med pa/dmigs
106b7(mdo sde): su med pa/stong pa nyid/mtshan ma med pa/smon pa med pa/mtshan nyid med pa/gnyis su med pa/'jug pa med pa/brten pa med pa/bgrang du med pa/rnam par
107a1(mdo sde): /bzhag tu med pa/gzung ba med pa/dor ba med pa/gnas pa med pa/chos thams cad rtag tu med pa/chad pa med pa/rgyu zad pa/sdug bsngal zad pa/
107a2(mdo sde): dngos po zad pa/mi skye ba/mi 'gag pa/mi gnas pa/mi 'jig pa/lam med pa/lam gyi 'bras bu med pa/'phags pa thams cad kyis mi dkrugs pa/byis pa thams
107a3(mdo sde): cad kyis spangs pa/mi shes pa rnams kyis bor ba/mkhas pa rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba ste/bzang skyong 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis phyag brgya gong gis de
107a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa rnams la btab pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o//bzod skyong de bas na byang chub don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs
107a5(mdo sde): kyi bu mos phyi ma'i tshe phyi mo'i dus der ting nge 'dzin 'di lung mnod par 'dod pas/lung mnos shing khe ton du byas nas gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bsgrag par bya'o//
107a6(mdo sde): bzang skyong de la chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' tha na ting nge 'dzin 'di nyan pa'i phyir yang brtson por 'gyur na lung mnod pa dang /kha ton bya ba'i phyir lta smos kyang ci
107a7(mdo sde): dgos/bzhi gang zhe na/sngon lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su sbyangs pa dang /sngon smon lam btab pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mos pa dang /ji ltar na de
107b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos dkon mchog gi
107b2(mdo sde): mdzod 'di 'chang bar 'gyur/ston par 'gyur snyam nas chos kyi tshul thams cad len pa ste/bzang stong chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di
107b3(mdo sde): mnyan pa dang /gzung ba dang /bcang ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro//bzang skyong gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la tha na yi
107b4(mdo sde): ger bri ba tsam gyi phyir yang brtson par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe ni/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas yid la byed pa dang /phyi phyir zhing chos rjes su dran pa la mkhas pa dang /chos thams
107b5(mdo sde): cad dmigs pa yongs su gcod pa yid la byed pa dang /mtshan ma thams cad rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa ste/bzang stong chos de bzhi dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' ting
107b6(mdo sde): nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la thu na bri ba tsam gyi phyir yang brtson par 'gyur ro//bzang skyong de la chos bzhi dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la brtson
107b7(mdo sde): par rig par bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad gzung du med pa'i dngos po yongs su gcod pa'i shes pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la
108a1(mdo sde): brtson par rig par bya'o//sangs rgyas kyi sku dmigs pa rnam par sgom pa la mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par rig par bya'o//
108a2(mdo sde): dmigs pa thams cad du sangs rgyas dmigs pa yid la byed pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par rig par bya'o//chos thams cad dngos po dang bral
108a3(mdo sde): bar mos pa la mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par rig par bya ste/bzang skyong chos de bzhi dang ldan na/byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin
108a4(mdo sde): 'di btsal ba la mngon par brtson par rig par bya'o//bzang skyong phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos kun tu 'khrug pa'i tshe sems can thams cad
108a5(mdo sde): la phan gdags pa dang /sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i phyir gang lo la zhig ting nge 'dzin 'di btsal ba la brtson par gyur cing /de 'di snyam du ting nge 'dzin
108a6(mdo sde): 'di ji ltar na shin tu rgyas pa dang /rgya che ba dang /yun ring du gnas par 'gyur snyam du sems bskyed par gyur na/rigs kyi bu de'i bsod nams mang du bskyed de/bsod
108a7(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gzhol bar rig par bya ba ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus so//de dag gi bsod nams
108b1(mdo sde): kyi phung po de smon lam gyi dbang gis myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gzhol bar 'gyur te/dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs chen po dang ldan pa/bdag med par gnas pa las nges par byung
108b2(mdo sde): pa/gang dag gis bsgral pa tshad med grangs med gzhal du med bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'am/de bas kyang lhag par go cha chen po bgos pa rnams ni ma gtogs te/de dag
108b3(mdo sde): thams cad ni bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/de dag thams cad ni spyod pa'i khyad par ji lta ba dang /tshogs ji lta ba bzhin du nges par 'byung
108b4(mdo sde): ngo //bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi
108b5(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'dod pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par dag pa thob par 'dod pas phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe 'jigs po chen po 'byung ba dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig
108b6(mdo sde): pa'i dus dor ting nge 'dzin 'di yi ger bri ba dang /lung mnod pa dang /khaM tron bya ba dang /gzhon dag la'ing rgya cher yang dag par bsgrag par bya ba'i phyir sbyor bar bya'o//de
108b7(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad kyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ni bzang skyong ting nge 'dzin 'di'i nang du 'dus so//sangs rgyas rjes su dran po la mkhas po bsgrubs
109a1(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad dngos po myed pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs pa 'di ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ste/de la gnas de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dmigs
109a2(mdo sde): pa thams cad sangs rgyas la dmigs par mos so//dmigs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthar 'jug par byed do//dmigs pa'i dngos po thams cad
109a3(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis yam bArlar shes so//de dag ji lta ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dmigs par byed pa dang /yid la byed pa de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
109a4(mdo sde): mthong ba rnam par dag ste/de lta bu la gnas pa de dag ni phyogs gang du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mi 'gyur ba med do/de dag ni phyogs thams cad du de bzhin
109a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par sbyong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag nas tshogs chung ngus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du dmigs pa byas na 'di nyid
109a6(mdo sde): du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro//tshad med dus de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa mngon sum du mthong ba yongs su dag par 'gyur te/
109a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa rnams de'i mig lam du snang bar 'gyur ro//dmigs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni gzung ba med pa'i phyir/dmigs pa gcig gis
109b1(mdo sde): dmigs pa thams cad 'dzin pa'ang ma yin/dmigs pa thams cad kyis dmigs pa gcig 'dzin pa'ang ma yin no//chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nye bar brtags na shin
109b2(mdo sde): tu nye bar zhi ba'i phyir dngos po med pa nyid du grub pa'o//bzang skyong de lta bu la gnas pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba rnam par dag par 'gyur la/rnam
109b3(mdo sde): par dag nas kyang rlom sems su mi byed/spos par mi byed de/de dag ni da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
109b4(mdo sde): ro//byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs pa la gnas par 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dgra gsungs so//
109b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas gang dag gsungs pa ni//ji lta bzhin du ye shes 'jug pa yin//de ni 'jig rten gtso bo ston pa'i sras//ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni yid kyang brtson//gang
109b6(mdo sde): gis sangs rgyasra dmigs pa rjes dran pa//dmigs pa'i don ni du ma mthong bar 'gyur//de la ting 'dzin zhi ba blta dka' 'di//phyi ma'i dus na mngon sum du'ang 'gyur//
109b7(mdo sde): mkhas pa gang zhig chos kun mi rten cing //sems can dag la phan phyir yid brtson pa//de dag phyi dus 'jigs pa chen po'i tshe//ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni sbyor bar 'gyur//
110a1(mdo sde): sems can rnams la phan zhing gzung ba'i phyir//gang zhig rtag tu blta dka' chos 'di la//dran pa brtan par 'jog cing brtson byed pa//de'i lag tu
110a2(mdo sde): ting 'dzin 'di 'gro 'gyur//gang zhig dran dang blo gos rtogs pa dag/sangs rgyas dmigs par rtag tu 'jog byed cing //gzhan dring mi 'jog rnal 'byor brtson pa de//
110a3(mdo sde): ting 'dzin chen po 'di la gnas par 'gyur//rjes su gzung phyir blta dga' tshig la gnas//'jig rten thams cad la ni yid skyo zhing //mkhas pa srid pa thams
110a4(mdo sde): cad mi 'dod pa//de dag ting 'dzin chen po 'di la brtson//byang chub 'dod cing phan phyir snying brtse gang //de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku la rtog/zhi ba'i chos
110a5(mdo sde): la smon lam 'debs byed pa//de dag ting 'dzin 'di la brten par brtson//'thab pa med cing rtsod pa med la zhi//bde bar gshegs pas bstod pa'i chos 'chol
110a6(mdo sde): zhing //sangs rgyas dmigs pa la ni rtag gnas pa//de dag ting 'dzin 'di la brtag brtson yin//gang dag phyi mo'i sdig pa'i dus de na//ting nge 'dzin 'di la ni brtson
110a7(mdo sde): byed pa//spyod pa'i yon tan mtha' yas la gnas pa//de yi yon tan 'jig rten mgon pos mkhyen//gang dag zag pa med pa'i chos shes shing //shin tu tshul
110b1(mdo sde): bzhin zag pa rnams kyang zhes//rtog pa med spyod mnyam pa nyid gnas pa//de dag ting 'dzin 'di la brtag brtson yin//gang dag bde gshegs chos ni tshad med la//shes
110b2(mdo sde): bzhin du yang kun smon lam med pas shing //sun mkhyen ye shes la ni brtan gnas pa//de la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di ston to//mtshan nyid med cing mtshan nyid las kyang 'das//
110b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa dang rnam dag gang yang med//rang bzhin stong pa'i chos rnams gang shes pa//de dag bde bar gshegs pa tshad med mthong //gang zhig dmigs pa mtha' med
110b4(mdo sde): brtson byed kyang //dmigs pa thams cad stong pa nyid du shes//blta bar dka' dag mthong nas rlom sems med//des ni bde bur gshegs pa tshad med mthong //gang zhig
110b5(mdo sde): don mthong yid kyang rnam par dge/nyon mongs med cing zhi ba'i go 'phang gnas//rdul dang phral zhing mnyam don chos ston pa//de la ting 'dzin zhi ba 'di bshad do//bde
110b6(mdo sde): gshegs sras po zug rngu phyung ba gang //bden pa nyams pa the tshom rnams dang bral//srog chags phan phyir byams pa sgom byed pa//de dag la ni don mchog 'di bshad do//
110b7(mdo sde): gang shizhig rang bzhin gyis ni ma rig bral//rig pas ma rig gnas ni sel byed cing //don mchog 'di la brtson par sbyor byed pa//de la ting 'dzin zhi bya 'di bshad do//rnam
111a1(mdo sde): dag gnas shing kun nas nyon mongs med//ye shes mtha' yas mngon par 'dod byed cing //nges don 'di la mchog tu dga' thob pa//de la rnam tha zhi
111a2(mdo sde): ba 'dri bshad do//gang zhig kun tu sbyor ba kun las grol//brtan zhing srog chags kun la snying brtse zhing //gnod sems med cing zhi lam dga' brten pa//de la ting 'dzin
111a3(mdo sde): 'di ni yang dag bsgrags//bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o////bzang skyong chos 'di bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa'
111a4(mdo sde): rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ba'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas la gus pa dang /mi phyed pa'i dang po yid la byed pa dang /chos la gus pa nyan
111a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang /chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i tshig bsgrub pa ste/bzang skyong chos bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'dri thob par 'gyur ba'o//
111a6(mdo sde): bzang skyong gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/yid la phyin ci log med pas sangs
111a7(mdo sde): rgyas lo dmigs pa'i sems pa dang /chos la the tshom med pas dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid rang bzhin gyis dge ba la rtog pa dang /dngos po la mkhas pa la rtog
111b1(mdo sde): pas ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa/rang bzhin gyis stong pa/shin tu stong pa'i chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba dang /'du shes rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa/yongs su
111b2(mdo sde): gcod pa shes pa la rtog pas dngos po yA ma baR+Sha rnam par 'jig pa ste/bzung skyong chos de bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par 'gyur ba'o//bzang skyong
111b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'dri 'thob par 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rjes su bzung ba dang /dam
111b4(mdo sde): pa'i chos 'dzin pa la mkhas la dam pa'i chos bsrung zhing sbed pa dang /sems can thams cad la bde bar sbyor zhing sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i sems dang /
111b5(mdo sde): sems can gyi 'du shes rnam par 'jig pa la mkhas pa ste/bzang skyong chos de bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin 'a ri thob par 'gyur ba'o//bzang skyod de/
111b6(mdo sde): bas na phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya pa tha mo la dam pa'i chos cher 'khrug pa'i tshe/der byang chub sems dpas lus dang srog kyang yongs su btang ba la gnas te/ting nge 'dzin 'di
111b7(mdo sde): gzung por bya'o//kun chub par bya'o//bcang bar bya'o//bzang skyong chos thams cad gzung ba la mkhas pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni de bzhin gshegs
112a1(mdo sde): pa rnams kyis bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i chos rin po che'i mdzod 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir 'jog par 'gyur/chos
112a2(mdo sde): 'di lta bu 'di yang dag par bsdud pa dang /rnam par dbye ba dang /yang dag par bsgrags par bya ba'ang nus par 'gyur ro//bzang skyong byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brtson
112a3(mdo sde): 'grus kyis gnas 'di dag ni yod de/byang chub sems dpa' rnams brtson 'grus kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa baM yongs su smin par bya ba'i
112a4(mdo sde): phyir/smon ldam 'jug par 'gyur ro//bzang skyong gang zhig phyi ma'i tshe phyi mi'i dus der chos 'di dag 'jog par byed/yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu
112a5(mdo sde): 'omu rigs kyi bu mo dri dag ni/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /sems can thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang /sems can thams cad yang dag par gzung
112a6(mdo sde): nga'i phyir zhugs pa yin te/de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i spangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro//byang chub
112a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na 'dug kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs par 'gyur
112b1(mdo sde): ro//de ni chos 'dod pa dang /chos don du gtor ba dang /chos bslab pa'i phyir phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na ting nge 'dzin 'di'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro//gang dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus na
112b2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ba de dag ni byang chub sems dpe'i chos rnams dang /byang chub sems dpo'i nor rnams kyis yang dag par gzung bar 'gyur ro//
112b3(mdo sde): gang dag phyi ma'i tshe phyi mi'i dus na chos 'di lta bu 'di dag yongs su gzung ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /
112b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang myur du 'dzin par 'gyur ro//de nas ng+ge'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag
112b5(mdo sde): gsungs so//gang zhig brtan pa chos sems pa//phyi ma'i dus su gyur pa na//dam chos gzung phyir gnas gyur pa//de dag la ni gzungs 'di bshad//gang dag dam chos rin
112b6(mdo sde): chen phyir//'jigs pa med pa brtson byed cing //snying yang brtse la snying rje can//de dag chos kyang 'dzin par gnas//brtan cing bag yod dga' ba dang /thub pa'i chos kyi mdzod
112b7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa//de dag don du ting nge 'dzin//sangs rgyas bsngags pa bstan pa yin//gang zhig chos rgyal skyob pa yis//gang dag byin gyis brlabs gyur pa//de dag phye dus
113a1(mdo sde): 'jigs bcas tshe//chos nyid 'di ni 'dzin par 'gyur//shin tu ngo bo nyid kyis ni//chos rnams stong zhing spos med par//dran dang ldan pa gang gis//
113a2(mdo sde): shes//de dag chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur//thams cad chos kyi ngo bo nyid//de la bsam yas tshigs su bcad//nges pa nyid du shes gyur pa//de dag chos kyang 'dzin
113a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur//zad pa shes la gnas gyur cing //mi skye ba la'ang rab gnas la//sems ni dul zhing ngo tsha ldan//de dag chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur//bde ba'i lam
113a4(mdo sde): ni bla na mod //cang shes lam la zhugs gyur pa//brtson 'grus byin gyis brlabs dang ldan//de dag chos 'dzin gnas pa yin//de bzhin nyid dang mi rtog den//gang
113a5(mdo sde): gis chos nyid rab tu shes//de la spros pa ci yang med//de dag chos kyang 'dzin par 'gyur//thams cad chos ni byed med par//nges pa gang gis shes pa de//ci yang
113a6(mdo sde): med cing len med pa'i//chos nyid de ni spogs par 'gyur//'dzin pa med cing 'dzin dang bral//chos kun sngon nas yongs dag par//gang gis shes pa de dag ni//
113a7(mdo sde): chos kyi spyod yul gnas pa yin//chos kun ngo bo med par ni//de ltar chos la gang gis shes//de dag chos nyid 'di ston 'gyur//de ni 'jug pa yin par bshad//
113b1(mdo sde): ming med ming dang bral gyur cing //spros pa med cing mi skye bar//gang gis chos nyid rab shes pa//de dag stong pa nyid kyang sgrogs//gnas pa med cing 'gro ba med//nam
113b2(mdo sde): mkha'i gnas bzhin dag par ni//gang gis tshes 'di shos gyur pa//de la ting 'dzin skye bar 'gyur//gang dag 'du shes don rtog bral//ngo bo nyid du ma skyes shing //dngos
113b3(mdo sde): po'i 'du shes bral gyur pa//de dag chos nyid ston par 'gyur//rgyas grang ba de ni rgya med de//dgongs pa'i tshig tu gsungs pa yin//gang gis de ltar shes gyur pa//
113b4(mdo sde): de dag chos nyid 'di 'dzin 'gyur//bzang skyong gis zhus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o////bzang skyong de lta bas na rigs kyi bu 'am//
113b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis bag yod pa lhur blangs te/chos 'di dag yang dag par bsdu bar bya'o//'di'i phan yon la sbyar bar bya'o//tshul bzhin dang yang ldan par bya'o//
113b6(mdo sde): tshul bzhin ma yin pa'ang yongs su spang bar bya ste/de ltar chos zab mo blta bar dka' ba/rtogs par dka' /gang songs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed par byed pa/rang
113b7(mdo sde): byung rnams kyi ye shes dang /thogs pa med pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa 'di rnyed mi dka' bar 'gyur ro//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
114a1(mdo sde): po dang /tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /li tsa bI gzhon nu rin chen 'byung gnas dang /
114a2(mdo sde): khyim bdag ded dpon che bzang dang /tshong dpon gyi bu phug sras dang /bram ze 'dam bus byin dang /byang chub sems dpa' dbang pos byin dang /khyim bdag chu lga nga /byang
114a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam po de dag dang /'khor bzhi po las ji snyed cig 'dus pa de dag thams cad dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin du bcus pa'i 'jig rten
114a4(mdo sde): rnams la bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu rnams ngas bskul pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa bla na med pa'i chos rin po che 'di'i mdzod dang /'jig
114a5(mdo sde): rten thams cad yid ches par mi 'gyur ba zab mo//don zab pa/rnam par thar pa sgo gsum gyi tshul bshad pa/zab mo byang ba/mthong bar dka' ba/rtogs par dka'
114a6(mdo sde): ba/mkhas shring shes pa rig pa/rgya che ba/gya nom pa/don phun sum tshogs pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di'ang khyed la gtad do//rjes su gtad do//gang dag bla na myed pa yang dag
114a7(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi brten du gyur pa de dag kyang khyed la nyes gyur du rjes su gtad kyis/khyod kyis kyang ci nas kyang bri bar bya'o//mnyan par bya'o//gzung bar
114b1(mdo sde): bya'o//kun chub par bya'o//bcang bar bya'o//klag par bya'o//shin tu rgyas pa dang /rgya cher bya ba'i phyir gzhan dgu la'ang rgya cher bshad par bya'o//bstan par bya'o//
114b2(mdo sde): yang dag par bsgrags par bya'o//sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba'i phyir bsgom pa'i sbyor ba lo brtson par bya'o//ji skad bstan pa bzhin du chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i
114b3(mdo sde): chos bsgrub par bya ste/de ci nas kyang skyes bu tham par ma gyur par bya'o//bzang skyong rigs kyi bro 'am/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig ting nge 'dzin 'di thos la thos nas kyang
114b4(mdo sde): lung nod par byed/kha ton du byed/kun chub par byed na des lhag pa'i bsam pas gus par bya ste mnyan par bya'o//lung mnod par bya'o//bshad par bya'o//gang dgra
114b5(mdo sde): gzhan dag la ston tam/klog tu 'jug na des kyang lhag pa'i bsam pas rgya cher bya ba'i phyir ci nas kyang ting nge 'dzin 'dri yun ring du gnas pa dang /shin tu rgyas pa dang /shin
114b6(mdo sde): tu rgya che bar gzhan dag la bstan par bya/klog tu gzhug par bya ste/'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa yin no//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe sems can grangs
114b7(mdo sde): med tshad med pa dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do//byang chub sems dpa' gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa nas 'dus
115a1(mdo sde): pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed kyis ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid thob ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//stong gsum
115a2(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//lha rnams kyis kyang bar snang las me tog gi char phab bo//rnga bo che dag kyang ma brdungs par sgra byung
115a3(mdo sde): ngo //bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang /dge slong de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' de
115a4(mdo sde): dag dang /lha dang /mi dang /lha ma yin dang /dri zar bcas po'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//'phags pa du
115a5(mdo sde): ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya pra b+ha dang /zhus chen gyi
115a6(mdo sde): lo tsA ba ban+de rat+nA rak+Shi tas zhus te gtan la phab pa/skad gras ro chad kyis kyang bcos lags//rgya gar skad du/Ar+ya sarba pu Na sa muts+tsha ya samA d+hi nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/bod skad du/
115a7(mdo sde): 'phags pa bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo//bam po dang po//sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag
115b1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo//'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/bcom ldan 'das yungs pa nA a mras bsrungs pa'i tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na/dge slong khri'i drag
115b2(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/zag pa zad pa/nyon mongs pa med pa/dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba shes rab shin
115b3(mdo sde): tu rnam par grol ba/cang shes pa/glang po chen po//bya ba byas pa/byed pa byas pa/khur bor bya/rang gi don rjes su thob pa/srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/yang
115b4(mdo sde): dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang /byang chub se mos dpa' nyi khri thams cad kyang
115b5(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa/gzungs thob pa/spobs pa thogs pa med pa/mngon par shes pa thob pa/ting nge 'dzin bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/dran pa dang /blo gros dang /rtogs pa dang /
115b6(mdo sde): bobartan pa dang /shes rab dang /thabs la mkhas pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros dang /
115b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros bla ma dang /byang chub sems dpo'i sems dpa' chen
116a1(mdo sde): po khyad par blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phel ba'i blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang /
116a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi blo gros dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam
116a3(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu dang /de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri dang /lha'i bu bzhi khri thams
116a4(mdo sde): cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba mang po dang /thabs cig tu bzhugs te/de nas
116a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to//de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa shin tu snying por gyur te/mu stegs
116a6(mdo sde): byed kyi tshogs thams cad zil gyis mnan to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus
116a7(mdo sde): mi g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
116b1(mdo sde): 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di shin tu snying por gyur te/mu stegs can ngan pa spyod pa can dang /kun tu rgyu grangs ma mchis pa dang /gcer bu pa la sogs pa thams
116b2(mdo sde): cad zil gyis mnan tI mdzes par gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams legs par yongs su gzung du gsol/
116b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/phan gdags su gsol/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bskyang du gsol/byang chub sems
116b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dge pa'i rtsa ba bskyed par gsol/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams gzeng bstod pa dang /yang dag par dga' bar mdzad
116b5(mdo sde): pa dang /yang dag par bstan par gsol/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i chos kyi tshul yongs su gzung du
116b6(mdo sde): gsol/sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang bar gsol/ji lta bu'i tshul gyi chos kyi phan gdags pas mya ngan las 'das par mchi ba'i lam bstan par gsol/
116b7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams
117a1(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba dang /yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /chos nyan pa dang /dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid pa dang /
117a2(mdo sde): mi 'bral ba dang /bsgyud ngas pa ma mchis pa'i chos can gyi slad du dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /chos kyi dgongs pa rtogs par 'gyur ba'i slad du blo gros dang ldan
117a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang /de ni rtogs pa rjes su 'thob pa'i slad du rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /rang gi sems yongs su dag pa'i slad du ngo tsha dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang //
117a4(mdo sde): sdig pa'i las thams cad spong ba'i slad du khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang /cho ga dang spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa'i slad du brtan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba
117a5(mdo sde): dang /nyon mongs pa thams cad bsal ba'i slad du dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang /'khor thams cad kyi nang du bag tsha ba dang bral ba'i slad du sran thub par 'gyur bar mdzad du
117a6(mdo sde): gsol/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsod nams yongs su mi nyams pa dang /chos yongs su mi nyams pa dang /shes
117a7(mdo sde): rab yongs su mi nyams pa dang /ye shes yongs su mi nyams par 'gyur ba lags/ji ltar na lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi nyams pa
117b1(mdo sde): dang /mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug gi bar du sems can thams cad la mdza' ba brtan pa dang /ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang /sangs rgyas kyis chos yongs su
117b2(mdo sde): rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du gnas pas sems can rnams la mi slu ba dang /gtong ba thams cad rjes su 'jug pas ma bstan pa'i sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang /sdom pa gsum
117b3(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa la gnas pas ma bstan pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /gnod sems med pa'i yid kyis sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pas ma bsten pa'i bzod pa
117b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa dang /yongs su mi skyo ba'i yid kyis don thams cad yongs su bsgrub pas ma bstan pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang /dran pa dang /shes bzhin la mkhas te//bsam
117b5(mdo sde): gtan dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la mi gnas pas ma bstan pa'i bsam gtan dang ldan pa dang /lta ba thams cad dang bral zhing sangs rgyas
117b6(mdo sde): kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob pas ma bstan pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa dang /sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis bsdu ba la shin tu brtson pas bsdu ba shin tu
117b7(mdo sde): bsdus pa dang /lha dang mi'i skye ba thams cad la mi rtag par yid la bgyid pa la brtson pas re ba ma mchis pa dang /thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems la legs
118a1(mdo sde): par gnas shing nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas 'dod pa dang bral bas sgo'i thim pa'i rten lta bu dang /chos kyi dbang du bgyid kyi 'dod pa'i dbang du mi bgyid pa
118a2(mdo sde): dang /chos kyi rgyal srid don du gnyer bar bgyid kyi lha dang mi'i rgyal srid don du mi gnyer ba dang /sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshig dang ldan pa'i chos smra bar 'gyur ba
118a3(mdo sde): dang /chos kyis 'tsho bar 'gyur gyi zang zing gis mi 'tsho ba dang /yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad la 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /sems can thams cad
118a4(mdo sde): la zhe 'gras pa ma mchis pa'i sems dang ldan pas zhe sdang dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /chos thams cad la gti mug gi mun pa dang bral bas gti mug dang bral bar
118a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral bas bdud thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /sgo thams cad nas yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas
118a6(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas par 'gyur ba lages/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rmen sgo sbyong gsum gyi bdag po
118a7(mdo sde): sred med kyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sred med kyi bu khyod legs so legs so//khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
118b1(mdo sde): phyir don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni sred med kyi bu khyod lags so//skyed med kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la gzung TI gau dang /byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa'
118b2(mdo sde): chen po rnams yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang /gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba ngas bshad do//bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/byang chub sems dpa'
118b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
118b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa zhes bya ba yod de/de la brten na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsod nams
118b5(mdo sde): yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/chos yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ye shes yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/sangs rgyas
118b6(mdo sde): mthong ba dang /chos nyan pa dang /dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur/bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la brtson pa dang /sems can thams cad yongs su
118b7(mdo sde): mi gtong bar gnas pa nas sgo thams cad nas yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pas thabs mkhas par 'gyur ba'i bar de dag dang /yon tan gyi khyad par gzhan dag dang
119a1(mdo sde): yang ldan par 'gyur ro//dri nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i ming tsam bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung /
119a2(mdo sde): bar gyur to//de nas de'i tshe dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba chen po che chen po stobs chen po dang ldan pa zhig yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na gnas so//de nas de 'di snyam
119a3(mdo sde): du sems te/bdag ni chen po che chen po stobs po che'i shugs dang ldan pa ste/dza m+bu'i gling 'di'i sems can lnga 'di lta ste/stobs sam spro ba bdag dang mnyamya
119a4(mdo sde): pa'ang med na lhag pa lta ga la yod snyam mo//des dge sbyong gau ta ma stobyas pa che'i shugs dang ldan te/stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan zhing sred med kyi bu'i lus thob po
119a5(mdo sde): zhes grag go snyam mo//de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/bdog dge sbyong gau ta ma'i thung du song la/bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra ba dang /bdag ci 'dra ba sad par bya gor
119a6(mdo sde): ma chag snyam mo//de nas chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjod yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/a mras bsrungs pa'i tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsigs
119a7(mdo sde): ba'i gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'khor 'bum phrag du mas yongs su bskor
119b1(mdo sde): cing mdun gyis bltas te/sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen pos chos ston cing /ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang nas mngon par 'phags pa dang 'dra la kun nas mdzes shing blta
119b2(mdo sde): bas chog mi shes pa mthong ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ma thag tu dga' ba dang dang ba dang mchog tu dga' ba chen po thob po//de dga' ba dang dang ba dang mchog
119b3(mdo sde): tu dga' ba chen po thob nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gtugs te/bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/bcom ldan 'das
119b4(mdo sde): 'ba' shig la phyag 'tshal zhing mgo bor thal mo sbyar nas/bcom ldan 'das la rtog cing 'dug go//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi
119b5(mdo sde): brjid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/nga rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /dregs pa gdul ba'i phyir gnas brtan maut+pal gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa maung+gal
119b6(mdo sde): gyi bu khyod song la/nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho mo'i phyir/mnga' 'phangs pa gang yin pa de 'drir long shig/de skad ces bka' stsal pa
119b7(mdo sde): dang /bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa mod+gal gyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gnam mda' de ga la mchis pa bdag gis ma mthong lags so//de
120a1(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe phyag g.yas pa nas snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer cig btang ste/'od zer des stong gsum gyi stong chen por
120a2(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skad byer byas so//de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'i khror yug chen po gang yin pa de na mda' de 'dug pa snang bar gyur to//de nas bcom
120a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa mornalo gyi bu chen po la bka' stsal pa/modal gyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i khor yug chen po ni mnga' 'dug pa de khyod kyis mthong
120a4(mdo sde): ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong lags si//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/maud+gal gyi bu khyod song la mda' de long shig/bcom ldan 'das
120a5(mdo sde): legs so zhes gsol nas/tshe dang ldan pa maud+gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te/'khor thams cad kyi nang nas mi snang bar gyur nus/dper
120a6(mdo sde): ni skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bsum pa las brkyang ba 'am/brkyang pa las bskum pa bzhin du skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
120a7(mdo sde): khor yug chen po de nas mda' de blangs te/bcom ldan 'das la phul nas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das cig nam mnga'
120b1(mdo sde): 'di byang chub sems dpas yab yum las byung ba'i stobs kyi sa 'phangs pa lags sam/'on te d+hA N+DalA gyi stobs kyis 'phangs pa lags/bka' stsal pa/mau la rgya /
120b2(mdo sde): yub yum las byung ba'i stobs kyis mdanga' 'phangs pa yin gyi/rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'phangs pa ni ma yin no//met+pal gyi bu gal te rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'phangs su
120b3(mdo sde): rten na 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med par 'gro bar 'gyur ro//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dngu' chen dri'i yAb yu pA las byung ba'i

127b7(mdo sde): pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur na/sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ci sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po
128a1(mdo sde): mang ngam/byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sems can gcig 'khor los sgyur ba dang mnyam par gyur pa'i bskyod
128a2(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po 'di dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis na/sems can grangs ma mchis pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pa de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po lta smos
128a3(mdo sde): kyang ci 'tshal/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sred med kyi bu khyod mos par bya/khong du chud par bya ste/de bas na sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
128a4(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po yongs su bzung ba ches mang la ches dpag tu med de/'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung pos ni bsod nams kyi phung po de'i rgya'i char yang
128a5(mdo sde): mi phod/stong gi cha dang /'bum gyi cha dang /bye ba phrag brgya'i cha dang /bye ba phrag stong gi tshe dang /bye ba phrag 'bum gyi char yang mi phod/grangs dang /cha dang /bgrang ba
128a6(mdo sde): dang /dpe dang /rgyur yang mi bzod de/sred med kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang po'o//sred med kyi bu gzhan yang stong gi bdag
128a7(mdo sde): po tshangs pa ni stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab par byed do//sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/gal te mi la la zhig gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams
128b1(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na/sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de dang tshangs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gnyis gang
128b2(mdo sde): mang /byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol po/bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de nyid ches mang gi sbyin pa las byung ba ni de lta ma lags so//
128b3(mdo sde): sred med kyi bu stong gi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhig gi sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pas stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten
128b4(mdo sde): gyi lams byams pas khyab par byed la/sred med kyi bu gal te mi la la zhig gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang par byas te sbyin
128b5(mdo sde): pa byin na/sred med kyi bu sbyin pa las byung ba dang /byams pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gnyis gang mang /byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/
128b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa de nyid ches mang gi sbyin pa las byung ba ni de lta ma lags so//
128b7(mdo sde): sred med kyi bu stong gnyis kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta zhog gi/sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/stong gsum gyi bdag po tshangs pas stong gsum gyi
129a1(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams byams pas khyab par byed la/sred med kyi bu mi la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin
129a2(mdo sde): po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te sbyin pa byin na/sred med kyi bu sbyin pa las byung ba dang /tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de gnyis grang /
129a3(mdo sde): mang /byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i
129a4(mdo sde): bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sred mod kyi bu spong gsum gyi
129a5(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po lta shog gi/sred med kyi bu gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
129a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad tshangs pa chen po'i byams pa bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang
129a7(mdo sde): ldan par gyur pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa
129b1(mdo sde): snyoms can thams cad yong skyes dkrol ba la brtson pa/glu ma med ning sgyu med pa'i byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po gA
129b2(mdo sde): yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di nyid de bas ches mang ste/tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i
129b3(mdo sde): brgyu'i rgyar yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//sred med kyi bu de lta rI nu sems drang po skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsod nams
129b4(mdo sde): kyi phung po ni dpag tu med pa yin te/sred med kyi bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gis bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
129b5(mdo sde): deskyed pa dang /bskyed par 'gyur bya de dag gis bsod nams thams cad yongs su bslus pa de ltar rig par bya ste/skyed med kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i
129b6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa gnyis pa'o//sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig yod/lha dang /nub dang /byang dang /'o/
129b7(mdo sde): dang /steng dang /phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig yod/byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis so//bde
130a1(mdo sde): bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so//phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni brjod pa 'am/brda sprad par rngo mi thog lags so//bcom
130a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sred med kyi bu gal te dper blang ba bstan pas bskul pa 'bum gyi bar du bstan du zin kyang /phyogs bcu na 'jig rten gyi khams ji
130a3(mdo sde): snyed yod pa ni bstan par sla ba ma yin no//sred med kyi bu 'on kyang don 'di nyid brda sprod pa dang /bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs
130a4(mdo sde): par bya ba dang /sems can bsod nams 'dod pa rnams phyir zhing 'bogs par bya ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i sems can rnams kyi brtson 'grus chen
130a5(mdo sde): po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ngas khyod la dpes bstan to//sred med kyi bu dper na mi la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di chu'i phung po
130a6(mdo sde): yan chad srid pa'i rtse mo man chad yungs 'brus yongs su gang bar byas la/sred med kyi bu de las shar phyogs su yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'das
130a7(mdo sde): nas yungs 'bru gcig bor te/de lta bu'i tshul gyis yungs 'bru de dag thams cad yongs su zad par byas kyang /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi mtha' rtogs
130b1(mdo sde): par mi nus so//lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /'og dang /ste bya dang /phyogs bcu kun tu'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro//sred med kyi bu gal te 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
130b2(mdo sde): snyed yungs 'brus yongs su gang bar gyur pa de las mri la la zhig gis yungs 'bru re re'ang /yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed yod pa de snyed kyi char gsas na/sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam
130b3(mdo sde): du sems/yungs 'bru'i cha gses pa de dag bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus sam/byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das yungs 'bru
130b4(mdo sde): gcig gi chugases pa'i phyogs gang lags pa de'ang gling bzhi pa'i sems can thams cad shA rI'i bu dang 'dra bar gyur pas kyang bskal par yang rtogs par rngo mi thogs lags na/
130b5(mdo sde): yungs 'bru'i cha gsas pa thams cad lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/sred med kyi bu gal te mi la lnga zhig gos shar phyogs su yungs 'bru'i tshagasas pa de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi 'jig
130b6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'das nas yangs 'bru'i rgya gses pa re re bor+ya te/sred med kyi bu de lta bu'i tshul gyis yungs 'bru'i chagasas pa thams cad zad par byas kyang /shar phyogs kyi
130b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par mi nus so//lho dang /nub dang /byang dang /ngag dang /steng dang /phyogs bcu kun tu'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro//sred medakyi
131a1(mdo sde): bu de ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkhas yongs su khyab pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad mi la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su gang
131a2(mdo sde): pabar byas te sbyin pa byin na/sred med kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/mi de gzhi de las bsod nams mang du byed dam/byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus gsol pa/
131a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis so//bde bar gshegs pa dpag tu ma mchis so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sred med kyi bu de lta bu'i sbyin pa
131a4(mdo sde): las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs
131a5(mdo sde): pa g.yo med pa sgyu med pa/sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba las brtson pa'i snying rje chen po dang /byams pa chen po bsgom pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung
131a6(mdo sde): po bsdus pa'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//sred med kyi bu dper na gzugs kyi rnam pa nam mkha'i khams kyis me khyab pa ci'ang med pa de bzhin
131a7(mdo sde): du/sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa des ni phyogs bcu'o 'jig rten na 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed yod pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi
131b1(mdo sde): nga ngo skad yod pa de dag ma khyab pa gang yang med de/'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpa' byams pas yongs su khya
131b2(mdo sde): go/'jig rten gyi khams dro dag na sems can gang dag sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur
131b3(mdo sde): tama?/de bzhin du brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur tam/de bzhin du tshangs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang byang chub sems dpa' lhag
131b4(mdo sde): pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa/g.yo med pa/sgyu med pa/sems can yongs su dgrol ba la brtson pa/snying rje chen po la zhugs pa/byams pa chen po la gnas pa'i gom pa
131b5(mdo sde): bdun la bsod nams kyi phung po bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni de bas ches mad+ma ste/sems can thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa'i bsod nams dang
131b6(mdo sde): ldan par gyur pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni de lta ma yin no//sred med kyi bu 'di ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa gsum pa'o//srid med
131b7(mdo sde): kyi bu gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad 'khor los sgyur ba dang mnyam pa'i bsod
132a1(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad brgya byin gyi bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//
132a2(mdo sde): sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad brgya byin dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par
132a3(mdo sde): gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni tshangs pa chen po'i bsod nams kyi phung po brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong
132a4(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rnams cad tshangs pa chen po dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams
132a5(mdo sde): cad ni dge bsnyen nag po'i mchog gi bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
132a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dge bsnyen nag po'i mchog dang mnyam pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po drang ldan par gyur kyang de dag
132a7(mdo sde): thams cad ni shA ri'i bu'i shes rab dang /ye shes dang bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas/rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//sred med kyi bu stong
132b1(mdo sde): gsum b+hi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad shA ri'i bu dang mnyam pa'i shes rab dang /ye shes dang /bsod nams kyi phung po
132b2(mdo sde): dang ldan par gyur kyang /de dag thams cad ni rang sangs rgyas gcig gi shes rab dang /ye shes dang /bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar
132b3(mdo sde): du rang mi bzod do//sred med kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rang sangs rgyas kyi shes rab dang /ye shes
132b4(mdo sde): dang /bsod nams kyi phung po dang ldan par gyur kyang de dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges par byung nas bskal pa lnga brgya ldon pa'i shes rab
132b5(mdo sde): dang /ye shes dang /bsod nams kyi phung po'i brgya'i char yang mi phod pa nas rgyu'i bar du'ang mi bzod do//thams cad la'ang de bzhin du sbyar te/sred med kyi bu 'di ni bsod
132b6(mdo sde): nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa bzhi pa'o//bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/mi sum khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
132b7(mdo sde): bskyod do//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//lha dang mi'i sol snyan dag kyang grag go//lha dang mi'i me tog gi sprin
133a1(mdo sde): drug kyang bab s+ho/me tog gi smon de dag gis sna chen po 'di sa mo nub tsamAng+ga sa ma mo//rtswa dang na /dang gnod sbyin dang /drizla dang l+h+wa ma yin dang /nam
133a2(mdo sde): mkhye' lding dang /mI'am N+Di dang /chen ba dung /rgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten kya dang de dag rnams cad kyis med tshig 'di skad ces gsol to//
133a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /skyed pa dang /bskyed par 'gyur ba gang
133a4(mdo sde): drug lags pa de dag gis ni bdag nAg zil gyis gnon to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cog ni sems can de dag gi dran bgyid pa legs so//bcom ldan 'das
133a5(mdo sde): kyis gsungs pa'i don bdagra cag gis 'tshal ba ltar na sems can gang su drug bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la ma zhugs pa de dgra ni bsod nams
133a6(mdo sde): thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mngon par byung ba'ang ma lpags/de dag thams cad ni bsad nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la yang dgra
133a7(mdo sde): bar gzhol ba'ang ma lags kyi/bcom ldan 'das gang drug gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad ni
133b1(mdo sde): bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mngon par byung ba'ang lags/de dag thams cad ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin de la yang dag par
133b2(mdo sde): gzhol ba'ang lags so//le'u dang po'o////bam po gnyis pa//de nas bcom ldan 'das la chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di
133b3(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di thob par bgyid pa'i chos rnams gang lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /
133b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di
133b5(mdo sde): 'thob par byed pa'i chos gcig ste/gcig gang zhe na/'di lta ste/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems mi gtong ba ste/rigs kyi bu chos gcig po 'di ni bsod nams
133b6(mdo sde): thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos gnyis
133b7(mdo sde): te/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mnyan pa'i chos yongs su 'tshol bas chog mi shes pa dang /ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog pa ste/rigs kyi bu
134a1(mdo sde): chos 'di gnyis ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus
134a2(mdo sde): pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos gsum ste/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sdig pa thams cad yongs su spong ba dang /dge ba'i chos rnams mngon
134a3(mdo sde): par 'du byed pa dang /yongs su bsngo ba la mkhas pa ste/rigs kyi bu chos gsum po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par
134a4(mdo sde): byed pa'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/tshul
134a5(mdo sde): khrims yongs su dag pa dang /lta ba yongs su dag pa dang /sems yongs su dag pa dang /shes rab yongs su dag pa ste/rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag ni
134a6(mdo sde): bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par
134a7(mdo sde): byed pa'i chos lnga ste/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lhag pa'i bsam pas byang chub la zhugs pa dang /rtag tu bden pa'i tshig smra ba dang /g.yo med pa dang /phrag
134b1(mdo sde): dog med pa dang /sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa ste/rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o//rigs kyi bu
134b2(mdo sde): gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'i chos drug ste/drug gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten pa dang /sdig
134b3(mdo sde): pa'i grogs po yongs su spong ba dang /tshogs kyi khwa mi 'dren pa dang /dben pa'i gnas nA gnas pa dang /byams pa chen po mi gtong pa dang /sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po

134b5(mdo sde): bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dri 'thob par byed pa'i chos bdun te/bdun gang zhe na/'di lta ste/zhi gnas yongs su 'tshol ba dang /lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang /rgyu yongs su
134b6(mdo sde): shes pa dang /rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa dang /yang dgra par bsgrub pa dang /lam gyi tshogs yongs su 'tshol ba dang /lam bsgom pa la le lo nod pA ste/
134b7(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu bdun po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting
135a1(mdo sde): 'dzin 'di 'thub par byed pa'i chos brgyad do//brgyud gu n+tu/'di//lus ltas su rung ba nyid dang /snums lus sa dang ba stod dang /
135a2(mdo sde): la so sor rtog pa nyid dang /chos la rjes su lta ba nyid dang /sdig pa mi dge bas ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa dang /sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos smras pa rnams spang
135a3(mdo sde): dang /dge ba'i chos mi skyes pa rnams sred pa dang /dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams kun nas bsrung zhing yongs su sbyong ba ste/rigs kyi bu rgyas brgyad pa de dag ni bsod nams
135a4(mdo sde): thams cad bsdus pa'o ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'dri 'thob par byed pa'i chos
135a5(mdo sde): dgu ste/dgu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'das pa mi zad pa'i chos nyid dang /me 'ongs pa mi zad pa'i chos nyid dang /de ltar byung ba mi zad pa'i chos nyid du so sor rtog
135a6(mdo sde): pa dang /sgyu me'i chos las sor rtog pa dang /dus gsum mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa dang /chos thams cad la ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi brjod pa dang ldan pa
135a7(mdo sde): dang /stong pa nyid mi spong ba dang /mtshan ma med pa rnam par bsgoms pas smon pa dang bral ba dang /bsams bzhin du srid par skye ba ste/rigs kyi bu chos dgu
135b1(mdo sde): po de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par byed pa'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'thob par
135b2(mdo sde): byed pa'i chos bcu ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdag med pa la mos pa dang /srog med pa la bzod pa dang /gang zag med pa la gcig tu nges pa dang /mi rtag pa la yid
135b3(mdo sde): chos pa dang /skye ba thams cad la sems can dmyal bar 'du shes pa dang /phung po rnams la gshed mar 'du shes pa dang /khams rnams la sprul gdug par 'du shes pa
135b4(mdo sde): dang /skye mched rnams la grong stong par 'du shes pa dang /srid pa rnams la nges par 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang /rnam par thar pa'i sgo rnams la 'dris par 'du shes pa ste
135b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bcu pa de dag ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di 'othob par byed pa'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom ldan 'das la chen po che
135b6(mdo sde): chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi tshogs yang dag par bsdus par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
135b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen pos bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyen par bgyi'o//bsod nams sogs par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
136a1(mdo sde): dpa' chen pos bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di mnyan par bgyi'o//bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'thob par 'tshal ba'i
136a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams rnams cad bsdus pa'i ting ti 'dzin 'di mnyan par bgyi/mos par bgyi'o//bsod nams mi zad pa 'thob
136a3(mdo sde): par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di la brtson par bgyi'o//bsod nams rgya mtsho 'thob par 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems
136a4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di gzung bar bgyi/bcang bar bgyi/klag+sa par bgyi/bshad par bgyi'o//bsod nams brgya'i mtshan yongs su gzung
136a5(mdo sde): bar 'tshal ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ting nge 'dzin 'di sgom pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bgyi'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la tshan
136a6(mdo sde): po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par brtson pas 'di lta ste/
136a7(mdo sde): bsod nams mi zad pa dang /bsod nams rgya mtsho dang /bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /bsod nams sogs pa dang /bsod nams brgya'i mtshan
136b1(mdo sde): gyi chos 'di dag ji ltar yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid la 'di skad
136b2(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu gsum po 'di dag ni bsod nams nye bar rton pa dang /bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /bsod nams 'du ba dang /bsod nams rgyas pa
136b3(mdo sde): dang /bsod nams mi zad pa dang /bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /bskyod nams rgya mtsho yin te/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i tshogs drug tshul
136b4(mdo sde): khrims kyi tshogs dang /thos pa'i tshogs so//rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i tshogs la ji ltar brtson par bya zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di
136b5(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dngos po gang la de'i gtong ba'i sems mi skye zhing gtong ba'i blo mi 'byung ba'i dngos po de blang bar mi bya'o//yongs su gzung ba
136b6(mdo sde): gang la btang ba'i sems mi skye ba'i yongs su gzung ba de yongs su gzung bar mi bya'o//gang la slong ba rnams kyis bslangs na yongs su 'dzin pa'i blo skye ba'i g.yog 'khor
136b7(mdo sde): de gzung bar mi bya'o//dngos po gang la slong ba rnams kyis bslangs na byang chub sems dpa' mi gtong ba'i blo skye bar 'gyur ba'i rgyal srid de blang bar mi bya'o//longs
137a1(mdo sde): spyod de dag dang /nor de dang /rdzas de dang /don po che de dag blang bar mi bya ba nas de lta bu'i dngos po ci'i nga rung ba'i bar du blang bar mi bya'o//rigs
137a2(mdo sde): kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/bdag gi lus 'di'ang sems can thams cad la gtang ste yongs
137a3(mdo sde): su gtang na phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams lta ci smos snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o//gzhan yang sems can gang dang gang la dngos po gang dang gang gis dngos po gang dang
137a4(mdo sde): gang byed par 'gyur ba de yod na de dang de la de dang de me dga' ba med pa dang 'gyod pa med par sbyin par bya ste/lag pa 'dod pa rnams la lag pa'ang sbyin no//rkang pa
137a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa rnams la rkang pa dang /mig 'dod pa rnams la mig kyang sbyin no//sha 'dod pa rnams la sha dang /khrag/'dod pa rnams la khrag dang /rkang 'dod pa rnams
137a6(mdo sde): la rkang dang /yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa rnams la yan lag dang nying lag dang /mgo bo 'dod pa rnams la mgo bo'ang yongs su gtong bar bya na/phyi rol gyi
137a7(mdo sde): dngos po 'di lta ste/nor dang /'bru dang /gse raM dang /dngul dang /rin po de dang /rgyan dang /rta dang /glang po che dang /shing rta dang /bzhon pa dang /grong dang /grong
137b1(mdo sde): dang /zang rdal dang /stongs dang /yul lakhor dang /rgyal po'i ga sa dang /tshong 'dus dang /ltung ba dang /dran pa dang /na mad/nga bye pa/dang
137b2(mdo sde): bu mo dang /chung me dang /'khor rnams lta ci smos/gzhan yang sems can gang dang gang la gling dang gang gis don byed par 'gyur ba de dang de yod na de dong de la da ma pade
137b3(mdo sde): dang de sbyin par bya ste/mi dga' ba med pa dang /'gyod pa med pa dang /rnam par smin pa la mi re bar yongs su gtang bar bya'o//mi lta bar sbyin par bya'o//gzhan du na
