137b4(mdo sde): sems can lnga pan gdags pa dang /sems can la snying rje ba dang /sems can de la steng brtse ba dang /sems can+da de dag nyid bsdu ba'i phyir bya bar zad do//bdag gis byang
137b5(mdo sde): chub thob pa na ci nas sems can 'di dag chos kun rtogs par gyur cig snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' glang su dgade ltar sems
137b6(mdo sde): bskyed par byed pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni lus dang srog la'ang mi lta ba yin te/da ni srog gi phyir
137b7(mdo sde): yang sdig pa'i las mngon por 'du mi byed do//lus brtas par bya ba'i phyir yang ba'i 'tsho bas 'tsho bar mi byed do//de ni srog gi phyir yang gzhan la slong khro ba mi byed/
138a1(mdo sde): do//yongs spyod kyi phyir mI dge pa mngon par 'du mi byed do//g.yog 'khor gyi phyir yang rtsod pa dang 'thab mo slong bar mi byed do//chung ma dang /bu dang /
138a2(mdo sde): bu mo rnams kyi phyir yang gzhan dag la 'did par mi byed do//gzhon gyi longs spyod dag la'ang brnab semus skyed par mi byed/ser sna'i sems bskyed par mi byed
138a3(mdo sde): do//de 'dod pa nyung ste sems skyed pa de cig kyang dge ba dang mi ldan pa bskyed pa ro mi byed na/mang po lta ci smos/de de ltar brtson na 'dod chen dang chags pa spong ba
138a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//'dod chen dang chags pa spangs na btsal bar bya ba 'tshal bar mi byed do//btsal bar bya ba mi 'tshal na yang dag pa la brtson par 'gyur ro//yang dag
138a5(mdo sde): nga la brtson na yang dag par 'gro ba thob par 'gyur ro//yang dag par song na yang dag pa'i bsgrub pa la gnas par 'gyur ro//yang dag pa la zhugs na/yang dag
138a6(mdo sde): pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams mnyes par byed do//yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnye na rnams mnyes par byas nas bsten par byed/'grogs par byed/bsnyen bkur
138a7(mdo sde): da do//de dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams dang posten cing 'grogs la bsnyen bkur byed na dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams las yang dag par nges pa'i chos rnams
138b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//thos nas kyang sgrub par byed do//de yang dag pa'i chos la zhugs nas logs par sgrub pa la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thams cad byed do//de sems
138b2(mdo sde): can gyi don lnga brtson na mi rigs par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro//de rigs pa la zhugs na 'di lta ste/sems can rnams kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i tshul
138b3(mdo sde): ngang tshul ma yin pa la mkhas pa 'thob par 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu de ltar na sbyin pa'i tshogs la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dri yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu dang
138b4(mdo sde): thob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni nang dang phyi rol gyi chos rnams la gcig gis 'du shes bskyed par bya gnyis
138b5(mdo sde): kyi 'du shes bskyed par mi bya ste/nang gi sa'i khams gang yin pa dang /phyi rol gyi sa'i khams gang yin pa 'di la gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//de cing phyir zhe na
138b6(mdo sde): lus 'di ni rtswa dang shing dang /brtsig pa dang /lam snang ba dang 'dra ste/spyod pa med pa/byed pa med pa/sems pa med pa/snying po med pa khams kyis bsdus pa yin pa'i
138b7(mdo sde): phyir ro//gal te 'di la la la zhig gis bcad dam/btubs sam/dbyug pa 'am/mtshon cha'am/shing ngam/bong pos bsnun kyang rung ste/de la bdag gis tsho
139a1(mdo sde): /ba rnam par rnyog pa / par mjug/lus la blta ra ma d+harmA/ga/ chags pa shAseM par //sems can dag la 'du tha ba da /
139a2(mdo sde): ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o snyam pa'i steng du des sems can de dag la byams pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o//rigs kyi bu dper na sman kyi shing ljon pa ni rtsa ba las khyer
139a3(mdo sde): ram/sdong po 'am/yal gA 'am/shun lpags sam/lo ma 'am/me tog gram/'bras bu 'am/snying po las khyer na/'di snyam du bdag gi rtsa ba khyer la sdong po
139a4(mdo sde): mkhyer cig ce'am/bdag gi sdong po khyer la rtsa ba ma khyer cig ce 'am/bdag gi yal ga khyer la la ma mkhyer cig ce 'am/bdag gi lo mkhyer la yul gu me khyer
139a5(mdo sde): cig ce 'am/de bzhin du bdag gi yul ga phre'u dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /shun lpags dang /snying po las khyer la snying po me pa las mkhyer cig ce'am/
139a6(mdo sde): bdag gi snying po med pa las khyer lnga snying po las ma khyer cig sgyum du rtog par mi byed de/de ltar na sman gyi shing ljon pa ni thams cad kyi thams cad du rnam par rtog
139a7(mdo sde): par mi byed mod kyi/'on kyang sman gyi shing ljon pa ni rnam par mi rtog bzhin du na do rab dang /'bring dang /tha ma sel bar byed pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu byang chub
139b1(mdo sde): snyoms dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i lus 'di la/sman gyi shing ljon pa lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//sems can gang dang gang dag la ci dang /
139b2(mdo sde): ci dgos pa de dang de de bzhin du khyer cig ces byas te/lag pa 'dod pa li ni lag pa/rkang pa 'dod pa la ni rkang pa/mig 'dod pa la mig/sha 'dod pa lA ni sha
139b3(mdo sde): khrag 'dod pa la ni khrag/rus pa 'dod pa lnga ni rus pa/rkang 'dod pa la ni rkang /mgo bo 'dod pa la ni mgo bo/yan lag dang nying lag thams cad 'dod pa la ni bdag
139b4(mdo sde): gri yan lag dang nying lag thams cad khyer cig snyam ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar sems pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i tshogs kyis bsod nams
139b5(mdo sde): mi zad pas mngon par 'byung ba yin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges sbyin pa byin pa nu sems can ser sna can rnams kyi gtong ba yongs su rdzogs par bya
139b6(mdo sde): ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//sems can dbul po rnams kyis longs stod chen po 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//des yan lag dang nying lag rnams
139b7(mdo sde): yongs su gtong ba na sems can thams cad kyi yan lag dang /nying lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//des sbyin pa sbyin pa na
140a1(mdo sde): dus thams cad du chos gsum du yongs su bsngo bar mi bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/'dod pa'i dga' ba dang /rgyal srid dang /longs spyod dang /dbang
140a2(mdo sde): byuphyug thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar mi bya ba dang /bdag nyid bsod nams dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar mi bya ba dang /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
140a3(mdo sde): 'thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar mi bya'o//des sbyin pa sbyin pa na sbyin pa de yan lag bzhi yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya/
140a4(mdo sde): ste/de la yan log bzhi yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs pa gang zhe na/sangs rgyas kyis zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang /byang chub
140a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i dge 'dun yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ba dang /thams
140a6(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesnga yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya ba ste/de ltar na yan lag bzhi yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogos par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
140a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa de yongs su bsngo bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa nye bar brton por bya'i zad par mi
140b1(mdo sde): bya'o//de la byang chub sems dnga' rnams kyi sbyin pa ji ltar zad par 'gyur zhe na/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur
140b2(mdo sde): to/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/yongs su ma bsngos pa dang /thabs mi mkhas pa dang /dma' bar skye bar 'dod pa dang /sdig pa'i grogs po la bston pa ste rigs kyi bu byung
140b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po dri dag dang ldan pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan pa rnams
140b4(mdo sde): kyi sbyin pa ni yongs su zad par mi 'gyur la nye bar brtan par 'gyur ro//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba dang /
140b5(mdo sde): thabs la mkhas pa dang /chos kyi rgyal srid 'dod pa dang /dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ston pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de
140b6(mdo sde): dgra dang ldan pa rnams kyi sbyin pa ni yongs su zad par mi 'gyur la nye bar brten par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos
140b7(mdo sde): bzhi mngon du byas la sbyin po sbyin par bya ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /sems can la snying brtse ba dang /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
141a1(mdo sde): bka' dang mi 'gal ba dang chos dang zung zing gi sbyin pa'i rnam par smin pa la mi ra bste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas rnas
141a2(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag mngon du byas la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pos chos gsum la dgod pa'i phyir sbyin du sbyin
141a3(mdo sde): par bya ste/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can thams cad byang chub la dgod pa dang /chos bstan pa de nyid la dgod pa dang /sems can thams cad blo na myed
141a4(mdo sde): pa'i badre ba la dgod pa'i phyir te/rigs kyi bu chos gsum po de dag la sems can rnams dgrod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//
141a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gnyis 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/longs spyod chen po dang /
141a6(mdo sde): gtong ba'i sems te/chos de gnyis 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gnyis yongs su spang
141a7(mdo sde): ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/chags pa dang /ser sna ste/rigs kyi bu chos de gnyis
141b1(mdo sde): yongs su spang ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gnyis stongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems/
141b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/gnyis gang zhe na/'dre lta ste/shes rab dang /ye shes te/rigs kyi bu chos 'di gnyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
141b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang chos gnyis thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpo' chen pos
141b4(mdo sde): sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/zad pa shes pa dang /mi skye ba shes pa ste/rigs kyi bu chos 'dri gnyis thob par bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
141b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas gang dag sbyin par bya ba'i sbyin pa dag ni rnam pa bzhi ste/bzhi gang zhe na/'di
141b6(mdo sde): lta ste/sems snyoms po'i sbyin pa dang /rnam par smin pa la mi re ba'i sbyin pa dang /byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bo'i sbyin pa dang /dulwa ba dang /zhi ba dang nye bar zhi ba yongs
141b7(mdo sde): su rdzogs pa'i sbyin pa ste/rigs kyi bu sbyin pa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin par bya ba dag go/rigs kyi bu dri lta bas na byang chub sems
142a1(mdo sde): dpa' bsod nams mi zad pa mngon par 'byung bar 'dod pas sbyin pa'i tshogs 'di lta bu la brtson par bya'o//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /bcom
142a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das la chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams
142a3(mdo sde): cad yongs su gzung ba'i slad du sbyin pa'i tshogs 'di bka' stsal pa ngo mtshar lags so//bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang drag sbyin
142a4(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni nam yang bsod nams yongs su nyams pa 'am/ye shes yongs su nyams pa 'am/shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur
142a5(mdo sde): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no//khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin te/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sbyin
142a6(mdo sde): pa'i tshogs 'di lta bu dang ldan pa de dag ni bsod nams mi zad pa dang /bskyod nams rgya mtshos mngon par 'byung por 'gyur ro//de dag ni 'phags pa'i chos dang ldan pas
142a7(mdo sde): dbul por yang mi 'gyur ro//de dag ni chos kyi rgyun dang ldan pas longs spyod chen por yang 'gyur ro//de dag ni nor bdun dang ldan pas phyug por 'gyur ro//de dag ni
142b1(mdo sde): bsod nams brgya'i mtshan yod pas bstod nams chen po dang ldan pa'ang yin no//de dag ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bas bsod nams kyi zhing yang yin no//bcom ldan
142b2(mdo sde): 'das kyis chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid lnga gzhan yang bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi tshogs gang zhe na/gang
142b3(mdo sde): tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang /bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ba dang /tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la snying rje ba dang /tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la gus pa drag po dang
142b4(mdo sde): ldan pa dang /lus kyi yan lag gsum yongs su dag pa dang /ngag gi yan lag bzhi yongs su dag pa dang /yid kyi yan lag gsum yongs su dag pa dge ba bcu'i las
142b5(mdo sde): kyi lam yang dag par blang ba rjes su sgrub pa ste/gzhan dag kyang de la 'dzud pa dang /de dag la 'god par byed pa dang /bdag la mi bstod pa dang /gzhan dag la mi smod pa dang /
142b6(mdo sde): tshul khrims dag la dri'i drang can du gyur pa dang /tshul khrims kyis mi rlom pa dang /brtson pa mi 'dor ba dang /sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa dgra las mi g.yo
142b7(mdo sde): ba dang /'phags pa'i rigs la gnas par byed pa dang /rang gi snyems srung ba dang /gzhan gyi 'khrul pa dag lo skyon du mi lta ba dang /sdig pa thams cad mi byed pa dang /
143a1(mdo sde): srid pa mngon par 'grub pa la mngon par mi dga' ba dang /gzhan rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la 'dzud pa dang /gzhan gyi bya ba dag la spro ba dang /bde ba/
143a2(mdo sde): dag la de'i ngang can du mi 'gyur ba dang /dgon par gnas pa mi 'dor ba dang /nad pa rnams kyi g.yog byed pa dang /byas nas kyang dga' ba dang /mchog tu dga' bar
143a3(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang /bkur sti mi byed pa dag le dang du len pa dang /bkur sti byed po rnams la khengs par mi byed pa dang /rnyed pa
143a4(mdo sde): dang ma rnyed pa dang /grags pa dang ma grags pa dang /smad pa dang bsdogs pa dang /bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba dog la khengs par yang mi 'gyuraro/zhum par yang mi
143a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong ba dang /khon du mi 'dzin pa dang /rtag tu rgyan mi chad par byams pa la gnas pa dang mdza' bshes dang ngagra rnams la
143a6(mdo sde): sems snyoms par lta ba dang /tshul khrims kyi phung po la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa dang /theg po gzhan du yongs su mi bsngo ba dang /lha gzhan la phyag mi 'tshal ba dang /
143a7(mdo sde): lta bar gyur pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /bag la nyal ba dang kun nas ldang ba rnam par gnon pa dang /'gyod pa spang ba dang /yid la gtsags pa med pa dang
143b1(mdo sde): dngangos pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba la mchog tu dga' ba dang /skyo ba'i gnas rnams cad la lhag par chags pa med pa dang /bsams bzhin du srid pa'i 'gro
143b2(mdo sde): skye ba dang /mi dga' ba bzod pa dang /brtson 'grus com pa dang /soms rab tu 'dzin pa dang /dmigs pa la rnam par g.yengs pa med pa dang /mi skye ba'i chos la brjod
143b3(mdo sde): citsong mi skrag pa ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar na 'di ni/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi tshogs yin te/tshul khrims kyi tshogs de lnga brten nas/srog gi phyir yang bslab
143b4(mdo sde): pa nyams par mi byed de/dwe ni rgyal srid kyi phyir tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do//mtho ris kyi phyir ma yin/brgya byin du 'gyur ba'i phyir ma yin/tshangs por 'gyur ba'i
143b5(mdo sde): bIr ma yin/ljongs spyod kyi phyir ma yin/dbang phyug gi phyir ma yin/kha drug gi phyir mu yin/grags pa'i phyir ma yin/snyan pa dod skra dang tshigs su brjod pa'i phyir ma
143b6(mdo sde): yin/rnyed pa'i phyir ma yin/bkur sti'i phyir ma yin/srog gi phyir ma yin/gos kyi phyir ma yin/zas kyi phyir ma yin/mAl cha dang stan gyi phyir ma yin te/no ba'i
143b7(mdo sde): gsos dang sman zong gi phyir tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do//mig dang /rna ba dang /sna dang /lce dang /lus la rten te tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do//gzugs dang /
144a1(mdo sde): skra dang /dri dang /ro dang /reg bya dang /chos la rten te tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do//gzugs la rten te tshul khrims srung bur mi byed do//tshor ba dang /
144a2(mdo sde): 'du shes dang /'du byed dang /rnam par shes po la rten te tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do/'dod pa'i khams la rten te tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do//gzugs kyi
144a3(mdo sde): khams la rten te tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do/gzugs med pa'i khams la rten te tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do//sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pas skrag ste//
144a4(mdo sde): tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do//dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pas skrag ste tshul khrims spang bar mi byed do//gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pas skrag ste skyabs
144a5(mdo sde): 'dod pa'i phyir tshul khrims srung bar mi byed do//mi dbul po'i 'jigs pas skrag ste tshul khrims srung por mi byed do//lha dbul po'i 'jigs pas skrag pa dang /klu
144a6(mdo sde): dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po'i dngul po'i 'jigs pas skrag ste/tshul khrims srung
144a7(mdo sde): bar mi byed do/gzhan du ni sangs rgyas kyi tshul gnas par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims srung bar byed do//sangs rgyas kyi rigs gnas par bya ba dang /chos kyi rigs gnas
144b1(mdo sde): par bya ba dang /dge 'dun gyi rigs gnas par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims srung bar byed do//skye ba dang /rga ba dang /nub dang /'chi ba dang /mya ngan dang /smre sngags 'don
144b2(mdo sde): pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /yid mi bde ba dang /'khrug pa las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims srung bar byed do//sems can thams cad rab
144b3(mdo sde): tu dgrol bar 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do//sems can thams cad la phyin pa dang /bde ba drong grub pa dang bde ba 'dod do tshul khrims srung bar byed do//sangs
144b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos gnas par 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do//chos kyi 'khor lo sbyor bar 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do//'phags pa'i dge 'dun yongs su bsdu
144b5(mdo sde): bar 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do//sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad par 'dod pa dang /chos kyi rigs mi 'chad por 'dod pa dang /dge 'dun gyi rigs mi 'chad par
144b6(mdo sde): dadod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do//'phags pa'i rigs yongs su spyad par 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do//lha'i mngon par shes pa 'dod pa dang /ting nge
144b7(mdo sde): 'dzin 'dod pa dang /shes rab 'dod pa dang /rnam par grol ba 'dod pa dang /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed do//rdzu 'phrul
145a1(mdo sde): 'dod pa dang /cho 'phrul 'dod de tshul khrims srung bar byed de/de'i tshul khrims de'ang ma nyams pa dang /ma zhig pa dang /ma 'dres pa dang /ma 'tshal
145a2(mdo sde): ba dang /rang dbang yod pa dang legs par char phyin pa dang /legs por bsams pa dang /mu nogs pa dang /rma med pa dang /gtsang ba dang /dri zhim pa dang /
145a3(mdo sde): mkhas pas bsngags pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa dang /ma smad pa dang /chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos sgrub pa snying por byed pa yin no//de tshul
145a4(mdo sde): khrims kyi phung po de lta bu dang ldan pas chos bcu las nyams par mi 'gyur te/bcu gang zhe na/'dri lta ste/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid las yongs su nyams
145a5(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur te/de la'ang bag yod la byang chub 'dod pa dang /brgya byin las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur te/de la'ang bag yod la byang chub 'dod cing sangs rgyas
145a6(mdo sde): mthong ba 'ba' zhig 'dod pa dang /tshangs pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/de la'ang bag yod la byang chub 'dod pa dang /shes nas dad pa thob pa'i phyir
145a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mthong ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /ji ltar thos pa'i chos la nan tan du bskyob pa'i phyir chos thos pa las yongs su nyams par mi
145b1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /byang chub sems dpa'i dam bcas pa shes pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba'i chos thams cad shes pa 'dod pa'i phyir spobs pa'o///
145b2(mdo sde): mi chod pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /bsam gtan las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas dang /rang sangs rgyas dang /nyon thos dang /
145b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsngags pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang /mngon par shes pa myur ba dang /thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su
145b4(mdo sde): rdzogs par bya ba las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba ste/tshul khrims kyi phung po de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni chos bcu po de dag
145b5(mdo sde): las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro//tshul khrims kyi phung po de lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lha rnams kyis rtag tu phyag byas pa
145b6(mdo sde): yin no//klu rnams kyis rtag tu bsngags pa yin no//gnod sbyin rnams kyis rtag tu bkur sti byas pa yin no//dri za rnams kyis rtag tu mchod pa yin no//klu'i dbang po
145b7(mdo sde): dang /lha ma yin rnams kyis rtag tu bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no//rgyal rigs dang /bram ze dang /tshong dpon dang /khyim bdag rnams kyis rtag tu bkur ba yin no//
146a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams kyis rtag tu thad du 'gro bar bya ba yin no//sangs rgyas rnams kyis rtag tu dgongs pa yin no//lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rtag
146a2(mdo sde): tu ston par bkur ba yin no//sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba can yin no//de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po yang dag par srung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
146a3(mdo sde): dpa' chen po de ni 'gro ba bzhir 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched ma gtogs blor mi khom pa'i 'phyo bar
146a4(mdo sde): 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas mi bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'gro bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang /log par lta ba'i rigs su skye ba'i 'gro bar
146a5(mdo sde): 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang /ngan 'gro thams cad kyi 'gro bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba ste/de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po legs par yang dag par srung ba'i byang chub
146a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'gro ba bzhi po de dag tu 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro//gzhan yang de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po yang dag par srung ba'i byang chub sems
146a7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos bzhi las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems las yongs su nyams par
146b1(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa las yongs su nyams por mi 'gyur ba dang /ji ltar thos pa dang /kun chub par byed pa'i chos rnams las yongs su nyams
146b2(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba dang /bskal ba grangs med pa rjes su dran pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba ste/de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po yang dag par srung ba'i
146b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos bzhi po de dag yos yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po yang dag par srung
146b4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam par 'jig pa bzhi dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa dang
146b5(mdo sde): phrad par mi 'gyur ba dang /mtshon gyi bar gyi bskal pa dang phrad par mi 'gyur pa dang /mu ge'i bar gyi bskal pa dang phrad par mi 'gyur ba dang /nad kyi bar gyi bskal
146b6(mdo sde): pa dang phrad par mi 'gyur ba ste/rigs kyi bu de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po yang dag par srung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam par 'jig pa bzhi
146b7(mdo sde): po de dag dang phrad par mi 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par
147a1(mdo sde): mtho ba bzhi thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mi slu ba dang /lha la mi skye ba dang /sems
147a2(mdo sde): can rnams la mi slu ba dang /rang gi sems la mi slu ba ste/de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par
147a3(mdo sde): mtho ba bzhi po de dag thob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'jigs
147a4(mdo sde): pa bcu las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur te/bcu gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sems can dmyal ba'i 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /dud
147a5(mdo sde): 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /
147a6(mdo sde): dbul po'i 'jigs pa las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang /bsngags pa dang /snyan pa dang /glags pa dang /sgra dang /tshigs su bcad pa ma yin pa'i 'jigs
147a7(mdo sde): pa dang /bdud kyi kun nas dkris pa'i 'jigs pa dang /nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi nges pa'i 'jigs pa dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /
147b1(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /grul bum dang /srin pa'i 'jigs pa dang /dug dang /mtshon dang /me dang chu'i 'jigs
147b2(mdo sde): pa dang /seng ge dang /stag dang /sbrul dang /dom dang /dred dang /gzig dang /khyi dang /la dang /chu srin ma ka ra dang /chu srin byis pa gsod dang /chu srin kum b+hi ra
147b3(mdo sde): dang /byil dang /byi ba dang /sdig pa dang /srin gyi me dang /sbrul gdug pa dang /rgyal po dang /chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ba
147b4(mdo sde): ste/de ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'jigs pa bcu po de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro//rigs
147b5(mdo sde): kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rten ni tshul khrims yin te/byang chub dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas so//gang la tshul khrims yod
147b6(mdo sde): pa de la ni ting nge 'dzin 'di yod do//gang la tshul khrims yod pa de la ni shes rab 'di yod do//gang la tshul khrims yod pa de la ni rnam par grol ba 'dri yod do//gang la
147b7(mdo sde): tshul khrims yod pa de la ni rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba 'di yod do//rigs kyi bu de la gang nyon mongs pa rnams rab tu zhi ba'i tshul khrims ni gang yin/ci'i
148a1(mdo sde): phyir na nyon mongs pa rnams shes bya zhe na/nyon mongs par byed pas na nyon mongs pa rnams te/'di ltar khams gsum du sems can rnams nyon
148a2(mdo sde): mongs par byed pas na nyon mongs pa rnams zhes bya'o//de dag zhi bar byed pa glang zhe na/gang rtog pa med pa dang /rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /yongs su rtog pa med pa
148a3(mdo sde): dradrung /rgyu ba med pa dang /skye ba med pa dang /kun tu rtog pa med pa dang /yid la byed pa med pa ste/'di ni nyon mongs pa rnams rnam par zhi ba zhes bya'o//rigs
148a4(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi ba mi shes pa de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po ni yongs su dag pa ma yin no//de
148a5(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/de dag ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du song yang nyon mongs pa dang bcas par zad do//de dag ni srid pa'i rtse mor song yang nyon mongs pa dang bcas par zad
148a6(mdo sde): dro//rigs kyi bu de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang khyod kyis gang la khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams med pa de'i tshul khrims kyi phung po ni yongs su dag pa
148a7(mdo sde): yin par de ltar rig par bya'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das la chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gal
148b1(mdo sde): tetote khams gsum pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams ma mchis pa de'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa lags na/bcom ldan 'das nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i byang chub
148b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' de ji ltar khams gsum par smon par bgyid/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid la 'di
148b3(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'i phyir khams gsum par smon par mi byed de//
148b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu gang dag bdag nyid kyang nyon mongs pa med la/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khams gsum du'ang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba de ni byang chub
148b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs yin no//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/mi la la zhig gis namo mkha' la ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs bkru ba ston par byed nA/rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam
148b6(mdo sde): du sems/tsa mi de dka' ba byed pa yin nam/gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags so//bde ba rA ga shegs pa de de lta lags te/mi de ni dka' ba bgyid pa
148b7(mdo sde): lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu byeng chub sems dpa' gang dag bdag nyid kyang nyon mongs pa med la sems can yongs su smin
149a1(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir khams gsum du'ang kun nus nyon mongs par 'gyur ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par byas nas kyang theg pa gsum ston par byed
149a2(mdo sde): pa de dag ni de bas kyang ches dka' ba byed pa yin no//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag thar pa'i sgro'ang mthong la//
149a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du khams gsum na'ang gnas pa de dag ni snying rje chen po dang ldan pa lags so//bcom ldan 'das dper bgyi na/dgum
149a4(mdo sde): pa'i gnod pa lam thar pa lags pa'i mi slar dgum pa'i gnod pa'i gnas su ma chis te/dgum pa'i gnod pa bgyid pa rnams la 'di skad du bdag sod cig
149a5(mdo sde): gzhan ma gsad cig ces mchi ba de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das dgum pa'i gnod pa'i gnod pa lta bu ni khams gsum lags so//dgon par bgyi ba lta bu ni 'jig
149a6(mdo sde): rten gnas pa lags so//dgum pa'i gnod pa bgyid pa lta bu ni 'du byed rnams la zhes so//dgum pa'i gnod pa spangs pa lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
149a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po khams gsum las rnam par grol ba de dag lags te/sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang ste/sems can yongs su dgrol bar bgyi ba'i
149b1(mdo sde): slad du khams gsum 'ba' shig tu rgyu lhams so//bcom ldan 'dras byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed pa des
149b2(mdo sde): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to//de ci'i slad du zhe na/bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas thams cad la ni de lta bu'i snying
149b3(mdo sde): rje chen po'ang ma mchis/thabs la mkhas pa'ang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chen po che chen po dri mo med pa'i gzi brjid la bka' stsal
149b4(mdo sde): pa/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thos pa'i tshogs la ni ji ltar brtson par bya/des thos pa ni ji ltar btsal bar bya zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di
149b5(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mkhan po dang /slob dpon la nga rgyal bcom pa dang /bka' blo bde bas bla ma'i sri zhu dang /gus pa dang /phangs pa
149b6(mdo sde): dang /gces pa'i sems bskyed par bya'o//des chos la ni sman gyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams la ni ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//
149b7(mdo sde): des bdag la ni nad pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//des chos kyi gdams ngag ston pa la ni sman pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//des sems can thams cad la ni nang
150a1(mdo sde): pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//des sangs rgyas kyi chos 'tshol ba ni lus la phangs par mi bya'o//srog la lhag par chags pa bskyed par mi bya'o///
150a2(mdo sde): dngos po sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa rnams la'ang des shin tu nyon mongs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o//nor phun sum tshogs pa la'ang des chags pa bskyed par mi
150a3(mdo sde): bya'o//chos gtso bor byas te nor thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o//dam pa'i chos kyi don dang dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa thams cad
150a4(mdo sde): yongs su gtang bar bya'o//chos kyi rnyed pa 'dod pas rnyed pa dang /bkur sti dang /tshigs su bcad pa yongs su gtang bar bya'o//chos kyi rgyal srid 'dod pa'i phyir
150a5(mdo sde): rgyal srid thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o//nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar 'dod pas dam pa'i chos yongs su btsal ba la brtson par bya'o//sems
150a6(mdo sde): can thams cad yongs su bskyab par 'dod pas dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson par bya'o//dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
150a7(mdo sde): dpa' chen po rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de bas na byang chub 'dod pa dang /byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
150b1(mdo sde): 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang /shes rab kyi ka ba bgrang bar 'dod pa rnams kyis thos pa la brtson par bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'dri lta ste/dper na khang bzang rnam par rgyal byed
150b2(mdo sde): ni ka bas brtan pa sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'du bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi ka bA ni thos pa'i stobs kyis yongs su bzung bas gnas pa la//
150b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'du bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub tu sems spyod nas
150b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpar dam bcas te/bdag sangs rgyas su gyur cig ces smras la de'ang thos pa yongs su 'tshol ba la mi brtson na sems can thams cad shes rab 'tshal
150b5(mdo sde): por bya ba la zhugs pa yin no//rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pa yongs su 'tshol ba la brtson 'grus rtsom par byed na/des ni
150b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi shes rab yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir nye bar brtan pa byas pa yin no//lha rnams kyang de'i tshe de la mgu zhing yid badre bar gyur nas a la la
150b7(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa 'dis ni thos pa dang /brtson 'grus dang /shes rab sbyangs pa'i blo stobs bcu thob par nus so//e la la skyes bu dam pa 'dis ni shes rab kyi mtshon
151a1(mdo sde): gyis nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i rgyud thams cad rnam pa thams cad du bcad par nus so//a la la skyes bu dam pa 'dis ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spang
151a2(mdo sde): ba'i phyir chos ston par nus so//a la la skyes bu dam pa 'dis ni sngon gyi rgyal ba bzhugs bzhugs pa'i byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par nus so//a la la skyes bu dam
151a3(mdo sde): pa 'dis ni bdud dpung dang bzhon pa dang bcas pa pham par byed nus so//a la la byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni rnam pa bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
151a4(mdo sde): byar nus so//zhes ched du rjod par byed do//rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos nyan pa la brtson pa de'i tshe/rigs kyi bu bdud kyi gnas thams cad mogs
151a5(mdo sde): mog por 'gyur ro//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud sdig can rnams dang /bdud kyi ris kyi lha gang dgra yin pa de dag thams cad de'i
151a6(mdo sde): tshe sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde bar 'gyur te/'di ni bdag cag gi dbang du mi 'gyur ro//'di la ni bdag cag dbang med do//'dris ni bdag cag rnam pa thams
151a7(mdo sde): cad du bcom mo//'dis ni bdag cag dbang du byas so snyam mo//de ci'i phyir zhe na/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar thos pa dang ldan na shes rab skye bar 'gyur ro//shes rab
151b1(mdo sde): dung ldan na nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro//nyon mongs pa met+tan bdud kyis glags mi rnyed do//zos pa dang ldan na rtog par 'gyur ro//rtog pa yod na tshul bzhin du chos
151b2(mdo sde): yongs su 'tshol bar 'gyur ro//tshul bzhin du chos yongs su 'tshol ba la brtson na bdud sdig can gyis glags mi rnyed do//thos pa dang ldan na log par lta ba dang
151b3(mdo sde): bral bar 'gyur la yang dag pa'i lta ba'ang skyed par 'gyur ro//yang dag par zhugs na bdud kyis glags mi rnyed do//yang dag par zhugs na don la nye bar rtog pa
151b4(mdo sde): dang gnod pa dang 'bral bar 'gyur ro//don 'dod na don la yang dag par 'brang bar 'gyur te/rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang thos pa mang po la brtson pa'i byang
151b5(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bdud bzhi pham par byed nus par 'gyur ba de ltar rig par bya'o//bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/phung po'i bdud dang /nyon
151b6(mdo sde): mongs pa'i bdud dang /'chi bdag gi bdud dang /lha'i bu'i bdud de bzhi po 'di dag pham par byed nus so//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems
151b7(mdo sde): dpa' chos don du gnyer ba dang /chos 'dod pa rnams kyis thos pa yongs su btsal ba de las cung zad tsam khyod la bstan par bya'o//rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das
152a1(mdo sde): pa'i dus bskal pa grangs mod pa bas kyang chos grangs mod pa yun ring po tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong chen po mchog
152a2(mdo sde): ces bya ba nags dang /nags 'dabs dang /ri la gnas pa/mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/rtag tu byams pa la gnas pa dang /snying rje la gnas phra zhig byung
152a3(mdo sde): ste/drang srong dri mchog tu gyur to//de nags khyud de dag na gnas pa na 'di snyam du sems te/bdag byams pa la gnas pa 'di ni sems can rnams kyi dga' ba
152a4(mdo sde): skyed par yang mi 'gyur la/byams pa 'dis ni sems can rnams kyi 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug rnams dang /bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas bsags
152a5(mdo sde): po'i nyon mongs pa thams cad kyang nye bar zhi bar byed mi nus so//byams pa 'dis ni 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba 'dra bskyed par mi nus so snya ma la de'ang 'di snyam
152a6(mdo sde): du sems te/'phags pa'i lta ba gang las skye zhig gu snyam mo//de la rtog pa 'di lta bu zhig byung ste/'phags pa'i yang drag pa'i lta ba skye ba la ni rgyu gnyis dang /
152a7(mdo sde): kyen gnyis yod de/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzhan gyi sgra dang /so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ste/'di gnyis ni 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba
152b1(mdo sde): skyo ba'i rgyu gnyis dang /rkyen gnyis so snyam mo//de de'i tshe chos yongs su 'tshol ba la brtson pa'i blo skyes te/legs par gsungs pa bdag gis ga las rnyed par 'gyur
152b2(mdo sde): snyam mo//de chos kyi phyir chos yongs su 'tshol ba la brtson nas grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdul dang /ljongs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas chos
152b3(mdo sde): btsal to//btsal kyang chos smra ba 'ga' yang ma rnyed do//de nas de'i mdun du bdud kyi ris kyi lha zhig byung ste/de drang srong de'i thad du song nas 'di skad ces smras so//sangs
152b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gyi tshigs su bcad pa gcig gzung ba nga la yod do//drang srong des smras pa/smos
152b5(mdo sde): shig/lha dwes+ye smras pa/gal te khyod kyis rang gi lus las pags pa bshus te nyi ma la skams nas shog bur byas te rang gi khrag dang sbyar bas snag tsha byas la/rang gi rus
152b6(mdo sde): ngas kyi ni kro byo so ni/nga las tshigs su bcad pa de 'dri na de lta na sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i tshigs su bcad pa do ngas khyod la sbyin no//rigs kyi bu de nas drang srong chen po
152b7(mdo sde): mchog 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gi lus 'di 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas skye ba de dang de dag dang /skye ba'i gnas de dang de dag tu bskal pa 'bum phrag mang por nyes
153a1(mdo sde): ba byas nas/dgra dang gu shed mA'i lag tu song nas chom rkun dang rgyal pos bkrabs pa la sogs pas/mtshon rnon pos yan lhag dang nying lag thams/
153a2(mdo sde): cad dum bu du mar bcad cing gtubs te 'dod pa'i phyir dang /nor gyi phyir dang /bye sad pa dang /bcad pa dang /bcing ba dang /brdeg pa dang /bsdigs pa la sogs
153a3(mdo sde): pa da/ka' ba 'bum nyams su myong mod kyi/'on kyang bdag gi lus de dag dang /tshor ba de dag gis sems can su la'ang don ci'ang byas pa med na/da bdag gis snying po med
153a4(mdo sde): pa'i lus 'dis chos rnyed par 'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyam nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/lha de la'ang slob dpon gyi 'du shes bskyed nas
153a5(mdo sde): mtshon rnon pos rang gi lus las pags pa ba shus te nyi ma la skams nas shog bur byas te rang gi lus lus khrag gzugs nas rang gi khrug gis snag tsha sbyar te/rang
153a6(mdo sde): gi rus pas skyug gu byas nas lha de la thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so//lha sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bsdus pa'i tshigs su bcad pa de bdag
153a7(mdo sde): la gsungs shig khyod kyis ji skad bsgo ba bzhin du bdag gis bgyis lags te/bdag gis pags pa bshus nas skams te shog bur bgyis nas rang gi khrag gis
153b1(mdo sde): snag r+b+ha gyur te/rang gi rus pas sdug grub kyis lags so zhes byas so//rigs kyi bu de nas bdud kyi ris k+Sh+mI lha ngas drang srong ched po mchog de'i gus pa dang dron du gnyer ba de
153b2(mdo sde): bri mthong nas/gnod gnod ltar byis te/de nyid du mi snang bar gyur te/rigs kyi bu de nas drang srong chen po mchog des de'i tshe lta de mi snang bar gyur pa re rig nas 'di snyam
153b3(mdo sde): sems te/bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa de ma thos su zin kyang /gang gi phyir bdag gis chos la gus pa chen pos snag tsha 'dri rang gi pags pa bshus traM skams nas
153b4(mdo sde): rang gi khrag dang sbyar ba dang /rang gi rus pa phyung ste smyug gu byas pas bdag gi chos la gus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di chud zla bar mi 'gyur ro//sru bar yang mi 'gyur ro//
153b5(mdo sde): 'on kyang bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /g.yo bya med pas sems can rnams la snying rje'i sems bskyed nas/lus dang srog la mi lta bar pagasdu pa shog bur byas te/rang
153b6(mdo sde): gi khrag gis sbyar nas/rus pas skyug gu byas pa'i chos la gus pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des na 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang
153b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na chos gsung zhing chos ston pa bdag nyid chen po su bzhugs kyang rung ste/de dag gis bdag la zhal bstan pa cha gsol/bdag la chos kyang thos
154a1(mdo sde): par mdzad du gsol zhes byas so//rigs kyi bu de ltar drang srong chen po mchog gis chog de skad ces sbas ma thag tu skad cig de dang /thang cig de dang /
154a2(mdo sde): yud tsam de nyid la 'og gi phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum cu rtsa gnyis 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas dri ma med pa zhes bya ba zhig
154a3(mdo sde): yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos
154a4(mdo sde): kyang ston to//des drang srong chen po mchog de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud de/dzam+bu'i gling 'di'i sems can yongs su smin pa'ang gzigs nas dper na skyes bu
154a5(mdo sde): stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am/brkyang ba las bskum pa bzhin du skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags
154a6(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po de byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang thabs cig tu de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/drang srong chen po mchog gri mdun du bzhugs te/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
154a7(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po de byon ma thag tu de'i mod la nags khung de snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur
154b1(mdo sde): to//me tog gi chur chen po'ang bab po//de'i tshe nags khung den shing gi yul ga dang /lo ma dang mgo lcogs dang /me tog dang /'bras bu thams cad lus chos ston pa'i sgra
154b2(mdo sde): dag byung ngo //de'i tshe lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'dus par gyur to//de nas drang srong chen po mchog la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags
154b3(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po de'i 'od kyis phog ma thag tu/de nas de'i mod la kha dog dang gzugs snga mkho bzhin du gyur te/rma dang snad pa med par gyur to//de nas drang srong chen po mchog
154b4(mdo sde): gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
154b5(mdo sde): bskor ba byas te sor mo bcu'i thal mo sbyar ba spyi bor bzhag nas/de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po lo 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ni
154b6(mdo sde): bdag gi ston pa lags so//bde bar gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa lags so//bdag ni bcom ldan 'das dang /chos dang /dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o///
154b7(mdo sde): ci nas bdag gis chos thos nas log par zhugs pa'i sems can lta bar gyur pa'i glag glag pa spyod yul pa rnams kyi log par lta ba'i mun pa bsal nas/yang dag pa'i
155a1(mdo sde): lta ba'i chos ston par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la chos bstan du gsol/bde bar gshegs pas bdag la chos bstan du gsol/rigs
155a2(mdo sde): kyi bu de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po des drang srong chen po mchog gtso bor mdzad nas lha'i bu de dag dang /byang chub sems dpa' de dag la
155a3(mdo sde): bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid las brtsams te/ci nas lha'i bu'i 'khor de'i nang nas sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sbyangs pa'i lha'i bu brgya stong
155a4(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur ba dang /drang srong chen po mchog de'ang dga' ba dang /dang ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po
155a5(mdo sde): dang spobs pa mi chod pa thob par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos bstan to////bam po gsum pa//bcom ldan 'das des rdo rje'i tshig brgyad po 'di dag kyang
155a6(mdo sde): bstan te/brgyad glang zhe na/'di lta ste/chos thams cad ni nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i phyir rang bzhin gyis yongs su dge ba'o//chos thams cad ni zag pa thams cad
155a7(mdo sde): yongs su chad pa'i phyir zag pa med pa'o//chos thams cad ni gnas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir gnas med pa'o//chos thams cad ni gnyis su med
155b1(mdo sde): 'i byor sung gyu//ma thams cad rnam pa nga pa mthas su byo nanasar+b+barmA/rgyas rnams ngan ba ma pa phrul sa ga
155b2(mdo sde): rnams cad ni 'gro ba thams cad yang dag par chad pa'i phyir 'gro ba med pa'o//chos thams cad ni 'das pa dang /mngangs pa dang /da ltar zung ba gnyis su dpyir med pa'i
155b3(mdo sde): phyir dus gsum mnyam pa ste/rdo rje'i tshig brgyad pa de dag ni/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po des/chos thams cad nges par
155b4(mdo sde): 'byed pa'i phyir bstan to//mchog/gzhan yang chos kyi sgra'i tshig brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid rtul bar myi 'gyur ba ste/brgyad gang
155b5(mdo sde): zhen/'di lta ste/mdun chos thams cad kyi goste/smre sna tshogs rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir pr-I/skranI rgyas thams cad kyi sgra ste/dag the dad par brjod pa'i phyirararo//brdzun
155b6(mdo sde): chos thams cad kyi sa ste/chos thams cad mngon par shin pa med pa'i phyir ro//rnam pa rig pa ni chos thams cad kyiste/gas bu dang /gsog dang /yA mA brla yin
155b7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir ro//bdag gi ngo bo nyid ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/bdag gi ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro//zad pa na chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro//
156a1(mdo sde): gdugs pa na chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/gdags pa 'byung ba med pa'i phyir ro//mnyam pa nyid ni chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ro gcig pa'i phyir ro//
156a2(mdo sde): mchog/chos kyi sgo'i tshig de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid rtul b.ru mi 'gyur ba'o//mchog/gzhan yang sa bon gyi tshig brgyad po 'di dag ni spobs
156a3(mdo sde): pa mi zad par 'gyur ba ste/brgyad gang zhe na/'di lta ste/mchog/u zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshigra ni chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma skyes par ston to//mchog/pa zhes bya
156a4(mdo sde): ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad don dam par ston to//mchog/na zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad kyi ming dang gzugs yongs su shes par ston to//mchog//
156a5(mdo sde): de zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad dul ba dang zhi bar ston to//mchog/sa zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad las yang dag par 'das par ston to//mchog/
156a6(mdo sde): ta zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad de bzhin nyid du dbyer med par ston to//mchog/ka zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cang zad pa nyid du ston to//mchog
156a7(mdo sde): ma zhes bya ba sa bon gyi tshig ni chos thams cad dbus dang mtha' yongs su chad par ston to//chog/sa bon gyi tshig brgyad po de dag ni spobs pa mi zad par 'gyur po'o//
156b1(mdo sde): de lta bsta na sa bon gyi tshig 'di dag dpa/chos kyi sgo'i tshig 'di dag dang /rdo rje'i tshig 'di dag la dran pa dang /shes bzhin du spyod pa mnyam pa nyid la brtson par bya'o//rtag
156b2(mdo sde): tu 'du 'dzi med par spyod pas tshul bzhin du so sor brtag pa la brtson par bya'o//rtag tu dge ba gang yin zhes 'tshol zhing 'dod pa wa btson par bya'o//rigs kyi bu de ltar
156b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po ngos chos kyi tshig zhus pa de dag gi lanA btab nas/'jig rten gyi khams de snang bar mdzad cing
156b4(mdo sde): rab tu g.yos par mdzad nas/byang chub sems dpa'adi dag dang thabs cig tu mi snang bar gyur te/skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bzhugs
156b5(mdo sde): par gyur to//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas kyang gang du'ang gshegs pa 'am slar gshegs par mngon pa med do//rigs kyi bu de nas drang srong chen po mchog de spangs pa mi
156b6(mdo sde): rjochod pa dang ldan par gyur te/brjed nges pa med pa'i dran pa de dang yang ldan par gyur nas lhas yongs su bzung ba thob par gyur to//lhas yongs su bzung bya des na/bdud
156b7(mdo sde): phyir rgol ba'ang choms nas grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /yul 'khor dang /rgyal po'i pho brang du song nas sems can rnams la chos ston te
157a1(mdo sde): bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di nyid rgyas par bshad cing rab tu bstan to//des lo stong tham par chos bstan te//srog chags brgyad/
157a2(mdo sde): khri bzhi stong ni nyan thos su yongs su smin par byas so//srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni rang sangs rgyas su yongs su smin par byas so//srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong
157a3(mdo sde): ni bla na med pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so//srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni 'khor los sgyur bar yongs su smin par byas so//srog
157a4(mdo sde): chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni brgya byin du yongs su smin par byas so//srog tshogs brgyad khri bzhi stong ni tshangs par yongs su smin par byas so//srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong
157a5(mdo sde): ni byams pa bsgom pa la bkod do/srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni snying rje bsgol pa la bkod do//srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni dga' ba bsgom pa la bkod do//
157a6(mdo sde): srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni btang snyoms bsgom pa la bkod do//srog chags dpag tu med pa zhig ni mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du nye bar 'gro bar byas so//de'i 'og tu drang
157a7(mdo sde): srong chen po mchog de shi nas lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par grags
157b1(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal po de nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nas dri ma med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su skyes so//rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus nu drang srong chen po mchog de gzhan zhig yin
157b2(mdo sde): par khyod som nyi 'am/yid gnyis sam/the tshom zlan rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blto'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/de nyid de'i tshe de'i dus ni drang srong chen po mchog tu gyur te/dus
157b3(mdo sde): chos 'dod pa dang /chos la gus par gnas pa'i bden pa'i byin gyis brlabs des 'og gi phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags pa'i
157b4(mdo sde): rgyal po de spyan drangs so//dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis chos 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni nam yang de bzhin
157b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'gyur la/dam pa'i chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar rig par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid chos 'dod
157b6(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa gus pa dang bcas pa rnams ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan ni 'dug kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
157b7(mdo sde): rnams zhal ston par mdzad cing chos kyang thos par mdzad do//dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid chos 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos kyi gter ri dang //
158a1(mdo sde): rI sul dang /shing dag gi nang du bcug pa dag yod de/gzungs dang /chos kyi sgo mthu' yas pa glegs bam du byas pa dag kyang lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur
158a2(mdo sde): ro//dri ma med pa'i grwazi brjid chos 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha rnams spobs pa sgrub par byed do//dri
158a3(mdo sde): ma med pa'i gzi brjid chos 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni tshe zad na'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /lha rnams kyis tshe
158a4(mdo sde): dang stobs sgrub par byed de/sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /lha'i byin gyis brlabs kyis de dag 'dod na lo stong du'ang 'khod do//lo 'bum phrag gnyis
158a5(mdo sde): sam/gsum mam/bzhi 'am/lji' bar du'ang 'khod pa nas/bskal pa dang /bskal pa las lhag pa 'am/yang na ji srid 'dod pa' bar du'ang 'khod do//
158a6(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid chos la gus pa skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rga ba'ang sel bar mdzad do///
158a7(mdo sde): nad kyang sel bar mdzad do//dran pa'ang posgrub par mdzad do//rtogs pa dang spobs pa'ang bsgrub par mdzad do//chos la gus pa skyes pa'i byang chub sems
158b1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lta bar gyur pa rnams ni sel bar mdzad la/yang dag pa'i lta ba ni bsgrub par mdzad do//dri mA med/
158b2(mdo sde): pa'i gzi brjid chos la gus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la gzhan gyi gnod pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de
158b3(mdo sde): lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thos pa'i tshogs la mkhas pa la brtson par bya'o//thos pa'i tshogs la mkhas pa la brtson pa'i byang chub sems
158b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yon tan gyi khyad par de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'am/yang na de bos kyang gong ma 'am/de bas kyang lhag par 'gyur te/dri ma med pa'i
158b5(mdo sde): gzi brjid gsum po 'di dag ni bsod nams nye bar brten pa dang /bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /bsod nams 'byung ba dang /bsod nams rgyas pa dang /bsod nams kyi
158b6(mdo sde): rgyu mthun pa dang /bsod nams mi zad pa dang /bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /bsod nams rgya mtsho yin te/de lta gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
158b7(mdo sde): chen po dag gi bsod nams rnams kyi mtha' 'am tshad ni rtogs par mi nus so//dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid rgya mtsho chen po'i thigs sa rnams kyi ched dang mtha' ni rtogs par nus
159a1(mdo sde): kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang /thos pa'i tshogs bsogs pa'i bsod
159a2(mdo sde): nams kyi phung po'i tshad dang mtha' ni rtogs par mi nus so//dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas la ri dang /shing ljon pa dang
159a3(mdo sde): nags tshal dang /rtswa yod pa thams cad kyi srang chud kyis tshad dang mtha' rtogs pa 'am shes par nus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i
159a4(mdo sde): tshogs dang /tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang /thos pa'i tshogs bsogs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i ni tshad gzung bar mi nus so zhes nga smra'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das
159a5(mdo sde): la chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das tshogs gsum po sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /tshul khrims kyi tshogs
159a6(mdo sde): dang /thos pa'i tshogs de dag gi nang na tshogs gang ches mchog dang /chos gtso bo lugs/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid
159a7(mdo sde): tshogs gsum po sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /tshul khrims kyi tshogs dang /thos pa'i tshogs de dag gi nang na thos pa'i tshogs 'ba' shig mchog ces bya/rab
159b1(mdo sde): mchog ces bya/gya nom pa zhes bya/gtso bo zhes bya/khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya/bla ma zhes bya/bla na med pa zhes bya'o//gong na med pa zhes bya'o//gong ma'i yang gong ma zhes bya'o//
159b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi mdun na yungs 'bru gcig 'dug pa bzhin du sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar
159b3(mdo sde): bya'o//ri'i rgyal pa ri rab ji lta ba de bzhin du ni thos pa'i tshogs blta bar bya'o//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na nam mkha' la bya'i rjes ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin pa'i tshogs dang
159b4(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi tshogs kyang dri dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o//phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' mtha' yas pa ji lta ba de bzhin du ni thos pa'i tshogs blta bar bya'o//rigs kyi glu
159b5(mdo sde): sbyin pa'i tshogs ni bya ba gnyis byed de/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/dbul ba sel ba dang /longs spyod chen po bsgrub pa ste/bya ba 'di gnyis byed do//tshul khrims kyi
159b6(mdo sde): tshogs kyang bya ba gnyis byed de/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/ngan 'gro sel ba dang /bde 'gro bsrub po ste/bya ba 'di gnyis byed do shes rab kyi tshogs kyang bya ba gnyis
159b7(mdo sde): byed de/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lta bar gyur pa thams cad sel ba dang shes rab bsgrub pa ste bya ba 'di gnyis byed do//rigs kyi bu sbyin pa'i tshogs ni zag pa dang /
160a1(mdo sde): bcas pa dang len pa dang bcas pa dang phung por rnam par smin pa'o//rigs kyi bu tshul khrims kyi tshogs ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang /len pa dang bcas pa
160a2(mdo sde): dang /phung por rnam par smin pa'o//rigs kyi bu thos pa'i tshogs ni zag pa med pa dang /len pa med pa dang /phung por rnam par smin pa ma yin pa'o//rigs kyi
160a3(mdo sde): bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa rnams kyis thos pa'i tshogs la brtson par bya'o//sbyin pa'i tshogs dang /tshul
160a4(mdo sde): khrims kyi tshogs dang /thos pa'i tshogs 'di dag bstan pa na sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i srog chags sum stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
160a5(mdo sde): sems bskyed do//lha'i bu lnga stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri mo dang bral bar rnam par dag go//chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis
160a6(mdo sde): kyang rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi bzod pa thob bo//de nas bcom ldan 'das la chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das
160a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na mi skye bo'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyure lags/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
160b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste lus la
160b2(mdo sde): gzugs brnyan dang 'dra bar mos pa dang ngag la brag cha dang 'dra bar mos pa dang sems la sgyu ma dang 'dra bar mos pa dang /chos thams cad la mi zad pa'i chos nyid du
160b3(mdo sde): mos pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi
160b4(mdo sde): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/
160b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par yang byed la sems can du 'du shes pa'ang med pa dang /chos thams cad la stong pa dang /mi rtag par yang mos par
160b6(mdo sde): byed la gzhir yang mi byed pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad kyang mthong la shi'i mig la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /sems rab tu rnam par 'byed pa la'ung
160b7(mdo sde): mkhas la sems kyang sems la gtod par mi byed pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan no mi skye ba'i chos
161a1(mdo sde): rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos
161a2(mdo sde): rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lta ba spangs pa'i phyir bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang /nyon mongaso pa thams
161a3(mdo sde): cad rab tu zhi ba'i phyir tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang chos kyis lhag pa'i phyir bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa dang dbyen pa'i chos kyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir brtson
161a4(mdo sde): 'grus brtsams pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur
161a5(mdo sde): ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang
161a6(mdo sde): zhe na 'di lta ste/bsam gtan yang thob la bsam gtan la'ang mi rten pa dang /shes rab kyis kyang rnam par brtags la spros po'ang med pa dang thabs la mkhas
161a7(mdo sde): pa'ang rab tu 'dzin la sems can yang sdud pa dang /spyod pa thams cad la'ang gegs med la spyod pa'ang khong du chud par byed pa ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
161b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chud po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
161b2(mdo sde): dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/byams pa chen pos sems can thams cad
161b3(mdo sde): yongs su slob pa dang /snying rje chen pos 'khor ba las yongs su mi skye ba dang /dgra' bo chen pos chos la dga' zhing mchog tu dpa' ba dang /btang snyoms chen pos rjes
161b4(mdo sde): su chags pa drang khong khro ba spong ba ste/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur du thob par
161b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams lo bzod pa myur du thob par 'gyur te/bzhi gang
161b6(mdo sde): zhe na/'di lta ste/rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mngon sum du byed pa dang /dus gsum yongs su shes pa dang /khams gsum las yang dag par 'da' ba dang chos thams
161b7(mdo sde): cad rang bzhin gyis mi skyes pa la yid ches pa ste rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa myur
162a1(mdo sde): du thob par 'gyur ro//bzhi pa bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri bshad pa na chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
162a2(mdo sde): pa thob ste/de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob pa de kho nas ta la bdun srid tsam gyi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags so//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
162a3(mdo sde): khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//lha dang mi'i sil sman 'bum yang 'khrol lo//pad+ma'i sprin gyi char chen po'ang mngon par bab po//'jig rten 'di'ang snang ba
162a4(mdo sde): chen pos khyab par gyur to//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad de/'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos nyid de/gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe
162a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer sna tshogs 'di lta ste/sngon po dang /ser po dang /dmar po dang /dkar po dang /btsod ka dang /shel dang /dngul gyi kha dog lta
162a6(mdo sde): bu dag byung ngo //de dag byung nas 'jig rten gyi khrims mtha' yas mu med pa 'od kyis khyab par gyur nas nyi ma dang zla ba rnams kyi 'od kyang zil gyis mnan te tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
162a7(mdo sde): du thug nas phyir log ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi gtsug tu nub par gyur to//de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo spyan las langs te/bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas
162b1(mdo sde): pus mo g.yas pa'i lha ngo sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga lnga ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das lnga 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
162b2(mdo sde): 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang legs/rkyen ni gang lags/de'i tshe tshigs su bcud
162b3(mdo sde): khA 'di dag kyang smras so//ye shes mchog brnyes yongs dag yangs pa'i spyan mnga' ba//dbang po zhi ba zhi gnas pha rol phyin mchog brnyes//sku mdog gser gyi ri bro lha
162b4(mdo sde): yi 'od 'dre ba//ci yi slad du bcom ldan 'dzum pa 'di ston mdzad//gang gi blo gros ci 'dra dus gsum ldan pa dang //lha dang mi rnams sems kyi spyod pa mkhyen bzhin
162b5(mdo sde): du||'du shes mi mnga' rtag tu ye shes mchog brnyes pa//zhal ras zla 'dra 'dzum pa'i don ni bstan par gsol//'das pa'i sangs rgyas ji snyed gang dag ma 'ongs dus//
162b6(mdo sde): gang dag gnas pa'i rgyal ba de dag mtshungs pa ste//sems can gang drag dkar po spyod pa sna tshogs pa//sbyor mkhyen lung bstan slad du thams cad yang dag gsungs//
162b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas zhing 'di dgra ni sku yis thams cad khyab//khyod kyi gsung ni sangs rgyas zhing mang yangs par grag/'dir ni thugs kyis 'gro ba kun la byams pa bskyed//
163a1(mdo sde): rgyal ba ma shos maH ya ldan pa gang skad gsungs//chos rnams yam+b+ha ba ste rgyu zla 'dra ba dang //sgyum lta bar 'jig pa mi la snang ba nyid//smin gyur/
163a2(mdo sde): mi brtan 'jig pa'i chos can mkhyen pa po//mi yi seng ge gang srad 'dzum don bstan par gsol//stong pa mtshan med skyon med rtogs pas rnam par grol//rtag tu thugs
163a3(mdo sde): dul chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas//rlung srubs mkha' lnga 'chub kyang spos med 'dra ba po//ci skad 'dzum mdzad 'di la don ni ci mchis gsungs//gang gi sems dang sangs
163a4(mdo sde): rgyas yu shwas mchog la btud//glang gis de ring shing rgyal drung du bdud kyang bcom//gang gis rgyal ba mchog rnams gdan ni yongs su bzung //skyes bu khyu mchog
163a5(mdo sde): gis ni ci phyir 'dzum pa bstan//'di na rgyal ba'i nyan thos de rnams sa ma mchis//'di la rang sangs rgyas kyi yul yang ci ma mchis//'di ni sangs rgyas yon tan
163a6(mdo sde): rgya mtsho rnams kyi yul//'jig rten mchog gis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni bstun par gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces
163a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//kun dga' bo khyod kyis chen po che chen po de ba med pa'i gzi brjid ta la bdun srid tsam gyi steng gi bar snang la mngon par 'phags te 'dug pa mthong
163b1(mdo sde): ngam/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so//bde bar gshogs pa mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/kun dga' bo chen po che chen po dri/
163b2(mdo sde): ma med pa'i gzi brjid 'di bskal pa grangs med pa gsum pa phrag 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/
163b3(mdo sde): shwar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag par byed pa zhes bya bar bskul pa tshangs pas bstod pa zhes bya ba la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
163b4(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa badre bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi sten pa
163b5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bkod pa mang po'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ngo //kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
163b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bkod pa mang po'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byed pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang 'byor pa dang /rgyas pa dang bde ba dang lo legs pa dang /nyams
163b7(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /skye bo dang /mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur te/kun dga' ba dper na dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang /yongs su spyad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs
164a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag gi longs spyod dang /yongs su spyad pa'ang de 'dra bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin
164a2(mdo sde): gshegs pa bkod pa mang po'i rgyal po de'ang gtam gzhan mi gsung bar byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod 'ba' shig ston to//de na
164a3(mdo sde): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ming yang med de/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod po thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po 'ba'
164a4(mdo sde): shig 'byung bar 'gyur ro//de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro//de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khrom pa brgyad med de/de bdud dang phyir rgol ba
164a5(mdo sde): bcom pa/gzhan mu stegs can med pa dang /bai DUr+ya las grub la dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+mas sbas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gyur ro//de nas chen po che chen po dri
164a6(mdo sde): ma med pa'i gzi brjod par snang de las babs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/bcom ldan 'das la rab tu 'byung bar gsol te de bzhin gshegs
164a7(mdo sde): pa'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ngo //de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan
164b1(mdo sde): 'das kyis chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so//bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar ljags te/'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la skur
164b2(mdo sde): pa 'debs pa 'am glen ka tshol ba 'am/mtho 'tsham pa 'am/bsting ba'i slad du mchis pa gang dag lhags pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ma thug tu dga' ba dang /
164b3(mdo sde): dang ba dang /mchog tu dga' ba drag po thob par 'gyur la/nga rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /tu dregs pa nges par bcom nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyag gcig la 'dud cing /
164b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig la thal mo sbyar ba btud pa dang bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid 'di nga rgyal dang rgyags pa dang /dregs pa
164b5(mdo sde): drag pos mchis la/chos 'di lta bu 'di thos nas bdag nyid chen po 'di lta bu thob ste/sdoms can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa'i nga rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /dregs
164b6(mdo sde): pa spang ba'i slad du chos ston par 'gyur lags so//bcom ldan 'das sngon 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i spangs rgyas ji
164b7(mdo sde): snyed cig la chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'tshal ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas des na da ltar 'di lta bu'i
165a1(mdo sde): mngon par shes bya myur ba thob par gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid med
165a2(mdo sde): kyi bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sred med kyi bu chen po che chen po de ma med pa'i gze brjid kyis ni 'das pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir
165a3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do//da phyin chad kyang sangs rgyas bcomA ldan 'das dpag tu med/grangs med pa la bkur stir byed/bla mar
165a4(mdo sde): byed/ri mor byed/mchod par byed par 'gyur te/tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur ro//sred med kyi lus gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mi dge ba'i rtsa ba gong gis na
165a5(mdo sde): de'i byang chub kyi sems ma mchis par gyur nas/des na 'di brtsang po'i bsam nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyan sngar mchis la 'di lta bu'i brgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /
165a6(mdo sde): dregs pa dang ldan par gyur lags/de skad ces gsol pa dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub se mos dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bu la 'di skad ces
165a7(mdo sde): bka' stsal to//sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan ni byang chub kyi sems brjod par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang /
165b1(mdo sde): chos la ma gus pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen la khyad du gsod pa dang /log pa'i tshig smra ba ste/sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub
165b2(mdo sde): kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro//sred med kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di ste
165b3(mdo sde): nyan thos dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa dag dang 'dris par byed pa dang /theg pa dman pa la mos pa rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' la spang
165b4(mdo sde): zhing skur pa 'debs pa dang /chos rnams la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyurtsa byed pa ste/srod med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed
165b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//sred med kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems marjed par 'gyur te/bzhi gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sgyu byed pa dang /
165b6(mdo sde): sems can rnams la g.yos bsten par byed pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la lho gnyis byed pa dang /rnyed pa dang /bkur sti la lhag par zhen pa ste/sred mod kyi bu byung
165b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro//sred med kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na byang chub kyi
166a1(mdo sde): sems brjed par 'gyur te/bzhi grang zhe na/'di lta ste/bdud kyi las mu rtogs pa dang /las kyi sgrib pas bsgribs pa dang /lhag pa'i bsam pa stobs chu
166a2(mdo sde): ba dang /shes rab dang thabs med pa ste/sred med kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub kyi sems brjed par 'gyur ro//sred med kyi bu yang
166a3(mdo sde): glagrang gi phyir chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyi byang chub kyi sems brjed par gyur pa de nyon cig sred med kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa bzang po 'di
166a4(mdo sde): nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes
166a5(mdo sde): bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor ba 'jig ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/de'i bstan pa gnos
166a6(mdo sde): pa na bram ze shing sA lI chen po lci bu nor bzang zhes bya ba zhig byung ste de bdud kyis bslus nas lhag pa'i nga rgyal can du gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du mi 'gro ba'i
166a7(mdo sde): steng du nga rgyal gyis zil gyis non nas bram ze dang /khyim bdag chos smra ba rnams dang /lhan cig tu 'thab pa dang /rtsod pa dang /'gyed pa la zhugs te/chos dang /
166b1(mdo sde): chos smra ba rnams la'ang ma gus pa bskyed do//de'i tshe de nyid la chos lnga dang bral bar gyur te/lnga gang zhe na/'di lta ste/sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /chos thos pa dang /byang chub sems//
166b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa dag dang 'brel ba'i gtam sna tshogs dri bar bya ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba dang /byang chub kyi sems
166b3(mdo sde): shin tu brtan por bya ba dang bral bar gyur nas des mi dge ba'i chos ni yongs su bzung la byang chub kyi sems ni yongs su mi bzung ste/sred med kyi bu chos lnga po de dag dang bral
166b4(mdo sde): pabar gyur to//sred med kyi bu de'i tshe dri'i dus na bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu nor bzung gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin par khyod som nyi 'am/yid gnyis sam the tshom za na
166b5(mdo sde): khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid 'di nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze shing sA la chen po lta bu nor bzang du gyur te nga rgyal des
166b6(mdo sde): na de'i byang chub kyi sems brjed do//sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsrungs pa dang /byang chub kyi sems kho nas skyabs pa des ni ngan song dag tu ma skyes so//de nga rgyal/
166b7(mdo sde): gyis khongs te/chen po che chen po'i shugs thob kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas mthong ba dang ma bral lo//de de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs kyi shugs ma bzod de
167a1(mdo sde): 'ongs pa la ste/de btsun grwa shegs pa dang byung rgyubs m+b+ha sa pa'i stobs kyi shugs rjes rgyas ngargyal dang /rgyags pa dang /dregs pa thams cad yong //
167a2(mdo sde): su chad do//sdig pa ma byas pa'i phyir ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo //de'i snron gyi rgyu las byung gA'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon du byung ste/des nA mngon par shes pa myur la
167a3(mdo sde): bzod pa thob bri//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sred med kyi bus chun po che chen po dri ma med pa'i gi bid+hi la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos gang bsrud
167a4(mdo sde): nu/deng khyod kyis bzod pa thob par gyur/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis smras pa/bdag gis so so'i skye bo'i chos thams cad bskyed do//sad med kyi bus smras pa/khyod kyis
167a5(mdo sde): ji ltar bskya/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis smras pa/ji ltar 'byung ba med pa dang /'jig pa med pa de ltar bskyed do//ji ltar mya ngon par zhen pa med pa dang /skye ba med pa
167a6(mdo sde): de ltar bskyod de//sred med kyi bus smras pa/rigs kyi bu so si skye ba'i chos rnams dang /sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams lnga khyad par ni ci zhig yod/tha dad du dbye ba na ci zhig yod/
167a7(mdo sde): dri ma med pa'i gen rjid kyis smras pa/ming sra'i tha dad du bye bo yang kyi dan la'i thang du da ba med do//srid med kyi bus smras pa dri ma med pa'i gzi rji sas skye ba chos
167b1(mdo sde): rnams kyi don gang yin/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis smras pa/de'i don ni med pa las yongs su byeklas pa dang /rnam par rtog pa med pa'o//skyed med kyi bus smras pa/drin
167b2(mdo sde): med pa'i gzi brjid don gyis ni ci zhig sel ba byed/ci zhig ni sgrub par byed/dri ma med pa'i gzo brjid kyis smras pa/sreng med kyi bu don gyis ni sa sa'i sgra ba'i chos rnams
167b3(mdo sde): sel bar byed do//sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni sgrub par byed do//srid med kyi bus smras pa/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don gang yin/dri mu med pa'i
167b4(mdo sde): gzi brjid kyis smras pa/sbed med kyi bu sangs rgyas kyis chos rnams kyi don ni gnyis su dbyer med pa'o//sred med kyi bus smras pa//rigs kyi bu don la rton par bya'i tshig 'bru
167b5(mdo sde): la rton par mi bya'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa dang /yang dag pa'i lta ba smos pa la ni rgyu gnyis dang /rkyen gnyis yod de/gnyis gang zhe na/'di lta ste/gzhan gyi
167b6(mdo sde): sgra dang /rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'o zhes gsungs na/ji ltar tshig 'bru'ang de nyid yin la/don kyang de nyid yin/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis smras pa/sred med kyi
167b7(mdo sde): bu don la rton pa'i byang chub sems dpos ni tshig 'bru phri ba'ang med do//yang tshig 'bru dmigs su med pa de ni don yin la/don de'ang brjod du med pa'i don yin no//don la rten
168a1(mdo sde): pa la ni chos kyang ci'ang med do//don kyang ci dang med do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa dang /ya mya brla dang /yul na mi gnas pa
168a2(mdo sde): dang /phyogs na mi gnas pa dang /gang kho na na gnas pa de kho nar 'gags pa'i phyir ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang don ni gtan du 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes gsungs
168a3(mdo sde): te/smad med kyi bu de lta bas na gang don la rton pa de ni chos gang las kyang mi 'phro rnam par mi 'phro'o//grang mi 'phro ba rnam par mi 'phro ba de ni don to//sred med kyi dus smras
168a4(mdo sde): pa/rigs kyi bu glang don la rton pa de chos thams cad la smyon pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis smras pa/sred med kyi bu yod de 'di ltar chos thams
168a5(mdo sde): cad ni stong pa/chos thams cad ni dben pa ste/de dag ni chos thams cad ji ltar stong pa de kho na bzhin du de la rton to//ji ltar dben pa de kho na bzhin du de la rton to//
168a6(mdo sde): sred med kyi bu de ltar na gang don la rton pa de ni chos thams cad la rton to//sred med kyi bus smras pa/dri mu med pa'i gzi brjid de lta bas na chos thams cad nyid rton
168a7(mdo sde): pa yin no//dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid kyis smras pa sred med kyi bu de ni de bzhin no//khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin te/chos thams cad ni don dam pa la rton pa yin no//don
168b1(mdo sde): dam pa ni de dag gi sgo yin te/don dam par de dag btsal bar bya ba yin no//ji ltar chos kyang mi sgrub/chos ma yin pa'ang mi bsgrub pa de ltar de dag btsal bar bya'o//
168b2(mdo sde): gnyis su med pa btsal ba ni 'phags pa rnams kyi btsal ba yin no//btsal ba de ni byed pa med pa'o//btsal bA de ni bya ba mu yin rnam par bya ba ma yin no//gang gi tshe
168b3(mdo sde): mi byed cing rnam par mi byed pa de'i tshe btsal ba byas pa yin no//gal te don dang 'gal bar mi byed na btsal bar bya ba'i 'o sa yin no//de nas chen po che chen po dri ma med pa'i
168b4(mdo sde): gzi brjid kyis don 'di bstan pa na dge slong lnga brgya len pa med par zug pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo//lha'i bu brgyad stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi rmig rdul
168b5(mdo sde): med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dgra go//byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sred med kyi bus byang chub sems dpa' dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid la gzhan yang
168b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so//dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de bzhin gshegs pas don la rton par bya'i tshig 'bru lnga ma yin zhes gsungs pa de ni/sems can 'dri dag don la mi
168b7(mdo sde): mkhas shing gnyis la spyod pa dang /tshig 'bru la'ang mi mkhas pas tshig 'bru la sgro 'dogs shing don mi shes pa'i phyir de dag la don la rton par byi'i tshig 'bru la ma
169a1(mdo sde): yin zhes de bskon gshegs pas gsungs te/de dag don la rton pas chog 'phrul rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pas chog 'phrulas yang /
169a2(mdo sde): dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro//rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag pa'i lta ba skye ba la ni rgyu gnyis dang /rkyen gnyis yod do zhes de skad gsungs pa de ni
