308b4(mdo sde): kyis smras pa/tshe dang ldan pa de de bzhin te/bdag cag gi 'khor la bltas te rab tu 'byung ngo //de nas kun tu rgyu nye rgyal dang /pang nas skyes rang gi 'khor ga la ba der dong ngo //
308b5(mdo sde): de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la bdud sdig can gyis yul ang ga ma ga d+hA na mkhas shing snyan pa dang /brjod pa dang /grags por ldan pa skyes bu dam pa nye rgyal dang
308b6(mdo sde): pyang nas skyes g.yog dang bcas te dge sbyong gr-i ta ma'i bstan pa la rab tu 'byung bar 'dod do//sras thos nas/de 'di snyam du sems so//kyi hod de gnyis gal te dge sbyong
308b7(mdo sde): glau ta mi'i slob mar gyur na bdag gi bdud kyi yul stongs par byed par 'gyur gyis/bdag der song ste skyes bu dam pa de gnyis rab tu 'byung ba las bzlog la/sdig pa
309a1(mdo sde): dz+nyAn gyi lta ba 'dzin du 'jug go snyam s+ho/de nas skad cog thang nog yung tsamA do la bdud sdig can myur du bdag gi khang pa nas mi snang bar byas te/
309a2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rta thul gyi cha byad dang rtag sa dang sgyid la maM bu bsgyur nus/skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyi mdun ni le me gar 'dug ste//'di skad ces smras so//
309a3(mdo sde): smras rgyu dang bying+ge rgyu lta bu de ni log pa ste//khyod gnyis yid kyi spyod pa ci la nges phra dgum par bya ba'i phyir//smras pa de dag thams cad don yod mi yin 'bre la rgya'ang med/
309a4(mdo sde): dag dung me dga'i las de'i 'bras bu thob pa 'di na ga la yod//myur du khyed gnyis 'dod pa'i yon tan rnams la rab spyod rjed mo byos//rgyun 'chi med cing sdig bsngal
309a5(mdo sde): med de 'jig rten pha rol med//bsod nams bsod nams ma yin las skyed 'bras ming rgyu dang byed pa med//rnyed phyir 'dir ni shAkya'i glu yis smras kyi sa dang pos ma 'ogro
309a6(mdo sde): shig/de nas nye rgyal dang /pang nas skyes gnyis ka 'di snyam du sems te/kye ma bdud sdig can bdug cig 'i nga ba la sa ba phyir 'ongs sa snyam nas/
309a7(mdo sde): nas nye rgyal rgya ba kyis phyogs te 'dug nas rang gi 'khor lo bos te 'di skad ces smras so//bram ze'i khye'u khyod nyon cig 'khor ba'i sbyin//dran par gyis la 'jig
309b1(mdo sde): napa'os//gang da 'a bdag ga ba rlag/dganas snang byur dab blang migs pa d+ma/T+Ta/don nga sa/gas ba las zlas pa
309b2(mdo sde): 'i blo 'chang sdug bsngal gusum mthur sbyin mchog tus rnams san /sa//nA mi prAgan tu bdag cigi rgyu zlas 'di las myo nas pa yang med//rnyed pa
309b3(mdo sde): bdag+sa gu ga na pa'i yid kyi sa rtag tu 'bad//seng ge'i gzugs byed lnga yi tshig gis da kyi blo gros ma sgyun cig/bden pa byu ba'i lta gang dag rnam mdza la 'dun
309b4(mdo sde): dag gis skyes bu dam pa de gnyis la legs so//zhes bya ba byin te/lta bu me pa rnyed gnyis legs so legs so//'di lta ste/rab tu 'byung ba dang /mngon par
309b5(mdo sde): bu 'di ni 'jog rten thams cad las ltung bar du 'phags pa'o la ma yin te/lam 'di ni sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba'o//lam 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
309b6(mdo sde): spyod yul la 'jig pa'o//'de lta ste/rab tu 'byung ba dang /mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi rab tu bsngags shing stong
309b7(mdo sde): mi ma me//de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde ste/yid la gcags nas de nyid du mi snang bar song ngo //de nas kun du rgya nye rgyal dang /nga nas
310a1(mdo sde): skyes gnyis kyis rang gi 'khor la bltas te/'di skad ces smras so//bram ze'i khye'u dag ded ni rga ba dang nu ba dang /'chi ba'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu
310a2(mdo sde): 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/dri bzhin gshegs pa la rab tu 'byung bar yang dag par rgyas kyis/khyed kyis shes par gyis shig+ha/khyed rnams las gang bcom ldan 'das kyi
310a3(mdo sde): bstan pa la rab tu 'byung mi 'dod pa de ni 'di nas phyir log cig/de nas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya pa de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces smras so//bdag cag cung zad shes
310a4(mdo sde): pa de kun kyang khyed kyi mthu na/khyed rgya chen po'i gnas su rab tu 'byung na/khyed gang las rab tu 'byung ba de lngas bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung ngo //de nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal
310a5(mdo sde): dang /pang naso skyes g.yogra lnga brgya dang bcas pa bcom ldan 'das las rab tu 'byung bar chas par bdud sdig can gyis rig nas ci nas de gnyis dge sbyong gau ta mo'i
310a6(mdo sde): gan du 'gro me nus par bya ba'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i phyi logs su g.yung sa chen po zabs su dpag tshad brgya pa zhig sprul to//de nas bcom ldan
310a7(mdo sde): 'das kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad de/ci nas kun du rgyu nye rgyal dang /pang nas skyes gnyis g.yangs chen po de mi mthong
310b1(mdo sde): zhing lam drang por 'gro bar mdzad do//yang bdud cig sman gyis de gnyis kyi mdun du ri chen po brtan pa/sra ba/maN+Dal ba/sprul med pa/gcig tu stug por gyur pa
310b2(mdo sde): mkhregs pa/'phyang du dpag tshad stong yod pa cag mngon par sprul te/seng ge khro zhing gdug la gtum pa/sgra chen po 'byin pa stong yang mngon par sprul na/bcom ldan
310b3(mdo sde): 'das kyis gzi brjid dang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus skyes bu dam pa de gnyis kyis ri de'ang ma mthong /spang ga'ang ma mthong /seng ge'i skad kyang ma thos te lam drang por bcom ldan
310b4(mdo sde): 'das ga la ba de logs su song ngo //bcom ldan 'das ni 'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
310b5(mdo sde): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/dge slong dag khyed skyes bu dam pa tshogs kyi gtso bo g+ha mog+sa gi tshogs can 'di gnyis la bltos/de dag gis gsol pa/bcom ldan
310b6(mdo sde): 'das mthong lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyi sgo bko' stsal la//skyes bu dam pa 'di gnyis g.yog dang bcas pa nga'i thad du rab tu byeng nas gcig ni nga'i nyan thos thams
310b7(mdo sde): cad kyi nang na shes rab can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro//gcig ni rdzu 'phrul can gyi mchog tu 'gyur ro//de nas dge slong zhig gis deng tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so//
311a1(mdo sde): skyes bu mkhas pa g.yog ldan 'di gnyis ni//rdzu 'phrul ldan dung shes rab 'jigs med par//mi mchog phan pa mdzad pas lung bstan te//bdag
311a2(mdo sde): gis de gnyis sti stong bskyed nas su//de nas dge slong de stan las langs nas dge slong mang po dang /khyim na gnas pa dang /rab tu byung ba mang po dang lhan cig tu skyes
311a3(mdo sde): bu dam pa de gnyis bsu nos bsnyen bkur byas so//de nas skyes bu dam pa de gnyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo
311a4(mdo sde): bos phyag btsal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das rab
311a5(mdo sde): tu 'byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs pa dge slong gi dngos po bdag cag gnyis la stsal du gsol/bdag cig bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du tshungs par spyad pa spyod do//
311a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis kyi ming ci/nye rgyal gyis gsol ba/bdag ni bram ze rgyal gyi bu lags te nye rgyal zhes bgyi/bdag gi
311a7(mdo sde): ma'i ming ne shA ri ka ste/bdag de las skyes pas na de'i slad du bdag gi ming ni shA ri'i bu zhes btags so//bdag rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas gnang lags so//
311b1(mdo sde): blang nas skyes kyis gsol pa/bdag gi pha'i ming nai kauN+Di n+ya zhes bgyi/bdag gi ma'i ming ni maud+ga la zhes bgyi ste/bdag de la skyes pas na de'i slad du bdag gi ming ni maud+gal
311b2(mdo sde): gyi bu zhes btags so//bdagu rab tu 'byung bar yang pha mas glanang lags so//bcom ldan 'das kyis shA ri'i bu dang /maud+gal gyi bu de'i thad du g.yob dang bcas
311b3(mdo sde): te/tshangs par spyad pa spyod cig ces bka' stsal pa dang /de nyid kyis de gnyis rab tu byung ba dang /bsnyen par rdzogs shing dge slong gi dngos por gyur to//shA ri'i bu dang /
311b4(mdo sde): maumod+gal gyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon par bdud sdig can dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas 'di skad ces smras
311b5(mdo sde): so//gang dag bstan bcos don spyod mkhas pa rig pa'i pha rol song //de kun nga yi rkang la phyag 'tshal de dag 'dren pa nga //gau ta ma slob ma 'khor bcas nga la deng myur skyabs
311b6(mdo sde): 'tshol cig/mya ngan 'das 'gro rgyas pa gsal ba'i lam ni khyed lnga bshad//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyod lam 'gro ba 'di dag ngan 'gror 'dren cing
311b7(mdo sde): sdug bsngal rgya mtsho rnyed par byed//nga yi lam ni rgyu dang mi rgyu 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho skems byed pa//'chal ba 'dzem pa med cing mu chor smra ba wa skad de yang ci zhig
312a1(mdo sde): zer//khyod ni btsam zin bdud kyi las kyis nga la yang 'drir ni byed mi nus//de nas bdud sdig can gyis dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs mi snang bar
312a2(mdo sde): byas nas/tshangs pa'i cha lugs su bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so//khyod kyi shes rab kyis ni las dang nyon mongs sred pa'i myu gu rab tu gsal//
312a3(mdo sde): de yi slan chad thub pa ji snyed sems can don 'dir 'di ltar sdug bsngal ste//gtso bo 'gro ba 'di na khyod kyi snod 'gyur skye bo gang na'ang ma mchis te//dus 'di lags na spyan
312a4(mdo sde): dang bral khyod ci yi slad du mya ngan myur me 'da'//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ngas 'dul gang 'khod sems can mtshungs meng gang+gA'i bye ma snyed//ngos
312a5(mdo sde): mthong de dag nga yi snying rjes thar bar bya ba yin//'gro ba rab 'bring ngan par gyur pa thar te mthar theg na//de nas mya ngan 'da' yis blo gros ngan po g.yos ci bskul//
312a6(mdo sde): de nas yang bdud sdig can sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs nas 'dug
312a7(mdo sde): dang /de'i modo la bdud kyi gnas na 'khod pa'i sems can kun phan tshun 'di skad du ci'i rgyus bdag cag gi rgyal po chen po 'di mya ngan gyi khang par zhugs te 'dug pa su
312b1(mdo sde): shus sa zhes 'dri'o//de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa thogs te rab tu yid du 'ang
312b2(mdo sde): ba'i gos dang /lhab lhub dag gis bdag cag brgyan nas rab tu yid du 'ong zhing mos par byed pa'i lho'i sil snyan byas te/rab tu yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis glu len gar byed
312b3(mdo sde): cing /yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i lha'i sil snyan dag byas nas/dga' ba'i rtsed mo dang ljon par bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khod pa dang /bdud sdig can des lag pa gnyis
312b4(mdo sde): bsgreng nas bos te sgra mi byed/sgra ma byed ces smras pa dang /yud tsam zhig lha'i bu mo dag cing mi zer bar 'khod do//yung glu rab tu blangs shing sil snyan byas pa dang /bdud
312b5(mdo sde): ldog can gyis lag pa gnyis g.yabs te bos so//lha'i bu mo de dag gis dga' ba dang ldan pa'i glu dang /gar dang /sil snyen lan bdun gyi bar du byas pa dang /yang dri
312b6(mdo sde): bzhin du bdud sdig can de lag pa bsgreng nas 'bod cing sgra ma byed/snga ma byed ces zer ro//de skad ces smras pa dang /lha'i bu mo de dag cang mi zer bar 'khrod do//de nas lha'i
312b7(mdo sde): bu mo dbyings snyan glog ces bya bas bdud sdig can ga la ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba gtud nas 'di skad ces smras so//gtso bo khyod kyis deng 'dir 'chi 'pho'i lhas shig
313a1(mdo sde): gzigs sam ci//'on tam ci zhig de ring 'gro ba zhugs kyis 'khrugs gyur tam//'on te 'di ni khyod dgra stobs chen 'ga' zhig mchis lpags//
313a2(mdo sde): sam//ci yi slad du khyed ni dgyes par mi bzhugs thugs ngan mdzad//bdud kyis smras pa//dro lu dgra yod pa ni stobs ldan sems thul pa//sa stengs shAkya'i bu pho
313a3(mdo sde): skum bslabs pa'i blo//de ni ci nas gal te brlag pur ma gyur na//de yis nga yi 'dod khams 'di ni stong par byed//lha'i bu mos smras pa//gtso bo srid gsum bcings
313a4(mdo sde): srid rgya mtsho mtha' rings la//zad bgyid nus pa'i stobs dang ldan pa su zhig mchis//bdag po thabs stobs brtson 'grus rtsal rnams gang gis kyang //de la de ring
313a5(mdo sde): ma lus bgyid par nus ma mchis//bdud kyis smras pa/sbyin dang brtul zhugs bsam pa smon lam snying rje'i zhags pa can//stong pa mtshan ma med pa'i mtshon cha
313a6(mdo sde): mchog dang gzhu thogs te//'khor ba las byung rab tu zhi ba'i lam dang mthun gyur nas//srid pa ma lus bzlog pa nye bar bstan par byed pa po//de yi slob ma bsams
313a7(mdo sde): gtan la ni mngon par brtson yid kyis//dben par rgyu zhing nyes pa zad par bya phyir khor zug tu//cho ga bzhin du zhugs nas grong dang grong khyer stong pa dang //nags kyi
313b1(mdo sde): nang dag dang ni ri yi sman ljongs rnams na gnas//rdzu 'phrul dang ni steng sa dang snying rje'i grogs dang ldan pa yi//dam pa nye rgyal pang nas skyes gnyis thub pas btul por 'gyur//
313b2(mdo sde): rlab dul chos can 'jig rten gsum kun cho ga bzhin du brtul//de ni nga yi 'dod khams 'di dag stong par byed par 'gyur//de nas bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis bdud
313b3(mdo sde): sdig can las bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa thos nas thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa dang bral pa'i glog ces bya ba thob bo//de nas bdud
313b4(mdo sde): kyi bu mo lnga brgya po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i sil bstan dang /lha'i me tog dang /bdug pa dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /lhab
313b5(mdo sde): lhub dang /sdud pa dang /rgyan de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su gtor ba dang /lci'i me tog dang /sil snyan nas rgyan gyi bar du de drag bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul
313b6(mdo sde): gyi mthus 'od mo'i tshal du bab par gyur to//bdud kyi bu mo de dag kyang g.yog dang bcas pas so so nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //de dag gis mthong nas kyang rab tu dga'
313b7(mdo sde): ba dang rangs pa skyes par gyur to//gang gi phyir 'od ma'i tshal du 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu bab ces dge slong de dag the tshom skyes nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/
314a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das shA ri'i bu dang /mdal gyi bu g.yog dang bcas pa 'di gnyis la ngo mtshar dang rmad du zung ba chen po sngon ma mthong ma thos pa'i
314a2(mdo sde): me tog gri chang chen po rab tu bab pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das 'di'i rgyu ci lags/rkyen gang lags/bcom ldan 'dres kyisra bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu
314a3(mdo sde): 'di gnyis kyi mthu ma yin te/bdud sdig can gyi g.yog me lnga brgya tsam gyis bdud kyis khong pa de nas nga la mchod pa bye ba'i phyir 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char chen po nas
314a4(mdo sde): rgyan gyi bar gyi char phab po//de dag ring phyir mi thogs par 'dir 'ongs te/nga las bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob bo//de nus
314a5(mdo sde): bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag so so nas bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung dang brjod pa'i dbyangs thos nas/bcom ldan 'das la de bas kyang rab tu dga' ba skyes te//de
314a6(mdo sde): dge dga' ba dang rangs pa des byang chub kyi sems brjod pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo//de nis yang bdud kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi khang pa dang gros phrag pa gcig
314a7(mdo sde): tu bgos te/pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das phyogs gang na bzhugs pa'i phyogs der bltas nas 'di skad ces gsol
314b1(mdo sde): to//skyed chu ma lus skams pa'i 'gro ba'i mig gcig pu//mog ma mchos pa'i 'jig rten kun la gzigs nas ni//khyod dang lha dang mir bcas pa yi 'gro bskul//thub pa bdag
314b2(mdo sde): ga ji ltar myur du sangs rgyas 'gyur//lha dang mis mchod don dum gsung ba bcom ldan 'das/bdag cag mthun par byed med srad pa nyid spangs nas//tha mchog kyi 'phrul
314b3(mdo sde): gyi drung du myur bar ni//mchis nas 'di bzhin thub pa'i dbang po'i gsung mnyan to//bdag med gsung ba den dam gzigs pa bcom ldan 'das//byang chub yan lag rin cheni
314b4(mdo sde): dri ming nor gsung sgron//mtshungs med bdud kyi stobs btul khyod kyis bdag cig la//da ltar myur du lhan cig byang chub lung bsnyen gsol//de nus bdud kyi bu mo de dag
314b5(mdo sde): stan las langs nas mgrin gcig tu bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so//nyes byas blo gros ce na khyod snying po med g.yo ba'o//dpal rnyed ci phyir bcom ldan 'das
314b6(mdo sde): laM sdang bar sems//dregs pas gos nIs skye ba la sogs sdug bsngal gyis//lus kun gtses te mi bzeng gnas su nye bar song //de ltar khro ba spangs te rgyal la dad
314b7(mdo sde): par gyis//'khor ba'i nyes pa dregs pa'i 'odom las thar pa'i bde//'di ni nyid kyis 'gro ba kun gyi ngo bo mkhyen//thugs rje can gyi skyabs su 'dong gis myur du dung//
315a1(mdo sde): de nas bdud sdig can shin tu gdug pa'i yid dang ldan pa 'di snyam du sems te/bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul drag po dran par byas
315a2(mdo sde): la/grang g.yog mo lnga brgya tsam 'di dag bdag nyid bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong bar byas te/'di nas bzlog la 'gro mo nus par bya'o snyam pa dang /bdud dos de
315a3(mdo sde): dag bcing bar ma nus so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/'di ltar g.yogs mo lnga brgya tsam po de dag de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro//de nas gru yig ma
315a4(mdo sde): lnga brgya tsam de dag bdud sdig can+da gyi drung nas drong ba dang /de nas bdud sdig can rab tu khros te de 'di snyam du sems so//bdag gis yang 'dri 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi
315a5(mdo sde): yul drag po dran par byas te/ci nas bdag gis g.yog mo de dag phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad 'khrul nas dge sbyong gau ta ma mi mthong zhing slar yang bdag gi
315a6(mdo sde): glanas su 'ong bar nam mkha' 'dri dag thams cad du rnam par 'thor rlung dang /rlung nag po chen pos kun tu khyab par bya'o snyam no'ang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs
315a7(mdo sde): kyis rlung cung zad kyang langs par byed ma nus so//tha na skra'i rtse mo gcig tsam yang bskyod ma nus na mang du lta ci smos/de nas yang bdud sdig can rab tu khros shing sdug
315b1(mdo sde): bsngal te yid mi bde zhing yid la gtsigs nus ngu zhing skad chen pos rang gi bu dang tshogs kyi 'khang la bos te bdud kyi gnas thams cad sgras gang bar byas so//sdug pa'i bu dang /
315b2(mdo sde): tshogs kyi 'khor rnams tshur shog cig/nga ni bdag yul rang gi rdzu 'phrul stobs las nyams//shAkya'i bu 'dri sgra ldan g.yo can ngag 'jam la//khong nas rang bzhin dug
315b3(mdo sde): sdong 'dra ba 'drir skyes so//de nas sgra des bdud kyi g.yog mo dang /bdud kyi bu mo de dag thams cad dang /bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa thams nad rings pa'i gzugs
315b4(mdo sde): kyis myur du lhagaso nas/bdud sdig can gyi mdun du 'khrod pa dang /'khor de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu rgyal ba'i blo grosa? zhes bya ba des thal mo sbyar te 'dri skad ces smras so//ci slad
315b5(mdo sde): thugs khros rab tu 'khrugs shing thugs mi dgyes//bsreg bskal deng 'dir ma byung 'dri na so khyod ma 'phos//'di na khyod lhag dgra ni su yang ma mchis na//khyod ci rmongs par
315b6(mdo sde): gyur tam ci slad gzhan du dgongs//bdud kyis smras pa/shAkya'i bu po dmangs pha la shing gi grib ma 'dug pa ma mthong nga mo//ci phyir 'di na khyod kyi mdun na stobs dang ldan pa'i
315b7(mdo sde): dgra med smras//stobs gcig ldan pa g.yo can de yis thams cad rnam pa du mar bslus//bdag cag bu dang sder bcas me lci 'bar dang bcas pa'i ma yis bsregs//
316a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten 'di na skyes bu gtso bo dpal dang brjod pa rnam grags pa//mabyas pa bstan bac+doMs snyan drangags mang po byed brtson mthun par myur bar yang /
316a2(mdo sde): chos kyi kyo ba btang gis drangs te shAkya'i bu 'di skyabs dreng sdong //lus mdzes g.yo can blo gros ldan 'ding yi dgrar ni rab tu gnano//rab tu sdug pa'i g.yog mo de dag
316a3(mdo sde): snying rje med pas nga bor ste//nga la dbang btsugaso nas ni de ring dge sbyong de yi skyabs su dang //gal te bdag cag myur bsgrims stobs chen 'di dang thal babur ma byas na//g.yo
316a4(mdo sde): dudang sgra yi sa skyid pa gsum po de dag ma lus stongs par byed//de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so//
316a5(mdo sde): de ltar bgyi'o//bdag cag gis rdzu 'phrul dang /stobs kyi yul gyi mthu dang /rnam par sprul pa de dag thams cad bstan te/shAkya'i bu 'di gal te thal bar bgyid
316a6(mdo sde): nus pa de lta na ni legs/de ltar ma nus nA ni de la skyabs su mchi'o//yub nyid kyi mngon sum du gyur pa lags te/gang bdag cig sde chen pos yongs su bskor ba
316a7(mdo sde): lags te/sngar shAkya'i bu gcig pu gnyis su med pa 'dis rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rab tu pham par bgyis na da g.yog mang por gyur pa lta ci smos/bdud sdig can
316b1(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/bzhin bzang dag deng la gal te dge sbyong gau ta ma 'di gsod nus na slar shog cig/ci ste ma nus na'ang bdag cag gi gnas kyang bsrung gis slar shog cig/de nas/
316b2(mdo sde): bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bcu gnyis po de dag de nas 'phags te/'di nas steng du dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi steng gi bar du bkang nas de 'dra ba'i bdud kyi stobs kyi yul gyi rdzu 'phrul
316b3(mdo sde): drag po bstan te/gang gling bzhi pa'i nam mkha' thams cad sprin nag po chen po dang /rlung nag po chen po dang /skar mdas bkad nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab la'ang lag gis brdebs
316b4(mdo sde): te/gling bzhi pa thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas nas shin tu 'jigs pa'i sgra rnams kyang 'byin to//de dag gis klu dang /klu chen po dang /gnod sbyin dang /gnod sbyin chen po
316b5(mdo sde): dag gis sa chen po drug dang rir bcas pa thams cad dang ldan pa dang /ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyang g.yos par rig/mtsho dang /mtsho chen po dang /'bab chu dang /chu bran dang /'bab chu
316b6(mdo sde): chen po dang /rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyang 'khrugs par rig nas nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod do//bdud kyi 'khor de dag ni ri rab kyi zom la 'khod nas/dpag tshad tsam gyi rdo'i char
316b7(mdo sde): mngon par sprul te nam mkha' las kun tu 'bebs so//ral gri dang /gtun shing dang /rdo ba tung /mtshon rtse gnyis dang /ste'u ka ma dang /lcags mda' dang /spu gri
317a1(mdo sde): dang /sru gri lta bu dang /rAgro sgra dang /ste'u so lta bu dang /ste'u so dang /khA rga rod can dang /shin tu rung rod can dang /sra ba drag pa thub pa//rno ba'i char
317a2(mdo sde): rab tu stsal te kun tu phub po/zhes de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdud kyi 'khor rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/phreng rdo du mtshon tshad
317a3(mdo sde): dag thams cad ni lha'i me tog ut+pal dang /pad+ma dang /ku mu dra dang /pad+ma dkAr po dang /man+dA ra ba dang /man+ta rA ba chen po'i me tig go char chen por byin gyis
317a4(mdo sde): brlabs/yul ang ga mA ga d+hA ra skar mda' ltung ba ni spos kyi char chen por byin gyis brlabs/sgra de ni ro baM mI'i sgra sna tshogs su byin gyis brlangs te/'di ltar
317a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang /chos kyi sgra dang /dge 'dun gyi sgra dang /pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang /mngon par shes pa'i sgra dang /phyir mi ldog pa'i sgra dang /dbang bskur
317a6(mdo sde): ba'i sgra dang /bdud bzhi pham par bya ba'i sgra dang /byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i sgra dang /len pa dang bcas pa dang /len pa med pa'i bar gyi sgrar byin gyis brlabs
317a7(mdo sde): so//rdul dang /mun nag dang /rlung thams cad kyang rab tu zhi'o//gang gling bzhi pa 'di na rtswa dang /shing gel pa dang /sman dang /nags tshal dang /so dang /brag dang /
317b1(mdo sde): ri ci yod pa de dag thams cad ni rin po che sna bdun du byin gyis brlabs so//bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor bltar mi mthong ba dang ldan pa ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du smras
317b2(mdo sde): dbang mdzad do//bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan re re los kyang 'di 'dra ba'i 'od byung ste/'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen ngos khyab par gyur
317b3(mdo sde): to//stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yan dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto
317b4(mdo sde): 'phye chen po dang /yi dgras dang /sha zo dang /grul bum dang /mi dang /mi ma yin po dang /sems can dmyal ba dang /dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /gshin rje'i 'jig
317b5(mdo sde): rten pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das mthong ba nas/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi'am ci dang /lto
317b6(mdo sde): 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /nam mkha' la 'khod pa brgya stong mang pos ni me tog gtor cing bstod nas bskor ba byas so//sems can dmyal ba pa dang /
317b7(mdo sde): dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang /gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa mi 'khrugs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po ni dran pa rnyed de/dge ba'i rtsa ba sngon bskyed pa dran nas sangs rgyas la phyag
318a1(mdo sde): 'tshal lo zhes byas te/dran song de dag nas shi 'phos nas lhar skyes so//bdud kyi sde de'i nang nas bdud kyi bu nyi khri'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas
318a2(mdo sde): pas bcom ldan 'das kyi cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas/bcom ldan 'das la rab tu dga' bar gyur te/bcom ldan 'das gra la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /
318a3(mdo sde): bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//rnam dag skye
318a4(mdo sde): mnga'i mchog tu gzugs bzang ba//ye shes rgya mtsho gser gyi lhun po 'dra//grags pa 'jig rten bkram nas lham me ba//mgon po khyod nyid la ni skyabs su mchi//
318a5(mdo sde): rab tu lam stor rnam par mig zum la//khyod ni 'jig rten sgron ma nyi ma 'dra//gzhan gyis mi thub srog chags rtsa lag gcig/ded dpon khyod la skyongs su rab tu
318a6(mdo sde): mche//shin tu tshegs bsags ye shes 'byor ba'i mdzod//nam mkha'i rang bzhin gzod nas rnam grol thugs//thugs rje bsam pa yid 'ong 'jam pa'i
318a7(mdo sde): gsung //don kun grub pa khyod la skyabs su mchi//'khor ba'i dgon pa las ni khyod thar mdzad//tshigs pa las kyang rgyu dang 'bras bu ston//byams la gnas
318b1(mdo sde): shing mchog gi cho ga mkhyen//thugs rje gnas pa'i skyabs su rab tu mchi//sgyu ma smig rgyu chu zla 'dra ba yi//sred pa la ni yul gyi gnas kyis chags//mi shes nad sal
318b2(mdo sde): 'jig rten rnams kyi mgon//sman pa'i rgyal po khyod lo skyabs su mchi//chu bo bzhi dbus zam par gyur pa khyod//nor bdun 'phags pa'i tshul gyis rab sgrol ba//yang dag
318b3(mdo sde): lam ston 'jig rten rtsa lag po//thugs rje ldan pa khyod la 'dir mchod do//blo mchog khyod la bdag cag bzod par gsol//khyod la bdag cag yid kyis gnod bsams
318b4(mdo sde): pa//mgon po dpa' bos nongs pa bzod par gsol//khyod ni 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig pu gtso//bdag cag bdud kyi phyogs rnams rab spangs te//byang chub mchog gi/
318b5(mdo sde): sems ni bskyed par bgyi//sems can ma lus thams cad mgron du gnyer//bdag cag gis ni byang chub mchog thob bgyi//ci nas bdag cig pha rol phyin spyod par//
318b6(mdo sde): bdag cag du mos la spyod pa rgya cher ston//gzhan ma yin gsung chos ni du rnams dag/ldan na byang chub rab tu thob par 'gyur//me tog gang gis khyod lo mngon gtor
318b7(mdo sde): ba//phyogs kun du yong de dag gdugs gyur te//dus kun bde ba'i 'byung gnas zheng du ni//rkong gnyis mchog gi skye bor 'dug gyur cig/de nas bdud kyi bu mo d+ha
319a1(mdo sde): dang /bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das la me tog sil ma gtor ba dang /me tog sil ma de da
319a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bye ma las 'das pa'i me tog gi gdugs kun tu 'dug par gyur te/me tog
319a3(mdo sde): gdugs de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes pa thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gri drang thad kyi stang gi bar snang la 'dug
319a4(mdo sde): go/bdud kyi bu mo de dag dang /bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis kyang so so nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa thams
319a5(mdo sde): cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tshol gzhes te/chos kyang 'chad pa 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te/lham mi/lhan ni/lhang nger bzhugs
319a6(mdo sde): pa'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la me tog gi gdugs de dag 'dug par gyur pa mthong zhing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang kha dog mtshungs
319a7(mdo sde): pa/rtags mtshungs pa/gzugs 'dra ba mtshungs par snang ba sha stag la/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag seng ge'i khri tha dad cing 'khor tha dad la/sangs rgyas
319b1(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i nyi tshe tha dad par mthong ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi gsung brjod pa ni ma thos so//bdud kyi 'khor de dag
319b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul mthong nus mchog tu dga' ba dang mos pa skyes te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas chos mnyan
319b3(mdo sde): pa'i phyir spyan sngar 'khod do//de nas bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag las dkrigs phrag bcu phyir log nas/bdud kyi gnas su de lta bu'i ngo mtshur bdud
319b4(mdo sde): sdig con lo rgya cher bzlas te/dge sbyong gau ta ma de yi ba spu'i khung bu gcig kyang bdag cag gis gzhig par ma nus na gsad par lta ci smos/de'i steng du bdud nyi khri de'i skyabs su
319b5(mdo sde): dong ste/chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun na 'khod do//de nas bdud sdig can rab tu khros te sdug bsngal zhing yid mi bde nas yid la gcags te des 'di skad ces smos so//
319b6(mdo sde): shAkya'i bu ni ji srid brlag por ma byas pa//de srid bar du nga yi dpal song slar mi 'ong //shAkya'i bu 'di ji ltar de ring bsad sam ste//bdag cag gzhan la yid mi rtog
319b7(mdo sde): mying mi smra 'dug/de nas bdud sdig can yid mi bde zhing mya ngan gyi khang pa na 'dug go/'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/bdud sra bkong ba'i le'u ste/
320a1(mdo sde): dang po'o///bam po gnyis pa//de nas bdud kyi bu mo dang /bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
320a2(mdo sde): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni 'di lta bu'i theg pa dang /ye shes dang /rdzu 'phrul dang /snying rje dang /thabs dang /spobs pa 'tshal lo//bcom ldan
320a3(mdo sde): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thabs dang ye shes kyi bar du ldan pa ngo mtshar to//bcom ldan 'das chos du dang ldan na skyes bu gang zag sdig pa'i grogs po'i lhag tu mi mchi
320a4(mdo sde): zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i stsal pa/rigs kyi bu dag chos bzhi dang ldan nu
320a5(mdo sde): 'di las skyes bu gang zag la lnga sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu mi 'gro zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//bzhi
320a6(mdo sde): gang zhe na/bzhin bzang drug 'di la rigs kyi bu chos thams cad la mchog tu mi 'dzin cing /chos gang yang mi 'dzin/mi gtong /khas mi len/mi gnas/nye bar mi
320a7(mdo sde): len/mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/'di lta ste/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na sbyin pa'i 'bras bu'ang mi gtog mi 'dzin/khas mi len/nye bar mi len/mi
320b1(mdo sde): gnas/mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog ste/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du spyod pa na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o//bzhin bzang dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de
320b2(mdo sde): sems can du sla ba ma yin/srog tu smra ba ma yin/gso bar smra ba ma yin/gang zag tu smra ba ma yin zhing //sems can dang sems can gyi khams la yid kyi mchog tu ma
320b3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa nas/mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o//bzhin bzang dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/rigs kyi bu mo de gzugs dang /sgra dang dri dang /ro dang /reg bya
320b4(mdo sde): la mchog tu mi 'dzin pa nas mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i bar du'o//bzhin bzang dag gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de khams gsum dang /dus gsum dang /phung po dang /
320b5(mdo sde): khams dang /skye mched rnams kyi rgyu dang /rkyen dang /dmigs pa dang /'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'byung ba dang /gnas pa dang /skye ba thams cad la mchog tu mi 'dzin
320b6(mdo sde): pa nas mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i bAr du'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni spyod pa'i gnas kyi yul thams cad lnga rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa dang
320b7(mdo sde): bral ba ste/mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o//bzhin bzang dag chos thams cad dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni dngos po med pa yin te/kla stedang+ga pa/mtshan ma med
321a1(mdo sde): pa/yi ge med pa/smon pa med pa/skye ba med pa/'gag pa med pa/mtshan nyid med pa/chags pa med pa/dmigs pa med pa/bstan du med pa/dben
321a2(mdo sde): pa/bdag med pa/mtshan nyid dang bral ba/skad cig pa/nye bar zhi ba/mun pa med pa/snang ba med pa/gnas med pa/yul med pa/dbang po med pa/phyogs
321a3(mdo sde): med pa/gnyen po med pa/bsam du med pa/spang du med pa//mi 'phrogs pa/ser sna med pa/spros pa med pa/rdul med pa/rdul dang bral ba/cha shwas med pa/
321a4(mdo sde): ci'ang med pa/byed pa po med pa/tshor ba po med pa/rten med pa/gzung ba med pa/rnam par rig pa med pa/so sor snang ba med pa/skad cig ma yin pa'i bar du'o//
321a5(mdo sde): bzhin bzung dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te/stong pa nyid pas dmigs su med pa'i tshul dang /mi gnas pa'i tshul dang /mchog tu 'dzin
321a6(mdo sde): pa med pa'i tshul dang /mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis spyad par bya'o//bzhin bzang dag chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na skyes bu gang zag sdig pa'i grogs po'i
321a7(mdo sde): lag tu mi 'gro zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//bzhin bzang dag gang la la yul thams cad la
321b1(mdo sde): chags pa'i yul gyi mtshan nyid kyi gnas la rnam par spyod pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'tshol na/de gnyis la chags pa yin te/de gnyis la chags pa'i yid kyis brnam
321b2(mdo sde): pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid slu bar byed do//de la gnyis gang zhe na/gang phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams lnga mtshan nyid du rnam par spyod pas gnas pa dang
321b3(mdo sde): mchog tu 'dzin pa de ni gnyis te/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid slu pa'o//spyod pa'i gnas dang 'bras bu la rtog pa 'dri ni gnyis so//skye ba dang /sred pa dang /len pa dang
321b4(mdo sde): sems can gyi gnas la rtogs pa 'di ni gnyis so//bshad pa dang /rab tu bstan pa dang /gdams pa dang /tshig gi lam dang /sgra dang /skad kyi gnas la rtog pa 'di
321b5(mdo sde): ni gnyis so//rtag pa dang /chad pa la rnam par lta ba'i shes pa dang /shes bya'i gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so//sems can dang /srog dang /gso ba dang /skyes bu
321b6(mdo sde): dang /gang zag dang /byed pa po dang /byed du 'jug pa'i 'du shes kyi gnas la rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so//gang pha rol dang /tshu rol dang /rtogs pa dang /sel ba la go nas
321b7(mdo sde): shing rtog pa 'di ni gnyis so//bzhin bzang dag skyes bu gang zag su la la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'chol ba de dus gsum du ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa
322a1(mdo sde): dang /kun 'byung ba dang /'gog par rnam par spyod pa la gnas shing kun tu rtog ste/mchog tu 'dzin pa 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la de'i gnyis
322a2(mdo sde): so//'di lta ste/dper na skyes bu la la zhig me 'dod pa la si'i ngos la nyug pa dang /skom 'dod pa la me dang /zan 'dod pa la rdo dang /me tog 'dod pa la gos dang
322a3(mdo sde): spos 'dod pa la mi ro bram pa dang /gros 'dod pa la dur khrod dang /byug pa 'dod pa la nam mkha' la nyug pa de bzhin du bzhin bzang dag gang spyod pa'i gnas la chags
322a4(mdo sde): shing rnam par spyod pa'i lus gnyis kyi gnas kyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'tshol na de'i 'bad pa 'bras bu med pa yin no//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
322a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po gzungs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces
322a6(mdo sde): gsol to//bcom ldan 'das gang brjod du ma mchis pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya brwa nus ljags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/gang brjod
322a7(mdo sde): du med par shes pa de nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o//de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod nyid la dris/khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob cig
322b1(mdo sde): gang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ming thob par 'gyur ba'i rdzas kyi mtshan nyid kyi dngos po gang yang yod dam/gsol pa gal te mchis zhes bgyis na ni rtag par 'gyur/ji stem+b+ha
322b2(mdo sde): mchis zhes bgyis na ni chad par 'gyur/dbu ma'i lam ni dmigs su ma mchis te/de ni mchis pa'ang ma lcags/ma mchis pa'ang ma lags so//gang ma chags/mi
322b3(mdo sde): skye/mi 'phro ka/tshad ma mchis/glengs ma mchis/dpe ma mchis/snang ba ma mchis pa de la 'tshal ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//byang chub sems dpa'
322b4(mdo sde): srong gi blo gros kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang la 'gro ba'ang mi mchis/'ong ba'ang ma mchis pa de lta bu shes pa la 'jug par mkhas pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs
322b5(mdo sde): par 'tshang bye ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang byed kyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gang na thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ma mchis/ma thob pa'i mtshan nyid kyang
322b6(mdo sde): ma mchis/mngon par rtogs pa'ang ma mchis/mngon du bgyi ba'ang ma mchis/zhi ba'ang ma mchis/rab tu zhi ba'ang ma mchis/dus gsum yang ma mchis/thegs
322b7(mdo sde): pa gsum yang ma mchis/smon lam dang yang mnyam pa'i rlom sems kyang ma mchis pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi
323a1(mdo sde): blo gros kyis gsal pa/bcom ldan 'das gang khams gsum yang ma mchis/kun tu sbyor ba gsum yang ma mchis/rig pa gsum yang ma mchis/
323a2(mdo sde): theg pa gsum yang ma mchis/phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched la rtog pa'ang ma mchis/rnam por rtog pa'ang ma mchis/bri bar yang ma mchis/'brel
323a3(mdo sde): bar yang ma mchis la/nyams par yang mi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje blo gros kyis gsol pa/gang so so'i skye
323a4(mdo sde): bo'i chos dang /'phags pa'i chos dang /slob pa'i chos dang /mi slob pa'i chos dang /nyan thos kyi chos dang /rlung sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mi rtog rnam par mi
323a5(mdo sde): rtog ste/mnyam par yang mi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/gang dben pa'i tshul gyis
323a6(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid la rnam par spyod cing mngon par mi zhen pa 'di ni mngon par rtogs par 'jung rgyu ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches gsol pa/gang chos
323a7(mdo sde): thams cad mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid thob par bgyid pa dang /mngon par rtogs par bgyi ba'i slad du mi rtog pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o//byang chub
323b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pas gsol pa/gang khams gsum la rnam par spyod cing sems nyid sems la 'jug par bgyid de/sems gnyi ga la sems
323b2(mdo sde): kyis rnam par dpyad nas mi dmigs pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' dag las rnam par rgyal gyis gsol pa/glang chos thams
323b3(mdo sde): cad la mi chags/rjes su mi chags/btang snyoms su mI bgyid/khong khro bar mi bgyid/'dod par mi bgyid/mi rmongs/mi 'dzin/mi gtong ba 'di ni mngon par
323b4(mdo sde): rdzogs parwa 'tshang rgya ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' pad+ma'i snying pos gsol pa/gang bsod nams dang sdig pa la mi chags shing /zab mo la bzod pa'i tshul la 'jug
323b5(mdo sde): pas ngar 'dzin pa dang /nga yir 'dzin pa la mi rtog pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o//zla bo de gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/gang chos thams cad chu zla
323b6(mdo sde): dang mtshungs par rab tu 'tshal cing chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid sogs pa dang /'bri bar yang mi mthong ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o//byang chub sems
323b7(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha'i blo gros gzhon nur gyur pas gsol pa/gang gi sems dang sems las byung ba la/mun pa dang /snang ba dang /skye ba dang /'jig pa dang /'phel
324a1(mdo sde): ba dang /'bri ba thams cad mi 'byung ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bya'o//byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/gang gnas pa la
324a2(mdo sde): gnas pa na khams gsum pa la gnas pa'i tshangs pa la mi dmigs/mnyam par mi bgyid pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o//byang chub sems dpa' blo gros
324a3(mdo sde): mi zad pas gsol pa/gang 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu goms par bgyid cing /mi chags mi skyo ba 'di ni
324a4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'o//'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsolnga pa/bcom ldan 'das gang chos thams cad la mi chags mi skyo zhing chos zab mo'i tshul
324a5(mdo sde): yang rab tu 'tshal te/gang rab tu 'tshal ba de'ang mi len mo 'dor/sdud par mi bgyid/bral bar mi bgyid cing /chos gang lnga'ang sogs pa'am/'bri ba 'am/ma
324a6(mdo sde): rig pa 'am/rnam par grol ba 'am/'jigs pa 'am//bri ba 'am/'brel ba'ang mi bskyed la/dngos po dag la rnam par mi rtog pas kun nas nyon mongs par mi
324a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ba 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ste/tshul gcig po 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//de nas byang chub sems
324b1(mdo sde): dpa' ltad mo can gyis smras pa/'jam dpal de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa'i tshul 'di ltar zab mo stong pa nyid bsgom pa'i tshul 'di gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
324b2(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par 'ching rgyun kun tu sbyor ba dang /rab tu sbyor bar ci dgos/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/lta ba mi bzad pa dang bral zhing yang dag pa'i lci bar sgro 'dogs
324b3(mdo sde): pa'ang med pa dang /g.yo med cing dang poraro sgro 'dogs pa'ang mod pa dang /sdig pa dang bral zhing bla ma la rim gro bya bar sgro 'dogs pa med pa dang /dka' blo bde bar sgro 'dogs
324b4(mdo sde): pa'ang med pa dang /yang dag pa'i 'tsho bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /kun tu sbyor ba thams cad dang bral bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /sems can thams cad la khro
324b5(mdo sde): ba dang snying rje bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /sdom pa gsum du sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /mi slu ba'i dge ba'i chos su sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /rnam par ma zhi bar
324b6(mdo sde): sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /dam pa'i chos bsrung bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /
324b7(mdo sde): dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /sems can nyams chung ba stobs la rab tu dgod par sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /'jigs pa'i
325a1(mdo sde): skyabs mi 'jigs par sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams nan tan la gzud par sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /bzod pa de
325a2(mdo sde): nges par spro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /'dzin pa thams cad la chags pa'i mtshan nyid du sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa dang /rdul dang mun pA'i phung po thams cad spong bur
325a3(mdo sde): sgro 'dogs pa 'dra med pa dang /bsngo ba'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa thams cad rnam pa spong bar sgro 'dogs pa'ang med pa 'di dag ni rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
325a4(mdo sde): shes kyi sbyor ba nyi shu ste/yi ge dang /skade dang /sgra dang /smra ba dang /brjod pa'i tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa la 'jug pas thams cad
325a5(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba'o//gzhan mu stegs can gyi tshig gi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang /spyod pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid lnga 'jug pa dang bsod nams thams
325a6(mdo sde): cad dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang /ldan pa dang /skye ba dang /'jig pa thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa dang /rnam
325a7(mdo sde): par thar pa gsum dang /gnas dang /rgyu dang /las dang /chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' thams cad shes nas thams
325b1(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sbyor ba khong du chud par 'gyur//byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis smras pa/'dzum dpal de de bzhin te/nam chos zab mo'i la 'ang
325b2(mdo sde): rtogs pa de'i tshe/chos gang ston pa dang /gdo la ston pa dang /don dang /tshig dge yig gang dag gis pa dang /rab tu ston pa'i chos gang yang mi mthong ste/glang rab tu song ba dang /gang
325b3(mdo sde): bsgom pa dang /gang kun shes par 'gyur ci'i chos de dag thams cad brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin nyid la 'jug ste/des thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesnga khong du chud par
325b4(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/legs sro legs so//rigs kyi bu tshul gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa de khyod kyis ldegos par
325b5(mdo sde): smras so//de ci'i phyir zhe na/thams cad la chags pa med pa'i dngos po yin pas chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa med po dang /ma skyes pa dang /mi 'jig pa'i mtha' can
325b6(mdo sde): /ma rig pa dang /mya ngan las 'das pa mi skye ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' can dang /nam mkha' dang /mya ngan las 'das pa mi skye ba'i yang dag pa'i mtha' can dang
325b7(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni brjod du med pa'i mtha' can dang /sems can thams cad kyang de lta bu yin pa dang /chos thams cad ni rdzas med pa'i mtha' can dang /dus gsum dang
326a1(mdo sde): khams gsum dang /phung po thams cad ni ci'ang med pa'i mtha' can dang /'du byed gsum ni stong pa nyid kyi mtha' can dang /chos kyi phung po dang /
326a2(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa'i phung po dang /sogs pa dang /'bri ba'i phung po ni rdzas med pa'i mtha' can du yongs su brjod do//stong pa nyid dang /yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /brjod
326a3(mdo sde): du med pa'i don dang /chos thams cad kyi don gyi chos thams cad dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la 'jug
326a4(mdo sde): go/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe bdud kyi bu mo dang /bdud kyi bu tshogs kyi 'khor nyi khris mi skye bo'i chos la bzod pa thob
326a5(mdo sde): ste/lus rags pa spangs nas yid kyi lus rnyed do//gzhan nyi khri brgyad stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//lha dang mi dkrigs phrag dgu bcu
326a6(mdo sde): hUM gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs sna tshogaso thob par gyur to//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma skye
326a7(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa nyi khri po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog gis gtor/rab tu gtor nas/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
326b1(mdo sde): 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi dge ba'i grogs po dang 'grogs pa'i dbang gis sems can rnams bsod nams thams cad sogs pa'i
326b2(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba yid la mi bgyid pa la gzigs su gsol/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par lta'o//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
326b3(mdo sde): mtshur du 'gyur ba'i sems can rnams the tshom bcad pa'i phyir sngon byung ba 'di gsungs so//rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa chen po depag tu med pa 'das
326b4(mdo sde): pade'i tshe de'i dus na gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du snang ba 'chang ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa chen po la ste dgu'i tshe lo drug khri brgyad stong thub ste/de tshe de'i dus na de
326b5(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dra ga spos snang dpal zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten rakhyen pa/seMs bud du la de'i mo pad+mar ba blan myed

326b7(mdo sde): ston to//yang de'i tshe gleng bzhi la dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong zhes bya ba byung ste/de nas dus gzhan zhig gi tshe rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong btsun
327a1(mdo sde): mu'i 'khor dang g.yog dang dpung gi tshogs dang bAHsa twe sbyin gshegs pa 'od smos snang dbul gangan ba der spod nas snyan pa dang /bcom ma/

327a7(mdo sde): chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i blo gros zhi ba yin te/gsum gang zhe na/'di lta ste/lhag pa'i bsam pas sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba dang

328a1(mdo sde): su bskor zhing mdun du bdUr nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'ang gi spos snang dpal ga l+yA ba der song ste phyin nas/bcom ldan 'dus de bzhin gshegs pa/

328b1(mdo sde): myur du brjes te sngon 'phags pa'i bud med kyi dngos po myur du ma lus par zad par 'gyur zhing /bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i bar du rang gi smon lam ma gtogs so//

332b5(mdo sde): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur te/thams cad kyang ma 'ongs pa na bud med kyi dngos po thob par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ma lus
332b6(mdo sde): par byang nas/bud med de dag thams cad kyis thal mo sbyar te/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la phyag 'tshal zhing skad chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to//de bzhin

333a1(mdo sde): cag da ltar bud med kyi dngos po mi gda' bar gyur cig/rnam pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i skyes pa'i dngos por gyur pa'i sngon byung ba 'di rgya cher bshad du
333a2(mdo sde): gsol/de lta bu'i ngo mtshar dang /cho 'phrul dang /skyobs bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi'o//bcom ldan
333a3(mdo sde): 'das sngon byung ba 'di lha dang mi dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams dbang du 'gyur bar bshad du gsol/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas sngon
333a4(mdo sde): 'byung bre 'di bshad pa ni/bzhin bzang drag gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa bod zhi spos snang dpal de'i thad nas rgyal po ut+pa lA'i gdong gi btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes
333a5(mdo sde): bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang bcas pas rin po che tog gri gzungs 'di thos te/thos ma thag tu btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes dang bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag mo mtshan
333a6(mdo sde): mi snang bar gyur te pho mtshan skyes pa de'i tshe de bzhin du lha'i bu mo nas mi'i bu mo'i bar du grangs med/dpag tu med pa dag rin po che tog gi gzungs 'dri thos ma thug tu
333a7(mdo sde): bud med kyi dbang po mi snang por gyur nas skyes pa'i dbang po skyes te/bud med de dag thams cad mi 'ongs pa na bud med kyi dngos po thob par 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa
333b1(mdo sde): ma lus par byang ngo //gang gi tshe rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong gi btsun mo dam pa lha mdzes btsun mo'i 'khor dang g.yog tu bcas pa phor gyur pa de'i tshe rgyal po ut+pa la'i gdong des bu thu bo
333b2(mdo sde): gling bzhi la dbang po'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur te/bu stong du gcig gris ma tshang ba dang /skyes bu chen po lha mdzes dang bcas/lha mdzes kyang
333b3(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang bcas/gzhan yang srog chags dgu khri nyis stong dang bcas te khyim nas byung ste/de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spros sbyang dpal de'i thad
333b4(mdo sde): du sgra dang /kha spu dregs/gos ngur smrig bgos te yang drag par khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo //rab tu byung nas kha ton la dga' zhing tshul bzhini yid la byed pa la
333b5(mdo sde): brtson par gyur to//de nas de na srog chags bye ba mang po 'di snyam du sems te/ci'i phyir 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rab tu byung snyam nas/de dag phan tshun 'di skad ces smra'o//
333b6(mdo sde): dge sbyong 'di ni bdud kyi las la brtsom pa ste/g.yo can sgyu ma bdud kyi las dang ldan pas chos 'di ston cing la la ni pho mtshan med par byas/la la ni mo mtshan med par byas
333b7(mdo sde): la la ni skra dang kha spu bregs/la la ni gos tshon can bskon/la la ni gos dkar po bskon/la la ni lhar skye bar ston/la lo ni mir skye bar/la la ni dud 'gro'i
334a1(mdo sde): skye gnas su skye bar/la la ni yi dwags su skye bar/la la ni sems can dmyal bar skye bar/la la ni 'chi 'pho dang /skye ba med par bya ba'i chos ston te/
334a2(mdo sde): bdud kyi las kyi lom la brtson zhing bud med bsgyur ba'i sgra dang ldan pa dge sbyong 'od ni spos snang dpal de dge sbyong gi gzugs kyis rab tu slu po yin gyis bdag cag 'dri nas
334a3(mdo sde): dong ste/de'i gzugs dang rtags 'dzin pa'ang mi mthong ba dang /de'i tshig kyang cung zad kyang mi zlos par 'dod do//de nas de nyid na shar ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya ba zhig

334a5(mdo sde): skyes pa'i dbang por sprul nas thams cad kyi mgo bregs te/gos chen can bskon nas kho bo gcig bu mya ngan gyis non te/thar nA bdag cag thams cad 'dus lo gang du
334a6(mdo sde): dge sbyong ma rungs pa/dge sbyong sgyu ma bdud kyi zhags pa la brtson pa 'di'i sgra dang /skad kyang mi thos na mthong ba lta smos kyang ci dgos pa'i ri khrod nyam nga bar 'dod gis
334a7(mdo sde): chur shog ces byas pa dang /de dag thams cad dga' ste de bzhin no zhes zer ro//de nas shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul dang /the tshom du gyur pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
334b1(mdo sde): brgya stong mang po dang lhan cig tu de nas dong ste/yul mtha' 'khob kyi ri zad nyam nga bar drang srong gi cha byad kyis spyad pa spyod cing sems can de dag la 'di skad ces chos ston to//

334b4(mdo sde): mgo bregs/khyim nas phyung /gos tshon can bskon/dur khrod du spyad pa spyod du bcug/slongs mo pa'i spyod pa la 'dzud /zan zagacig par byed/lta ba mi bzad po'i
334b5(mdo sde): yid dang ldan pa dang /rtag tu yid 'byung bar byed/dben par gnas pa la dga' ba dang /gnas khang du bcug/'dod pa la dga' ba'i glu gar dang /phreng ba dang /dri
334b6(mdo sde): dradang /byug pa dang /rgyan dang /lhab lhub dang /'khrig pa'i chos dang /chang ra ro bar 'gyur ba'i btung pa spangs shing skya ba nyung bar byed de/de lta bu'i dge sbyong gi gzugs
334b7(mdo sde): kyis chad par smra ba/bdud kyi las la brtson na de sems can rnams kyi dgrar gyur pa zhig byung ste/dge sbyong gau ta ma de'i byed pa ni sngon ma thos ma mthong po yin par kho
335a1(mdo sde): bos rtogs so zhes des srog chags bye ba ga khrig brgya myong mang po de lta bu'i sdig pa can gyi lta ba 'phrin du bcug go/de nas dus gzhan zhig na dge

335a4(mdo sde): byas shing yang dag pa'i lta ba la ma bkod na bdag dge slong du gyur pa don med do//mi 'ongs pa'i dus na ldongs par gyur pa'i 'jig rten du bdag ji ltar bla na med pa yang

335b1(mdo sde): ribrag nyam ba'i gnas de dang de dag na spyad pa spyod cing de dang de dag tu sems can de dag la ci nas sems can de dag sdig pa'i lta bar song ba las bzlog ste/yang dag pa'i lta bu
335b2(mdo sde): bcud nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bkod/gzhan la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg par smon pa la/la la ni nyan thos kyi theg pa la/la la ni 'bras bul bkod/

335b7(mdo sde): bdag gi 'khor rnams bslus te khrid kyis/bdag gis kyang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der

336a2(mdo sde): mtha' dang /klog cing 'dug pa dang /dga' ba'i rtsed ma'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba nas byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi skying po lnga 'dug gi bar du skrag
336a3(mdo sde): par bya'o//bgegs bya'o//byang chub thob nas kyang bston pa gshig par bya'o//zhes smon lAm btab bo//de nas dge sbyong ut+pa la'i gdong gis shor ba gzhan nu
336a4(mdo sde): tshul gyis smon lam de ltar brtul to btab pa la mthu chen po dang 'bad pa drag pos dad par byas te sdig pa'i lta ba thibs po de las bzlog nas nyes pa 'chags su bcug ste/
336a5(mdo sde): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go/de nas shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul rab tu dul zhing dad pa skyes nas 'di skad du snying rje chen po dang ldan

336b1(mdo sde): bcas pa la mchod pa dang rim 'gro rnam pa du ma byas nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang bcas te khyim nas byung nas rab tu byung zhing /srog chags bye ba khrag khrig

336b7(mdo sde): to//bzhin bzang dag de'i tshe de'i dus na the tshom du gyur pa'i sreg chags bye ba mang po dang bcas te sangs rgyas la mi snyen pa'i bar du zer ba shor ba gzhon nu'i tshu lo zhes bya ba

337a2(mdo sde): de'i tshe de'i dus na shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya bar gyur te/gang de'i tshe ngas de'i 'khor rab tu phyung nas de'i phyir nga la sems rab tu khro ba bskyed nas phyis smon lam

337a7(mdo sde): ngag dang /yid kyi nyes par spyad pa'i las de sngon bskal pa du mar ngan song gsum du sdug bsngal myong ngo //las kyi sgrib pa de nyid kyis da ltar bdud sdig can gyi gnas
337b1(mdo sde): su skyes so//rin po che tog gi gzungs 'di sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bshad pa na bdud kyi bu mo lnga brgya tsam de dag bud med

339a2(mdo sde): 'gro ba'ang kho bos mi shes so//gang dag de la skyabs su dong bu de dag gi skye'i drung bre gicig tsam yang dang dus pa dang 'khrugs par byed ma nus na de la skye ba 'omo bskyeng
339a3(mdo sde): pur lta ga la nus te/deng kho bo'i g.yog mo lnga brgya dang /bu nyi khri dang tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas te/dge sbyong gau ta mi dmangs de la skyabs su dong nas chos nyan pa'i phyir
