339a6(mdo sde): sbyong g.yo sgyu can nag po'i phyogs pham par byas te/bdud kyi phyogs dkar po snang bar byas la/de byon chad bde ba la reg par gnas par bya'o//de nas bdud me 'od ces
339a7(mdo sde): bya bas dzam+bu'i gling 'di gang na de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs shing chos 'chad pa la bltas pa dang /de nas bdud me 'od kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi sku mthong //sgra dbyangs
339b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa thos so//mthong nas de spu zing zhes byed cing dngangs par gyur te/de nas des bdud sdig can de la 'di skad ces smras so//ma lus zhing na 'di ni rgazu
339b2(mdo sde): bzung mchog/bsod nams shes pas ring nas grinas gtsang ste//nyon mongs rnam grol lam ldan yun+da ring lon//srid pa kun zad mya ngan rnams las thar//khyod kyang me
339b3(mdo sde): rigs khro ba'i dbang ma 'gro/gtso mchog 'di ni srid pa gsum na skyabs//'di la zhe sdang cung zad su skyed pa//de ni rmongs shing bud pa nyams par 'gyur//de nas gzhan
339b4(mdo sde): yang bdud mu khyud bzang po zhes bya bas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so//de ni 'phrul chen bsod nams rab kyi mtshan//mi gnas 'gro ba kun las rab tu thar//
339b5(mdo sde): sdug bsngal ma lus zad pa'i lam ston pa//bdud brgya kun gyis gtses par bya mi nus//sdig can gyis smras pa/nga yi skye bo dag la dbang byas te//khyod kyi skye bo 'di yang
339b6(mdo sde): de dbang 'gro//de yis ring por mi thogs yul stongs byed//'u bu cag kyang gang du 'gro bar 'gyur//de nas bdud nags kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so///
339b7(mdo sde): khyod ni rab tu 'byor par gyur pa'i tshe//de na khyod kyis rang gi dpa' ba bstan//da ni rab tu dpung nyams ri chad na//de ring ci phyir thams cad mkhyen la sngo//bdud ral
340a1(mdo sde): gri zla ba zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so//de ni su lA'ang yid kyi khro ba med//mi gnas de ni bsam pa nyid kyis gtsang //khams gsum dgra
340a2(mdo sde): las thar zhing 'gro ba rgyu//de la gzhan gyis gsad par mi nus so//sdig can gyis suswa pra/'dod khams 'di na sems can gang 'khod pa//'dod la chags shing
340a3(mdo sde): nga rgyal dregs pas myos//de dag dpyir rtag 'brang phyag brnyan te//de dag tshogs pas ci phyir de mi sod//de nas bdud sa chu zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so//
340a4(mdo sde): snying po med cing sgyu ma smig rgyu 'drar//dngos po kun shes sred pa rnam par brtul//srid par mi chags nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid//de la bgegs byed nus par ga la 'gyur//
340a5(mdo sde): sdig can gyis smras pa/mi yi 'jig rten 'di na de dbang yod//bza' btung zhim po sman dang gos rnyed cing //tshor ba gsum yang de yi sems la yod//ci phyir de la
340a6(mdo sde): brlag par bya mi nus//bdud sred spong zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so//sdig can lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis ni//rdzu 'phrul bdag cag yul na ci yod pa//
340a7(mdo sde): don grub 'phrul le cha shas mi reg na//de la ji ltar brlag par bya bar nus//sdig can gyis smras pa/ngas ni de la zan bcod byas//de la rdo ba dag kyang 'phangs//
340b1(mdo sde): nam spyan chogasus nas//gnas d+ha r+m+mas/ rab tu brdud//'dudu gas srog tses bya sa 'dus nas smras // sak+Sha kyad lta grogs sa r+m+ma /
340b2(mdo sde): ni khros pas cung zad 'i tshig pa'am//khyod la khro gnyer bzhin yang bstan byas sam//de lus khyod kyis tshig ngan mngon thos sam//sdig can gyis smras po/de ni mi
340b3(mdo sde): sor brtags pas rtag tu bzod//'dod chags spangs shing zhe sdang gti mug bral//de ni se mos can kun la byams sems ldan//'dra bar spyod pa la yang dri rtog
340b4(mdo sde): go/bdud thub dka' zhes bya ba des 'di skad ces smras so//kun sbyor gsum gyi zhags pas gang bcings pa//de la bdag cag nen tan+t+ra ba grogs blo mod//des ni skyo
340b5(mdo sde): dang gti mug zhags pa spangs//de la ji ltar bIrlag par bya bar nus//srog can gyis smras pa/stobs thob khyed cag nga yi grogs yin te//khyed rnams bag yod
340b6(mdo sde): byos la dri'ur chos//thams cad phyogs su ri maM phreng ba dang //sa 'jim lus byin gyis chur brlab bo//mkha' las mi bzlan stun pa'i brag char dang //lcags
340b7(mdo sde): kyi phye ma'i phung po rab tu dbab//lcogs mda' mdung thung spu gri mda' bo che//de lus phye mar brlag phyir dbab par bya//kun nis rab tu rno ba'i rdo rje dang //mdung
341a1(mdo sde): thung ral gri tho ba rnams phab la//'bar ba mngon 'phangs sbyor ba de dag gis//shAkya'i bu de thal bar brlag par bya//de bzhin du bdud bye ba'i
341a2(mdo sde): bar du thams cad kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras so//de nas bdud de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so//de bzhin du 'drong bar bgyi'o//rang
341a3(mdo sde): rang gi gnas nas gau bgos la spro dang g.yog tu bcas te 'dod do//bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul dang /stobs kyi yul de dag thams cad bstan par ni bya na/dge sbyong
341a4(mdo sde): go d+ha ma de rtsal ci 'dra ba de'i mo la rab tu ston te/khyod rang gis rigs par 'gyu ro//de nas bdud bye ba rang rang gi gnas nas go bgos te//bdud bye ba re re zhing
341a5(mdo sde): g.yog stong stong ya lang rnam pa mang po gyon pa/lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa/gro cha rnam pa sna tshogs bgos pa dag dang chas te/de'i nub mo 'das nas dzum+bu'i gling
341a6(mdo sde): 'dir phyin te//yul ang grA ma ga d+hA'i drung thad kyi nam mkha' la 'khod nas gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /
341a7(mdo sde): lha mo yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /yi dgas dang /sha za dang /grul bum gang dge bcom ldan 'das la sems ma
341b1(mdo sde): dad cing gus par bya ba yid la byed pa med par gyur la/chos dang dge 'dun la'ang sems ma dad pa yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig can gyis bcom ldan 'das bgrongs
341b2(mdo sde): su bcug nas/de dag kyang lag cha dang /go cho sna tshogs dang chas te de nyid na 'khod do//bdud sdig can ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su bsgyur nas//drang srong skar ma la
341b3(mdo sde): druga' bya zhes bya ba dbang phyug chen po la dad pa/rig pa'i gnas bcoM brgyad kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa/rdzu 'phrul gyi yul gyi pha rol tu ston po/g.yog lnga brgya med pa/gangs
341b4(mdo sde): kyi ri'i ngos la gnas pa de'i mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so//gau ta ma'i rigs las skyes pa'i drang srong mchog/mkhas shing mngon par shes pa dag la gnas//
341b5(mdo sde): ang ga ma ga d+hA na dwer 'dug di ring ni//rgyal po'i khab tu nges par bstod snyoms spyod//brten por sna tshogs gsal ba'i gtams rnams kyis//de dang khyod du lhan cig
341b6(mdo sde): smra bar byos//der khyod mngon shes dbang po lnga po yang //gdon mi za ba rab tu thob par 'gyur//de nas bdud sdig can gyis tshogs su bcad pa 'di smos te/de lta du mi
341b7(mdo sde): snang bar gyur nas rang gi gnas su song ste/rang gi 'khor gyi bdud rnams la bsgo ba//ngas dang mi mtshungs blos bsams ci 'dra ba las khyod nyon cig/bdag yul
342a1(mdo sde): bdud kyi dregras chen 'joms pa'i sku de mi ston par//rdzu 'phrul mthu dang ldan de shAkya'i bu la rang dgar smra//de rtag tshig 'jam slob ma dag la
342a2(mdo sde): bu la ma byams bzhin//de yi slob ma rgyags spangs gdon mi za bar snga dro ni//grong khyer dag tu gi yang ba med par mthar gyis rgyu ba na//de dag glu gar snyan mchog
342a3(mdo sde): tshul gyis rang dgar myur du gzungs//de thos shAkya khyu mchog ci nas yid sgo med pararo bya//bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/glang chen rnga mo seng ge ma he stag gtum
342a4(mdo sde): sgra drag dbyar dus kyi//'brug sgra 'byin pa lta bu du ma grang de yi phyi rol myur sprul te//bdag cag lag cha mtshan thogs 'dug pa ngo mtshar mngon sum de mthong na/
342a5(mdo sde): bskrad cing mi dran rdzu 'phrul stor te de nos tha dad phyogs su 'gro//bdud gzhan zhig gis smras pa/lam srang bzhi mdo rta babs dag na mi sdug gdong mangs 'khod//sna
342a6(mdo sde): tshogs mtshon rnon mda' tshe ni mda' zhags brla dwags ral ri thogs//nam mkha' las kyang mtshon cha'i sgra grag sprin lngas lce yang 'bebs//de nas sa g.yos 'jigs pas
342a7(mdo sde): dbang med myur du ma rung 'gyur/bdud de dag gis bdud kyi yul gyi stobs dang /rnam par sprul pa ji lta ba de bzhin du thams cad rgya cher byas so//bcom ldan 'das
342b1(mdo sde): kyis kyang thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs nas bdud kyi sgra'ang mi 'byin/phyogs bzhin me dang ri'ang med//
342b2(mdo sde): sprin nag po'ang med/dus ma yin pa'i rlung yang med de/sangs rgyas kyi stobs dang byin gyis brlabs kyis klu gung yang tha na char pa thigs pa gcig tsam yang mi 'bebs so//
342b3(mdo sde): yang de'i tshe nyan thos chen po bzhi snga dro chos gos dang shams thabs bgos/lhung bzad thugs nas rgyal po'i khyab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs te/de
342b4(mdo sde): nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu grong khyer gyi lho phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud gzhon nu shin tu
342b5(mdo sde): dar la bab pa/byad bzhin bzang ba/btsun pa'i cha byad dang 'dra ba lnga bcu glu len gar byed cing kun tu rgyu ste/de dog gis lag pa gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa shU ri'i bu la bzung
342b6(mdo sde): nas srang du rgyu gcig glu len gar byed de/shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so//dge sbyong glu long shig/dge sbyong gar byos shig/shA rI'i bus smras pa/grogs po dag khyed
342b7(mdo sde): kyisna sngon ma thos pa'i glu thos par bya yis nyon cig/bdud gzhon nu de dag thams cad kyis bcom bsrungs pa dang /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis 'di
343a1(mdo sde): skad ces smras so//skye mched dag gis shin tu chog/skye mched dag gis bdag cag bslus//skye mched dag ni gsod pa ste//skye mched bdag gis
343a2(mdo sde): mthar dbyung ngo //phung po byas pas shin tu chog/phung po byas pas bdag cig bslus//phung po byas pas gsod po ste//phung po byas pa nges mthar dbyung //'di lta
343a3(mdo sde): ste/ba ha ra/bA ha ra/b+ho ra ba ha/ma ri tsaM ba ha/sad+ya ba ha a ma ba ha ba ha swA hA/gnas brtan shA ri'i bu rgyug cing /glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang /
343a4(mdo sde): gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang /de nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste yid rab tu dang nas 'di skad ces smras so//mgon po bdag cag de ring
343a5(mdo sde): bzod par gsol//'gro ba'i gnyen gcig ston pa'i mchog byed de//phung po khyod kyis ji ltar 'jigs bcas bshad//bdag cag de ltar rtag tu de mngon sum//
343a6(mdo sde): bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis slong gi dbus der tshwa dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag btsal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug
343a7(mdo sde): go/de nas ming+gal gyi bu grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu
343b1(mdo sde): na sgra'i dbyangs kyi bar du ste 'drind ces smras so//khams nyid dag gis shin tu//khams nyid dag gis bdag cag smras//khams nyid dag ni gsod pa'o//khams tad/
343b2(mdo sde): bdag giso mthar dbyung ngo //tshor ba dag gis shin tu chog/tshor ba dgu gis bdang /drug bslus//tsher bdag ni gsod pa ste//tshor ba bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo //
343b3(mdo sde): sems pa dag gis shin tu chog/sems pa dag gis de dag cag bzlas//sems pa dag ni gsod pa ste//sems pa bdag gis mthar byung //'du shes byas pas shin+d+ha
343b4(mdo sde): chog/'du shes byas pas bdag cag bslus//'du shes byas pa gsod pa ste//'du shes byas pas ngas mthar dbyung //'khor bdag gis shin tu chog/'khor bdag gis
343b5(mdo sde): bdag cag bslus//'khor ba dag ni gsod pa ste//'khor bu bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo //'di lta ste/A ma ga/A~M ma ga/A mA gA a ra dz+ra/nar dza haM/sham mya tha/sham myA tha/
343b6(mdo sde): gag na ba swA hA/tshe dang ldan pa mdal gyi bu chen po rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag dang /gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag skyes bu dang /de nas bdud gzhon
343b7(mdo sde): nu lnga bcu po de dag shin tu dga' ste yid rab tu dang nas 'di skad ceso smras so//'phrul ldan sbas pa 'phags lamathub dbang sras//'khor ba'i nyes la mnyam po lta chos
344a1(mdo sde): kyi sgron//sdig spangs bdag cag ri mo gus pa skyes//sangs rgyas chos mchog dge 'dun dang skyabs song //bdun gzhon nu sgra bcu po de dag thams cad kyis
344a2(mdo sde): srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa mot+pal gyi bu chen po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te//chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i
344a3(mdo sde): pu gang po grong khyer gyi byang phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /de nas yang bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu nas glu'i dbyangs kyi bar
344a4(mdo sde): buste 'di skad ces smras so//reg pa byas pos shin tu tshig/rog pa byas pas bdag cag bsgos//reg pa byas pas gsod pa ste//reg pa byas pas mthur dbyung ngo //
344a5(mdo sde): bdag so dag gis shin tu chog/bdag po dag gis bdag cag bslus//bdag po dag ni gsod pa ste//bdag po drag gis mthur dbyung ngo //'khor ba dag gis shin tu chog/
344a6(mdo sde): 'khor ba dag gis bdag cag bslus//'khor ba dag ni gsod pa ste//'khor bu bdag gis mthar dbyung ngo //srid pa kun gyis shin tu chog/srid pa kun gyis bdug cag
344a7(mdo sde): bslus//srid pa kun ni gsod pa ste//srid baM kun+da ni ngas mthar dbyung //'dod pa'i dga' bas shin tu cho ga/zla 'dod pa'i dgra' bas bdagu cag bslus//'dod pa'i
344b1(mdo sde): dga' bas gson pa ste//'dod pa'i dga' bsrungs mthar dbyung //grogs drag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste//ri bzar chu drug mgyogs 'dra na//byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te//
344b2(mdo sde): mkhas bzugs kyi dregs pas myos//de bzhin du sbyar+ya te/myi mkhas sgra yi dregs pas myos//mi mkhas dri yi dregs pas myos//mi mkhas ro yi drags pas chos//mi
344b3(mdo sde): myakhas reg gi dwags pus myos//grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste//ri bzar chu drag mgyogs 'du na//byis pa'i skye bos mi shes te//mi mdasu chos kyi stangs
344b4(mdo sde): myos na/mi mkhas phung po'i dregs pas myos//mi mkhas khams kyi dregs pas myos//mi mkhas longs spyod dregs pas myos//mi mkhas bde ba'i dregs pas myes//
344b5(mdo sde): mi mkhas rigs kyi dregs pas myos//mi mkhas 'dod pa'i dregs pas myos//grogs dag tshe 'di myur 'gro ste//ri bza ro chu drag mgyogs 'dra na//byis pa'i skye bros mi
344b6(mdo sde): shes te//mi mkhas kun gyi dogs pas myos//'dri lta ste/khArga ba/kharga ba/kharga ba/mun nyi ni/a brta/bi brta/kha brti/bra ma Ar+tha/dz+yo ti ro brta swA hA//tshe dang
344b7(mdo sde): ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis bdud kyi bu rnams lta tshigs su bcad pa 'di dang /gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smos pa dang /de nus bdud
345a1(mdo sde): gnon nanu lta bcu po de dag shin tu drug /yod rab tu dga' nas 'di skad kyis smras so//khams rnams su ma sgrog d+hA 'a bdad/'dzid d+ha/
345a2(mdo sde): rtog pas bskyod pa dang //zhi ba'i lam yang khyod kyis nye bar bstan//mchog sbyin dko/na mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi//bdud gizhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad
345a3(mdo sde): kyis srang gi dbus der tshe dang ldan pa byams mo'i bu gang po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/yang de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa
345a4(mdo sde): rab 'byor nub phyogs kyi sgo nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs pa dang /grong khyer gyi sgo de na bdud gzhon nu shin tu dar la bab pa/byed
345a5(mdo sde): bzhin bzang po btsun pa'i cha byad 'chang ba lnga bcu glo len gar byed cing kun tu rgyu ba de dag gas lag pa gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bzung nas srang du rgyug cing
345a6(mdo sde): glu len gar byed de/rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smos so//dge sbyong klu long shig/dge sbyong gar byos shig/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/grogs po dag khyed kyis sngon
345a7(mdo sde): mi thos pa'i glu thos par bya yos nyon cig/de dag gis gcom po sbyangs pa dang /tshe dang ljon pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis 'di skad ces smras so//dngos po
345b1(mdo sde): thams cad mi rtag sgyu ma chu gur bzhin//'dus byas g.yo ba'i ra bzhin gang la'ang rtag pa med//smig rgyu mthong nas zhig bzhin dri la ther zug med//chos kun myur
345b2(mdo sde): du 'jig par blo dang ldan pas shes//sdug bsngal chos gzir byas pa thams cad gar chags pa//reg kun sdug bsngal khur yid tshor ba dag kyang med//ji ltar dad
345b3(mdo sde): pa byang chub lam bsgom bsten byed pa//de ltar sdug bsngal kun thar byed grogs gang yang med//chos kun mtshan nyid gcig ste 'du shes spangs pa dge/bdag myed
345b4(mdo sde): ldan las spyod kun rdzas kyi mtshan nyid bdag/srog dang gso ba gang zag dang ni byed pa med//bdud kyi g.yo drug mthong la sems ni byang chub bsngos//nam mkha'i glog
345b5(mdo sde): bzhin dbang po dag la rnam shes 'byung //reg dang tshor dang sems pa thams cad bdag med de//tshul bzhin brtags na rdzas ni ci yong yid ma yin//byis pa'i sde rnams
345b6(mdo sde): bslus pas 'khrul 'khor bzhin du 'jug/phung por thams cad tshul bzhin brtags na byed pa med//yang dag mtha' ni stong zhing mtha' rnams kun dang bral//byung
345b7(mdo sde): chub lam spyod der ni 'dren pas byang chub brnyed//rmongs med chos nyid 'di ni chos su skyob pas gsungs//'di lta ste/su mun de/bi mun de/sun da dza hi/so la
346a1(mdo sde): si lI si li/a ba ha si li/a bra hA si lI/ta thA ga tA si li/b+hu ta ko Ti si li swA hA//tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyug cing glu'i dbyangs kyis
346a2(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'dri dag dang /gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag smras pa dang /dri nas bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dge shin tu dgo' ste/yid rab tu dad nas 'di
346a3(mdo sde): skad ces smras so//sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song 'di 'dra'i chos ma thos//gti mug mi shes dngos pos srog las ci bgyis pa//rgyal ba'i sras la bdag
346a4(mdo sde): cag mngon sum deng bshags nas/'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas nyid du smon dge 'debs//bdud gzhon nu lnga bcu po de dag thams cad kyis srang gi dbus der
346a5(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/chos mnyan pa'i phyir de'i mdun du 'dug go/yang de'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi mthus srang gi dbus
346a6(mdo sde): der dpag tshad brgya tsam du go skabs yangs par snang ste/srang de'i dbus na gnas bortanA shA ri'i bu ni byang phyogs su bltas te 'dug/maut+pal gyi bu chen po ni nub
346a7(mdo sde): phyogs su bltas te 'dug/gang po ni lho phyogs su bltas te 'jug/rab 'byor ni shar phyogs su bltas te 'dug nas gcig nas gcig tu dpag tshad phyed
346b1(mdo sde): byed tsam na 'khod do//nyan thos chen po bzhi po de drag gi dbus kyi sa'i phyogs na khru lnga bcus 'khor ba'i pad+ma mchu ba ni dzam+bu'i chu bo'i gser//'dab ma ni bai DUr+ya sngon
346b2(mdo sde): po//ze ba ni dpal gyi snying po//snying po ni mu tig/dri ni lha'i spos pas lhag pa/'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa zhig byung ste/pad+mo de lus snang ba byung
346b3(mdo sde): ngo //snang ba des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar gyur te/srang dri na pad+ma de 'phang du mi gsum gyi khrun tsam du snang ngo //rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i
346b4(mdo sde): bar du ni pad+ma de'i 'phang du lha'i dpag tshad lnga bcu par snang ngo //sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i rlung du ni pad+ma de'i 'phang du ni dpag tshad brgya par snang ngo //'og min gyi lha'i bar
346b5(mdo sde): du ni pad+ma de'i 'phang dpag tshad phyed par snang ngo //pad+ma de'i 'dab ma dag las tshig dang don dang tshigs su bcad pa sna tshogs byung ste/sems can gang dag sa 'di la gnas
346b6(mdo sde): pa de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos so//sangs rgyas zhing 'dir gang zag sdig pa med pa gcig skyes pa//gcig pus bdud kyi sde ni dpung dang bzhon par bcas pa
346b7(mdo sde): bcom//sangs rgyas dpa' bo gcig gis chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor//nyag cig 'gro ba dag la phan phyir byon pa the tshom med//mkhas pa bstan bcos tshul mang rig pa chos
347a1(mdo sde): don mthar 'dod pa//tshul shes pad+ma nas skyes dang nye rgyal mchog 'dir ston pas btul//'gro ba kun la phan don rig mkhas dam chos gsung ba
347a2(mdo sde): che//thub pa smra mchog 'jig rten kun gyis mchod pas de ring gshegs//dus gsuMm+b+ha gshegs pa ston pa dge sbyong rgyal po bslab gsum 'chang //tshad med chos don
347a3(mdo sde): rig pa mi dang lhar bcus 'gro ba skyob//'jig rten don dang phan spyod mkhas pa ye shes chen po'i sgron//dam chos gsung ba dri ma gsum spangs de ring 'dir kun ston//
347a4(mdo sde): sdug bsngal phongs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad rnam grol zhing //'jig rten don slad mi bsgyel blo glos mnga' bas spyad//ma rig pa yis bsgribs pa'i mig can dag
347a5(mdo sde): yang /nidam pa'i chos kyis mig ni ji bzhin rab tu sbyin//thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'dri 'drir ni tshogs 'gyur gyis//don gyi dam pa gzigs pa gzugs bzang
347a6(mdo sde): mchog mnga' la//stobs dang ldan zhing mchog dang mchog ma yin mkhyen pa//sla ba'i seng ge ring po mi thogs 'dir gshegs so//'gro ba sdug bsngal rgya mtshor
347a7(mdo sde): gnas pa gzigs nas ni//dbang po drug gi sdom pa'i mchog la rab gnas shing /mngon par shes pa drug mkhyen drug gi rjes 'brang ba//de ni chos kyi rnga chen
347b1(mdo sde): brdung du yang dag gshegs//dbang po drug gi grong khyer gnas rnams rab 'joms pa//don mchog dran pa drug gi kha lo bsgyur dbang po//pha rol chos drug mchog rnams
347b2(mdo sde): rab tu bshad pa'i phyir//drug gi sa bon smra ba'i seng go 'dir gshegs so//'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug gi bar du pad+mo de las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo //
347b3(mdo sde): khyed cag tshogs te dwe ring dga' ba spyod//bag med sems pa sred dang rgyags pas bsgrib so//rtag tu rmongs shing dga' bo'i skom gyis myos//bag med gyur pas bde
347b4(mdo sde): gshegs mchod mi byed//'dod pas mi rtag chu yi zla ba bzhin//skye dgu'i 'khor ba'i zhags pa shin tu sra//dga' bu drag lu bag med ma thar bya//nam yang mya ngan
347b5(mdo sde): 'da' bar mi 'gyur ro//rtag tu bag med zhi ba'i phyir mi 'jug/dge dang mi dge sngon byas ma mthong ngam//rga dang na 'chi'i 'jigs pas kun zin cing //khyed cag ngan
347b6(mdo sde): song sa la rab tu zhugs//sbyin dang dul dang kun sdom bag yod la//stan cig sngon gyi legs byas rnams kyang bsrung //'dod pa mi gtsang mtha' med kun spongs la//
347b7(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa'i skyabs su nye bar dong //song ste de yi bka' la rab tu nyon//legs bshad de ni khyod kyi don chen te//shes rab rnams grol rab tu zhi ba'i rgyu//
348a1(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos ldan mnyan pa don chen no//lha yi ris bcu drug gi bar du pad+ma de'i 'dab ma las tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag byung ngo //mnyam
348a2(mdo sde): bzhag bsum gra tan dga' ba nyon mongs med//rab tu bsgrims te chos la rnam par bsgoms//ma 'khrul sems dang rnam par ther 'dod pas//zhe sdang rab tu
348a3(mdo sde): spangs pa'i blo gyis shig/rnam pa bcu gsum mtshan ma bsnyen pa yi//bzod pa mchog la rnam par bsgom par gyis//des nin dang rga las thur pa yI/shin+da
348a4(mdo sde): tu rnam thar myur du thob par 'gyur//gang rnam gzugs kyi rnam rtog srog la chags//ther zug rtag pa bdag brtan dngos por lta//de dag gi ni skye ba'i rgyun mi
348a5(mdo sde): 'chad//de rnams ngan song sa la shin tu 'bab//rtag tu khams gsum bdag med rdzas med cing //byed med rang dbang med par rnam bltas nas//rjes su
348a6(mdo sde): mthun pa'i bzod pa grang sgom pa//de dag 'gro ba kun las thar bAr 'gyur//skye dang 'jig grol chos 'di thams cad la//nam mkha' 'dra bar gang rnams sgom
348a7(mdo sde): byed pa//de dag 'chi med rga med na ba'ang med//ngan 'gro med cing mi sdug phra po'ang med//gang rnams dbang po dag la yid mi chags//lam de mchog ste/
348b1(mdo sde): shin tu dag pa yin//da ltar shAkya seng ge de bzhin du//bdud rnams bzhi po rnam par 'joms par 'gyur//gang dag g.yo ba btul nas gnyis spang phyir//ci yang med cing
348b2(mdo sde): mtshan ma kun spangs pa//tshu la gcig rnam par skam par byed pa rnams//de dag la ni lam mchog 'di bshad do//bdag po med cing byed pa med gyur par//chos 'di
348b3(mdo sde): thams cad stong par bsgoms nas su//smon pa spangs na bla na med pa yi//byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin reg par 'gyur//de lta bu'i don gyi tshig gis chos kyi sgra de
348b4(mdo sde): dag byung bas 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag tshogs te/srang gi dbus na pad+ma de 'khor bar 'dug go/'og min gyi lha grangs med dpag tu med pa'i
348b5(mdo sde): bar du 'og min nus babs nas chos mnyan pa'i phyir pad+ma de'i khor 'khor yug tu 'khod do//bdud sdig can gyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag thos nas kun tu bltas to//rgyal
348b6(mdo sde): po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i srang gi dbus na pad+ma de las 'di lta bu'i tshigs su bcad pa dag byung ste/chos mnyan pa'i phyir mi bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med
348b7(mdo sde): pa dag gis pad+ma de 'khor bar 'khod par mthong ngo //de nas bdud sdig can gyis steng du bltas nu 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha drug gi gnas thams cad na'ang chos mnyan pa'i phyir/
349a1(mdo sde): lnga bye ba khrag khrig brgya skyong grangs med dpag tu med pa dag gis pad+ma de 'khor bar 'khod pa mthong ngo //de nas bdud sdug can rab tu sdug bsngal zhing yid mi
349a2(mdo sde): bde nas yid la gtsigs te/spu zing zhes byed par gyur cing /lus rdul te lus 'drar nas nam mkha' la rgyug cing skad chen pas bos te bdud gzhan la 'di skad ces
349a3(mdo sde): smras so//mi 'gyur yid kyis nga yi tshig nyon la//nga la stobs med bdag yul 'dir dbang med//mthu stobs yon tan shin tu dri med de//skye bo brtan phyir 'jig
349a4(mdo sde): rten 'dir 'dug go/lha mi dga' ba'i dam pa 'dir byung ste//'gro mchog mA lus nges par nye bar dong //bde gra shegs tshig la skom zhing rab tu dgra'o//yon tan
349a5(mdo sde): rab mchog zhi ba'i lam du 'gro/'di ni 'jig rten gsum po slub dag sbyong sgyu yin te//lha mi mang po thams cad yid cig pud+ma 'khor bar 'dug/da ni 'jigs pa'i
349a6(mdo sde): skad phyung myur du ri yI char phob ste//ci nas bdud kyi sde btsan+da mtshan gyis dang bcom 'dir brlag gyis//de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces
349a7(mdo sde): smras so//bdag gi phan byed tshig 'di nyon cig khyod kyi chos rig na//bdag sde brlag pa mthong yang zhi bar ci yi phyir mi 'gro/bde gshogs gzi brjid sku dang
349b1(mdo sde): dpal 'chang gzugs mthong bdag cag myos//sangs rgyaste 'dren pa ma gtogs 'di na skyabs rab mchog gzhan med//de nas bdud gzhan zhig rab tu ngu zhing gdong mchid/
349b2(mdo sde): tu stobs non pas bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so//log pa'i lam du zhugs shing lam dman pa//bdag gi stobs mthu med pa'ang mi shes sam//'dren pa la yang
349b3(mdo sde): gang phyur khyod sdig/ mi tsha'am 'dzem sa mi bya'am//bdag cag stabs de shin tu brlag par 'gyur//sangs rgyas mthu yis 'gro ba ma lus pa//pad+ma'i drung du nye bAr
349b4(mdo sde): dang 'dong ste/ches thos ri pA pas lus kyang shin tu dag/bdag cag rnam par 'jigs shing skrag gyur te//lus ni dring stobs dang brtson 'grus sbyar//ci tsam skad cig
349b5(mdo sde): zlog par ma gyur pa//de yi bar du thub dbang skyabs su 'dong //de nas bdud gzhan zhig gis thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so//sdig can khyod ni chos kyi stong pa sangs
349b6(mdo sde): shing rdzog byed dga'//sangs rgyas chog de 'di 'gro ba'i phan don mdzes shing dge ba'i mchog/grong khyer 'dir byin padag cig myur du dge zhing dong bas blta//'jig
349b7(mdo sde): gsum mchod srog chags kun gyi sman la skyabs su 'dong //de nas nam mkha' de nyid nas bdud dbyangs kyi blo gros zhes bya ba de ste sgra chen pos 'di skad ces smras so//
350a1(mdo sde): kun chags pas gus shing dga' ldan nga yi chog nyon cig/sdig pa'i lta bya kun bzlog lus btud dag yid mthun spyod de//khro sangs ba dag /
350a2(mdo sde): thub pa'i gsung mtshig la yang dga' dang bskyed//sangs rgyas mngon sum rnyed dka' skyabs dong de ring zhus par mchod//de nas skad cig de nyid la bdud thams cad
350a3(mdo sde): nam mkha' las babs nas/rgyal po'i khob kyi grong khyer gyi sgo rin po che sna bdun las byas te/bdud la la ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i cha byad du bdag nyid mngon
350a4(mdo sde): par sprul nas/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'bad cing 'khod do//la la ni tshangs pa'i cha byad du/la la ni dbang byed kyi chu byad du/lo la ni dbang phyug chen
350a5(mdo sde): po'i tshe byad du/la la ni srid med kyi bu'i cha byad du/la la ni dga' ldan gyi cha byad du/la la ni 'thob bral gyi cha byad du/lo la ni brgya byin gyi chu byangad du/la lA ni sum
350a6(mdo sde): cu rtsa gsum bre'i cha byad du/la lA ni gzhon nu'i cha byad du/la la ni rnam thos kyi bu'i cha byad du/lalA ni 'dugs skyes po'i cha byad d+ha/la la ni mig mi bzang gi cha byed
350a7(mdo sde): du/s+thu la ni yul 'khor bsrung gi cha byad du/lo la ni rgyal chen smai pa thal pa'i cha byed rmyi la lan+ti nyi ma'i cha byad du/la la ni zla ba'i cha byad du/la la ni skar rmin
350b1(mdo sde): cha byad du/la lA ni l+h+wa ma yin gyi cha byad du/la la nI nam mkha' lding gi cha bya dang /la lA ni mI 'amani'i chu byad ngu/la lan lto 'phye chen pa'i cha byad du//la la ni rin pa
350b2(mdo sde): nabod dr-i/la la ni gsar gyi rgyun gyi cha byad de/lA la ni nor bu rin po rje'i cha byang du/la la ni rin po che'i shing ljon po chen po'i cha byad du/la la ni rgyu lo rigs kyi cha byad du/
350b3(mdo sde): lA nI gzhan mu stegs can gyi ma byud du/le la ni 'khor lo rin po n+de'i chu byang rje/la la ni nA burin pa che'i cha byang du/la lo ni klang po rin pa rgyas bskyung gi cha byed de/la
350b4(mdo sde): nirta'i rgyal po sprin gyi shugs can gyi tshe byad du/la la ni bud med rin po che'i tshe byed de/lA la ni chang dpon btsun pa'i cha byang du//la la ni blon po rin po che 'cha byad du bdag nyid
350b5(mdo sde): mngon par sprul te/bcom ldan 'das kyi mchod pa bya ba'i phyir 'khod do//lo li ni sngo zhing kha dog sngal byang 'phrul dang /rkyen dkar pos brgyan par bdag nyid mngon par spru
350b6(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das la mched pa bya ba'i phyir gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /bden dmar ba dang /mu tog gi phreng bzlogs shing 'phang du te la'i srid tsam gyi rnam mchi
350b7(mdo sde): dkyil na 'khod do//la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la phyed 'phrul dang /sdud pa kha dog le brgan te/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba~M dan ser po dang /mu tig gi phreng ba
351a1(mdo sde): thogs shing 'khod do//lA la ni la brga na kha dog le brgan la gser gyi gos dang /phyung 'phrul dang /lhab lhub ste/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /
351a2(mdo sde): ba dan mthing ga thogs shing 'khod do//la la ni dmar zhing kha dog dmar la mu tig dkar po'i char 'bebs so//la la ni dkar zhing kha dog dkar la mu tig dmar po'i char
351a3(mdo sde): 'bebs so//la la ni lha'i drang srong gi kha dog du bdag nyid mngon par sprul nas/nam mkha' las me tog gi chur mngon par 'bebs so//la la ni bcom ldan 'das
351a4(mdo sde): kyi nyan thos kyi gzugs su mngon par sprul nas nam mkha' las lha'i spos sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs so//la la ni dri za'i kha dog gis lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs rdung ngo //la
351a5(mdo sde): la ni lha'i bu mo'i kha dog gis rin po che sna tshogs kyi snod du spos chu thogs te sri la chag chag 'debs so//la la ni mching bu nag po lta bu'i kha dog ste spos sna tshogs kyis
351a6(mdo sde): rab tu bdug par byed do//la la ni lha'i bu'i cha byad kyis gar byed cing glu'i dbyangs 'byin to//la la ni kha dog sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba di logs su thal
351a7(mdo sde): mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das la bstod do//bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor la le ni bcom ldan 'das phyogs ga la bzhugs pa de logs su mngon par phyogs te/bcom
351b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs thogs so//la la ni srang dang /khyad pa dang /khyim dang /skar khung dang /rta babs dang /bsil khang dang
351b2(mdo sde): ldem gyi bzhi mdo dang /sum mdo dang /khrang ba brdegs pa dang /sgo dang /shing dang /gzhal med khang rnams na 'dug cing thal mo sbyar te/bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya
351b3(mdo sde): ba'i phyir 'khod do//de nas bdud sdig can gyis gang gi cha bdud de dag thams cad g.yog dang bcas te dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs su dong por mthong ba de'i tshe/rab tu 'khrugs te/
351b4(mdo sde): skrag cing myos nas rab tu ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so//bdag la phyin chad grogs med de//bdag gi dpal deng thams cad ster//bdag ni bdud kyi yul nas 'khyams//
351b5(mdo sde): brtson 'grus tha ma brtsam par bya//bdag gis pad+ma rtsa ba bcad//pad+ma bcad dang kun 'khrugs te//des na sems can phyogs phyogs 'gro//de ni tha ma'i stobs yin no//
351b6(mdo sde): bdud sdig can gyis de ltar bsams nas rlung lta bur nam mkha' las bzlas te/srang gi pad+ma ga la ba der phyin nas pad+ma de'i sdong po yan chad dbyung bar 'dod na reg par yang
351b7(mdo sde): ma nus/pad+ma'i 'dab ma bcad par 'dod ni de dag kyang ma mthong /pad+ma'i snying pa lag pas brdab par 'dod na de'ang me dmigs te/dper ni glog snang yang mi dmigs
352a1(mdo sde): pa bzhin no//'di lta ste dpe na grib ma snang yang mi dmigs pa de bzhin du pad+mo de'ang snang mod kyi mi dmigs so//glang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis pad+ma de
352a2(mdo sde): mthong yang mi dmigs shing rig par mi rung ba de'i tshe/'khor thams cad rab tu dngangs par bya ba'i phyir skad drag cing che la 'jigs pa'i sgra dbyung bar 'dod na de'ang ma nus
352a3(mdo sde): so//yang stobs chen po'i drag shul gyis lhag pa gnyis su chen po la brdabs te rab tu bskyod par 'dod na rig par yang ma nus te mi dmigs sngo//'di lta ste/dper na
352a4(mdo sde): la la zhig nam mkha' la rdob par 'dod na mi dmigs pa de bzhin du bdud sdig can gyis mthong yang reg par mi rung zhing ma dmigs nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ci nas
352a5(mdo sde): sems can 'dus pa rnams brtags te sems rnam par 'khrugs par bya'o snyam nas sems can de dag mthong yang mi dmigs shing reg par yang ma nus so//de nas
352a6(mdo sde): bdud sdig can rab tu ngu zhing sangs rgyas kyi mthus de'i lus shing ljon pa bzhin du 'drar te/gdong mchi ma can gyis phyogs bzhir blta zhing 'di skad ces smras so//
352a7(mdo sde): dge sbyong gis ni 'gro kun bsdu phyir de ring sgyu 'di byas//'di ltar bdag ni mdun 'dir slad bzhin skad cig myos par song //yul dang rung gi stobs lus nyams
352b1(mdo sde): shIng bdag gi srog kyang zad//des bslang ba rlag par ma gyur byar du bdag gnas myur du //bdag gri gnas su 'gro b.rad+ma 'dod na der+ya yang 'gro bar ma nus te//rab tu stug
352b2(mdo sde): cing ngus nas 'di snyam du sems so//bdag gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs zad de bdag dge sbyong gau ta mA 'di'i dbang du song du 'ong //dgra 'di'i mdun du bdag gi srog/dru ba tu gyur
352b3(mdo sde): du 'ong gis 'dir mi snang bar byas te/ci nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gnas pa'i sems can gcig gis kyang bdag 'chi ba'i dus byed pa mi mthong bar sangs rgyas kyi nyid mi mai kyi
352b4(mdo sde): rol tu 'chi ba'i dus bya'o snyam na/'on kyang mi snang bar bya ba 'am/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'bros kyang ma nus te/de nyid du mgul ba bcing ba khrus bcings par bdag gis
352b5(mdo sde): mthong nas rab tu khros shing skrag ste/skad chen por ngu zhing 'di skad ces smras so//kyi hud bu dang gnyen bshes sdug pa khyed rnams phyis mi mthong ngo zhes zer ro//de nas bde dbyangs
352b6(mdo sde): dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba'i cha byad du 'dug par gyur te/des bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so//ci phyir khyod deng mya ngan yid kyis du gdong sgra chen 'bri//'dra
352b7(mdo sde): kun gtso thub mchog skyabs su ma 'jig smra myur du song //'jig rten rnams kyi mgon skyabs dpung gnyen sdug bsngal gsum sel ba//'di la bsnyen bkur ni lda
353a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur yang dag/de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du bdag gi tshig snyan pas dge sbyong gau ta ma la skyabs su song la/bcings pa 'di las bdag grol
353a2(mdo sde): bar bya'o//snyam du bsams te/de nas bdud sdig can gyis phyogs gang na bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas 'di skad ces gsol
353a3(mdo sde): to//gang zag gi mchog skye ba dang /rga ba dang /na ba dang /che ba las rab tu thar be mdzad pa dri la phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de la bdag
353a4(mdo sde): skyabs su mchi'o//'di skad ces kyang gsol to//thub mchog myur du 'jigs chen mi bzad bcing po 'di las khrol//de ring slan chad byed gshegs gtso ba mchog
353a5(mdo sde): skyobasra bdag mchis te/gti mug gis ni bdag ljongs khyod la khros shing nongs chen gyis//mngon sum khyod bzhag spyan sngar de dag so sor bshags par bgyi//
353a6(mdo sde): gang gi tshe bdud sdig can gyis tshig snyan pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lnga skyabs su song ba de'i tshe na bdag grol ba snyam du shes so//yang gang gi tshe 'khor 'di
353a7(mdo sde): nas bdag 'gro'o snyam du bsams pa de'i tshe'ang mgul ba bcing ba lngas bcings par bdag gis shes te/gang gi tshe gang du'ang 'gro bar ma nus pa de'i tshe bcom
353b1(mdo sde): ldan 'das la mgon dang /skyabs su sems bskyed nas yang bdag nyid grol bar shes so//lan bdun gyi brla du bdag bcings pa dang krol bar shes te de nyid du 'dug
353b2(mdo sde): go/'dus pa rin po che tog gi gzungs las/bdud pa tatu lta ba'i le'u zhes bya ste gsum pa'o////bam po bzhi pa//gong du zlos pa'i bar
353b3(mdo sde): ste/nyan thos chen po bzhi po de dag rgyal po'i khab kyi spyong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir song bro bdud gzhon nu de dag gis dge sbyong glu long shig/dge sbyong gar byos
353b4(mdo sde): shig ces spyod pa ma yin pa byed du bcug nas/nyan thos chen po de dag kyang srang gi drabu so na rgyug cing mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi tshig dang ldan pa'i glu'i dbyangs kyis
353b5(mdo sde): gang gi tshe tshigs su bcad pa skyes pa de'i tshe sa chen po 'di rab tu g.yos so//skad cig de nyid la lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam
353b6(mdo sde): mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po brgya stong mang po bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la dad pa rnams gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces smras so//chos
353b7(mdo sde): kyi kha lo bsgyur mchog mya ngan med bzhugs kyang //rgyal ba'i bstan pa 'di lta bu yi gnas gyur te//nyan thos de dag la ni rkyal ka deng byas pa//'gro ba rnams
354a1(mdo sde): kyis mthong na dad par ga la 'gyur//de nas lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am
354a2(mdo sde): dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /srin po bye ba khrag khrig mang po gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nas
354a3(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to//da ltar bsten pa 'di yi gnas//bcom ldan 'das kyis kun gzigs te//bstan pa'i cho ga bsrung slad du//kun mkhyen btang snyoms ma
354a4(mdo sde): mdzad cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//'di ltar nga nyid der song ste//gzhon dpung bcas pa'i bdud btul la//skye bo mang po thams cad kyang //
354a5(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das grong 'gro bar bya//de nas bdud de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das ma gshegs cig/sangs rgyas
354a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/bdud kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab/klu'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab/las rnams kyi las kyi
354a7(mdo sde): yul bsem gyis mi khyab bo zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' mo stsol ta maM/yul thams cad kyi nong na ni sangs rgyas kyi yul khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog lags
354b1(mdo sde): te/bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan 'di la bzhugs bzhin du bdud bye ba khrag khrig rab tu pham par mdzad pa dang /chos kyi phung po bye ba khrag khrig rab tu bstan pa dang /nyon
354b2(mdo sde): mongs pa'i rgya mche bskam pa dang /lta ba'i rgyal mo dral pa dang sems can bye ba khrag khrig ye shes kyi rgya mtshol gzu phyir spyod mod kyi/'on gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das
354b3(mdo sde): dring gri dus la gshegs pa'i me rigs so//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/sems can gyi khams na sems can ji snyed po de dag thams cad bdud du gyur la/de dag
354b4(mdo sde): re re'i bdud kyi stobs dang /byin gyi rlabs kyang sa'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de tsam du gyur te/de dag thams cad nga la bsad par shom yang spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la'ang ga dang
354b5(mdo sde): par mi nus so//dAs ni 'di na 'dug bzhin du bdud bye ba khra khrig rnams rab tu pham par bya ba dang /gdul bar nus te/bdud g.yog dang bcas pa 'di ni ma gtogs so//yang
354b6(mdo sde): nga la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bdud 'di dag gis rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad bdud kyi stobs dang /rdzu 'phrul dang /rnam par 'phrul pa'i byad gyi rlabs kyi bkod pas brgyan
354b7(mdo sde): pas/de dag la snying brtse ba'i phyir 'gro bar bya ste yongs su spyod do//de nas bdud de dag rab tu dgu' zhing dad pa skyes nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dge
355a1(mdo sde): pha'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro//ji tsam na gdun las gzhengs par bzhed pa dang /de nas 'od ma'i tshal bsrung ba'i lha mo mthu mdzes zhes
355a2(mdo sde): bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gdong ma chi ma can du 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan de ring gshegs pa'i dus ma lags//grong khyer 'di
355a3(mdo sde): dog kun nas bdud kyis bltam//rI re la yang shin tu ma rungs pa//bye bas smra ba'i seng ge bskor cing mchis//zhe sdang rab 'bar rno ba'i mtshon thogs te//khyod
355a4(mdo sde): dkrongs slad du 'khrugs pa'i sems kyis gnas//mgon po rnam pa kun tu deng ma gshegs//'jig rten rtsa lag brlag par ma bzhud cing //gang gi tshe bcom ldan
355a5(mdo sde): 'das gden las bzhengs pa de'i tshe/gtsug lag khang gi lha mo snang ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces
355a6(mdo sde): gsol to//sdig can dag ni lnga stong po//mtshon char bcas pa mchis pa ni//btsam med de dag khyod la sdod//thub chen de ring ma gshegs shig/gang gi tshe bcom
355a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das gtsug lag khang nas byung ba de'i tshe/sman gyi lha mo grub pa'i bla gros zhes bya ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol
355b1(mdo sde): //'jig rten skyon ma brlag gyur na//k+Shi hrung chos kyi lam sbyor cing //chos kyi tshul ni rab tu 'jig/chos kyi glu yang 'jog par 'gyur//'jig rten kun na rgyu rgyun
355b2(mdo sde): chos kyi ro ni nyams par 'gyur//'gro ba 'dir ni nyon mongs g.yA can gdug pas shin tu bltam//sa 'dri bde gshegs thub pa'i mchog ni ma rung 'gyur ba lngas//ji ltar
355b3(mdo sde): shin tu 'byung ba'i mthu ni bdag la ci ma mchis//khyod brlag bgyi slad 'di ni rab tu mi bzad mang po daMH//sdig pa'i chos can ral gri sta re mtshon rnon thigs shing mchis//
355b4(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten bsrung skad bdug gi tshig gson te//stobs bcu grub par bzhud de de rnying grong khyer ma gshegs shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das gtsug
355b5(mdo sde): lag khang gi dang ra nas bzhud pa dang /de na shing gi lha mo 'od 'tshang zhes bya ba de snying ji snying brtse bar ngu zhing bcomo ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad
355b6(mdo sde): ces gsol to//thams cad don grub thub pa yid bzhin rdzogs khyod ma rung gyur nA ni//mgon po khams gsum 'di dag de'u re mig ni stor bar 'gyur//nam mkha' 'di
355b7(mdo sde): la sbrul gyi rgod cings rno ba'i mda' dang mtshan thogs shing //khyod dkrongs slad du kho nam maM 'bar rgyu yis dAn+ti dwer ma gshegs//de nas sgo khang gi lha mo 'od zer chu'i lha
356a1(mdo sde): zlos bya b+ha da/tshor ngu zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//grong khyer bzang po 'di na bram zer ming
356a2(mdo sde): btagis stong phrag nyi shu po//mda' dang spu gli mtshon tsha 'bar ba thogs te snying rje med par blta//gcig pas gcig mi bzad pa snying rje med pa stong phrag nyi shu rnams//
356a3(mdo sde): khyod dkrongs slad du 'di na mchis kyis gtsang mo'i zhal ni mA gshegs shig/de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du byon pa dang /der rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer bsrung ba'i lha
356a4(mdo sde): mo ta ma la'i snying po zhes bya ba de nam mkha' las sgra chur ngu zhing /bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du rings par song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs lnga mgo bos phyag btsal
356a5(mdo sde): te 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan shul 'di sdeng ge rnga mo glang chen sbyin pas bskor//dge slong rnams la gtso slad bdud kyi rnam mang gnod par bgyid//sa 'dir ston pa
356a6(mdo sde): khyod dkrongs slad du mu stegs gzhan yang brtson//sprin dbyangs 'od 'bar lha klu thugs brtse'i slad du ma gshegs shig/bcom ldan bdud btul khyod kyis ston pa rnam
356a7(mdo sde): zhig dang //sgyu ma bgyis pa mi mthun gdong can bdud mthong nas//lha mi klu dang mi 'am ci yi dbang po rnams//kun 'dus mi dga' skrag nas shin tu rnam par 'khrugs//
356b1(mdo sde): rim chos tshor zhig pa dang 'jig rten 'khrugs gyur dang //nam mthu' skur mra'i 'od sbyor nyi zla gyur mthong nas//'gro mchog kye ma mi bzud glad pa dang drag rdoH//bde
356b2(mdo sde): gshegs ma rung 'gyur bar kun dogs kyi hud mchi//mthong ba'i nyi ma 'di nyams shing //chos kyi sgron ma zad par 'gyur//rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grongs pas brlag/chos
356b3(mdo sde): kyi chu yang skam par 'gyur//dam chos spyod pa 'jig rten du//ma rung 'gyur ba nyer gnas tshe//mi dge bya yi bdud rnams kyang //'di dag tu ni 'byung bar 'gyur//de nas
356b4(mdo sde): lha mo des bcom ldan 'das phyir ldog par ma mthong nas gdong mchi ma n+dan gyis yang 'di skad ces gsol to//thub pa 'jig rten kun la gzigs su gsol//sgra mchog
356b5(mdo sde): dI ring brlag par ma bzhud cig/bdag gi grong du ma rung khyod gyur na//'jig rten gsum gyis rtag smad 'gyur du mchi//'dren pa bdag gi tshig gson sems can mchog/bdag
356b6(mdo sde): gi grong du brlag par dreng ma bzhud//sems can thugs brtso'i slad du 'dir bzhes te//sems can skye bas gtses pa 'jigs thar mdzod//dam pa brnyes nas sgrol bar rab
356b7(mdo sde): 'gyur bar//sngon gyi dam bcas de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs//sems can mang po sdug bsngal du mas gdungs//srog chags rnams kyi gtso bo dbugs phyung shig/sku
357a1(mdo sde): mchog bskal pa bye ba mang por bzhugs//kye ma 'dod la chags pa'i byis pa'i sde//de rnams zhi bgyid slad du chos lam shod//skye mched dbang po
357a2(mdo sde): don ni rang bzhin stong //de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang du gshegs pa dang /de nas so'i lha mo gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba'i lha mo khri dang lhan cig skra ga shig cing
357a3(mdo sde): gdong mchi ma can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to//rab tu sbyin la dgongs shing khyod kyis ni//rgya mtsho bzhin bltam
357a4(mdo sde): pa yi khrag bstsal cing //dbu dang rus pa khor yug ri rab tsa mo//spyan yang gang+gA'i bye ma rnyed bstsal to//sngon ni rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang //skas dang bcur mo
357a5(mdo sde): glang chen de bzhin rta//gnas dang gos dang mal cha zas skom drang //de bzhin nad po dag la 'dod sman bstsal//rang byung mchog rab la ni mchod pa mdzad//khyod
357a6(mdo sde): kyis bag yod par yang tshul khrims bsrungs//bzod pa dang ni thos pa rtag tu bsnyen//par 'dzin mar 'dzin pa yang de bzhin no//bya thA dka' ba dag kyang mtha'
357a7(mdo sde): yas spyad//sems can du mnyon mongs thar bar mdzad//gang sngon khyod kyis smon lam btab pa ni//lam mchog ston pa sangs rgyas nyid gyur cig/chu bo chen
357b1(mdo sde): po las ni 'gro ba bsgral//'jig rten la yang shin tu chos bstan te//sdug bsngal ma lus par ni bsal bar bya//sems can mang po 'jig med grong khyer gzung //sems/
357b2(mdo sde): can de dag dgos pa yongs rdzogs shing //byang chub dam pa la ni shin tu khod//'di na lam por sdig pa spyod po rnams//tshul khrims thos bshig mugon pos bzod par
357b3(mdo sde): mdzod//'di dag sgrol tshig dam bcas dgongs su gsol//bskal pa bye ba mang por chos ston te//mgon po chu bo dag las 'jig rten sgrol//'di dag yan lag brgyad
357b4(mdo sde): kyis chu yis khrus//mgon po mchog rlab khyod dang 'dra ba ni//'jig rten gsum po 'di na 'ga' ma mchis//bdag grol 'jig rten 'di dag grol bar mdzad//srid gsum
357b5(mdo sde): rgya mtsho las kyang 'gro ba sgrol//khyod ni sangs rgyas 'gro ba'i rtsa lag gcig/rtag tu zhugs shing chos ni bshad du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das sgo khang nas gshegs
357b6(mdo sde): pa dang //skad cig de nyid la lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin+da dang /srin po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po nam mkha' la rgyu zhing gdong mchi ma can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
357b7(mdo sde): bdag cag rnams kyis bde gshegs sngon mthong ba//zhi ba'i dus la shin tu slob ma dul//chos rnams rgya cher ston pa mdzad pa na//de la de lta bu'i bgegs ma byung //
358a1(mdo sde): ston pa 'di ni shin tu dus ngan la//rgya chen blo yis rang byung nyid brnyes te//thub dbang 'gro ba yongs smin mdzad slad du//'jig rten nyon mongs
358a2(mdo sde): bsgribs la chos ston cing //smra ba'i seng ge 'di na bzhugs bzhin du//sdig can dag ni bye ba stong mang po//de ltar chos rnams rab tu 'jig par bgyid//sangs rgyas
358a3(mdo sde): dpa' bo grong du deng mA gshegs//de nas lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to//sngon gyi rgyal ba 'jig rten phan+da brtson pa//de dag yul cig 'khor lo
358a4(mdo sde): bskor gyur pA//'di ni gang du gshegs pa der yang bskor//de ring ma rung buR+Sha ni gyur ta re//de nas yang lha mo gzhan zhig gis 'di skad ces gsol to//ded
358a5(mdo sde): dpon 'di ni thugs rje'i slad//shin tu sems n+dan don mdza spyad//de ni de ring grong khyer 'dir//brlag par 'gyur snyam bdag rtog go/yang de'i tshe lha dang /klu
358a6(mdo sde): dang /gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi ma ci dang /lto 'phye chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gdong la mchi ma zag cing ngom zung gnag pa
358a7(mdo sde): dag nam mkha'i ngos kyi lam las babs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod nos bdag nyid la rnam pa mang po byed de/la la ni sgra 'bil/la la ni rgyan
358b1(mdo sde): 'gyul//la la ni gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan stsol//la la ni bdag nyid kyi lus sa la rdog/la lA ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dzin/lA la ni shin
358b2(mdo sde): tu nyon mongs par du lnga la ni lag pas brang rdung /la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs drung na 'dug cing so bya bzhin du 'gre ldog/la la ni bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
358b3(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te bstod cing phyag 'tshal bar byed/la la ni bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /bdug pa dang spos dang phreng ba dang /gos dang phyung 'phrul dang gser gyi skud pa dang

358b5(mdo sde): bas mang ba yi//bya bar dka' ba khyod kyis rab tu spyad//zad pa 'dus deng 'dir ni khyod skyes kyis//btang snyoms mdzod la mi gshegs bzhugs su gsol//sdig med khyod kyis
358b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyung ngu mdzad//lha drang mi rnams dbang du mdzad pa shin tu nyung //shin tu yun rnying chos rnams ston cing khyod bzhugs la//srid pa gsum gyi rgya mtsho 'di las

359a6(mdo sde): cag bde bkun dang ldan//bsod nams 'byung gnas 'dir brlag ma myur cig/yang dri'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lta bye bo khrag khrig ba rgyu stong mang po dag d+hI'i

361a1(mdo sde): la legs so sa bya ba gsal nas 'di rgyu cesgyu smras so//ngo mtshur rmad du byung ba'i grangs men pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan g+ho la phyag 'tshal lo//

361a6(mdo sde): bzod pa dang nges pa la btsud do//bsam gtan gyi bde ba la rtser stsal to//'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par mdzat+pa do//ston pa bcom ldan 'das thugs rje
361a7(mdo sde): chen po mnga' bas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skye ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral to//sems can rnams 'jigs pa ma mchis pa'i grong khyer du rab tu bcud do//de nas lha
361b1(mdo sde): dang mi de dag gis bdug pa dang /me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /lhab lhub dang /rgyan sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par mchod nas
361b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir lam de phyag dar byas so//lha'i gos dang /me tog dang /lha'i ras bcos bus kun tu g.yogs so//lha'i me tog man+dA ra ba dang /man+ta ra ba chen
361b3(mdo sde): po dang /pa ru sha ka dang /pau ru sha ka chen po dang /mauny+dzu sha ka dang /many+dzu sha ka chen po dang /mdog mdzes dang /mdog mdzes chen po dang /ro tsa na dang /ro tsa na chen po dang /ut+pa li dang /ku
361b4(mdo sde): mu da dang /pad+mas kun tu g.yogs so//gang du bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs gnyis 'dor ba'i lam de'i ngos gnyis su lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing ljon pa mngon par sprul
361b5(mdo sde): te/lha'i ras bcos bu dang mu tig gi phreng ba dang lag rgyan dang rna rgyan dang /mgo'i rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan to//shing do dag gi bar bar du lha'i rdzing bu grang zhing zhim pa'i
361b6(mdo sde): chu dngas shing rnyog pa med la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun tu gang ba kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi brgyan pa dag sprul te//bar snang la'ang rin po che sna bdun
361b7(mdo sde): gyi gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /gser gyi skud pa dang /mu tig gi phreng ba bzung zhing gser gyi phye ma dag gi char yang phab po//dngul dang bai DUr+ya'i phye ma
362a1(mdo sde): dang /a ga ru dang rgyu spos dang /dus kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang /ta ma la'i 'dab ma'i char yang rab tu phab bo//go ga dA sha dang /tsan+dan sbrul gyi snying
362a2(mdo sde): po'i phye ma'i char yang lam der phab bo/lha'i rkan sna tshogs gser gyi skud pa dang /mu tig gi phreng ba dang nor bu dang /mu tig dag gis kyang nam mkha'i dkyil
362a3(mdo sde): thams cad brgyan to//grong ngam/grong khyer gyi phyi rol na'ang lha dang mi rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir lam mdzes par byed do//grong khyer gyi nang na
362a4(mdo sde): bdud dam bdud kyi 'khor rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bkod pa dag bkod pa byas so//de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das dpe'o par 'gro ba
362a5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs bzhin du lam du gshegs so//yang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das klu'i gzugs
362a6(mdo sde): dang /rtags dang /spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs kyis lam der zhugs te/de na sems can grang dag tshangs pa la dad cing tshangs pas 'dul ba de dag gis ni bcom
362a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das tshangs pa'i gzugs su lam nis gshegs par mthong ba nas/gang dag brgya byin gyis 'dul ba'i bar dang /gang dag sred med kyi bus 'dul ba dang /
362b1(mdo sde): glang dag dbang phyug chen pos 'dul ba dang /gang dag rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis 'dul ba dang /gang dag 'khor los sgyur bas 'dul ba dang /gang dag khams kyi rgyal phran
362b2(mdo sde): gyis 'dul ba dang /gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul ba dang /gang dag dge sbyong gis 'dul ba dang /gang dag gzhon nus 'dul ba dang /gang dag bud med kyi sa 'dul ba
362b3(mdo sde): dang /gang dag seng ges 'dul ba dang /glang dag glang po ches 'dul ba dang /gang dag ltas 'dul ba dang /gar dag klus 'dul ba dang /gang dag lta ma yin gyis 'dul
362b4(mdo sde): ba nas/gang dag ri bong la dad cing ri bong gis 'dul ba'i bar de dag gis/bcom ldan 'das ri bong gi gzugs dang /rtags dang /spyod lam gyis lam nas gshegs
362b5(mdo sde): par mthong ngo //sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba de dag gis ni/bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /rtags drang /spyod lam gyis lam nas
362b6(mdo sde): gshegs par mthong ste//sems can de dag thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar nas mngon par desnyed cing phyag bcol te/zhabs 'bring du 'brang zhing dong ngo //yang de'i tshe gangs kyi
362b7(mdo sde): ri dang nye bra na gnas pa drang srong skar ma la dga' ba zhes bya ba bdud sdig can gyis btang nas/de g.yog lnga brgya dang rgyal po'i khob kyi gling khyer chen po'i sgo'i drung na sdod pas
363a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das drang srong gro gzugs dang /rtags dang /kha dag dang /dbyibs dang /spyod lam+b+ha dang /bkod pad+ma lta bus lam nas gshegs shing
363a2(mdo sde): lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po mchod pa byed par brtson par mthong ste/mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems so//bden par 'di ni drang srong chen po mthu che zhing mchod
363a3(mdo sde): par 'os pa ste/lha dang mis mchod par stong ngo //'di'i lus thams cad kyang bsod nams kyis mtshan gyis brgyun te/mkhas shing slob dpon yin par shes
363a4(mdo sde): so//bdag cag gnyis gang rgan/gang mikhas pa de la ngas ji ltar brtag snyam ste/de nas yang 'di ltar bdag gis mdun bsu la/'di la rigs dang /rus dang /
363a5(mdo sde): granas dang /brtul zhugs kun dri'o snyam du sems so//de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' bas bdag gi 'khor la bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so//thos ldan
363a6(mdo sde): yid 'thad brtul zhugs che 'dzin mchod pa'i rigs par snang //ye shes chos don ldan zhing thub mchog bzod 'di lam rab mkhyen//khyed cig thams cad 'dra
363a7(mdo sde): la gus par mchod chen yang dag sbyor//yon tan ldan pa 'di las 'khor mthar 'gro ba'i legs bshad mnyan//de nas bram ze'i khye'u de dag thams cad kyis
363b1(mdo sde): mgrin gcig tu mkhan po de bzhin du bgyi'o zhes smras so//de nas drang srong skur ma lA dga' ba g.yog dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das grul ba der song ste byin nas/bcom
363b2(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyi skyon sngar thal mo sbyar te 'dug nas 'di skad ces gsol to//khyed su zhig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalnga pa/nga ni bram ze'o//gsol pa/gdung
363b3(mdo sde): rus ci/bka'o stsal pa/nga'i rus ni gau ta ma'o//gsol pa/khyod kyi brtul zhugs ci/bka' stsal pa/nga'i brtul zhugs ni rnam par thar pa gsum mo//gra sol pa/
363b4(mdo sde): khyod kyi spyod pa ci/bka' stsal pa/nga ni yang dag pa'i mtha' de bzhin nyid la spyod do//gsol pa/khyod rab tu byung nas ji srid lon/bka' stsal pa/ma rig pa byung
363b5(mdo sde): nas ji srid ljon pa nga rab tu byung nas kyang de srid lon no//gasrol pa/drang srong chen po skur mI'i bA shud pa lhung bstan pa'i rig pa gsung ngam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
363b6(mdo sde): stsal pa/sgro btags pa med par mnyam pa nyid du'o//'di ni 'jig rten gyi shes pa ste/de la snying po ci zhig yod/drang srong gis gsolnga pa/mkhas pra rnams dga' bar
363b7(mdo sde): bgyid pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/skar ma'i gnas gang yin/drang srong gis gsol pa/gang zla ba dang nyi ma la brten cing rjes su rgyu ba'i rgyu
364a1(mdo sde): skur nyi shu rtsa brgyad brjod pa 'di dag go//de la mdzub ni sor brgyad kyi tshad de/mdzub de'i tshad kyis lus la srid du mdzub bcu gnyis par rig par
364a2(mdo sde): bgyi'o//klad pa'i spyi bo la mdzub gang dang /rkang pa'i mthil la mdzub gang ste/mdzub bcu bzhi ni skar mA rnams kyi gnas so//grang de dgra na gda' ba ni rnam pa gzhan
364a3(mdo sde): du mi 'gyur te/ska ma gang la btsas pa de dang de dag na gadra'o//yang gang zhe na/de bshad par bgyi yis thub pa chen po gson cig/smin drug la ni su btsas pa//
364a4(mdo sde): de yi gdong gi sor bzhin//g.yas phyogs na ni sme ba mchis//sU can gnag la mdog kyang dmar//longs spyod bdog cing grags dang ldan//mkhas shring
364a5(mdo sde): rab tu dngal 'brar te//sbyin drug la ni skyes pa yi//mtshan ma nyid ni de lags so//gang zhig la ni sor bzhin//sme ba 'di nyid gda' ba de//snar mya la ni skyes
364a6(mdo sde): pate//shes shing rtag tu chos la dga'//mkhas la longs spyod phuni sum chogs//rnam pa rkun tu mdzes dang ldan//dpa' zhing rgyal ba phun sum tshogs//
364a7(mdo sde): dgra rnams rtags par rab tu 'joms//mgul pa yi ni mdzub phyod na//gang la tshig pa 'dra gdu' ba//de ni mgo la skyes pa ste//dpa' zhing longs spyod ldan
364b1(mdo sde): pa'o//mdzub kyi phyed po gnyis pa la//g.yon pa sme ba gang mchis pa//lag pa skyes pa khro ba ste//de ni blun zhing longs spyod bdog/mchan khung g.yon na ske nag
364b2(mdo sde): mchis//nabs so la ni skyes pa ste//nor dang 'bru rnams 'byor par 'gyur//de ni shes pa'i rgya yang chung //ji ltar khyod ni rgyal las skyes//mtshan mchog dag ni
364b3(mdo sde): rab tu gda'//phyag gi mthil na 'khor lo ni//nyi ma lta bur rab tu mdzes//dbu skra dag ni thams cad kyang //gyen du g.yas 'khyil logs par mchis//sku ni chu zheng
364b4(mdo sde): gab pa ste//'dren pa khyad kyis nyon mongs thul//tshig 'dra gang gi snying ga mchis//sgeg la skyes te 'thab mo sred//tshul khrims 'chal zhing 'grogs mI bAdri//de ni
364b5(mdo sde): g.yem la dga' blo'o//'og gam brang ngam rgyab cig na//gleng la byi sran 'dra ba gda'//mchu las skyes te nor dang ldan//btsun zhing chos dang ldan pa'i mi//lte ba
364b6(mdo sde): g.yas g.yon gnyis ka na//gang la rma 'dra gda' ba ni//de ni gre lo skyes pa ste//ser sna che zhing tshe yang thong //lte ba mun chad sor bzhin//gang la sme ba rab gda' ba//
364b7(mdo sde): spo la de skyes longs spyod can//khrims ldan shi 'phos mtho ris mchi//me bzhi la ni skyes pa dag/sme ba dmar po chu sor gda'//rku zhing g.yo can sgyu ma ste//bsod
365a1(mdo sde): nams chung zhing shes ba zhun//gang gi mtshan la sme ba ni//gda' bur gyur pa nges par yang //nag pa la ni skyes pa ste//'dod chags glu gar
365a2(mdo sde): ngag tu dga'//mtshan gyi 'og gam steng na ni//sme ba dmar po rab tu gda'//sa ri la ni de skyes te//mi mkhas brkam zhing mang po sdong //brla gnyis kyi ni mdzub gang
365a3(mdo sde): ni//sre ba dmar po de bzhin te//saM ga la ste shor ba mchog/skyes pa bud med rnams kyis bskor//mkhas shing dpa' la dgra yang thul//rtag tu bde la gnas
365a4(mdo sde): pA ste//ngo tsha shes shing brtan dang ldan//shrI 'phos nas ni mtho ris skye//bArla gnyis kyi ni mdzub don//gang la byi sran 'dra ba gda'//lha mtshams la ste tshul
365a5(mdo sde): khrims can//chos dang longs spyod ldan pa'o//glang gi brla 'og gnyis na ni//sme ba gda' brtson la skyes//mi sdug che thung tshul khrims 'chal//dbul
365a6(mdo sde): zhing snying rje mu mchis so//pus mo gnyis ka'i gong na ni//gang lA rma chung gda' ba de//snrubs lnga skyes te dbang thung can//myur du bdag khyim zhig par bgyid//
365a7(mdo sde): chu stod la ni skyes pa dag/sle ba pus mo'i lha ngan//sbyin pa bgyid cing chos lam 'tshal//shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi//chu smad la ni su skyes pa//gra do
365b1(mdo sde): la ni sme ba mchis//de ltar gda' ba shes dang ldan//longs spyod ldan zhing sems can byams//sme ba gnyis po gda' ba ni//gro bzhin la ste longs spyod rtag/de bzhin
365b2(mdo sde): nad med sems can byams//shi 'phos nas ni mtho ris mchi//sme ba nag po rje ngar la//gda' ba mo ni gru skyes pa ste//de ni khro zhing 'dod chags chung //longs spyod ma mchis
365b3(mdo sde): shes rab ldan//rje ngar la ni mdzub don//sla ba nag po rab tu grada'//mon gri las skyes blun po ste//de no chu yis 'chi bar 'gyur//rje ngar 'og gi mdzub gong na//rma
365b4(mdo sde): 'dra mchis pa khrums stod la//blun zhing gzhan la gnod pa bgyid//de ni dbul zhing rkun po bgyid//gang la sme ba mdzub gang na//khrums slad la ni skyes pa ste//phyin
365b5(mdo sde): dang tshul khrims dran pa dang //shes rab 'jigs med snying rjer ldan//gang gi rkang pa gnyi ga la//sme ba phra mo gadra'i ba ni//nam gru skyes pa ma ribs te//'dreg mkhan du
365b6(mdo sde): yang 'gyur ba lags//gang gi mthe bo'i phrag na yang //sme ba sngon po gda' ba ni//rtag tu stobs ldan nad mA mchis//tha skar la nid skyes so//rkang mthil sme ba mchis
365b7(mdo sde): ba ni//bra nye la ste snying brtsa med//gsod pa'i gshed ma'i ngang tshul can//shi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar mchi//gang gis spyod pa 'tshal ba yi//skar ma'i gnas ni 'di
366a1(mdo sde): drag lags//'jig rten na ni rnam shes 'dis//sems can rnams ni pha rol 'dren//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//kun tu rtog pa'i
366a2(mdo sde): spyod yul can//byis pa gang la chags 'dug pa//de ni byis pa rmongs pa ste//sems la gnas shing rims nad bcas//khyi dang sbrul dang rus sbrul dang //sgrog
366a3(mdo sde): tshogs gzhan yang rnam mang po//skar mu rgyal la gang skyes pa//de dag bde la brten pa yin//ji ltar bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul dang //thar pa khyod kyis rnyed pa bzhin///
366a4(mdo sde): nga yang thams cad gzigs pa na//ci phyiraro nga la khyod mi 'dri//de nas drang srong skar ma la dgra' bas bcom ldan 'das la me tog gis gtor nas yid rab tu dga' ste
366a5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to//drang srong mi yi gzugs su ni//mtshan mchog rnams kyang shin tu gda'//khyod kyi gdung rus mA 'tshal na//lha 'am 'on te khyod rmi
366a6(mdo sde): lags//gsung dang dbyangs dag 'byin pa ni//tshangs pa chen po bzhin du gda'//spyod pa'i gnas kyang tshul gyis ni//sngon gyi drang srong rnams drang 'dra//thub pa
366a7(mdo sde): 'dra phun sum tshigs//'di sngon ma mthong ma thos na//khyod kyi ston gang de ci smra//khyod kyi gdung rus ci lags gsungs//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
366b1(mdo sde): pha rol tshur rol mi shes shing //mtshan ma la ni gang gnas pa//de dag sdug bsngal kun gyis bcing //de ni thar pa'i snod ma yin//pha rol phyin drug nga yi rus//bram ze
366b2(mdo sde): mngon shes drug dang ldan//yang dgra dga' bya drug smra zhing //dbang po drug ni rnam par bshig/chos gsum rtogs pa'i shes dang ldan//nga yi spyod pa rnam thar gsum//byang
366b3(mdo sde): chub sems ni nam skyes pa//de tshe nga ni rab tu byung //mtshan ma rnams ni ngasnga ma dmigs//mtshan ma med pa rab tu bsgoms//sems can med cing srog med pa//bdag med
366b4(mdo sde): stong par mngon sangs rgyas//tshor ba gsum drung 'du byed gsum//stong pa nyid du rnam par bsgoms//nga ni ye shes phra rol song //nga yi tshigs 'di gsungs pa med//gang dag
366b5(mdo sde): mkha' bzhin ma chags par//byang chub phyir ni sems bskyed pa//de dag bzod stobs phun sum tshogs//ye shes 'dri 'dra thob par 'gyur//chos rnams la ni mi 'jug cing //
366b6(mdo sde): rnam par smin pa 'dod med la//de bzhin nyid las 'gal mi byed//de dag byang chub rnyed mi dka'//chos rnams la ni mi gnas shing //pha rol tshu rol mi brten par//yang dag
366b7(mdo sde): mthar ni 'dir bsgoms na//de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur//mtshan nyid med cing mtshan ma'ang med//dmigs pa de ni rnam par spangs//chos rnams kun dang ma 'dres
367a1(mdo sde): /na//de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyur//rang gi mtshan nyid 'dir 'ong la//rang gi sems la the tshom spongs//nam mkha' 'dra bar shes nas su//
367a2(mdo sde): nga 'dra sangs rgyas khyod 'gyur byas//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs ma thag tu de nas drang srong skar ma la dga' ba g.yog dang bca
367a3(mdo sde): pas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /rtags dang /spyod lam du zhugs par mthong nas sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon sum du gyur to//de nas drang srong
367a4(mdo sde): skar ma la dga' bas ting nge 'dzin gang thob na byang chub sems dpa' rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo bzhin du 'dug nas//ting nge 'dzin thams cad la lta zhing gzhan la rag las pa
367a5(mdo sde): med de/ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rin po che tog ces bya ba thob bo//de nas drang srong skar ma la dga'
367a6(mdo sde): bas/bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas lag pa gnyis na me tog thogs te/bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'dri dag gis mngon par bstod
367a7(mdo sde): do//yon tan mtha' yas 'jig rten mgon po bden pa gsung ba legs bzhugs pa//khyed kyi ye shes spyan gyi 'od zer gyis ni 'jig rten kun snang mdzad//rtag tu
367b1(mdo sde): soms nan kun gyi skad du dpa' bo byams pas mngon 'phags pa//sems can snying po chags pa zad pa 'dren pa khyod la dang phyag 'tshal//gser gyi 'dog gsor dang 'dra
367b2(mdo sde): bu'i 'od zer rnams kyis bsil gyur pa'i//yon tan dag gis sems can thams cad byang chub rgyur 'gyur rab tu bskul//byed kyis chos kyi 'kho lo rab bsko nyid
367b3(mdo sde): rirnams bcom par 'gyur//tha ma'i spyod pa byang chub shes pa'i rgyu ni de ring mthar phyin te//sman pa chen po sems can snying po mtshan rnams kyis nI rab brgya nr-i pa/
367b4(mdo sde): can snying po sangs rgyas 'gyur ba 'dren pa de ring bshad du gsol//bdag gis lta ba'i rgyu mtsho bcud cing grol nas 'gro bla bsgral bar bgyi//ji srid kyis ni sangs rgyas
367b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba mi yi dam pa lung bstan gsol//sdug bsngal chu bo 'das pa'i sems can srid pa'i mtsho las bskul bar bgyi//mya ngan 'das pa'i bde ba zag pa med pa'i lam
367b6(mdo sde): lngal dgod par bgyi//phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas gang rnams yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu dgra/de dag bdag gis dbang du gsol te byang chub tu ni sems gzhol bgyi//drag
367b7(mdo sde): cing mi bzad rngub pa'i sdug bsngal dag gis reg pa'i sems can kun//dus gsum gyi ni bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyi bsod nams des//sems can thams cad
368a1(mdo sde): sdug bsngal de ring zhi bar gyur cig sems can kun//sangs rgyas k+Shi ni bde dang ldan zhing rtag tu mya ngan 'das par shog/sems can thams cad nang
368a2(mdo sde): zhir gyur cig nyon mongs chu yang skams par shog/ngo bo nyid kyi ye shes dbang po'i snying po ldan pa thob gyur cig/sems can gang dag bsad par chad cing sdug bsngal dag
368a3(mdo sde): gris gtses pa rnams//de dag bdag gi bsod nams gzi brjid dag gis myur du tha bar shog/sems can re res kyang ni yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad thob gyur cig
368a4(mdo sde): shes rab bsod nams tshad med pa dang bde ba kun gyis tshim par shog/de dge sdig pa'i rnam spangs lte ba mnyam nyid myur du bsten gyur cig/sems can thams cad
368a5(mdo sde): skye ba dran cing chos la spyod pa nyid du shog/sems can de kun chos grus srid pa'i rgya mtsho pha rol brgal gyur cig/thams cad chos kyi pha rol phyin pa sangs rgyas su yang
368a6(mdo sde): grub par shog/bskol pa dpag tu med par chos kyi char pa 'bebs shing 'dug gyur cig/sems can thams cad chos kyi sprin gyi char chus legs par 'bru bar shog/
368a7(mdo sde): bdag gi lus dang ngag dang yid kyis nongs pa cung zad ci bgyis pa//sangs rgyas thams cad dpung du gsol te gus par bgyis nas so sor bshags//bdag kyang
368b1(mdo sde): phyin chad sdig la lta ba'i las rnams spyod par ma gyur cig/rtag tu mdun na bsam gyis mi khyab gang zag mchog bzhugs mthong bar shog/bdag gi bsod nams cung
368b2(mdo sde): zad ci mchis drang de byang chub bsngo bar bgyi//sems can ched du spyod pa kun dang sdug bsngal thams cad spro bar bgyi//sems can thams cad byang chub mchog gi lam du rab
368b3(mdo sde): tu gzung bar bgyi//bskul bar zhing dang ye shes sems can rgya mtsho rnam par spyad par bgyi//gang du byang chub reg par 'gyur zhing rnam par dag pa thob par bgyi//'khor
368b4(mdo sde): kun rnam par dag cing bzod pa'i sa la rab tu gnas par shog/smra ba'i seng ge nges par mngon par shes pa lnga rnams thob par shog/'dren pa chags med ye shes ldan zhing thams
368b5(mdo sde): cad gzigs pa lung bstan gsol//'jig rten du yang sangs rgyas chos kun kha lo bskur bar 'gyur zhe na//me tog sil ma gtor ba nam mkha' la ni gdugs su gnas par
368b6(mdo sde): shog/lha dung klu dang gnod sbyin mi rnams lhag pa kun kyang dbang gyis shig/sa rnams g.yo bar byed cing khyod kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal shog/de nas drang srong skur ma
368b7(mdo sde): la dga' bas me tog de dag bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de'i steng logs su gtor ba dang /me tog de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug gi steng du gdugs gcig
369a1(mdo sde): tu gyur nas 'dug ste/drang srong skar ma la dga' bas ngo mthong nas rab tu zang zing med cing mchog tu dga' ba dang /yid bde bas tshim par byed par
369a2(mdo sde): gyur te/de nas pus mo'i lha nga gnyis sa la btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la btugs so//drang srong chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan
369a3(mdo sde): 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so//sems
369a4(mdo sde): can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpag tu med pa gang drag der lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang yid mi skyo zhing bltad mor gyur to//gang dag glang po ches 'dul
369a5(mdo sde): ba'i sems can de dag gis ni bde bar gshegs pa glang po che'i gzugs su mthong nas yid dga' bar gyur cing drang srong chen pos me tog gtor ba de dag steng gi bar
369a6(mdo sde): snang la gdugs su gyur te gnas pa dang sa g.yos pa de'ang mthong nas rab tu ngo mtshar du gyur te/bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs so//gang dag
369a7(mdo sde): yang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis ni bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur to//de nas bcom ldan
369b1(mdo sde): 'das dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs pa dang /sangs rgyas kyis 'dul bya'i sems can de dag gis ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs par mthong nas zang zing med
369b2(mdo sde): cing mchog tu dga' ba dang /mgu ba skyes te/bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /na bza' dang /phyung 'phrul dang /rgyan ji snyed
369b3(mdo sde): pa dgra gis gtor to//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to//drang srong chen po myur du longs lnga nyon//byang chub lung bstan
369b4(mdo sde): zhes ni 'dren pa gsung //mnyam pa med pa'i mthus ni sa g.yos shing //nam mkha' la yang me tog gdugs gcig 'dug/khyod ni 'jig rten phon phyir ston dbang
369b5(mdo sde): po//rkang gnyis bdag gi gtso bo sangs rgyas su//bsod nams mtha' yas nam mkha' tshang mnyam pa//khyams gsum snying po 'gro ba'i sgron mar 'gyur//de nas
369b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga' bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//gang du bdag chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i
369b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ci 'dra bar 'gyur/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/khyod ni bskal pa grangs med dpag tu med pa na/byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing
370a1(mdo sde): me tog rgyas pa'i dri zhes bya ba 'byung ste/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni ji ltar da ltar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can bzhin du bkod pa de lta bu dang ldan
370a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bu dam pa khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/de bzhin gshegs pa
370a3(mdo sde): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /zhabs su ldan pa/bde bar gshegs pa/'jig rten mkhyen pa/skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bsgyur
370a4(mdo sde): ba/bla na med pa/lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdul med spos sdang skar ma'i dpal zhes bya bar 'gyur te/khyod kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal
370a5(mdo sde): pa bcu thub par 'gyur ro//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gi gnas su 'gyur//
370a6(mdo sde): te/khyod kyang de na theg pa chen po'i gtam 'ba' zhig ston par 'gyur ro//'khor ji snyed lhags pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dga'
370a7(mdo sde): ba'i lung bstan pa de thos nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i las la mngon par brtson par gyur to//bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya pa de dag dang /srog chags bye ba
370b1(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te/de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
370b2(mdo sde): byang chub kyi sems dpa' zhes bya ba thob po//'dus pa chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/drang srong skor ma la dga' ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o////bam po lnga pa/

371b6(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis me tog dang /phye ma'i bar de dag phyogs bcu'i phyogs kyi che re re na'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag

372a1(mdo sde): dag tu me tog dang /phye ma dang /rgyan de dag las tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo //myur du sad par gyis la 'di dag bltos//byang chub phyir ni bgra yod

372b1(mdo sde): bltas pa dang /bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i sgo na 'dul ba la gzhos shing bzhugs pa mthong ngo //de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

372b3(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra gang byung ba de dag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang /yongs su ma dag pa dang /stong pa dang /mi stong pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing

372b5(mdo sde): de thos nas 'di snyam du sems te/yid du 'ong ba 'di lta bu/ro myong bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/dga' bar bya bar 'os pa 'di lta bu/tshim par byed par 'os pa 'di lta bu/spro bar
372b6(mdo sde): byed pa 'di lta bu'i yon tan chen po brjod par 'os pa 'di lta bu'i sgra 'di dag dang /me tog dang /phye m+bu'i char 'di dag ga las 'ongs snyam mo//de nas byang chub sems dpa'

373a1(mdo sde): thub pa sangs rgyas kyi rgyun dang lhab lhub kyi rgyu mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs s+ho//bcom ldan 'das kyi rgyan dang ltab ltung
373a2(mdo sde): mthun pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dri dang /phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas
