376a5(mdo sde): 'ong ba yang //ngas ni su la'ong bzlog pa med//gul te lam ni rab shes na//gang du dga' bor 'gro bar byos//bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
376a6(mdo sde): rang gi spyod yul gar dga' bar//gang tshe bdag ni mchi 'tshal te//bdag ni bcing bA lnga dag gis//btsongs par mthong ngo gau tA ma//bcom ldan 'das kyis
376a7(mdo sde): bka' stsol pa//nga ni rtog pa kun spangs te//grol nas 'gro ba grol byed pa//ngas ni 'tshe ba rnam spangs nas//sems can bcings pa thar bar bya//de nas
376b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams ca sa dang nam mkha' la gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba la gzig sa nas tshogs su/
376b2(mdo sde): bcad pa 'dri dag bka' stsal to//'dir lhags pa dag thams cad kyang //the tshom thams cad rab spongs la//skad cig ci yang ma smra bar//khyod cag rnams nI da nyon cig/
376b3(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dkon//chos dang dge 'dun shin tu dkon//dad cing mos pa 'byor pa dang //byang chub spyod pa shin tu dkon//'jig rten mgon
376b4(mdo sde): po'i mngon sum du//chos nyan pa yang shin tu dkon//gang du bzod pa bsten byed pa//de yi dus ni rnyed par dka'o//gang du 'jig rten sdig pa yi//rtog pa thams
376b5(mdo sde): cad rab spong ba//stong pa nyid ni bsgom pa dang //sems ni dul bar byed pa dkon//ji ltar ngas ni sngon sprad pa'i//byang chub spyod pa rnyed par dka'//de las me tog
376b6(mdo sde): tsham chod 'di//khyed cag rnams la bshad par bya//gang gis byang chub 'byor byed pa//srid pa'i bcings la rab grol zhing //mun pa'i phung po sel po yi//lam gyi mchog ni bstan
376b7(mdo sde): par bya//dri ma ngan pa gsum spongs la//ston pas gsungs po 'dir nyon cig/chu bo rnams kyi pha rol rgol//rgya mo can gyi sred pa spongs//rnam thar gsum la rab gnas shing //
377a1(mdo sde): sdom pa gsum la yang dag gnas//khams gsum kun gyi nyon mongs gang //de dag ma lus rnam par chom//dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mchog/
377a2(mdo sde): dang //chos kyi don du khyed cag rnams//sangs rgyas lha dang bdud gsum gyi//byin rlabs sprul pas lhags pa rnams//dus gsum ma rig bsgribs pa'i sems//skye
377a3(mdo sde): phrag tu ni rab tu spongs//khams gsum pa las grol pa yi//zhi byed bzod pa thob par byas//phyin ci lag ni rnam bzhi yis//so so'i skye bo bsrad pa rnams//dngos po
377a4(mdo sde): med la rtog byed pa//de dgra bzod pa'i snod ma yin//mig ni gzugs la chags pa yis//lus dang ngag dang sems bsgribs nas//bsam gtan bzhi dang bral ba
377a5(mdo sde): rnams//'khor ba shin tu bstan par 'gyur//'jig rten na ni gang mkhas gsal//bsam gtan skom pa byed pa rnams//de dag phyin ci log bzhi las//di ring
377a6(mdo sde): rnam par grol bar 'gyur//dbang phyug de dag sems can rnams//chu bo bzhi las thar bar byed//'chi 'pho skye ba rab shes pa//nges pa rnams ni pha rol 'gro//
377a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa//rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa dag/sems can sred pas bcings pa rnams//yang dag shes pas gcod par byed//phung po lnga
377b1(mdo sde): rnams yongs shes pas//zhags pa las grol zag pa med//yang dang yang du mi skye ste//sred pa'i rgya mtsho'i pha rol phyin//sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar khyed//sdig/
377b2(mdo sde): pa dag ni myur du shogs//sdig pa ma lus rab spongs la//'jigs pa med par pha rol song //srid par yang dang yang skyes pas//sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang song bas//
377b3(mdo sde): 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal de dag ni//'dus byas la yang myong bar 'gyur//sdig pa'i grogs po rab spongs te//sdig po'i lta ba rnams bor nas//'khor ba'i sdug bsngal
377b4(mdo sde): dran byas te//dam pa'i chos la rab sbyor cing //btung ba'i dam pa 'thung bar byas//stong pa nyid kyang rab bsgoms shig/dam pa'i don la dngos po med//rdzas kyang med
377b5(mdo sde): cing mtshan nyid med//'di ltar dbang po drug stong ste//byed pa po ni 'di la med//de bzhin mtshan mar rtog pa yang //dngos po tsam ste g.yo ba med//tshor ba dag dang /
377b6(mdo sde): sred pa drug/reg pa drug las byung ba yin//de bzhin rig pa'i skye mched drug/stong pa yin par shes par byos//rang bzhin gyis ni dngos med par//dngos po nyid
377b7(mdo sde): la brtag par byos//skye ba med cing 'gag med pas//'di na rdzas kyang med par bltos//gang gis chos kun tshul gcig ste//dus gsum du yang dngos med
378a1(mdo sde): par//shes pa de dag nud med do//de ni bla na med pa'i lum//rnam pa bcu gsum nges grol la//sems can 'du shes rnam 'jig cing //tshu rol
378a2(mdo sde): pha rol rnam grol ba//de ni bzod pa bsgom pa yin//dri nas gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod nams kyi stobs rnams dang /mi 'jigs pa'i shugs dang /
378a3(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgra thogs pa med pas tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsungs pa de'i mod la phyogs bcu'i 'jig
378a4(mdo sde): rten gyi khams stong pa dang /mi stong pa'i snyigs ma ldats+tshana? gaut+sASh+Ta krung dpag tu med pa mi 'khrugs pa'i bye ma snyed rnams su dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa 'dri
378a5(mdo sde): dag grags par gyur nas/de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi zhing re re nas kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med dpog tu med pa drag ni shin tu zang zing med pa'i
378a6(mdo sde): dga' ba dang /dad pa rnyed de/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to//la la dag gis ni ting nge 'dzin dang /bzod pa
378a7(mdo sde): dang /gzungs sna tshogs thob bo//sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus par sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams kyis ni don dang /tshig dang /yi ge 'di dag
378b1(mdo sde): thos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob par gyur to//sems can grangasnga med dpag tu med pa drag ni theg pa gsum po drag gis nges par 'byung ba thob par gyur to//de nas byang
378b2(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skar ma la dka' bas pad+ma'i khri la 'dzeg par bya ba'i phyir rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus rin po che sna bdun gyi them skas me tog gis kun tu
378b3(mdo sde): g.yogs pa mngon par sprul te/bcom ldan 'das ga la bla de logs su thal mo sbyor ba btud nus 'dri skad ces gsol to//thams cad mkhyen pa rga shi mya ngan gyi//'dam
378b4(mdo sde): du bying ba'i 'jig rten thams cad la//rab tu gzigs te mi rma rgyur bcas te//'jig rten du ni chos kyi zam pa thogs//thal mo sbyar ba'i sems can rgya chen brgyas//
378b5(mdo sde): rab tu bltam pa'i zhing la gzigs nas su//chos kyi mchod sbyin rab tu bgo bAr gsol//rang gi mthu rtsal rab tu bstan du gsol//mtshungs pa med pa'i pad+ma mngon
378b6(mdo sde): 'dzegs te//mgon po shes rab dang ni thabs rnams kyis//chos chu sprin gyis char pa rab phob lnga//nyon mongs gzir ba'i mi la bstan du gsol//phyogs bcu
378b7(mdo sde): dag gi sangs rgyas thams cad dang //drang srong chen po shes rab ldan pa gzhan//khyod kyi dbang du de dag kun+d+ra bzhugs kyis//thub pa'i dbang po bdud rnams pham par
379a1(mdo sde): mdzod//chos rnams stong pa nam mkha' lta bu dang //ngo bo nyid kyis ya ma brlar mkhyen nus//sngon gyi dam bcas rnams ni dgongs mdzod la/
379a2(mdo sde): bla med 'khor lo dam pa bskor du gsol//chu bo bzhi dbus 'khor ba'i sems can rnams//mi yi seng ge de ring bsgral du gsol//khyod kyis chos rnams shin tu
379a3(mdo sde): thugs su chud//srid gsum mtsho las 'jig rten bsgral du gsol//shin tu rlabs chen thugs mnga' bcom ldan 'das//bde bar gshegs kyi lam ni bde ba la//
379a4(mdo sde): 'gro ba gzud 'dod mtshungs med chos kyang ston//'jig rten nyes pa dri ma bsal du gsol//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bur sprul pa'i them skas de las
379a5(mdo sde): pad+ma'i khri la mngon par 'dzegs te/pad+ma'i snying po la bzhugs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcu thams cad du rnam par gzigs nas bdud sdig can la
379a6(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/bdud sdig can ji ltar khyod kyi rkyen gyis deng 'dir 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad pas sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dge mngal nu
379a7(mdo sde): gnas pa dang /rga shis gtses pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/rnam par thar bar 'gyur ro//chu bo bzhi las yang dag par brgal bar 'gyur//zhi
379b1(mdo sde): ra'i lam la gnas par 'gyur/nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i ye shes khong du chud par 'gyur te/'di la sdig can khyod ni sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par
379b2(mdo sde): 'phel ba'i thog mar 'gro ba yin gyis khyod dga' bar gyis shig/sdig can khyod kyis du lu chos bshad par gsol cig dang ngas dang bdud kyi dkyil 'khor mthon po'i
379b3(mdo sde): yul gyi chu bo'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to//de nas bdud sdig can gyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'dri smras so//ci ste sdig med khyod la tha ba zhe sdang rgyags
379b4(mdo sde): med na//ci phyir deng 'drir kun du skrag par bya phyir chos kyang ston//de ste khyod la tha ba rgyags dang nga rgyal yod na ni//thub dbang khyod kyi thar po ci 'dra bdag la 'di shod
379b5(mdo sde): cig/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//da ni sa la mngal gyi gnas na zla ba bcur gnas pa//de na yang ni bdud khyod nga la bsad par rab tu sbyar//de tshe nga la kho na dang
379b6(mdo sde): tha ba cung zad tsam yang med//nga ni bzod dang ldan te tha ba ma lus med pa yin//nga ni btsas ma thag 'dir khyod kyis sra yang g.yo bar byas//nga bsod phyir ni rdo ba'i char pa
379b7(mdo sde): rab tu dbab par byas//de nas khyod kyis nga yi ma yi nu zho myur skams byas//khyod kyis nga la gnod pa rnam pa du ma ci ma byas//nga ni bsam gtan zhugs na khyod kyis bud
380a1(mdo sde): medra khrid de 'ongs//nga ni bsod snyoms rnam par spyod che zas kyang bcad par byas//khyod kyis rtag tu la rgyul skyed mngon par rab tu bstabs//da ni//
380a2(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i nub mo 'dir yang mun pa byas par gyur//de tshe khyod dang skyes bu rnams kyis grong khyor kun tu bskor//rdzu 'phrul gyis ni song tshe rdzi char drag par rab tu phab/sa
380a3(mdo sde): ni mdom do 'phang tsam rdo bdag gso gang bar byas//zhi bo'i gnas na gnas pa'i tshe yang sgra ni rab tu phyung //nga ni shin tu dka' ba spyod tshe gleng ba'i rlung dang ni//'brab chu
380a4(mdo sde): 'gram na gnas tshe khyod kyis chu bo rab tu btang //nga ni bsad par bya phyir khyod kyis seng ge rab tu btang //de tshe khyod kyis nga yi zas lo drag po'i dug kyang btab//nga ni byung
380a5(mdo sde): chub shing drang nye bar yang drag song ba ni//rdo rje dang ni gnam lcags skra gri mnga' char khyod kyis phab/'gro la phan phyir rdo rje'i gdan la mngon par gnas pa na//khyod
380a6(mdo sde): kyis ngur smrig gos kyang 'adz+ri mA rdzab dag gis rab tu bskus//de na yang ni ngag na khyod kyis bu mo rnams bkye ste//nga bsad phyir ni khyod nyid mthu dang bcas te 'ongs me
380a7(mdo sde): kyi//'on kyang khyod kyis nga yi yid la gnod byas cung zad med//ngas ni khyod btul nas su byang chub mtshungs pa med pa thob//'on kyang ngo tsha bor ste 'dir 'ongs nas ni
380b1(mdo sde): yang smrab ma//sdig pa'i tshul gyis 'od srung mchog la sogs pa bzlog byas te//khyod kyis sems can bye ba du ma ma rung byas nas kyang //snying rje bor te 'dir yang du la brgal
380b2(mdo sde): zhing skye byed dum//nga yis zas ma zos pa de yi tshe yang khyod kyis su//nga bsad phyir ni glang chen myos pa drag shul can yang btang //sa steng nga lnga ltos sbyin gyis ni rdo ba 'phangs
380b3(mdo sde): pa dang //kye mangs ni zla ba gsum du rta chas zos pa dang //phyar kaM btang phyir bu mo mdzes ldan rab tu gang btAng dang //me mngagra 'bar ba mi bzad pos ni 'bras rnams
380b4(mdo sde): bkang ba dang //kha zas dag ni myur du gdug pa'i drug dang sbyar ba yi//de la sdig pa'i las cen khyod ni rtsa b.rA nges pa yin/khyod nyid dpung bcas bu dang lhan cig sngar
380b5(mdo sde): bcas 'ongs nas su//nga bslang phyir ni mda' bo che drang ral gri mda' mang thogs//'on kyang 'drir ni khyod kyis nga yi spu gcig ma g.yos na//ci phyir khyod ni rgyags
380b6(mdo sde): par gyur nas da dung 'dug/ji snyed bdud ni stong phrag bya ba rgol du yang btsud kyang //sems can bye ba khrag khrig dag ni 'dir yang lhags nas su//zhing kun rab tu glang
380b7(mdo sde): bar 'dug pa nga yi dbang yin te//nga ni khyod phyir mchog tu byams pa'i yid kyis gnas par bya//nga ni snying rje'i gnas te 'gro ba rjes su 'dzin byed pa//byed ni shin
381a1(mdo sde): rtagatum pa yortag tu dgags byed do//thub pa'i dbang po rgyum chog 'di dag pa ya mang ldan //da ltar rnam rnaM dus nas sanas mdzad pa smra/2
381a2(mdo sde): thar sems kyis sems can rnams kyi don yang spyad por bya//smyos par gyur kyang bzod pa yongs su btang bar mi bya'o//nga la phrag dog tha pa rab tu khro bI'i yid med do/
381a3(mdo sde): khyed ni rjes su bzung phyir grwa nyid rtag tu mngon par bcas//nga la gsol dang khyod yid ni phyir 'jig rten gsum dag tu/mchog tu zhi bar byed pa'i chos kyi bdud rtsi bshad par
381a4(mdo sde): bya//de phyir khyod kyi sdig pa'i las rnams med par rab 'gyur gyi//'jig rten mgon myong la yid ni myur du dad par byos//khyod ni rtag tu 'di na gnod pa bya bar rab sems kyang //
381a5(mdo sde): khyed dgrol phyir ni nga snying rtag tu byams par rab tu dang //sdig pa'i blo gros por lA dad bcas yid la byos shig dang //ring por mi thogs khyod ni byang chub tu yang lung
381a6(mdo sde): bstan to//de nas bdud sdig tsan+do bcom ldan 'das la rab tu 'khros te 'khrugs shing dzam nas de nas slor 'gro bar 'dod pa dang /bdag gi mgul po bcing ba lngas
381a7(mdo sde): bcings pa snyam du shes te/'jigs skrag pa'i sgra lta byung bar 'dod kyang de ma nus nas/bcom ldan 'das bgrongs pa 'i phyir rang 'khros pa'i mthus shin tu che ba'i/
381b1(mdo sde): dbugs btang ba dang /bcom ldan 'das kyis dbugs de shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i me tog tu mngon par sprul to//phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na sangs rgyas
381b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes te chos kyang ston pa de thams cad kyi dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi bar snang la shin tu yid du 'ong ba'i gdugs su phyin
381b3(mdo sde): gyis brlabs so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo gang dag 'khod pa dro dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la gsol pa/
381b4(mdo sde): me tog gi gdugs 'di dag ga la mchis/su'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul lags/bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
381b5(mdo sde): to//rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya/
381b6(mdo sde): ba de rab tu nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sngon gyi smon lam gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
381b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas nas chos ston te/de bzhin gshegs pa de da ltar bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa/stobs dang /mi 'jigs pa dang /sangs
382a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi yul thams cad mthon por byed pa/sangs rgyas kyi bstan pA'i rgyud thams cad dang /dkon mchog glasum gyi sgron ma yun ring du gnas
382a2(mdo sde): par byed pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam par 'phel ba'i brtson 'grus kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi stobs byed pa/dgra dang phras kyis rgol ba thams cad shin tu tshar
382a3(mdo sde): gcod par byed pa/ngo mtshar dang /bkra myi shis pa dang /rtsod pa dang /rmi lam ngan po dang /lta sa ngan pa dang /mu ge dang /'jigs pa'i tshogs dang /'thab pa dang
382a4(mdo sde): 'gyed pa dang /'ching ba dang /'thab mo dang /rtsod pa dang /char mi 'bab pa dang /dus ma yin par grang zhing tsha ba dang /rlung dang /tshwa ba dang /nad dang /sgra mi

382a6(mdo sde): byed cing 'gugs pa/rigs bzhi thams cad chos kyi don la 'dzud pa/shes rab kyi sgron ma rab tu 'byar bar byed pa/la mo drang por rab tu ston pa khyim dang /grong
382a7(mdo sde): dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /yul dang /pho brang 'khor dang /yul 'khor thams cad 'dun par byed pa/gza' dang /rgyu skar dang /
382b1(mdo sde): nyin par dang /mtshan mo dang /zla ba gcig dang /zla ba phyed dang /dus dang /lo thams cad mthun par myed pa/lo tog dang /me tog dang 'bras bu dang 'bru dang sman thams
382b2(mdo sde): cad grub par byed pa/bzo dang /lus kyi mtha' dang /gnas dang /byin gyis brlabs dang /dgos pa thams cad grub par byed pa/lus dang ngag dang /yid kyi nyes pa
382b3(mdo sde): thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/rig pa dang /dran pa dang /blo gros dang /mos pa dang /dpa' ba dang /brtan pa dang /bzod pa dang /spobs pa rnam par 'phel
382b4(mdo sde): bar byed pa/chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i snang bas rab tu sad par byed pa/'phags pa'i rigs bzhis chos kyi tshul byin gyis rlob pa/theg pa chen po ston par
382b5(mdo sde): byed po/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phel bur byed pa/sems can tshon po rnams dbugs 'byin pa/phyir mi ldog pa'i so la rdo rje lta bu'i sems byin gyis rlob pa/
382b6(mdo sde): sa bcu la yang dag par 'jug par byed pa/mi skye bo'i chos la bzod pa khong du chud par byed pa/dbang bskor ba'i chos dang /byang chub la gzhol bar byed pa/gdul
382b7(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams rjes su 'dzin pa/chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos khyab par byed pa/pha rol tu phyin pa la 'dzud pa//
383a1(mdo sde): bla na mod pa'i lam la yang dag par 'jog par byed pa/chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/chos kyi ros sems can+da rnams tshim par byed pa/spangs/
383a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/bdud bzhi'i yul yas rab tu zer bar byed pa/phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
383a3(mdo sde): su 'jog par byed pa/chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lnga bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms phra zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan
383a4(mdo sde): pa'achad par bzhed do//'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten
383a5(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /tshig rab tu dbyi ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa gsungs so//byin gyis brlabs so//gcig la
383a6(mdo sde): gcig dgyes so//da ltar phyogs bcun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
383a7(mdo sde): thams cad kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa ltos bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang chag rab tu dbye bo la 'jug pa lung bstan pa
383b1(mdo sde): gsung ngo //byin gyis rlob bo//gcig la gcig dgyes par mdzad do//ma 'ongs pa'i dus na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag tu de bzhin
383b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung ba de dag kyang chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu'i chos kyi snying pos lus yongs su 'joms pa zhes
383b3(mdo sde): bya ba'i gzungs dang phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug po lung bstan pa gsung bar 'gyur ro//byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro//gcig la gcig dgyes par mdzad
383b4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro//de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yod pa de dag so so'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la yongs su
383b5(mdo sde): zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis sngon ma bris pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig
383b6(mdo sde): rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstun pa/gang 'di ltar yon tan mang po bgyid pa/'di ltar yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/chos thams cad la sleb pa ma
383b7(mdo sde): mchis po'i snang ba bgyid pa nas zhi ba'i bar du bgyid pa de gang logs/chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag

384a3(mdo sde): thugs brtse ba dang /skye bo phal po che dang /lha dang /mi rnams kyi don dang /sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/de nas sangs rgyas bcom

384b2(mdo sde): par bya ba dang /bla na med pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya

391a1(mdo sde): dam pa'i gzungs ba shad du gsol/glang 'dir thos ma thag tu sems can byo khrug ldog brgya skyong dpag tu med pa dag la dkon mchog gsum mngon
391a2(mdo sde): sum du gyur cig/mas sbyi na rnams pa ni rkyen du dge ba'i bshes rgyu nu skyed cing 'a por bgyid par /sems can+da glengs med dpag tu med pa dag blun
391a3(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /lung bstan pa thob par gyur cig/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
391a4(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyis kyang chos bstan pa'i phyir cang mi gsung bar gyur pas ga nang nas pad+ma'i snying po de dag la bzhugs so//ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du
391a5(mdo sde): gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /de/de'i rtsu bA thams cad byisogs de'i phyir dran pa dang /dad pa dang /dang ba dang /
391a6(mdo sde): mos pa rnyed par 'gyur ba dang /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang sems las
391a7(mdo sde): byung ba rnams la 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug dang /lta ba ngan pa dang /nga rgyal dang /rgyags pa dang /dregs pa dang /'jig tshogs la blta ba dang /
391b1(mdo sde): the tshom dang /nye bar len pa dang /srid pa'i sred pa kun gzhi'i ltos pa dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /sems can so so nas 'di snyam du bdag gcig pu de bzhin gshegs pa'i
391b2(mdo sde): spyan sngar chos nyan pa'i phyir 'dug gi 'di na gzhan su'ang med do//bdag gcig bu la de bzhin gshegs pA'i thugs thams cad kyis dgongs te nad thams cad rab tu zhi
391b3(mdo sde): bor bya ba'i phyir chos ston par bzhed do//'di na gzhan sus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la chos mnyan pa'i phyir gsol ba ma btab bo snyam du shes par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i
391b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi smon lam mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so//yang de'i tshe gar sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir gtogs pa'i
391b5(mdo sde): sems can rnams dbang po thams cad bstan te thal mo sbyar nas de dag gis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag
391b6(mdo sde): cag la chos bshad du gsol/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyis bdag cag la chos bshad du gsol/bdag cag gis sangs rgyas
391b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nan tan gyis bsdu bar bgyi'o//de nas yang de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan rnams
392a1(mdo sde): la mchod pa'i phyir spos bkod pa las shin tu lhag pa'i spos gong du mchog tu khyad par du gyur pa rgya chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad
392a2(mdo sde): khyab par byin gyis brlabs so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lhag ma rnams mchod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams
392a3(mdo sde): cad kyi lhag pa rin po che dang /me tog dang /phreng ba dang /spos dang /byugs pa sna tshogs dang /gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba dan dang /rgyan dang /lhab
392a4(mdo sde): lhub sna tshogs dag gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so//da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
392a5(mdo sde): khyams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas badrag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du dri ba'i phyir byon pa rnams dgongs su gsol/bdag sngon gyi smon lam gyis 'di 'dra bar rab tu nyon
392a6(mdo sde): mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten du bla na med pa yang dgra bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/sems can bsam pa nyams
392a7(mdo sde): pa/lam rab tu stor ba/ma rig pa'i mun pa dang rab rib kyi ling tog gis nyon mongs pa'i mun par bcug pa/ngan song gsum du bzhugs pa/mi dge ba dang
392b1(mdo sde): 'grogs pa/dge ba thams cad dang bral ba/mkhas pa thams cad kyis yongs su spangs pa/mtshams med pa byed pa dang /dam pa'i chos spong ba/'phags pa la skur pa
392b2(mdo sde): 'debs pa/snying rje med pa'i bsam pa can gyi sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i slad du snying brtse ba dang /brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyi brtson pa chen pos grang ba dang /dro ba dang //
392b3(mdo sde): rlung dang /tsha ba dang /ngal ba dang /chad pa dang du blang bar bgyi'o//grong dang /grong khyer dang grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /yul dang /yul 'khor du rkang gis 'gro
392b4(mdo sde): bar bya'o//sems can la phan par bgyi ba'i slad du rtsub pa dang /nyung ba dang /ro med pa shin tu smad pa/mi mthun pa'i zas bza' bar bgyi'o//de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba
392b5(mdo sde): bskyed pa'i slad du sbom pa rtsub pa/reg na mi bde ba/sha na dang /shing bal dang /gso ma'i ras dang /phyag dar khrod kyi gos bgo bar bgyi'o//ri dang /ri sul dang /nags stug po
392b6(mdo sde): dang /grong stong dang /dur khrod du gnas par bgyi ba nas rtsa'i mal cha dang /gso ma dang /shing gi 'dab ma dang /rtsub pa/dri mi zhim pa/reg na mi bde ba'i mal cha spyad par bgyi'o//
392b7(mdo sde): bdag gi thabs mkhas pa dang /snying rje chen po dang /brtson 'grus kyi go cha bgos nas sems can rnams la gtam rnam pa sna tshogs bgyi ste/rgyal rigs rnams la ni/rgyal
393a1(mdo sde): srid dang dbang phyug gi gtam bgyi'o//bram ze rnams la ni rig byed dang /rA ma'i gautatAm dang /blon po rnams la ni yul dang las kyi mtha'i gtam
393a2(mdo sde): dang /sman pa rnams la ni khams dang /sman dang /bsgrub pa'i gtam dang /tshong pa rnams la ni nyo tshang gi gtam+bu dang /dmangs rnams la ni las kyi mtha' la mngon
393a3(mdo sde): par zhen pa'i gtam dang /bud med rnams la ni kha dog dang /rgyan dang /bu dang /phyug pa dang /'gran zla med pa'i gtam dang /dge sbyong rnams la bzod pa dang /des
393a4(mdo sde): pa dang /les gsum la brtson pa'i gtam bgyi'o//sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i skyed du ma thob pa thob par bgyi ba dang /mngon du ma bgyis pa mngon
393a5(mdo sde): du bgyi bar gzud do//mthar pa rnams rab tu thar bar bgyi ba'i slad du sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs lnga spro bar bgyi'o//sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i
393a6(mdo sde): slad du yul thams cad du rgyu bar bgyi'o//de lta mod kyi sems can 'di dag ni de ni bdag la ga sh+ye'o//mi snyan pa zer ro//phrag dog gi chos kyi rgyus bdag la 'khrig
393a7(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyis med pa la skur pa 'debs so//kha gsag dang /tshul 'chos pa dang /sgyu dang g.yo dang /brdzun smra ba dang /zhe gcod pa dang /bud med kyi tshig dag
393b1(mdo sde): gis skur pa 'debs so//bdag lasu sa 'thor ro//bdag bsad pa'i phyir mtshon dang /dug dang /me dang /'khor lo dang /mda' bo che dang /mda' dang /ral gri dang //
393b2(mdo sde): mdung dang /dgra sta dang /rdo dang /mtshon cha'i char 'bebs so//bdagra bsad pa'i phyir glang po che dang /sbrul sdug pa dang /seng ge dang /stag dang /glang dang /ma hi dang /
393b3(mdo sde): spyang ki dang /pag rgod dang /tshan po che rnams kyang 'gyed do//bdag gi granas drang /gnas khang dang /gtsug lag khang yang mi gtsang ba dang /dri nga bas 'gangs so//
393b4(mdo sde): bodag gi nyan thos kyi grong khyer du bzhugs pa rnams la phan 'dogs pa ma yin pa'i sems can rnams kyis glu dang gar tshul ma yin pa byed du 'dzud do//thabs brgya stong
393b5(mdo sde): du mas bdag bsad pa'i phyir brtson no//bdag gi bstan pa nub par bya ba dang /chos kyi tshul gyi sgron ma bsad pa dang /chos kyi grub shig pa dang /chos kyi rgyal mtshan
393b6(mdo sde): bskal ba dang /bdag gi chos kyi mchod sbyin rnam par gtor ba'i phyir brtson no//nga sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
393b7(mdo sde): chos kyi tshul la gzigs te/ji ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir 'dus pa chen po
394a1(mdo sde): mdzad nas dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /bdud kyi stobs kyi yul thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi
394a2(mdo sde): rigs gnas pa rgyun mi chad par bgyi ba dang /sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /dgra dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang mthun pas tshar bcad
394a3(mdo sde): pA dang /sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang /brtsod pa dang /mu ge dang /nad dang /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /'ching ba dang /'gyed pa dang /rgol ba dang /dus ma
394a4(mdo sde): yin par grang ba dang /tsha ba dang /char pa dang /rlung dang /lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyis nyes pa dang /lta ba ngan pa yang ba rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba dang /lha dang /klu dang /
394a5(mdo sde): gnod sbyin dang /lha ma yin dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad 'dun par bgyi'o//khyim dang /grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /yul 'khor thams cad
394a6(mdo sde): bsrung po dang /g.yo dang /dug dang /byad dang /rmongs byed dang /rmi lam ngan pa dang /braltos ngan pa thams cad gzhil ba dang /'bru dang /sman+da dang /me tog dang
394a7(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang /bcud thams cad kyis sems can nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba dang /rgyal rigs dang /bram ze dang /dmangs rigs dang /rje'u rigs rnams dge ba
394b1(mdo sde): spyod pa la gzud pa dang /byang chub kyi sems rab tu bskyed pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gzud pa dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams thabs shes///
394b2(mdo sde): po la mkhas pa dang /dran pa dang /blo gros dang /rtog pa dang /mos pa dang /dpa' ba dang /brten pa dang /spobs pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang /dbang bskur
394b3(mdo sde): ba'i sar dbugs dbyung za la 'dzud cing ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de
394b4(mdo sde): drag gis chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu la brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos
394b5(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad cing byin gyis brlabs te/gcig la gcig dgyes pa de 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar phyogs bcu na bzhugs shing 'tsho la
394b6(mdo sde): bzhes pa dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing skyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'dir dri ba'i phyir gshegs te bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsrung ba'i slad du chos mnyam
394b7(mdo sde): pa nyid rdo rje lta bu bstan pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam
395a1(mdo sde): pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas pa bgyi ba dang /bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang /ji ltar gong ngo rgyas par brjod pa
395a2(mdo sde): bzhin du sgrib pa med pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag gis gsol ba btab pa la thugs brtse bar mdzad de/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir dam pa'i
395a3(mdo sde): chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas shing phras kyis rgol ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa dang /mi 'jigs pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs
395a4(mdo sde): rgyun mi chad pa dang /chos kyi bcud kyis sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho bar bgyi ba'i slad du legs par bshad du gsol/byin gyi sra brlab du gsol/bshad
395a5(mdo sde): nas kyang phan tshun rjes su dgyes par mdzad du gsol/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis 'di skad ces gsungs so//de bzhin du bdag cag gis sangs
395a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa legs kyang bgyi ste/chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang /bdud kyi yul gyi stobs thams cad rab tu gzhom
395a7(mdo sde): pa nas sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu 'gro bar bgyi ba'i bar gyi slad du byin gyis brlab cing chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus
395b1(mdo sde): 'jams pa zhes bya'i gzungs phyag rgyu dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad kyis gang sA dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gtog su nga'i sa
395b2(mdo sde): can thams cad nyon cig/'di lta ste/aM ku ra/oM kA ra/b+h+r-i ka ra/pra b+h+r-i ka ra/b+hA ya mi he/mi tra ma b+ha se/A khA u khA I pra rI/dr-i ma do mad te/ke ba Te/ka yu
395b3(mdo sde): sa ma pra hA ne/su mAn ta b+ha dwe/d+harmaM d+hirme d+hArma ke/dzaM pha le/mi tra a nu pa laM/pa la b+hi te/gaNe gaNe pa ran+na te/hi li hi li/hi lI hi lI ke/dzam b+ha ba te/Ta ka Te/Ta kra ba rAn
395b4(mdo sde): te/hI rIn te/shi rin te/bin du ba two/go b+hA te/dzA ra mi tra/dzu re dzu shaM/a gre a ba me/sa s+ya ta b+hU tAn/hu lu hi la tsan tra/sa ma d+hi/me d+harma/ku tsu ru/mu tsu rI/a tsing
395b5(mdo sde): tsi lI tsi li li/tsa ba ha/tsu lu nu l+yaM/mi tA ba ha/ku lu ku lu/sa ra sa ra/ku Tu ku T+Ta/ma hA sa rA sa ra/tu Tu tu Tu/ma hA sad+ya hri dA ya/puSh+pe su pradz+dzi/d+hu ma bai ri ha re/a b+h+ya
395b6(mdo sde): ru tsi ne kA rak+She/a ya maso+o/ba~M ba ha ti te la/ma m+b+ha ye/pa shwa la shi shrI rI shi shi ra/lo ka bi nA ya ka badz+ra badz+re d+hA re badz+re ba te/badz+re ma te/brjid de/tsakra bad+d+he/tsa kren prat+ta

396a1(mdo sde): khi shwa ra la ya nI rAShA nI dzA ni d+ha ba ba tsaM/tsaN Da la sa me/sUrba sa s+ya a d+hISh+ThA na/a tsan d+han tu mad+hA nA/ni ni pA la rIta/atsa gre/pri tsi ne/ba na ra hA/

396a4(mdo sde): a tsa le shro d+ha ni/pra kri ni mar+the/i li i li la pra b+he se ra pra te sarba tra thA tA/sat+ya a nu ga te/a ra pa ra Na pra te a la tha aM gu re sha mi ni mi bri h+ma ba yo ha/a ha ti/
396a5(mdo sde): a b+ha hi/ni ba ra ya pra/a tsi ra marga/la na la rgu sa re/tri ra na na bang shre/tarma kA ya/dza lats+tsha na tre//sa mA dra ba ti mahA da b+hu ta bya ya/suM mu dr-i biM ga ba d+ha ra Ni/mu de Na/

396b1(mdo sde): tsing Sha Da ya tA nA ni shri tra th+yA ta/i na mi nes tsa ne/gro ShA sa tsa na/mu tretra/Ar+ya a d+hiSh+ThA na b+ha pa thA na/n+ya tha ma hA bu ma n+ye sa mAts+tsha ya/a ba tA rA mAh+ma kA ru Na ya/mu tri tA saH/
396b2(mdo sde): saM myag pra ti bad tsir d+ha dran dz+wa la tu d+harmA ne/tri sarbe mu ni b+hi Sha b+h+ya/ma hA kA ru Na/saM mA d+hi/dz+nyA na la b+hA ba laM/na me tr-i ta ga a b+hi bair+ya pa le na aM d+hiSh+Thi ta/sarbe b+ha ta a pa tsa yA
396b3(mdo sde): ya swA hA//de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du gtogs pa'i sems can thams cing 'di skad ces sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal
396b4(mdo sde): lo//phyag 'tshal lo//sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//zhes lan gsum smras nas 'di skad ces kyang smras so//kye ma'o thub pa 'dus pa nga mtsho ru che'o//
396b5(mdo sde): kye ma'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan thos chen po rnams 'dus pa ngo mtshar chu'o//kye mi'o chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi
396b6(mdo sde): snying poso lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs ston pa'i bstan pa thams cad kyi tshul gyi
396b7(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs kyi byin gyi brlabaso ston pa/bdud kyi yul gyi stobs rnam par 'joms pa/bdud kyi zhigs pa kun gcod pa/dgra thams dad tshar
397a1(mdo sde): gcod pa/chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/chos kyi phyogs bsrung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar rmang du byung ba sngon ma thos pa ste/sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha'
397a2(mdo sde): dag yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang /sems can thams cad kyis snying pa dang /phyag rgya dang /'byung ba chen pa thams cad dang /'du byed dang /skye mched drug
397a3(mdo sde): yongs su sbyang bar bya ba nas sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis
397a4(mdo sde): phyag rgya dang tshig rab tu dbye ba lnga 'jug pa lung bstan pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di po shad do//gzungs lung bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems
397a5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang+gA'i klung sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed dag gzungs mngon par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang bzod pa thob par gyur to//yang de'i tshe zla 'od
397a6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te kun tu rnam par bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs dang /rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyi mthus sangs
397a7(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir thams cad dbyangs kyis bkang ste 'di skad ces smras so//rgyal ba zla ba rnams kyi 'khor//'di 'dra ba ni rnyed par dka'//byang chub sems dpa'
397b1(mdo sde): brtul zhugs che//mkhas pa 'dir ni rnyed par dka'//gang 'di thugs rje ldan pa yi//mgon pos chos tshul byin brlabs pa//phyag rgya 'di 'dra thos pa yang //mchog tu rnyed
397b2(mdo sde): par dka' ba'o//bdud kyi phyogs rnams thams cad dang //dgra rnams kyang ni pham byed pa//dkon mchog gsum rgyun mi chad pa//rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs///
397b3(mdo sde): sgrib pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyir//bzod dang nges pa rab 'phel ba//sems can rnams kyang 'dun byed pa//rgyal po dang ni yul 'khor skyong //'di na ngan byas zlog
397b4(mdo sde): byed pa//lta ba ngan pa rab 'gog pa//byang chub sems dpa' dbugs 'byin pa//byang chub lam yang rab ston pa//pha rol phyin pa 'phel byed pa//bzang por spyod pa
397b5(mdo sde): rdzogs byed po//thabs dang ye shes spobs pa rnams//'phel bar bya phyir byin gyis brlabs//dkar po'i phyogs ni bsdud byed pa//gzungs 'di gzhan gyis mi thub pa//
397b6(mdo sde): byang chub lam las mi g.yo ba//chos kyi dbang rnams 'bar byed pa'i//gzungs la yid gnyis thams cad ni//bsalnga nas lhag par mos par byos//gang gis byang
397b7(mdo sde): chub 'grub 'gyur ba//'di ni rdzogs pa'i lam yin no//chos smra rnams ni bsrung ba dang //nyan pa mngon par 'phel bya'i phyir//gzhan gyis mi thob pa yi gzungs//
398a1(mdo sde): bdag gis de yang bshad par bya//sgrib pa med pa 'grub pa dang //sems can rnams kyi phan 'phrul phyir//byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po//su
398a2(mdo sde): dag 'di la dad pa 'bul//yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nur gyur pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so//
398a3(mdo sde): bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul byin gyis rlob bo//rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am/dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma gang
398a4(mdo sde): la la zhig gis khrus byas te/gos gtsang mo bgos la me tog sna tshogs bkram pa/spos sna tshogs kyis rab tu bdugs pa/ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba
398a5(mdo sde): ras dang rgyan dang ras bcos bu sna tshogs bting ba/gdugs dang /rgyal mtshan dang /ba da ni bsgreng bas shin tu brgyan pa'i 'khor gyi khyims su seng ge'i khri rog na 'jam
398a6(mdo sde): pa la 'dug ste gzungs 'di yang dag par bshang na su'ang de'i sems 'khrug pa'am/khams 'khrug pa'am/lus 'khrug pa'am/yid 'khrug par mi byed do//de'i lus
398a7(mdo sde): la su'ang dbugs mi gtong ngo //klad pa na bar byed mi nus so//mig na ba dang /rna nga na ba dang /snun pa dang /rtsen pa dang /so na ba dang /rus pa na ba dang /mgul pa na ba dang /
398b1(mdo sde): dpung pa na ba dang /rgyub na ba dang /rgyu mu na ba dang /lto na ba dang /chu so na ba dang /brlan pa dang /byin pa na bar phyed sus kyang mi nus te/de ni gnas med do//de'i skad 'gags
398b2(mdo sde): pAr yang mi 'gyur ro//chos smra ba de sngon gyi mi dge ba'i las kyis khams 'khrug pa 'am/skad 'gags par gyur na'ang des gzungs 'di klags na thams cad ma lus par
398b3(mdo sde): zhi bar 'gyur te/las yongs su byed nas bde bar 'gyur ro//chos nyan pa gang dag der 'du bar 'gyur ba de dag la su'ang khams 'khrug pa 'am/skad 'gags par byed par mi 'gyur/
398b4(mdo sde): ro//gang dag de na gzungs 'di nyan pa de dag kyang mi dge ba'i las kyis yun ring por na ba dang /khams 'khrug pa dang /skad 'gags pa de thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro//
398b5(mdo sde): de nas zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor can gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag ga la pA de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung
398b6(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag la dgongs su gsol gzungs 'di la dad pa stsal du gsol/'di lta ste/kha shan te/oM sa mA ro bi mr-i
398b7(mdo sde): tre so ma ba te/a hi na ba kun dza be na ba kun dza be/mI ye go d+ha ne/ba ha kha/ba ha kha mA ra pha ta thA tA pa ri tshe da ba ha saM ba taM sa a mu la/a tsa le/tsa tsa le/pu tsa la/d+hi
399a1(mdo sde): d+hA la/e ka na yus pa ri tshid/tsaN Di Na bo ra sa tri naM/kha ga sur ti Ne/b+hut+t+ra ko Ti pa ri tshidade/dza la khA/dza lA khA ba ye/dza la nA myA khyA sha kha ka ka
399a2(mdo sde): kha ha hA ha ha hu hu s+pha ra Sha be da na pA ri tshe da na/a mA mA nu ma ma khya ma ma sa mu dra mu dra ba/kha sau skA rA Na ma pa ri tshe dA Na/bo d+hi satwA k+Sha ti bi ma ma hA bi ma b+hu tI ko Ti a ka sha shA
399a3(mdo sde): sa pa ri tsho swA hA/yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad du gtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /nyan thos chen po de dag
399a4(mdo sde): dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /lha dang /bru dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /
399a5(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po de dag dang /sems can gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyang legs so zhes bya ba byin no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
399a6(mdo sde): de dag gis kyang 'di skad du/kye ma gzungs 'di ni stobs che ba drag shul dang ldan pa ste/dgra thams cad bzlog pa/'jigs pa dang /nad dang /rmi lam ngan pa dang /
399a7(mdo sde): ltas ngan pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar byed pa nas bsgrib pa med pa'i ye shes dang /bsod nams dang /ye shes chen po bsags pa/bla na med pa'i
399b1(mdo sde): ye shes kyi rgyu mthun pa'i bar gyi gzungs 'di bshad do//zhes bka' stsal to//yang de'i tshe tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug ces bya ba kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog
399b2(mdo sde): dang ldan pa/lha'i las 'das pa'i gos dang /sdud pa dang /rgyan dang /me tog dang /spos dang /phreng ba dang /byug pa dang /rgyuni chen po mchog rnams kyis lus brgyan nas
399b3(mdo sde): bud med kyi gzugs su bsgyur te/tshangs pa chen po'i stobs kyi yul bkod pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan snga na 'dug
399b4(mdo sde): go/de nas tshangs pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug stan las langs nas/thal mo sbyar te phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
399b5(mdo sde): rnams kyis gang bdag gis/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'dir dbyangs kyis go bar bgyi ba la dor bdag la bgegs cung zad kyang mi 'byung bar dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor
399b6(mdo sde): gyi tshig brjod pa rnam par gdon mi 'tshal ba bstan par bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/bdag gis da ltar chos smra ba rnams dang /chos nyan pa rnams kyi slad du 'di
399b7(mdo sde): 'dra ba'i gsang sngags kyi tshig bsrung ba bshad par bgyi ste/ci nas slad ma'i dus na bdud dam/bdud kyi 'khor ram/lha 'am/lha mo 'am/klu 'am/klu mo 'am/klu
400a1(mdo sde): rgan po 'am/klu rgan mo 'am/klu'i 'khor ram/klu'i 'khor mo 'am/klu'i bu pho 'am/klu'i bu mo 'am/de bzhin du rgyas par bgyi ste/sha za'am/sha za mo 'ang//
400a2(mdo sde): sha za rgan po'am/sha za rgan mo 'am/sha za'i 'khor ram/sha za'i 'khor mo 'am/sho za'i bu 'am/sha za'i bu mo 'am/mi 'am mi ma lags pa'i b.rarA gang la la chos smra ba rnams
400a3(mdo sde): dang /chos nyan pa rnams la glags lta ba 'am/skabs tshol ba'i dgra phyir rgol ba zhig mchis te/tha na chos smra ba'am/chos nyan pa rnams kyi spu'i khung bu gcig tsam la'ang
400a4(mdo sde): 'tshe ba 'am/gnod par bgyid dam/'jig par bgyid dam/mdangs 'phrog gam/lus la dbugs chen po gtong ngam/tha na skad cig gcig tsam yang sdang ba'i sems
400a5(mdo sde): kyis blta na/bdag gis bdud nas mi dang mi ma lags pa'i bar de dag bzlog pa dang /chad pas bcad pa dang /tshar bcad pa dang /rmugs pa dang /rengs pa dang /rmongs
400a6(mdo sde): par bgyi/bro rnal bar bgyi na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gang bdag gis/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di dbyangs kyis gang bar bgyi bar dbyangs kyi
400a7(mdo sde): dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyis brlab tu gsol/'di la su zhig bdag gi grogs su 'gyur/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis cang mi gsung bar
400b1(mdo sde): gyur pas gnang bar mdzad do//de nas brgya byin gtsug phud 'dzin ces bya ba dzam+bu chu bo'i gser gyi rgyan gyi 'od kyis lus brgyan nas ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug go/de nas
400b2(mdo sde): brgya byin gtsug phud 'dzin gyis tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug lnga 'di skad ces smras so//che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyi spyan sngar ma 'dug cig/che zhe
400b3(mdo sde): 'dir bag med par ma byed cig/bcom ldan 'das la ma 'tshe zhig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/byis pa rnams ni spros la dga'//de bzhin gshegs la spros mi mnga'//de dag skye 'jig
400b4(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyi//'dus byas drag kyang ston pa mdzad//de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzungs dang /yi ge dang /tshig rab tu dbye ba thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi tshul brnyes pa ste/tshe
400b5(mdo sde): zhe de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'di lta ste/nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du gcig pas de bzhin nyid la 'gal bar mi mdzad de/nam mkha' la ni 'du byed gsum gyi 'jig pa'i
400b6(mdo sde): mtshan nyid sgro btags pa med do//ji ltar 'du byed gsum la nam mkha' mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang 'dod pa'i yon tan la spro bar mi
400b7(mdo sde): mdzad/mi rtog/rnam par mi rtog/mi gnas/mngon par mi zhen te/de bzhin du srog la ma yin/skye ba po la ma yin/gso ba la ma yin/skyes bu la ma yin/gang zag la
401a1(mdo sde): ma yin/phung po dang /khams dang /skye mched rnams la'ang spo bar mi mdzad/mngon par mi glen na/che zho khyod kyis ji ltar na/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la
401a2(mdo sde): spro bar byed/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/lha'i dbang po rtog rtogs te tshig smros shig/khyod la des mi sdug pa'i 'bras bur gyur ta re/skyes bu
401a3(mdo sde): dam pa chen po 'di ni sangs rgyas mang po la lhag par bya ba byas shing /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o//skyes bu dam pa 'di ni de bzhin
401a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir legs par brtson nas/bud med kyi lus su mngon par sprul pa yin gyis 'di la bud med ces tshig tu ma brjod cig/de nas brgya byin
401a5(mdo sde): gtsug phud 'dzin gyis tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so//rigs kyi bu dag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te bzod par gsol/'di skad smos
401a6(mdo sde): pas bdag 'bras bu mi sdug pa thob par ma gyur cig/de nas byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das gal te brgya byin gyis tshig de slar ma
401a7(mdo sde): bshags na/de'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur/de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu gal te des ma ga shegs
401b1(mdo sde): sku zin na/tshe rabs brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'dod pa'i mngal smad pa bud med kyi dang sa ba yongs su blangs par 'gyur ro//de bsan rigs kyi ba ci nus kyang ngag gi las bsrung bar bya'o//
401b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis khyod kyi dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshig brjod pa byin gyi rlabs kyis khyod spobs par gyis shig/de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs
401b3(mdo sde): pa'i dbang phyug sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis thal mo sbyar te/phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas 'di skad ces smras so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams drang /byang
401b4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan thos chen po rnams dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin drang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /
401b5(mdo sde): me'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol/bdag gri bsam pa la chos kyi tshul 'di yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang /chos smra ba rnams dang /chos
401b6(mdo sde): nyan pa rnams dang /naunA tran dang ldan pa rnams la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar 'dir dad pa stsal du gsol/grang slad ma'i dus na bdud nas/mi dang mi ma legs pa'i bar gyis//
401b7(mdo sde): de dag la 'tshe bar mi bgyid par dad pa stsal du gsol/de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis de dag gis sdang ba'i sems bzlog pa dang /mnas bsgag
402a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir/dbyangs kyi sgo phyung nas/sgra des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad gang bar byas so//yang de'i tshe tshangs pa'i dbang po de dag thams cad kyis
402a2(mdo sde): mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so//bdag cag kyang gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul lo//bdag cag nyid kyis kyang phyi ma'i dus na gzungs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o//rab tu bstan
402a3(mdo sde): par bgyi'o//dam pa'i chos kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o//chos smra ba dang /nyan pa de dag dang /nan tan dang ldan pa de dag kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o//bdag cag gis sangs
402a4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan thos chen po rnams kyi spyan sngar gzungs 'di la dad pa 'bul gyis skyes
402a5(mdo sde): bu dam pa gsungs shig/de nas tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub
402a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /nyan thos chen po rnams kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab tu gsol/'di lta ste/a ma la/bi ma le/gaNau ShA Ne De/
402a7(mdo sde): /ha re tsaN De/ma hA naN De/tsa ma/ha tsa mya so mye/s+thA me/a ba he/bi ba hA/aM ga tsan+te tra/kha kha mU la pa ri tshe de ya kha sha tsa Na De/pri shA tsa tsa De/a brta ni/sam
402b1(mdo sde): dar+d+ha naM saukA ri Ni dzam b+hA ni/s+yAm b+hA ni/myo hA ni/u tsaT ni hA mat+ma/hA ma hA/muh+ma u gu tsi ne/kha ga sha ma/a ma le/a mu lA pa ri bad+d+he/a sa rI kha bu swA hA/gsang
402b2(mdo sde): sngags 'di las gang 'da' zhing //mang po tshogs par mi spyod na//mig mi mthong zhing mgo yang 'gas//yan lag tha dad 'jig par 'gyur/'di lta ste/A tsa tsa a
402b3(mdo sde): ba ha/tsa tsa tsu/khra khra sha tsa Tu Ta kha tsa ts+tsha na/khra ga tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa tsa nA tsa hA/mu lA tsa tsa tsa mu la tsa tsa ha mA mu la tsa tsa hA mu hA mu/ba u baM ha swA hA/de nas tshangs pa'i dbang po
402b4(mdo sde): thams cad nas sha za'i dbang po'i bar gyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/'di skad ces kyang smras so//stobs cheni stobs kyi shugs shin tu 'joms pa'i gsang sngags
402b5(mdo sde): kyi tshig 'di bshad de/phan pa ma yin par sems pa'i 'byung po thams cad la zhugs pa 'dis btab na de dag 'tsho bar ga la 'gyur/tshangs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i dbang
402b6(mdo sde): phyug gis 'di skad ces smras so//'byung po gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa can//snying rje med pa byas pa mi bzo ba//sems can la 'tshe ba rnams sam/bdud dam/bdud
402b7(mdo sde): kyi 'khor klags lta zhing skabs 'tshol ba rnams sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams la skabs 'tshol bu nye
403a1(mdo sde): bar 'ong ba dang /btsun mo dam pa dang /bu dang bu mo dang /btsun mo'i 'khor rnams dang /blon po dang /shor ba dang /dpung dam pa dang /'khor
403a2(mdo sde): rnams dang /gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khye'u dang /bu mo rnams dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dang /chos smra
403a3(mdo sde): ba dang /chos nyan pa rnams drang /dge slong dang /dge sbyong ma bsam gtan dang /kha ton la 'grus pa rnams dang /zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa rnams la skabs 'tshol
403a4(mdo sde): du 'ong zhing tha na sems kyi skad cig gcig la spu'i khung bu gcig tsAm lA 'tshe 'am/glanod par byed dam/'jigs par byed dam/mdangs 'phrog gram/lus la dbugs
403a5(mdo sde): gtong ngam/sdang ba'i sems kyis blta na/bdud nas mi dang mi ma yin par lus dri nga ba de dag gi mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas so//de dag gi mig kyang long bar 'gyur
403a6(mdo sde): ro//snying yang skems par 'gyur ro//sha bkra can du 'gyur/lus rul cing dring ba dang /rdzu 'phrul yang yongs su bri bar 'gyur/de dag sa gso par ltung bar 'gyur//
403a7(mdo sde): rlung gis kyang de dag phyogs bzhir gtor bar 'gyur/rdul gyis kyang yog nas de nyid du sems 'khrugs te 'thoms par 'gyur ro//gang dashas la rgyu ba de dag rnam
403b1(mdo sde): khung bur 'jug par 'gyur te/sa'i 'og tu dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad par 'gyur ro//gang dag chu na rgyu ba'i 'byung po sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa/
403b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par ma dad pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa'i rgyal rigs nas zhal ta byed pa la brtson pa'i dge slong gi bar la 'tshe'am/gsang
403b3(mdo sde): sngags kyi tshig 'di dag las 'da' na de dag kyang de bzhin du mgo tshal pa bdun du 'gas pa nas/de nyid du de dag gi tshe yongs su zad pa'i bar du 'gyur ro//yang yul gang du bdud
403b4(mdo sde): kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'byung ba der bdag gis bsrung ba dang /bskyab pa dang /sba ba'i slad du spro bar bgyi'o//der tshos 'dod pa'i
403b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi'o//sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas sdang ba'i lus srul po'i bar thams cad de nas bskyed par bgyi'o//yul de na 'thab pa dang /brtsod
403b6(mdo sde): pa dang /mu ge dang /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /dus ma lags pa'i char dang /rlung dang /grang ba dang /tsha ba dang /nad thams cad slar bzlog par bgyi'o//bde ba dang /
403b7(mdo sde): 'dum pa dang /lo legs pa dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba dang mthun pa rnams bsgrub par bgyi'o//chos smra ba rnams dang chos nyan pa rnams la nad ma mchis pa dang /grags pa dang //
404a1(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang /bsti stang chen po nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o//yang de'i tshe tshangs pa chen po dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
404a2(mdo sde): po sa bcu la gnas pa/tshangs pa'i nang du ni tshangs pa kun gyis bkurA/bdud kyi nang du ni bdud kun gyis bkur/brgya byin gyi nang du ni brgya byin kun gyis bkur ba nas de
404a3(mdo sde): bzhin du sbyar te/rnam thos kyi bu dang /'phags skyes po dang /mig mi bzang dang /yul 'khor bsrung dang /dbang phyug chen po dang /sred med kyi bu dang /lha ma yin dang ///
404a4(mdo sde): lha'i dbang po'i nang du ni de dag kun gyis bkur ba/kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/rgyan dam pas legs par brgyan pa bud med kyi gzugs dang /rtags dang //
404a5(mdo sde): spyod lam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar 'dug ste/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lag pa gnyis na yid bzhin gyi nor
404a6(mdo sde): bu rin po che thogs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub po de la mig mi 'dzums par bltas te/
404a7(mdo sde): gzhan ma yin pa'i dngos po brjod du med pa ci'ang ma yin par bltas so//de nas de bzhin pa/shegs pa shAkya thub pa des tshangs pa dbyangs dang ldan pa la 'di skad
404b1(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to//kye khyod mig mi 'dzums par ci'ang ma yin pa'i bar du du la ci zhig blta/ci 'di la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /rdzi 'angam yin zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yang
404b2(mdo sde): yod dam/de bzhin du 'dod chags dang /zhe sdang dang /gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnams yod do zhes bya ba'i mong gi dngos po ni rkyen gyi mtshan nyid do//mtshan nyid kyi rkyen
404b3(mdo sde): ni ma rig pa'o//ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams nas 'grog pa'i bar du rgyas par bya'o//gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ma mchis pas na de'i slad du ma rig
404b4(mdo sde): pa zhes gsungs na/bcom ldan 'das gal te ma rigs pa ma mchis na srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis de dag ga las skye bar 'gyur/ci nam mkha' las skye zhes bgyir ni nam
404b5(mdo sde): mkha' nyid kyang ma mchis pa'o//bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni nam mkha' lta bu'o//ji ltar nam
404b6(mdo sde): mkha' rdzas ma yin/mtshan nyid ma yin/mun pa ma yin/snang ba ma yin/rtog pa ma yin/rnam par rtog pa ma yin/grub pa ma yin/brjod pa ma yin/tswi'ang ma yin pa
404b7(mdo sde): cha shas med pa/dngos po thams cad spangs pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de bzhin nyid kyi phyir/sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs
405a1(mdo sde): su bcad pa'o//bri ba med pa dang /gang ba med pa'i phyir srungs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni pha rol dang tshu rol la reg pa med pa'o//chu shas med pa'i phyir sa m+b+ha rgya
405a2(mdo sde): kyi chos rnams ni brjod du med pa'o//mi g.yo zhing rnam par bzhug pa med pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni rjes dang /dngos po dang /mtshan nyid thams cad med pa'o//
405a3(mdo sde): tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni sgro btags pa med pa ste/yang dag pa ma yin pa/kun tu rtog pa las srid pa'i yan lag rnams skyes so//
405a4(mdo sde): bstan pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri bzhi sbyong gis/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol
405a5(mdo sde): pa/gal te sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha' lta bur dngos po ma mchis shing brjod du ma mchis pa la gros na/de ci'i slad du ye shes dang /brtson 'grus dang /thabs
405a6(mdo sde): dang /pha rol gnon pas khyod 'di ltar bdag la 'tshe//bdag gi bdud kyi yul 'joms/bdag gi bdud kyi yul nas sems can kha 'dren/'gro ba myed pa dang /
405a7(mdo sde): bong ba med pa dang /ci'ang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la slob tu 'dzud/gang gi tshe sems can 'di dag khyod kyis bslab pa la slob pa na de dag la nyon mongs pa skye ba'i spyod pa yang
405b1(mdo sde): dog byung nas sum mthong ngo //gang gi slad du khyod kyis bdag gi smang du blangs mod dpag tu med pa'i sbyangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /byung chub sems dpa' sems pa
405b2(mdo sde): chen po rnams dang /nyan thos chen po rnams dang /tshangs pa chen po rnams dang /brgya ban dang /'jig rteni skyong ba bzhi dang /dbang phyug chen po rnams dang /rdzu 'phrul gyi
405b3(mdo sde): mthu che ba'i lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri zla dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /myi 'am ci dang /lceng phye chen po rnams bsdus nas/sbyangs rgyas kyi ning ma
405b4(mdo sde): lus pa 'di dag gang bar bgyid/sto rje mang pa 'dis kyang gang dag thos ma thug tu bdag klad pa'i nang myi zad pas btab ste/sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong zhing /lus kyang drul
405b5(mdo sde): ma dring byur gyur pa de 'dra ba'i glus du stegs kyi tshig rnams bshad/yang dang tshe bdud drug khri brgyad stong dang /bdun kyi la bar grang ste ma dpag tu med pa dang /de bzhin
405b6(mdo sde): du sdang ba'i gnod sbyin dang /srin po dang //grul bum dang /sha za de dag thams myed kyis kyang mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so//bdag cig kyang thos ma thad
405b7(mdo sde): kladaben par gyur to/lus kyang rul zhing dri nga bar gyur nas shin tu sdug bsngal ba'i tshor ba myong ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
406a1(mdo sde): sdig can khyod kyis 'das pa de dran par byos shig/nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/khyod kyis nga bsad pa'i phyir dpag tshad bcu zhun cad kyis
406a2(mdo sde): dang nam mkha' bdud kyi sdes bkang ste 'ongs pa nas/da ltar bdud bye ba 'khor dang bcas te dwa bsad pa'i bar du bkye bas/de bas na khyod yongs su gdul ba dang /zhi bar
406a3(mdo sde): bya ba dang /yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba dang /de bzhin du bdud gzhan rnams nas/mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du gdul ba dang /zhi bar bya ba dang /sdug bsngal thams cad
406a4(mdo sde): nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang /'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa/ci'ang ma yin pa'i sgyu ma la bslab par bya ba dang /'gro ba thams cad du 'chi 'pho dang /skye ba'i 'khor ba'i chu kun bskam pa dang /
406a5(mdo sde): phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa' grangs
406a6(mdo sde): med dpag tu med pa nas/mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar rnams bsogs kyis/sdig con khyod de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cig/de ltar na

406b1(mdo sde): chechos 'ad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rnams kyang thob pa ba ku ro//yang de'i tshe/bdud drug khri ba ni stong dang /bdu kyi por grangs med dpag tu med pa
406b2(mdo sde): dang /sdang ba'i gnod sbyin nas lus srul po sdang ba'i bar gyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag cag gis kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
406b3(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed par bgyi na/ji ltar bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi chos nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu de dag mngon du 'gyur/thams cad las khyad par du 'phags
406b4(mdo sde): po'i sangs rgyas kyi yul 'di'ang thob par 'gyur/de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'di skad ces smras so//gal te bdag phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du klad pa na bor gyur kyang /bdag
406b5(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba'i g.yo rgyus byang chub tu sems mi bskyed do//de nas tshangs pa chen po dbyangs dang ldan pas 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir spangs

407a1(mdo sde): na bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs kyi/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma byung ba der bdag gis 'byung bar bgyi'o//gang du byung ba der ni shin tu

408b1(mdo sde): sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bdag la thugs pa ni bu mdzad du gsol/skyes bu'i mthu 'di nyam bu 'og tu chud par bgyi ba'i slad du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

411a7(mdo sde): bar 'gyur te/skye dgu'i tshe lo stong phrag bzhi bcu thub pa na mtshams med pa byed pa nas/mi dge ba bcu'i chos kyi bar dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang du/

411b6(mdo sde): yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag par chad med par mthong bar mo gyur tam+ba
411b7(mdo sde): bdag gis sngon byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa ni/sems can gang dag thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud pa dang /yang dag par 'dzin du
412a1(mdo sde): bcug pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa de dag phyogs bcur so sor sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
412a2(mdo sde): rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma mthong ba de srid du/bdag bla na med pa yang drug par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'o//ting nge 'dzin bkod
412a3(mdo sde): pa'i mthu 'di 'dra bas phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul skyed kyi/sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de drag dang gzhan
412a4(mdo sde): dag na'ang /sems can gang dag mtshams med pa byed pa dang /the tshom can nus mi dge ba'i chos kyi bar dang ldan par gyur pa de rnams de dag nam shi 'phos nas/
412a5(mdo sde): bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes la/bdag byang chub sems dpar 'gyur bzhin du/de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par bya ste/phyir mi ldog pa la so
412a6(mdo sde): sor bkod nas/de nas gdod bdag bla na myed pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar/skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu rgyun du
412a7(mdo sde): bya'o//zhes smon lam btab bo//de nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//gang dag da
412b1(mdo sde): rgyas da /gas pang pas kun pa s+ho// par bac+doMs/byung chubs sa dang nga tshun po dang sgyur pa mnan po 'di
412b2(mdo sde): 'dres pa dang /mkhyen pa dag/dI d+hA ba'i sa seMrgyas mtsham ldan 'dus na mas kyi rjes mnyam pa nyid du rje snru na pa'aM/chos kyi spri pos lus 'arnams pa
412b3(mdo sde): sa pa ba ma rgyas byug dza dade /tshig ra tu ts+tsha la 'jug pa lang bstan pa'i chos kyi rgyal ste/byin gyen pas sbyin ma thus pa 'di'ang mnyan pa'i sang dang /rnyed du ni
412b4(mdo sde): bdag cag gis legs par rnyed do//'dus pa chen po rin po che tog g+higangs las/dem pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//yang de'i
412b5(mdo sde): de zhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pas/thams cad dang ldan blo'i 'khor lo boswA te/'di skad ces bka' stsal to//rigs kyi bu dge brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /
412b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri zla dang /lha ma yin dang //nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lce 'phye chen po'i dbang po nas mi dang mi
412b7(mdo sde): ma yin pa'i bar du gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la dad pa 'dir lhags pa myed cag thams cad ngas spro bar bya'o//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dus pa
413a1(mdo sde): 'di lta bu 'di dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'dus pa 'di dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /lha
413a2(mdo sde): dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin drang /dri za dang /mi dang /myi ma yin pa 'dus pa 'di lta ba ni dkon no//de bas nu da khyod kyis 'di mthong nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir ma 'ongs
413a3(mdo sde): pa'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'di dang /chos kyi tshul 'di yongs su bskyed pa dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs 'di 'bar bar byed par spro ba dag gis/de de bzhin gshegs
413a4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi spyan sngar byed so so nas rang rang gi smon lam thob cig/yod de'i tshe/bdud dge slong me tog ces bya bas me tog dang /'bras bu dang /myu gu sna tshogs kyis
413a5(mdo sde): rin po che sna bdun gyi bro bo byur bur bkang ste/bud med kyi gzugs kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par bsgyur nas/bud med kyi gos dang /rgya ni mchog gis
413a6(mdo sde): brgyan te/'di skad ces gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir byon te bzhugs pa thams cad dang /gang gzhan yang su dag 'dir
413a7(mdo sde): 'dus pa thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la me tog dang /'bras bu dang /lo tog dang /myu gu thams cad
413b1(mdo sde): kyis b+hur bur yongs su bltam zhing rgyas pa'i bro bo 'di 'bul na/sems can thams cad la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis bdag na /
413b2(mdo sde): thob me tog dang /'bras bu dang /lo tog dang /myu gu thams cad kyis yongs su bltam pa 'di bzhes su gsol/'di ltar bdag bskal pa bzang po mtha' dag la sangs rgyas kyi
413b3(mdo sde): ma lus pa 'dir bud med kyi gzugs kyis/sems can rnams la zas dang /skom dang /'bras bu dang /me tog sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur bar dgyi/de dag kyang yongs
413b4(mdo sde): sosbyin par bgyi/bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa des bdag pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
413b5(mdo sde): rdzogs par tshang rgya bar bgyi/sems can gang dag bdag gis 'dul ba de dag kyang /yo byad kyis mi brel bar bdag gis rim gro bgyi na/bdag gi bsam pa rnams
413b6(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par dngos grub sbrul du gsol/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//skyes bu dam pa khyod 'di ltar sems
413b7(mdo sde): mngon par dad pas sbyin pa che zhing mtho ba byas pa dang /sangs rgyas thams cad le khyod kyis mchod pa byas pa legs so legs so//khyod kyi bre bo me tog dang /'bras bus yongs
414a1(mdo sde): su gang ba 'dri'ang bzhes so//khyod kyang me tog dang /'bras bu dang /'bru dang /lo tog la sogs pa ji ltar 'dod pa dang /gang gi phyir 'dod
414a2(mdo sde): pa rnyed par gyur cig/khyod kyi re ba yid kyi brnag pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/me tog dang /'bras bu dang /'bru phun sum tshogs pa grub par gyur cig/
414a3(mdo sde): 'byor pa'ang phun sum tshogs par gyur cig/de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis yang gsol pa/grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rda lnga dang /ljongs dang /ri brag gang
414a4(mdo sde): dgon bdud kyi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i gzungs 'di 'chang ngam/ston tam/'chad dam/glegs bam la bris te/bsti steng bgyi ba'i grong dang /grong khyer dang /
414a5(mdo sde): grong rdal dang /ljongs dang /ri brag de dag tu bdag gnas par bgyi'o//de dang de dag tu shing ljon pa rnams kyi me tog dang /'bras bu nas 'bru dang /lo tog gi bar
414a6(mdo sde): du bsgrub par bgyi'o//de dag thams cad na me tog dang /'bras bu 'tshalnga ba'i sems can rnams kyang tshim par bgyi'o//bcom ldan 'das lasrabs nas/tshe bsra
414a7(mdo sde): pa ma gtogs par gal te de na sems can me tog dang /'bras bu'i zas 'tshal ba 'ga' zhig me tog dang 'bras bu'i zas ma 'tshal ba'i slad du/'gum pa'i
414b1(mdo sde): dus bgyid par gyur na/dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang /'dus pa chen po ma lus pa 'di bdag gis bslus par 'gyur gyis
414b2(mdo sde): bdag kyang /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/gang yang de na sems can rnams me tog dang /'bras bu 'tshal
414b3(mdo sde): ba de ni bdag gi/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro//bcom ldan 'das de na me tog drang 'bras bu de dag 'tshal nas gang sems can de dag gcig
414b4(mdo sde): lA gcig phan pa dang /mnyen pa dang /snying rje'i sems su 'gyur ba de ni bdag gi/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
414b5(mdo sde): pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro//gang me tog dang /'bras bu 'tshal nas/brtson 'grus dang ldan par 'gyur ba de ni/de dag gi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
414b6(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro//gang sems dang sems las byung ba dag la mi rtag pa'i 'du shes 'jug pa de ni bdag gis/bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
414b7(mdo sde): pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro//gang me tog dang /'bras bu 'tshal nas tha na bya dang ri dgas kyang chos tshal bar gyur cing stong pa nyid la gnas na de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
415a1(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro//gzhan yang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang du byung ba der sems can rnams kyi 'bras dang /glo dang /nas dang /ti la drung /
415a2(mdo sde): moman sran sde'u dang /mon spun gre'u dang /rgya sran dang /sran chung dang /sran ma dang /gang drag lo tog tu gyur pa de dag 'tshal ba'i slad du bdag gis nan tan cher bgyi'o//
415a3(mdo sde): 'bru dang lo tog mang po dag gris kyang mdzad dang /bang ba thams cad yongs su bltam par bgyi'o//de na sems can gang tha na bya dang ri dgas ngag gis kyang 'tshal bar gyur
415a4(mdo sde): na/de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro//der bdag gi bu ram shing dang /rgun 'bru dang /bal po se'u'i khu shugs shin tu
415a5(mdo sde): mang po bsgrub par bgyi'o//der bdag gros sems can rnams kyi rdza ma dang /bum pa dang /bya skyogs rnams yongs su bltam par bgyi'o//gang de la tha na bya dang ri dgas
415a6(mdo sde): la sogs pas 'tshal na'ang de ni bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur te/de ltar bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa de dag yongs
415a7(mdo sde): su rdzogs nas/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /byang chub sems dpa'
415b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyis bdag gis/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di lta bu 'di la rjes su dgyes par mdzad du gsol/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
415b2(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyis cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnong ba mdzad do//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog ces bya bas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//skyes bu dem pa khyod
415b3(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i mthu chen po byed nus kyis/skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi stobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /spro ba dang /rtulnga ba de lta bus sems can thams cad gnyer bor gyis shig/
415b4(mdo sde): de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes tog de lus dbugs 'byin pa dri thos nas 'di skad ces gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
415b5(mdo sde): bdag la dgongs su gsol/gang la la zhig na/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mi spyod pa der bdag mi gnas kyi/gang la lar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der bdag gnas
415b6(mdo sde): te/se phyogs de na 'bru dang /sman dang /'bras bu dang /me tog gang dag 'byung ba de dag sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /kun spyod pa'i slad du/rab tu snum bag can dang //
415b7(mdo sde): shin tu che ba dang /shin tu mang ba dang /shin tu ro bda' ba dang /shin tu yongs su kha dog dang ldan par bsgrub par bgyi/sems can de dag kyang bza' ba dang /btung bas tshim par
416a1(mdo sde): ba kyi/sems can rnams kyi mdzod dang /bad ba dang /bum pa dang /rdza ma dang /bya sgyogs rnams shin tu yongs su bltam par brag+h+na/bla na gang ba dang /
416a2(mdo sde): dgas kyis de la 'tshal kyang /de ni bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyuro 'gyur ba dang /bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir bskal pa stong
416a3(mdo sde): thams cad du/sems can rnams la zas dang skom gyi longs spyod 'di lta bu bdag gis tshim par bgyi/de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing kun nus nyon mongs pa can du gyur
416a4(mdo sde): pa snyigs ma lnga dang ldan par gyur pa grangs ma mchis dpag tu mo mchis pa gang+gA'i rlung gi bye ma snyed rnams su bskal pa stong re re la'ang /skyes bu'i mthu chen po 'di lta
416a5(mdo sde): bu bgyi zhing /de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi na/bdag gi lasra yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
416a6(mdo sde): bar dngos grub stsal du gsol/bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni rang gi smon lam gyis 'gug pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig lags so//'di lta ste/tsA me kha tsam kha/
416a7(mdo sde): tsa me kha/bi bri ti ha te/ba ha ba ha ba ha/sma ra asma ra kA na/sa ra Ti/bi bi ba sa be/sar sa ra/in dre/ser ma hIn dre/sa ra badz+ren dre/ta ra badz+ran dre/ta ra pa ya
416b1(mdo sde): thamatham caca nams aH/thas mtsham/aHtha sa mthaHSha sa mtham yaH/ma
416b2(mdo sde): Asma kan/hu hu hu/hu hu hu/a srang ga dza be hu Sha kha ba yu ba he/u pa na ya/san ta ra pa ya/bi dza pha la puSh+Ta/o Sha d+hi/d+hA na d+ha n+yen tsan tra ak+Sha ye/dzA la ba la hIH/sma ra a s+phar kan/
416b3(mdo sde): saM myag pra ti pa na na pa ya saT ta kA li/ya ma mo/ma mi ma med tsa ba ra swA hA/bcom ldan dadas yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par
