416b8(mdo sde): kyis mgrin gcig tu legs so//zhes bya ba byin te/skyes bu dam pa khyod bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa dang /pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod
417a1(mdo sde): pa legs so lags so//kho ba cag gi bsod nams dang /brtson 'grus dang skabs dang /phyi rol gnon pas skyes bu'i mthu 'di lta bu mngon par grub bya /
417a2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//skyes bu dam pa 'di'i grogs byed par snying brtse ba can du spro'o//de nas bdud dge sbyong
417a3(mdo sde): me tog gi 'khor gang yin pa des mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag cag 'di'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing mdza' ba dang /rjes su mthun pa'i grogs bgyi'o//skyes
417a4(mdo sde): bu dam pa khyod nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/khyed kyis bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
417a5(mdo sde): nub tu lung ston cig/bdud dge sbyong me tog gis smras pa/bzhin bzangs dag de bzhin du gyur cig/sems can gang dag gis sa la sa bon rnams btab ste/me tog
417a6(mdo sde): dradang /'bras bu dang /dri kun tu spyod par gyur pa de'ang bdag cag lnga phan pa dang bde bar gyur cig/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la bdud dge sbyong me togra
417a7(mdo sde): gis 'di skad ces gsol to//bdog ni khyod kyi bstan pa 'dzin pa chos kyi tshul 'bar bar bgyid pa lags te/'di nyid du thog mar mu ge'i dgon pa rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i
417b1(mdo sde): skad du/nan tan cher bgyis/bcom ldan 'das bdag bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lhung bstan du gsol/de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog gis/de bzhin
417b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de la yan lag lngas phyag btsal te/phyogs gcig tu 'dug go//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdud dge sbyong me tog la 'di skad ces
417b3(mdo sde): bkra' stsal to//bde gshegs sras po dpa' bo pada'i gdong longs shig/de ring byang chub mchog tu smon lam snying po bteg/rtsa lag gcig pu snying rje skyes te bkres
417b4(mdo sde): pa'i sdug bsngal gyis//gzir ba'i 'gro ba 'di bkrol nas ni sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur//chos rnams rang bzhin dri med dag la nam mkha' 'dra ba drang //stong nyid mtshan
417b5(mdo sde): ma rnams dang smon pa'i yul las rab grol bar//rtogs nas zhing 'dir ring por mi thogs dpal ldan zhes bya ba'i//sangs rgyas dgra thul blo gros shin tu bstan pa nyid
417b6(mdo sde): du 'gyur//de nas bdud dge sbyong me tog mchog tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/bcom ldan 'das de dag la mai tog sna tshogs kyis gtor+ya to//yang de'i tshe/byang chub sems
417b7(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po grub pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba stan las langs te/thal mo sbyar nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la
418a1(mdo sde): dbyangs kyis go bar byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bdaka ya dgongs su gsol/bskal pa bzang po
418a2(mdo sde): byung nus bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi spyan sbya ru sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i slad du smon lam btab ste/sems can rnams kyi nad brgya
418a3(mdo sde): rtse bzhi rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/bud med kyi gzugs kyiso sA'i bcud las byen blangs te/rtswa dang rtsa ba sna tshogs kyi nang du sprul to//sems can rnams langs
418a4(mdo sde): spyod du bgyi ba dang /nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/sman bcud kyis len+d+ra brgya rtsa bzhi sbyar to//rtsa ba'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi bstan to//'bras bu'i sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang /
418a5(mdo sde): mr-i ri las bsgral ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang /'bru mar las duskal ba brgya rtsa bzhi dang /bkru sman brgya rtsa bzhi dang /sman na du med ces bya ba rgya rtsa bzhi nas bska ba'i phye ma dang /
418a6(mdo sde): ril bu dang /snar stsal ba'i bar du stong rta bzhi bstan to//sem sngo can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /nad zhi bIr bgyi ba dang /sems can la phan par bgyi ba'i
418a7(mdo sde): slad du bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig zhabs 'bring ba dang bcas pa la kun spyad pa sna tshogs kyis bsnyen bkur bgyis nas/der bdag byang
418b1(mdo sde): chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal ba dang /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gis bdag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/skye dgu'i tshe lo brgya
418b2(mdo sde): thub pa na/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba nas/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar dang ldan pa shAkya thub pa zhes
418b3(mdo sde): bya ba 'byung ngo //de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po dang /byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa chen po 'byung ste/der khyod bla na med pa
418b4(mdo sde): yang drag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro//de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub kyis kyang de skad ces bka' stsal to//de'i 'og tu 'od
418b5(mdo sde): srung gis kyang bdag la de skad ces bka' stsal nas/de'i tshe bdag gis sems can nad pa rnams kyi slad du/bskal pa chen po gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar du/sangs rgyas kyi
418b6(mdo sde): zhing 'dir sman chen po bcud kyis len gyi lhar gyur cig/der yang bdag gis sems can kun spyad pa dang /nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/sa'i bcud rgya chen po blangs nas//
418b7(mdo sde): rA dang /rtsa ba dang /lo ma dang /mdab ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu sna tshogs kyi nang du stsol to//de na sems can gang dag gis yang dag par sbyar te/'tshal nas
419a1(mdo sde): sems can de dag sdoms dang sems lus byung ba dag la mi rtag pa dang /sdug bsngal ba dang /stong pa dang /bdag med par so sor rtog par gang
419a2(mdo sde): 'jug pa de'ang bdag gi/smes rlab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur 'byor ba dang /ji ltar bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir skyes pa'i mthu chen po bgyid
419a3(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang bskal pa grang+gA'i klung gi bye mo snyed du/bdag gis bung
419a4(mdo sde): med kyi gzugs kyis spro ba chen po dang /stobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /rtul ba 'di lta bu dang /sems can nad pa yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /bsnyen bkur bgyi ba
419a5(mdo sde): 'di lta bus bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig/ces smon lam btab bo//da ltar yang bdug seMng+ges rgyas
419a6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar smon lam 'phel bar bgyid do//brgalnga pa chen po dang ldan pa/pha rol gnon pa/brtan pa dge sbyong me tog 'di'i grogs su yong
419a7(mdo sde): gyur cig/bdag cag gnyis kas kha dog gcig tu bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyin/bud med rnams yongs su smin par
419b1(mdo sde): gyi'o//bcom ldan 'das yang bdag cag gnyis kyis nad pa rnams dang /rgan po rnams kyi nad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/sa'i bcud las byin blangs la zas dang
419b2(mdo sde): skom dang /kha dog dang /dri dang /ro dang ldan pa sbyar bar bgyi ste/bdag gi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyur gyur cig/bdag bla na med pa
419b3(mdo sde): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhe na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag la lems so//zhes bgyi ba stsal du
419b4(mdo sde): gsol/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan du gsol/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
419b5(mdo sde): dag gis/skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs so//zhes de la legs so zhes bya ba byin no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
419b6(mdo sde): khyed ni 'jig rten nad pa'i sman pa gcig/de bzhin dbang po rnams la bde byed pa//pad+mo ldan pa zhing gtsang pad+ma der//rnam par snang mdzad ces bya rgyal bar 'gyur//de
419b7(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa 'dzin ces bya ba/lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/bud med kyis smon lam btab pa dang /de bzhin gshegs pa
420a1(mdo sde): shAkya thub pas de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyod ni ri drang sa 'dzin gcig pu ste//khyod kyi re ba myur du rdzogs par 'gyur//rgyal ldan zhing
420a2(mdo sde): mchog phun sum tshogs par ni//ye shes dbang phyug ces bya rgyal bar 'gyur//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla ma zhes bya ba/lung bstan pa thob par
420a3(mdo sde): 'dod nas/bud med kyi gzugs su spyod pas/smon lam btab pa dang /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyod kyis 'dir
420a4(mdo sde): ni thabs dang shes rab kyis//me tog 'bras bus sems can tshim byas nas//zhing mchog rnam par dag pa sgo ldan du//nyi ma mchog gi bde bar gshegs par
420a5(mdo sde): 'gyur//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i thal ba ston zhes bya bas/lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/bud med kyi gzugs kyis me la yongs su spyod pas//
420a6(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/smon lam btab pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'gro ba mi rtag 'du shes
420a7(mdo sde): byas nas ni//skye bo byang chub yongs su smin byas nas//skye bo rdul can zhing mchog rab bsngags par//me yi sgron ma bde bar gshegs par 'gyur//
420b1(mdo sde): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can la g.yo zhing /rdul dang bral ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/bud med kyi gzugs kyis rlung la yongs su spyod pas/sems
420b2(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/smon lam btab pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//g.yo bas sems can rnams la dga'
420b3(mdo sde): sbyar te//khyod ni nyon mongs rab tu zhi byed cing //rnam dag zhing du mnyam nyid don mthong ba//zla ba'i 'od ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa
420b4(mdo sde): mod pa'i sgron me lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/bud med kyi gzugs kyis nam mkha' la yongs su spyod pas/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/smon lam btab pa dang /
420b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i bar du de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//mi gnas ye shes ston pa mya ngan med//yang dag byang chub lam mchog don smra ba//sgrib pa
420b6(mdo sde): bsal cing chags pa med zhing du/ye shes mchog ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur//de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' spos mchog smra ba lung bstan pa thob par 'dod
420b7(mdo sde): nas/bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pa me tog la yongs su spyod pas/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab pa dang /de nas bcom ldan 'das
421a1(mdo sde): kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sangs rgyas lam mchog ston pa rnams la ni//me tog /spos mchog dag gis mchod byas nas//ma
421a2(mdo sde): tog 'byung gnas ning mchog rnam dag tu//kun nas smos kyi bde bar gshegs par 'gyur//de bzhin du byang chub sems dnga' khwa dog ngur smrig lung bstan pa
421a3(mdo sde): thob par 'dod nas/bud med kyi gzugs dang ldan pas tshon sna tshogs lnga yongs su spyod pas/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lami btab pa dang /de
421a4(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de la'ang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//'jig rten dur sgrog gos la btsud nas su//dkon mchog gsum rigs dga' bar ldan byas
421a5(mdo sde): nas//sngon por snang ba'i sangs rgyas zhing mchog tu//rin chen snang ba'i bde bar gshegs par 'gyur//de bzhin du sa bon dang /nags tshal dang /'bras bu'i lha
421a6(mdo sde): du ma nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa bdun gyi bar dag lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can
421a7(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba dang /bud med shin tu yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang /de dag
421b1(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa re rer lung bstan pa thob par gyur to//de ci'i phyir zhe na/pho mtshan gyur te mo mtshan thob la ni shin tu rnyed par sla la/mo mtshan gyur te pho mtshan//
421b2(mdo sde): thob pa ni shin tu rnyed par dka' ba'i phyir ro//de'i tshe nA lha dang klu chen po bye ba phrag brgya lung bstan pa thob par 'dod nas/byang chub tu smon lamra btab pa dang /tshigs
421b3(mdo sde): su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob po//de bzhin du lha ma yin dkrigs phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang /lha dang mi'i bu mo mi 'khrugs bye ba
421b4(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya skyong phrag bdun cu dang /bdud dang bdud kyi 'khor dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu nas/mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar dang /bram
421b5(mdo sde): ze dang /rgyal rigs dang /rje'u rigs dang /dmangs rigs dang /skyes pa dang /bud med dang /khyo'u dang /bu mo gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag bla na med pa yang dag
421b6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'dod pa dang /tshigs su bcad pa re res so sor lung bstan pa thob bo//mi dang /mi ma yin pa dang /de bzhin du lha dang /klu
421b7(mdo sde): dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /yi dgas dang /sha za bgrang ba las 'das pa sngon bla na med
422a1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa dag ni sems bskyed par gyur to//sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni phyir mi ldog pa'i
422a2(mdo sde): sa la gnas par gyur to//sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni/byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /bzod pa dang /gzungs sna tshogs thob par gyu ra to//
422a3(mdo sde): sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dag ni 'bras bu thob nas/'dod chags dang bral te zag pa zad par gyur to//sems can bgrang ba las 'das pa dge na nyon thos
422a4(mdo sde): dang /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las sems bskyed nas/sangs rgyas nyid du phyir me ldog pa'i sa lnga gnas par gyur te/de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di
422a5(mdo sde): skad ces gsol to//bdag cag thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o//gang dag
422a6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang /yi ger 'dri ba nas/'chang bar bgyid pa'i bar gyis gang zag de dag kyang /rig pas yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o//'dus pa
422a7(mdo sde): chen po rin po che tog gi gzungs las/lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas yang
422b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag thugs brtse bas dri ba'i slad du/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gshegs pa thams cad rigs kyi bu 'di dag
422b2(mdo sde): gis gos dang /zas dang /skom dang /sman dang /yo byad kyis sems can rnams shin tu tshim par bgyis te/bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems can rnams bla na med pa yang
422b3(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par bgyi ba dang /ci nas 'di dag sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/sems bskyed ma thag tu ci 'tshal ba dang /gang gi slad
422b4(mdo sde): du 'tshal ba dang /ji lta bu 'tshal ba'i gos dang /zas dang /skom dang /sman dang /yo byad rnams sprul pa 'am/byasham pa 'byor par 'gyur ba'i yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
422b5(mdo sde): ba dang /ci nas skyes bu dam pa 'di dag/skyes bu chen po mthu 'di lta bu bgyid pa dang /sems can rnams la longs spyod dang /yongs su spyod pas rim gro bgyid nus par 'di dag
422b6(mdo sde): la dgongs su gsol/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/thugs rje chen po dang /bsod nams dang /ye shes dang /bsam gtan gyis brgyan pa'i rgyu mthun
422b7(mdo sde): pa yid la mdzad pas/skyes bu dam pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//khyed kyi bsam pa dang /yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/dus gsum du gshegs
423a1(mdo sde): 'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/dge ba'i rna ba thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa'i gsung sngags kyi tshig 'di dag
423a2(mdo sde): sbyin no//'di lta ste/Sh+ya ho ba ba/d+hI ti ba ba/mu ni ba ba/sa t+ya ba ba/s+phon+ta/a lang ka ra ba ga/d+hA na ra sa ba ba/ma hA kA ru Na ba ba/ma hA pA ti ba ga/a mr-i hA ba ba/
423a3(mdo sde): bo ba/TI ti bra ga sa l-i la ba pra/khyo ga ba ba b+h+ra yu ba ba/brta pA ga/oM d+hiSh+ThAn pa pa/a ma pa ga~M a ha na na ba ba/t+yA b+hA ba ba/b+hU ta ko Ti ba ba/nir b+hI tI pra ba/tI ya
423a4(mdo sde): lan pa ba/twed+b+ha tu ka ba ba/tri bi mo k+Sha ba ba/tri sh+le ka b+ha ba/ra a d+hiSh+ThA naM bi ba/bri ba ba ba ba ba/sa ma tra yanA n+ya saMm tA/Ta Ta Te Ta/Te Ta D+haSh+Ta/sid d+hi sarba ku la sha
423a5(mdo sde): la mu la/a d+hiSh+ThA na ya swA hA/skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis/gsang sngags kyi cho ga bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa
423a6(mdo sde): 'di dag/sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /kun spyod pa dang /yongs su smin par bya bya dang /khyed kyi byang chub kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir gzung
423a7(mdo sde): zhig/yang de'i tshe/dge sbyong me tog dang /dpal gyi lho mo dang /rtsi'i lha mo grub pa'i blo gros dang /lha mos 'dzin l-i sogs te/byang chub sems dpa' khri thams
423b1(mdo sde): cad bud med kyi gzugs kyis/sems can rnams kyi longs spyod dang /kun spyod pa dang /yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/de dag thams cad mgrin gcig tu
423b2(mdo sde): 'di skad ces gsol to//bdag cag gi yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams kyis/gsang sngags kyi tshig 'dri dag gsungs
423b3(mdo sde): pa na/byin gyis brlabs 'dis bdag cag sems can thams cad la rim gro bgyid nus so//bdag cag bla na med pa'i ye shes de bsgrub par nus so//bdag cag gis sems can
423b4(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gzung bar bgyi zhing brtson pa drag pos spro bar bgyi'o//yang sems can thams cad la snying brtse
423b5(mdo sde): ba'i slad du nga dre bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sman sngar rang gi dam bcas pA la gnas par bgyi'o//lha 'am klu nas mi'i bar gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pas byin
423b6(mdo sde): gyi brlabs pa'i dram pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ma mchis par bgyid dam/zhig par bgyid dam/rnam par ma rungs par bgyid la/bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos yun rong
423b7(mdo sde): du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/gal te de me bzlog gam/nan tan ma bgyis na bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad bslus
424a1(mdo sde): par gyur cig/bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba ma gyur cig/kye grogs po dag lta nas
424a2(mdo sde): mi'i bAr gang la la zhig/dge slong dma?/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma la 'tshe la/gal te bradag cag gis de dag la bzlog gam/bdag
424a3(mdo sde): cag gis de dag gi 'khrug pa zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan mya bgyis nr-i/bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad
424a4(mdo sde): bslus par gyur cig/bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cog/bcom ldan 'das byang chub dron
424a5(mdo sde): du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig zhugs dang /chab dang /dug dang /mtshon dang /byang dang /rims zhag gcig pa dang /zhag gnyis
424a6(mdo sde): pa dang /zhag gsum pa dang /zhag bzhi pas 'jigs pa nas/lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /lus srul po dang /rgyal rigs dang /bram ze'i rigs dang /

424b1(mdo sde): par gyur pa las/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag dran na//
424b2(mdo sde): sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs te/bdag cag gis de dag gnod pa rnams las yongs su thar bar ma bgyis na/dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad
424b3(mdo sde): bdag cag gis bslus par gyur cig/bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ma gyur cig/de'i tshe gang dag sangs
424b4(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'dir ga togs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis de dag la legs so//zhes bya ba byin te/skyes bu dam pa khyed kyis legs par dam bcas
424b5(mdo sde): pa legs so legs so//khyed kyis skyes bu dam pa'i mthu chen po 'di lta bu byed nus so//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bdud sdig to can la 'di skad ces bka'
424b6(mdo sde): sAlA to//thub pa gshegs pa 'di dag la ni dad cing dga' ba'i mchog bskyed de//di ring gzhan gyi don phyir dga' bar myur du byang chub sems gzhol byos//sdig can
424b7(mdo sde): kyad ni rang gi yul nas rab tu grogs med mthu med kyis//thub pa la ni khyod kyis sngo zhing snyog par byed pa btang por byos//de nas bdud sdig can gyis gsol pa/khyad kyi tshig
425a1(mdo sde): gis byang chub dri mod dang bya'o sa pas gcig bdag mo bskyod//thubab ma gsung bzhugs shAg bdag la rjes su 'gro bla rnams kyang mchis//de dag
425a2(mdo sde): lhun cig bdag gis yul na dbyung dang de zhon par gnas pa bgyi//phun sum mchog 'dzin bdag mjus ji srid 'tsho ba khyod kyi dbang mi mchi//'dus pa chen hUM
425a3(mdo sde): rin po rje tog gi gzungs las spyong rje le'u ste dbu pa//bam pa brgyad pa ste tham//yad de'i tshad bzhin gshegs pa mye tog man+dAr ba
425a4(mdo sde): dri mos kyis/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub paM li 'di da ces gsungs so//ji ltar 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad padag
425a5(mdo sde): nus don te/nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas/dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di ni legs par byin gyis brlabs/bdud
425a6(mdo sde): bye ba ni pam+ba par mdzad/byams pa chen po dang /snying rje rjen po spyan gyis sems can+da rnams la ni gzigs/sdig pa'i lta ba las ni rab tu thar bar mdzad/
425a7(mdo sde): shes rab kyi sgron ma ni 'bar bar mdzad/zhi ba'i lam la ni bkodang /chos mnyam pa nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bgyi ba'i
425b1(mdo sde): gzungs phyag rgya dang /tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa lung bstan pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bshad/nag pa'i phyogs ni pham par mdzad/chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni btsugs
425b2(mdo sde): pa de bzhin du/da ltar phyogs bcu dag nA bzhugs shing grazhes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis kyang /sems can la thugs btso ba'i slad du/
425b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'du ba chen po mdzad de/chos kyi tshul 'di legs par byin gyis brlabs pa nas/chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs
425b4(mdo sde): ba'i bar du mdzad na/shAkya thub pa khyod ni nyi ma nub nas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir su zhig mchog tu 'gyur/dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di
425b5(mdo sde): 'bar bar bgyid par 'gyur/sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid par 'gyur/'dus pa chen po 'dir yang bgrang bar chud par 'gyur/bdag gis su'i lag tu
425b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par bgyi/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man+dA ra ba'i dri mo sa la 'di skad
425b7(mdo sde): ces gsungs so//sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa thob pa rnams sam/brgya byin nam/tshangs pa 'am/'jig rten skyong ba 'am
426a1(mdo sde): wA dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /g+hum+b+ha yin+d+ra dang /num mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lta 'phye chen po'i dbang po 'am/glang su'ang rung ste/chos
426a2(mdo sde): kyi tshul 'di la mngon par brtson pa rnams dang /gang dag dbus kyi gling bzhi po 'di dgra ni gnas pa/chos kyi tshul 'di lo mngon par dad pa'i brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang //
426a3(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba nas/lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bar de dag gi lag tu gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gtad par mdzod cig/de nas de bzhin
426a4(mdo sde): gshegs pa me tog man+ta ra bi'i dri mos kyis/dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga brjod pa thogs pa med pas/sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' dag khyab par mdzad nas/'di
426a5(mdo sde): skad ces bka' stsal to//grogs po dgra gang su dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa thams cad nyon cig/de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
426a6(mdo sde): rgyurgyas rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ba ni shin tu dkon no//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad gcig tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu 'dus pa 'di shin tu dkon te/
426a7(mdo sde): khyod la thugs brtse ba dang /sems can thams cad rjes su gzung ba dang /dam pa'i chos kyi tshul byin gyis brlabs pa dang /bla na med pa'i lam la bkod pa'i phyir//
426b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'di dag thams cad bsdus te//dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi chad par bya ba dang /sems can thams
426b2(mdo sde): cad yongs su smin par bya ba nas 'khor ba'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i bar gyi phyir/da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis/dus glosum du gtogs pa'i sa'i
426b3(mdo sde): khrims thams cad byin gyis brlabs so//chu'i khams thams cad dang /me'i khams thams cad dang /rlung gi khams thams cad dang /nam mkha'i khams thams cad byin
426b4(mdo sde): gyis brlabs so//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa'i/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i
426b5(mdo sde): chen po rnams dang /brgya byin dang /tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /lU dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /
426b6(mdo sde): lto 'phye chen po'i dbang bdag dang /gang dag gzi brjid che ba gzo brjid che ba'i sems can rnams dang /gang dag yang gling byizhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni gnas pa de dag thams
426b7(mdo sde): cad la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//kye grogs po dag sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/chos kyi tshul 'di byin gyis brlabs te/khyod kyi lag tu shin
427a1(mdo sde): tu gtad kyis ci nus 'dir dam pa'i chos 'di myur du mi 'jig pa dang /nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yid la gyis shig/
427a2(mdo sde): 'bar bar gyis shig/rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad po gang dgra 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/yi ger bris te/'chang ba'i blar
427a3(mdo sde): du byed pa dang /dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dgra bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma 'am/dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag de dag thams cad yongs su bsrung zhing
427a4(mdo sde): bskyang ba'i phyir/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi lag tu gtad kyis chos smra ba dang /chos la dga' ba dang /bsam gtan la mngon par dga' ba dang /chos nyan pa dang
427a5(mdo sde): dmo pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag rnams khyed kyis bsrung bar bya ba nas/yongs su bskyang ba'i bar du gyis shig/de ci'i phyir zhe na/de ban+dan gshegs pa dgra
427a6(mdo sde): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa'i/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang nyon mongs pa can snyigs ma lnga dang ldan
427a7(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dus nas chos kyi tshul 'di bsrung ba dang /mi nub par bya ba dang /dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag kun tu bsrung ba nas/sems
427b1(mdo sde): rkyen thams cad yongs su skyed par bya ba'i bar gyi byer/bAN+Di b+hin dang /zangs pa dang /'jog rten byung ba rnams cad dkyi lag tug d+hA dang //de bzhin du marmongs pa ldan//
427b2(mdo sde): phyogs bcur sang sar+b+ba sti ba tsam ldan 'das 'byung ba de dag rnams byung /nyin mangs btsun rtogs mA ny+dzu dang ldan pa'i srung sa rgyas kyi shing du ska nig+sa sa 'du
427b3(mdo sde): sems can la phan pa'i phyir/gzungs kyi glu sdang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang 'chad par 'gyur/chos kyi chu khA 'di'ang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur zhing /chos kyi
427b4(mdo sde): tshul 'di bsrung ba dang /yongs su bskyang ba'i phyir bye rgya byin dang /rmongs pa dang /'jig rten snang ba thams cad kyi lag tu gtad par 'gyur ro//de bzhin du ngang kyis kyang
427b5(mdo sde): da ltar kun tu bsrung ba dang /sems can yongs su smin por bya ba'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa rnams dang /gling bzhi po 'di na gnas pa'i bad+ma byin dong //
427b6(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang /'jig rten skyong ba dang /wA dang /klu dang /gaunod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /b+h+yo 'phye chen po'i dbang
427b7(mdo sde): po rnams kyi lag tu 'do shin tu gtad kyis/ci nas myur du mi 'jig cing /nub par mi 'gyur ba/de ltar khyed kyis dam pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di yid la gyis shig/
428a1(mdo sde): rab tu 'bar bar gyis shig/bsrung bar byas shika/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo drod pa gang dag dang /dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge slong
428a2(mdo sde): dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen mi rnams gang 'dus pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas glegs bam lnga bris te/'chang bar byed pa'i byar
428a3(mdo sde): dang /chos skye ba dang /chos nyan pa dang /bsam gtan la mngon par brtson pa rnams drang /dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa de dag la khyed kyis bsrung bar bya'o//ri mor bya'o//
428a4(mdo sde): mchod par bya'o//de ci'i phyir zhe na/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sangs rgas thams cad kyis/byin gyis brlabs pa ste/grong ngam/grong khyer ram grong rdal lom ldongs som ra//
428a5(mdo sde): brag gam/pho brang 'khor dang /dkon pa'i gnas nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang na/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa de 'chad dam/lung 'bog game/kun chub
428a6(mdo sde): per byed depa/than glegs ba mo la bris te/'chad na chos kyi bcud depa sa'i bcud dang /sems can gyi mdangs 'phel bar 'gyur te/khyod des mdangs dang ldan
428a7(mdo sde): zhing //gzi brjid dang /stobs dang /brtson 'grus dang /pha rol gnon pa dang ldan par 'gyur/khyod kyi g.yog 'khor dang /gzhal med khang yang 'phel bar 'gyur
428b1(mdo sde): mi'i rgyal po rnams kyang bsrung bar 'gyur te/de dag gri rgyal srid dang /dbang phyug kyang 'phol bar 'gyur te/de dag gi yul 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung bar 'gyur/
428b2(mdo sde): ro//dzam+bu'i gling gi rgyal po rnams kyang mngon par chos kyi bcud des tshim nas/gcig la gcig phan pa'i sems dang ldan par 'gyur ro//rgyal po de dag las kyi rnam
428b3(mdo sde): par smin pa la 'dra mngon par yid ches par 'gyur/dge ba'i sems su 'gyur/ser sna srid pa'i sems dang /phan pa'i dngos po'i sems dang /sngams can thams
428b4(mdo sde): cad li snying rje ba'i sems nas/yang dag pa'i lta ba'i bar du 'gyur ro//so so bdag gi yul lA'ang mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro//dzam+bu'i gling 'di'ang skye bo
428b5(mdo sde): rigs pas gang bar 'gyur/shin tu la legs pa dang /shin tu nyams dga' bar 'gyur/mi'i skye bo mang pos gang zhing sa 'ang mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur//
428b6(mdo sde): 'bras bu shin tu mdog bzang ba dang /shin tu zhim pa dang /lo ma'i sman dang /lo tog gi sman dang /nor dang /'bru rnams shin tu 'byor pa dang /nad med pa dang /

429a5(mdo sde): tshe ste/sems can rnams 'khor po'i pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'dus pa chen pos byin gyis brlabs te/grags pa 'phel zhing

429a7(mdo sde): 'gyur ro//mdor na tshe 'di la bud med kyi dngos po myong bar 'gyur bar 'phangs pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur te/mtshams med pa byed pa dang /dam pa'i chos
429b1(mdo sde): spong ba dang /'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa ma gtogs par gang gzhan lus dang ngag dang /yid kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa'i gnas ngan ldan de thams cad
429b2(mdo sde): yongs su byung bar 'gyur ro//gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tha na glegs bam la bris te/'chang na'ang 'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/byin gyis brlabs
429b3(mdo sde): pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus/de'i las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib po ri rab tsam yang byang bar 'gyur/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la dmigs pa
429b4(mdo sde): 'phel zhing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /bsam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang /lus dang drugra dang /yid
429b5(mdo sde): kyi legs par spyod pa thams cad 'phel bar 'gyur/lta ba ngan pa thams cad spong ba dang /dgra thams cad chos dang mthun par char gcod pa dang /zhi zhing phra ba'i las
429b6(mdo sde): thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro//yul gang du gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der/sangs rgyas thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa 'dus

430a4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/de na sems can gang dag zas dong skom gyis 'tsho ba de dag ni shin tu nad med pa dang /nor dang ldan pa dang /kha dog dang ldan pa dang /stobs dang ldan

430a8(mdo sde): dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thamaso cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa me tog man+dA ra ba'i dri/
430b1(mdo sde): mos kyis/'dus pa chen pa'i mdo'i chos kyi rdul 'di gzung ba dang /bshad pa dang /bsrung ba'i phyir/sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi ye shes kyi sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pas
430b2(mdo sde): don dang /tshig brjod pa'i tshul gyis/sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus pa 'di kun bkang nas/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /brgya byin gyi dbang
430b3(mdo sde): po nas tshangs pa'i dbang po dang /lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi bar du gung dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na gnas pa bal cher gling bzhi pa 'di ni gnas pa rnams la sangs
430b4(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis bkrus skyo ba mdzad do//yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la sogs pa gang dag bzod pa thob pa bye ba stong phrag
430b5(mdo sde): dgu bcu rtsa bdun sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'od na gnas pa 'di dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdog cag gis
430b6(mdo sde): kyang dus gsum du gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rigs pas ston par bkur b+h+ring gus pa chen pos bzung bar bgyi'o//snying rjes
430b7(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba nas bla na med pa'i lam gyi bar la dgod pa'i slad du bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal
431a1(mdo sde): dang /ljongs dang /yul 'khor dang /pho brang 'khor dang /dgon pa'i gnas rnams su rgyas par bstan par bgyi'o//dam pa'i chos yun ring du/
431a2(mdo sde): gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/snyoms can rnams kyang yongs su smin par bgyi'o//yang de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
431a3(mdo sde): de dag thams cad kyis legs so//zhes bya ba byin te/skyes bu dam pa dag legs so//legs so//khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/de nas brgya byin drang
431a4(mdo sde): tshangs pa nas lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i bor thams cad dang /gang dag gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir 'dus pa/sems can gzi brjid che ba/gzi brjid
431a5(mdo sde): che ba bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi de dag thums cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//bdug cag gis kyang dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas
431a6(mdo sde): par bgyi ba'i slad du/'dus po chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung bar bgyi ba nas rgyas par rab tu bshad pa'i bar du bgyi'o//yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o//
431a7(mdo sde): sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi'o//chos 'tshal ba dang /chos nyan pa'i gang zag rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o//yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o//gang
431b1(mdo sde): duchos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod par 'gyur ba der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi bkas bdag cag gis kyang 'thab pa dang /brjod pa dang /'thab mo dang /
431b2(mdo sde): 'gyed pa dang /mu ge dang /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /dus ma yin du'i rlung drung /char pa dang /grang ba dang /tsha ba dang /gdug pa dang /rtsub pa dang /rom

431b6(mdo sde): bya ba byin te/bzhin bzangs dag legs so legs so//khyed kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga'i phyir nun tAn gyis shig/de ltar na khyed
431b7(mdo sde): kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro//'di ltar khyod kyis sems can yongs su smin par
432a1(mdo sde): bya ba dang /dam pa'i chos kyi rdul 'bar bar bya ba dang /dam mA'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir brtson nu khyod ring por mi thags par myur/
432a2(mdo sde): du bla ni med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//de nas dbus kyi glong bzhi pa 'don gnas pa'i brgya byin dang /

432a5(mdo sde): chos kyi tshul 'di bstan par bgyi/bsrung bar bgyi/yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o//'dus pa chen po sangs rgyas thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i gzungs

432b1(mdo sde): grong dgra yang chos bsrung bar gnas pa 'am/chos smra ba 'am/chos nyan pa'i dge slong dang /dge slong ma dang /dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma dang /dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am
432b2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo rnams/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas blugs bum la dris te/'chang ba'i bar du bgyid pa dang /bsam gtan la brtson pa de dag bdag cag gis bsrung bar

432b7(mdo sde): kyis bdag cag mdangs dang ldan par 'gyur/stobs dang ldan/brtson 'grus dang ldan/mthu dang ldan/dran pa dang ldan/ye shes dang ldan/phyogs dang g.yog tu
433a1(mdo sde): ldan zhing /chos dang mthu thogs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro//de ltar bdag cag gis yul thams cad du 'thab pa dang /brtsod pa dang //'thab
433a2(mdo sde): mo dang /'gyed pa dang /mu ge dang /nad dang /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs dang /dus ma lags pa'i rlung dang /charar+ya dang /grang ba dang /chu ba dang /chur mi 'brub

433b1(mdo sde): slong dang /grong ltar dang /glang rdul dang /ljangs de dag na 'du sems can lha ldan par bgyi de'i skad du/bdag cug gos 'ad ma dang /yal ka dang /me k+ku
433b2(mdo sde): 'bras bu dang /steng bu dang /'bru dang /sman dang /ro dang /lo tog rnams shin tu snum pa dang /'dab ma dang /kha dog dang /ro che zhing mang bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/

433b4(mdo sde): dang /sdig pa yongs su sbyang ba dang /dpal dang /bsod nams 'byung ba chu ring por bsgrub par bgyi'o//grang dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /ltungs dang /yul

433b6(mdo sde): bam la bris te 'chang ngam/klog+sa ga mu/mchod dam/bsti stang bgyid cing /'chang ba de dag tu rgyal po rgyal rigs skye ba nas dbang bsrur ba 'byung ba de dag tu
433b7(mdo sde): bdag cag gis bsrung bar bgyi'o//yongs su bskyang bar bgyi/de dag la gnod pa bsal bar bgyi/phan pa bsgrub par bgyi/de ltad mo dang /bkra me shis pa
434a1(mdo sde): dang /ltas ngan pa dang /byed pa ngan pa dang /rkyen rlabs ngan pa dang /smon lam ngan pa dang /skyabs dran pa dang /tshul 'chos pa dang /khya
434a2(mdo sde): gsag dang /g.yo dang /sgyu dang /rdzun du spro ba dang /phrag rdog dang /khro ba dang /ser sna thams cad rab tu zhi bor bgyi'o//yang dag pa'i lta ba'i lame dred po
434a3(mdo sde): dang /dad pa dang /dul ba dang /kun sdom pa dang /ngo che shes pa dang /khrel yod pa la gzud par bgyi'o//de bzhin du btsun mo dam pA rnams dang /btsun
434a4(mdo sde): mo'i 'khor rnams dang /blon po dang /rtsis pa chen po dang /grong rdal pa dang /zhe shas 'tsho ba dang /ljongs kyi mi rnams dang /rigs bzhi rnams dang /bud
434a5(mdo sde): med dang /skyes pa dang /khye'u dang /bu mo rnams kyang bsrung zhing bskyang bar bgyi ba nas/dro tsha shes pa dang /khrel yod pa'i bar la gzud par bgyi'o//tha na
434a6(mdo sde): yul de dag tu rkang bzhi pa rnams kyang bsrung bar bgyi'o//gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba nas/glegs blam la bris te/gzhag pa'i bar
434a7(mdo sde): du bgyid na/sems can de dag la bdag cag gis de 'dra ma'i nan tan chen po dang rtul ba chen pos yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o//chos kyi tshul yang dag
434b1(mdo sde): par bstan pa'i slad du/bskal pa mtha' yas par nan tan tshor bgyi'o//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis/skyes bu dam pa de dag la
434b2(mdo sde): legs so zhes bya ba byin te/bzhin bzangs dag legs so legs so//khyod kyis de bzhin du gyis shig/khyed kyis chos kyi tshul dang /dkon mchog gsum mi nub
434b3(mdo sde): par nan tan byas na/de ltar khyed kyis dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro//'dus pa chen po rin
434b4(mdo sde): po che tog gi gzungs las/kun tu bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o////de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas brgya byin dang /
434b5(mdo sde): tshangs pa dang /'phags skyes po dang /mig mi bzang dang /yul 'khor srung dang /lus dran po rnams la bka' stsal pa/bzhin bzangs dag nga sems can la snying
434b6(mdo sde): rje'i smon lam gyis nyon mongs pa can skyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa chos kyi mu ge byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
434b7(mdo sde): par sangs rgyas te/sems can ma rig pa'i mun par zhugs pa/nyon mongs pa'i chom rkun dang /g.yo can gyis gtses pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir/
435a1(mdo sde): ngas bdud kyi phyogs ni pham par byas/dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan ni bsgreng /sems tsan+d+ra tshud med pa dag ni sdug bsngal rnams ltas yongs su
435a2(mdo sde): thar bar byas/dam pa'i chos kyi char ni phab/ras bdud bye ba ni pham par byas so//bzhin bzang de ni gang gi phyir/da ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang
435a3(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgrang ba las 'das pa dpag tu med pa rnams kyis/sangs rgyas
435a4(mdo sde): kyi zhing gi sa'i bcud dang /sems can gyi gnas kyi nyes pa rnams rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang /mi dge ba'i las thams
435a5(mdo sde): cad ma lus par zad par bya ba dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs yun ring du gnas par bya ba nas/sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa mtha' dag yongs su grub par
435a6(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/chos mnyam po nyid rdo rje lta bu brten pa'i chos kyi snying pos lus 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs phyag rgya dang /tshig rab tu dbye ba la 'jug pa/lung
435a7(mdo sde): bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlabs kyis de bzhin du khyed kyis kyang /byin gyis rlobs la bsrungs shig/gang de'i dam pa'i chos kyi tshul yang
435b1(mdo sde): ga par bsrung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa bsra bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshogs dang /gang lung 'brog pa dang /kha ton byed pa dang /dran pa dang /brjod pa dang /bshad
435b2(mdo sde): pa dang /dkon mchog gsum gyi skyabs su 'gro ba dang /dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa dang /tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas bsod nams mngon par 'du byed
435b3(mdo sde): pa'i chags dang /gang bsam gton dang po bsgom pa nas 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgom pa'i bar dang /gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba nas
435b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi byang chub mngon par 'du bya ba'i bar gyi bsod nams kyi tshogs dang /gang yang de 'dra ba'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba da ltar
435b5(mdo sde): byed pa dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byed par 'gyur ba nas/nga'i dam pa'i chos kyi sgron ma 'di 'bar bar 'gyur ba'i bar du bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba'i tshogs de
435b6(mdo sde): dag thams cad khyed kyi lag tu gtad do//gang de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud pa'i/chos kyi tshul yang dag par 'bar bar byed par brtson pa de dag gis/bsod
435b7(mdo sde): nams kyi tshogs kyang khyed kyi lag tu gtad do//ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa nas/tha na glegs bam la bris te/'chang ba'i bar
436a1(mdo sde): du byed pa de dag kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis las thams can byang par 'gyur ro//grogs tho dag grong ngam dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gang dang
436a2(mdo sde): gang na chos smra bA shin tu khrus bya sr-i tAM/gos sar po bgos nas/me tog bkrom pa'i 'khor gyi khyams su/spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa ras bcos bu dang /
436a3(mdo sde): ras sna tshogs ting ba'i seng ge'i khri la 'dug ste/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rtse mos 'chad dmo/tha na glegs pa mi lnga bris te/klog pa der gal te khyod chos
436a4(mdo sde): nyan pa dang /chos smra ba bsrung ba 'am/chos nyan pa rnams yongs su bskyang ba'am/bdag dang gzhan dang gnyi ga mi dge ba'i las yongs su zad par bya ba'i phyir der
436a5(mdo sde): ma dong na/de'i phyir khyod kyis bslus pa dang /lam bskyed pa la rmongs par byas par 'gyur ro//de nas bcom ldan 'das la mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad
436a6(mdo sde): ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das da ltar ma mchis po'i dus na/dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gyi bor du nub par gyur pa na/grong ngam/grong khyer ram/grong rdal lam
436a7(mdo sde): ljongs sam/ri brag gam/pho brang 'khor ram/gtsug lag khang ngam/dgon pa'i gnas sam/rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/bram ze'i khyim mam/tshong dpon gyi khyim mam//
436b1(mdo sde): dumangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen mchos smra ba dang /gluwAn yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
436b2(mdo sde): mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/yan lag shin tu byugs nas gus saR+sha paM 'tshul tAM/me tog bkram pra'i 'khor gyi khyams su spos sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa ras
436b3(mdo sde): bcos bu dang ras sna tshogs bting ba ro bro ba sna tshogs kyis bskor ba'i seng ge'i khril 'dug ste/lha'i rtse mos gzungs kyi phyag rgya 'di gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag
436b4(mdo sde): par rab tu bris te/klag pa dor chos nyan pa 'am/chos smra ba de bsrung ba 'am/chos nyan pa de dag dang /bdag dang gzhon gnyi ga'i nyon mongs pa'i las yongs
436b5(mdo sde): su sbyang ba'am/dge ba'i chos yongs su smin par bgyi ba 'am/chos kyi tshul chen po yang dag par 'bar brla bAgyi ba 'am/ye shes snang ba chen po mchog gi
436b6(mdo sde): la mo la 'jug pa'i slad du/bdag 'khor brgya stong du mas bskor te/der ma mchis sam/grang nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag yongs su bskyang ba dang /sems
436b7(mdo sde): can de dag gi nor dang /'bru dang /mdzod dang /bang ba mang po rab tu dgang ba'i slad du/der ma mchis na/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi spyan sngar bdag
437a1(mdo sde): gis/sngon ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'galnga bar 'gyur ro//'di lta ste/oM gu ha/oM gu ha/D+hang ga pu ra ha na/ya mi kha
437a2(mdo sde): kha kha kha/kha ba kha ba kha ba/kwin na kha ba swA hA/bcom ldan 'das 'di dag ni gal te bdag chos nyan pa'am/chos smra ba bsrung ba nas/nor dang /'bru dang /
437a3(mdo sde): mdzod dang /bang ba mang po rnam par 'phel bas/tshim par bgyi ba'i bar gyi slad du/der ma mchis ni/yi dam las 'gal ba 'gyur ba lags so//de
437a4(mdo sde): nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang /lha dang mi dang /lha ma yin thams
437a5(mdo sde): cad kyis mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa de la legs so/zhes bya ba rab tu byin no//de nas kau shi gas 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das da ltar
437a6(mdo sde): dang /ma mchis pa'i dus na grong ngam/grong khyor gang dang gang du zhes bya ba nas//'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thums cad kyi spyan sngar bdag gis sngon
437a7(mdo sde): ma thos pa'i bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'grol bar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i bar du'o//'di lta ste/kha ba mri kha/kha ba mri kha/na lI g+h+ra~M e mud nya/a mu ba
437b1(mdo sde): a ka Ta Ta/a kha a sha kha/dzi na pra khA swA hA/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dam+ba bcas pa bzhin du ma bgyis nA/'di ni bdag gi bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang
437b2(mdo sde): 'gal bar 'gyur ba nas/mi dang /mi ma yin pa dag gis/lce'i dbang po brgya byin la legs so//zhes bya ba byin pa'i bar du'o//de nas 'phags skyes pos kyang
437b3(mdo sde): gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das bla ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/grong gi bar du/glang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung bar ma bgyis na/bcom ldan
437b4(mdo sde): 'das 'di ni bdag gis bro bror ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur lags so//'di lta ste/u kha na ba na ba sa ba na/sa mu dra srad dId dzA/tA thA ts+tsha da ta/bA ru Na
437b5(mdo sde): ba bA rA dzA swA hA/mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pa la legs so/zhes bya ba rab tu byin no//de nas mig mi bzang gis kyang 'di skad
437b6(mdo sde): ces gsol tAM//bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na grong gi bar du glang dang gang du/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung bar ma bgyis na/bcom
437b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar bdag gis bro bor pa'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba legs so//'di lta ste/dza lo
438a1(mdo sde): g+ho/a to g+ha/a mA ma/mo g+ha/a ma sU rA dza na tsAr+ya ya ma dza swA hA/de nas mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang
438a2(mdo sde): la legs so//zhes bya ba rab tu byin no//de nas yul 'khor srung gis kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na//
438a3(mdo sde): grong gi bar du gang dang gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis bro bo ra ba'i dram bcas pa drang 'gal bar
438a4(mdo sde): 'gyur ba lags so//'di lta ste/bin du dza ba khA ba/dza ba ra mu kha/k+Sha sA ra/pu ka be ha/a mArga ba Ta swA hA/mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen
438a5(mdo sde): po yul 'khor srung la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no//de nas lus ngan pos kyang 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang /ma 'ongs
438a6(mdo sde): pa'i dus na/grong gi bar du gang dang gang du/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba ma bgyis na/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
438a7(mdo sde): kyi spyan sngar bro bor ba'i dam bcas pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur ba lags so//'di lta ste/k+Shu tre k+Shu k+Shu k+Sh+ya traM/kha k+Shu tri/a ti k+Shu tre/a na ya na k+Sh+ya traM/hr-i da k+Sha/
438b1(mdo sde): tra/sa ga rA hr-i da N+ya t+ye/sau ku su n+ya twe/d+harma DA yA mu tre swA hA/mi dang mI ma yin pa'i bar gyis rgyal po chen po lus ngan po la legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no//yang
438b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe/gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'di na yongs su skyong ba ltung nyis brgya dang /gzhan yang gling bzhi pa gzhan
438b3(mdo sde): na gnas pa bzhi khri dang /gzhan yang lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po rdzu
438b4(mdo sde): 'phrul che ba/rdzu 'phrul che ba de dag thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to//bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/dam pa'i chos kyi
438b5(mdo sde): sgron ma'i bar du nub par 'gyur ba'i tshe/glong ngam/grong khyer ram/grong rdul lAm/ljongs sam/rI b+hag gam/pho brang 'khorar+ya ram/dgon pa'i gnas sam/rgyal po'i pho brang
438b6(mdo sde): ngam/bram ze'i khyim mam/tshong dpon gyi khyim mamra/bdag nyid chen po'i khyim mam/dmangs kyi khyim gang dang gang du dge slong ngam/dge slong ma 'am/dge bsnyen nam/
438b7(mdo sde): dge bsnyen ma chos smra ba dang /gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo shin tu khrus bgyis te/yan lag shin tu byugs nas/gos sar pa bgos te/me
439a1(mdo sde): ma pa'i 'khor gyi khams su dayu bAnas bu tshogs sbyi ga/sgros sna tshogs kyis bdugs pa/rapra ba sna chags kyis bsdam pas brgyan
439a2(mdo sde): pa'i seng ge'i khri la mchis te/gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lce'i rnams gzhan la rgya cher yang dag par bshad dem/glegs bam la bris te
439a3(mdo sde): klog par gal te bdag cag re re zhing ying /'khor brgya song du mas bskor nas mA mchis sam/der chos nyan pa'am chos smra ba bsrung ba dang rang gi 'khor bsrung ba
439a4(mdo sde): dang /sems can gzhan yang bsrung ba dang /sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba'i slad du/grong ngam/grong rdal nus/dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar de dag tu ma
439a5(mdo sde): mdzes sam/'khor dang bcas pas bkra' ma mnos sam/yongs su ma bskyangs sam/der sems can rnams kyi nar dang /'bru dang /mdzod dang /bang ba
439a6(mdo sde): mang po rab tu ma bltam mA ma/der ma mchis sam/dwer sems can rnams kyi 'thab pa dang /brjod pa dang /mu gro dang /nad dang /pha rol gyi dmag tshogs
439a7(mdo sde): dang/dus ma lags pa'i char pa dang /rlung dang /shin tu grang ba dang /tsha ba rnams ma bzlog na//bdag cag gis 'das pa dang /ma byon pa dang /da ltar
439b1(mdo sde): byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la bslus pa dang /'khus pa dang /mnyes par ma bgyis par 'gyur te/lus la sha bkras btab pa dang /lha
439b2(mdo sde): ba yongs su nyams pa dang /lus rul bar 'gyur ro//bdag cag g.yog dang bcas pas/da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khums
439b3(mdo sde): 'dir/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di 'bar bar bgyi'o//chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad pa'i gang zag rnams bsrung bar bgyi'o//
439b4(mdo sde): yongs su bskyang bar bgyi'o//yongs su smin par bgyi/don par bgyis pa'i las yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i chos sme ba'i gang zag
439b5(mdo sde): de la bskul bar bgyi'o//chos smra ba dang /chos nyan pa de dag gi nor dang 'bru dang /longs spyod dang /kun spyod pa rnam par 'phel ba bsgrub par bgyi'o//rgyal
439b6(mdo sde): ba'i bstan pa myi 'jig pa'i chos su gzung bar bgyi'o//de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyis mI dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad lnga lags so/
439b7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byin no//de nas de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de wa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis zhus pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di ci lags
440a1(mdo sde): gang bdud bye ba phrag brgya po 'dir 'dus pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa lags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/thams cad
440a2(mdo sde): 'khor dang bcas pa'o//byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/ci 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyis dkon mchog gsum la dad pa thob pa
440a3(mdo sde): lpags sam/bcom ldan 'das kyis bkra' stsal pa/rigs kyi ba de ni ma yin no//bdud sdigs can g.yog stong yod pa 'di dad pa ma thob ste/'khrugs shing
440a4(mdo sde): yid mi dga' nas da ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang dam pa'i chos kyi tshul ji srid 'bar ba de srid du 'di blags blta zhing skabs tshol te/dam pa'i chos kyi tshul
440a5(mdo sde): gzhig pa dang nub par bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do//de bzhin du g.yog khro sum stong yod pa'i bdud bco brgyad dang /g.yog nyi shu rtsa gcig yod pa nyis brgya
440a6(mdo sde): 'dre dag kyang g.yog dang bcas pa dkon mchogo gsum lnga dad pa ma thob ste/'khrugs shing yid mi dga'o bas 'di dag da ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang
440a7(mdo sde): ji srid du dam pa'i chos kyi tshul rab tu rgyas pa de srid du 'di dag nga'i bstan pa la glags lta zhing skabs tshol te/dam pa'i chos kyi tshul gzhig pa dang /nub par
440b1(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do//de ci'i phyir zhe na/sngon chad khon du bzung ba dang /dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa dang /mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su zin pa dang /dge bas so zhing
440b2(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba mi 'dod pa dang /smon lam ma btab pa'i phyir/sems drang sems mtshams mi sbyor/drad par mi byed/gnas par mi byed/rab tu gtong bar
440b3(mdo sde): mi byed do//sangs rgyas 'dus pa chen po 'di lta bu mthong ba dang /gzungs zab mo 'di lta bu thos pas rgyu de nyid kyis phyin chad/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
440b4(mdo sde): la dad pa rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro//byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltararo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gal te sems can dge ba'i
440b5(mdo sde): rtsa ba ma bskrun pa rnams kyi/rna lam du grag par gyur pa na'ang /de nyid de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba ni/bcom ldan 'das shin
440b6(mdo sde): tu ngo mtshar to//bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to//yang de'i tshe bdud ri byi zhes bya ba sngon gyi rgyal ba le lhag par bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/dkon mchog/
440b7(mdo sde): gsum la dad pa mi nyams pa rnyed par gyur pa/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob pa de/drang srong chen po'i cha byad du/de bzhin
441a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa shwAk+Shasgrub pa'i san tha du 'dug par gyur nas/na las langs te/kun tu bltas nas thal mo sbyar te/su m+b+ha rgyas bcom ldan
441a2(mdo sde): 'das rnams kyis stobs bskyed pas/sangs kyi zhing ma lus phyi de dbyangs kyis gang bar byas te/'dri skad ces sbas so//sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang
441a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/lha dang klu dang /gnod sbyin dang /dri za dang /lho ma yin dang /nam mkha' lding
441a4(mdo sde): dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa dang /bdud g.yog dang bcas pa rnams kyang bdag gi tshig 'di la gson cig/bcom ldan 'das
441a5(mdo sde): shAkya thub pa thugs rje chen po mnga' ba/sangs rgyas kyi zhing skyigs ma lnga can thams cad rnam par gcod pa/yon tan bkod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
441a6(mdo sde): mdzad pa'i ston pa 'di/sngon gyi smon lam gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab tu nyon mongs pa tsan+da/snyigs ma lnga dang ldan pa 'di lta bur/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
441a7(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/sems can mtshams ma mchis pa bgyid pa/dam pa'i chos spong ba/'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa mi dge
441b1(mdo sde): 'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa/dran par spyod pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems kyi rgyud yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /ngan stong gsum las shin tu bzla ba dang /thog
441b2(mdo sde): pa gsum la yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /ting nge 'dzin dang /gzungs dang /bzod pa la dgyid pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byed pa dang /dkon
441b3(mdo sde): mchog gsum gyi gdung mi chad par mdzad pa'i slad du zhugs kyis de la khyed kyis kyang /ci nas ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi rdul 'di'ang
441b4(mdo sde): rnam par mi 'jig pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang /bsgrub pa dang mi ldan pa ma gtogs par/de ltar dang /ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ang /bdud dam/bdud kyi 'khor sus
441b5(mdo sde): kyang /de bzhin gshegs pas rab tu gsungs pa/rgyal ba'i bsten pa 'di la sems can 'ga' yang 'tshe ba 'am/rnam par 'jig pa 'am/nub par bgyid par mi
441b6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba dang /gang dag yang dam pa'i chos 'di 'dzin pra dang /ches la nun tan bgyid pa dang /chos smra ba dang /chos nyan pa'i dge slong ngam+ba/dge slong ma 'am/dge
441b7(mdo sde): bsnyen nam/dge bsnyen ma 'am/gzhan yang dad pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo las gsum la mngon par brtson pa bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po la dga' ba
442a1(mdo sde): dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i lus la mngon par brtson pa/khams gsum na spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa spong ba la mngon par brtson pa/sems
442a2(mdo sde): can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su thar bar bgyid par gyur pa/de dag la'ang bdud dam/bdud kyi bu mo 'am/bdud kyi 'khor rA ma/bdud kyi 'khor mo 'am//
442a3(mdo sde): bdud kyi pho nyas gtse ba'i bsam pas glags lta ba 'am/skabs tshol du mchi zhing g.yeng ba dang /dge ba'i bar chad kyi las bgyid par mi 'gyur pa de ltar mdzod
442a4(mdo sde): cig/da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la gsol lo//bdag la las kyi dngos grub stsal du gsol/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
442a5(mdo sde): po dang /bdud kyi 'khor thams cad dang /lha dang /klu dang /gnod sbyin+ya dang /dri za dang /lha ma yin dang /nemA mkha' lding dang /mi 'am ci dang /lto 'phye chen po
442a6(mdo sde): dang /mi dad mi ma yin pa thams cad kyang bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzod cig/gang su drag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir gtogs pa'i sa la gnas pa de dag
442a7(mdo sde): kyang /sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bkyi ba'i slad du/bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzod cig/
442b1(mdo sde): bdag la gsang sngags kyi dngos grub stsol cig/bdag gis bdud dang /bdud kyi 'khor dre nan tur gyis tshar bcad pa dang /sems 'khrugs pa dang /lus la gnod
442b2(mdo sde): pa dang /lus spa dgong ba dang /rdzu 'phrul nyams par bgyi ba'i sngags bshad par bgyi ste/des bdud dang /bdud kyi bu dang /bdud kyi bu mo dang /bdud kyi 'khor
442b3(mdo sde): dang /bdud kyi 'khor mo dang /bdud kyi pho nya gang bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la sems ma dad pa gcig tsam bskyed dam/dge slong la 'tshe ba 'am/tha na skad cig gcig
442b4(mdo sde): tsam yang sems 'khrug par bgyid pa nas/dge ba'i phyogs yongs su 'dri bar bgyid pa'i bar du nan tan bgyid pa dang /grong dang /grong khyer dang /grong rdal dang /
442b5(mdo sde): ljongs dang /pho brang 'khor dang /ri brag de rnams ma rung bar bgyid par sems bskyed pa dang /gang du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad par 'gyur ba de dag tu tha na

442b7(mdo sde): dang /chu bo dang /sa g.yo ba dang /sa 'gas pa dang /skar mda' ltung bar bgyid pa dang /lo ma dang /me tog dang /'bras bu dang /'bru dang /sman dang /ro skye bar mi
443a1(mdo sde): bgyid dam/ma drangs par bgyid par 'tshal na/bdud des de ltar sems bskyed ma thag tu bdud nas bdud kyi ba nyi'i bur de dag rims nad kyis rgyu bar
443a2(mdo sde): 'gyur/rAlus lci ba dang /rdul ba dang /lus rul ba dang /dri mi zhim pa dang /lngas su mi rung ba dang lhung mi nus par 'gyur/bcing ba lngas bcings par mthong ba
443a3(mdo sde): nas/de'i yan lag thams cad 'khums pa'i bar du 'gyur zhing /slar brkyang mi nus pa dang //de'i phyogs thams cad mun par gyur nas/nyi ma snang ba'i gzugs
443a4(mdo sde): nga mi mthong ba dang /de'i rdzu 'phrulo bri nas/sems 'khrug par 'gyur/de'i dbang po d+h+r-ig kyang spyod yul la 'jug mo nus par 'gyu ra//'di lta
443a5(mdo sde): l-i/a ha ma ma le/a dza pa ba/m+bA ra sa le/bya kha sa le/dza mas l-i/hwA hA/hA hA/hA tAM/gau ra sauTA Ta/dza na kha ban+d+ha dz+nyA ya kha ga/bid dz+nyA ba sa khaM ga/a mra

443b1(mdo sde): byin gyi rlabs kyis skad cig tu/bdud kyi yul thams cad med par byas te/'bras bu med par gyur to//gang su'ang rung gnod par 'dod pa dag kyang de bzhin no//de nas
443b2(mdo sde): de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lugs so zhes bya ba byin no//byang chub sems dpa shA sems dpa' chen po dang /mi dang /mi ma yin pa dang /lha thams cad kyis
443b3(mdo sde): kyang legs so zhes bya ba rab tu byin no//de nas de'i tshes ni g.yos/sprin ni 'khrugs/ri'i rgyal po rnams ni rab tu g.yos te/gang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la mngon par da

443b5(mdo sde): can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sra ba'i blo gros la smras pa/rigs kyi bu bdud ri byi 'di'i stobs ga las 'ong /mthu ga las 'ongs na/gang snying rje med pa 'dis rang gi
443b6(mdo sde): phyogs thams cad dang /nga'i stobs kyi yul dang /pha rol gnon pa thams cad ma lus par bcom te/nag po'i rtsa lag ni pham par byas/mi mthun pa chad par smra ba
443b7(mdo sde): dang /dge sbyong gau ta ma'i phyogs ni mtho bar byas/bdag kyang gzungs 'di thos ma thag tu lus dri mi zhim pa dang /lus rul ba dang /los su mi rung bar gyur/bdag gi
444a1(mdo sde): phyogs thams cad kyang mun par gyur te/snang zhing mthong ba med par byas nas/yongs su gdung ba chen pos kyang bdag gdungs so//byang chub sems
444a2(mdo sde): dpa' sra ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa/sdig can sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad kyi stobs bskyed pas/bdud ri
444a3(mdo sde): byis bdud kyi stobs kyi yul dang /pha rol gnon pa 'dir thams cad rnam par 'joms shing /des gzhan gyis mi tshugs pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang bshad
444a4(mdo sde): kyis/sdig can khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dad par gyis shig/ci nas khyod lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi sdug bsngal 'di dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur
444a5(mdo sde): bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu'ang sems bskyed cig/bdud sdig can gyis smras pa/bdag ni phyi ma'i mtha'i mu grangs med par 'di bas kyang
444a6(mdo sde): ches sdig pa'i lus dang /ngag dang /yid kyi sdug bsngal rnams la spro'i/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni sems mi bskyed do//'dus pa chen po
444a7(mdo sde): rin po che tog gi gzungs las/dam pa'i chos kyi tshul bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o////de nas yang gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog
444b1(mdo sde): gnas ni/gnad sbyin 'a jigs 'jigs lta bu'i gzugs su/yang dag shes ni ri dgas kyi gzugs su/shes pa'i sgron ma ni sde'u yi gzugs su/sred skyong ni ra'i gzugs su/
444b2(mdo sde): rgyun bcad pa ni glang po che'i gzugs su/sems can chen po lnga po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i drung nas/he cang yang mi ring ba zhig na/de bzhin gshegs pa kauN+Di n+ya
444b3(mdo sde): 'od 'phro ba'i spyan sngar 'khod nas de dag gi lus thams cad las rnam par dag cing /dri zhim pa'i 'od phyung ngo //de nas sems can chen po lnga po de dag gis/bcom ldan 'das
444b4(mdo sde): la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/nor bu rin po che chen po me'i 'od ces bya ba lag pa gnyis na thogs so//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis/de dag gis
444b5(mdo sde): bsam pa tshul bzhin rnam par dag pa la bltas te/'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'o snyam nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas de la bos te//
444b6(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so//kye skyes bu dam pa don gyi dbang gang mthong na khyed 'di lta bu'i spyod lam gyis/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mchod par bya ba'i phyir brtson
444b7(mdo sde): par byed/'brog gnas kyis smos pa/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig na/sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
445a1(mdo sde): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs zhes bya ba byung ngo //de'i tshe badrag cag lnga spun drung du gyur te/de na bdag cag gis bla na
445a2(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nan tan byas so//de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa
445a3(mdo sde): gtsug tor can dang /thams cad skyobs dang /bskal pa chen po bzang po 'di byung ma thag tu/de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig 'jig rten du byung gi bar du/
445a4(mdo sde): de na'ang de bzhin du bdag cag sngon gyi smon lam gyis spun drung du gyur te/de bzhin gshegs pa de la bdag cag gis mchod pa dang /bsnyen bkur rnam pa mang
445a5(mdo sde): po byas so//de nas yang der sems can chen po dge bsnyen yang dag shes/bsam gtan la mngon par dga' bas der 'di 'dra ba'i smon lam btab ste/bdag
445a6(mdo sde): bskol ba chen po bzang po 'di la/gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen por gyur la/de na 'brog dgon pa na gnas pa ma rungs pa/sems can rnams la snying rje dang /skying
445a7(mdo sde): brtse ba med par zhugs pa/byad gzugs tha dod pa'i gnod sbyin dag nas/lus srul po'i bar du de dag la bdag gis 'di 'dra ba'i chos bshad par bgyi ste/'di
445b1(mdo sde): ltar dad pa thob par byas nas/bslab pa 'dzin du bcud la zhi ba'i lam la bkod pa nas/don dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i ri dgas dang /nga kri dang /rku ba dang /

445b3(mdo sde): chos bshad pas yongs su smin par byas nas/theg pa gsum po dge la so sor bkod de/de nas gdod bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
445b4(mdo sde): bstan pa thob par shog cig ces byas so//de bzhin du gnod sbyin shes pa'i sgron mas spre'u gzugs kyi yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab bo//sred spong ra'i

445b6(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba'i phyir smon lam btab ste/de bzhin du gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po gling bzhi pa na gnas pa khri nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang

446a1(mdo sde): de'i spyan sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'tshol zhing bskul pa bzang po 'di thams cad du gnod sbyin ma rungs pa yongs su sbyin/
446a2(mdo sde): par bya ba'i phyir smon la mu btab bo//'di na gnod sbyin ma rungs pa/snying rje med pa/mi bzlo ba/yang ba spyod pa/sdig pa 'dod pa/snying rje dang mi ldan pa nas lus

446a4(mdo sde): pa/rgyal rigs dang /bram ze'i rigs dang /rje'u rigs dang /dmangs rigs kyi sems 'khrugs par byed pa/yul 'khor dang /grong dang /grong khyer dang

447b7(mdo sde): kyi bar du dkrug par byed mi nus so//rigs kyi bu grong ngam/grong phyir ram/grong rdal nas dmangs kyi khyim gyi bar du gdon rdo rje nam mkha' rtog 'jug ces
448a1(mdo sde): b+hA ba/'byung po thams cad kyi snying po dgra pa mi bzad pa chen mo rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bshad par gyur pa der gnod sbyin dang /lus
448a2(mdo sde): srul byo ma rangs pa de dag kyis sngon khon du bzung zhing mi dge pa'i las byed pa de dag thams cad btang nas/byams pa dang /snying rje dang /semya sa 'jam pa dang /

448a4(mdo sde): srub blo'i 'khrug pa thams cad dang //nyi ma dang /zla ba dang /gza' dang /rgyu skar dang /chad pa dang /dug dang /mtshon dang /byang dang /'khrug pa thams cad dang /
